story:
Elevate your workouts to the next level

Here's what you get with Athlos Live AI earbuds...

 

  • Hear feedback on your exercises as you workout

  • Our AI coach tailors motivation specifically for you

  • Cues your exercises and intervals: forget remembering workouts, managing timers

  • Get real time fitness insights mid exercise

  • Leave your phone behind while working out!

     

 

  • Automatically records your activities

  • Track swimming, running, interval workouts

  • No extra devices or apps needed while working out

  • The first earbuds to measure your vertical jump

 

 

  • Patented watertight designs

  • Hear crisp music underwater

  • Prototypes underwent 500+ hours of underwater submersion and swimming tests

  • Ear hooks fit with goggles to stay on

  • IPX8 rated. Swim for hours without worrying about any leakage

 

Elite sound systems for crisp audio on land and underwater

Athlos Live takes the best parts of a fitness tracker and injects it into a pair of extremely waterproof earbuds with high-fidelity sound quality. You'll get high fidelity music, precise fitness tracking, and live audio reports all in one device!

Athlos Live intelligent earbuds let you hear fitness insights as you workout, keeping you accountable with tailored motivation and timely cues. No more awkward fumbling with small screens mid exercise!

Most waterproof electronics this size can only last a mere 30 minutes underwater. Athlos Live's patented watertight designs and seals our earbuds last for 4+ hours underwater! With our advanced underwater audio systems, you can immerse in crisp music as you swim, even if water enters your ears! Our prototypes underwent hundreds of hours of underwater tests by swimmers to verify their waterproof capabilities.

The weak points of most waterproof devices are the buttons. Moving parts that make physical contact with sensors on the vulnerable PCB board are susceptible to wear and tear. Pressing these buttons over time weaken watertight seals, which lets water seep in. By replacing orthodox buttons with a contactless magnetic slider, we completely circumvented this problem by relying on magnetic fields to activate sensors, creating a watertight citadel that blocks any leakage from entering the device. Have fun in the water with our no-look controls!

Our built-in fitness tracking uses precise sensors and self-learning algorithms to analyze your movements and tailor audio feedback for you. No phone or watch needed! Just bring your earbuds and your activities will be automatically recorded. You can sync with the Athlos app and view your fitness progress afterwards.

Athlos Live earbuds are the only earpiece that can measure your vertical! All you have to do is jump, land, and listen for how high you jumped. It's the most convenient way to help increase your vertical!

We've constantly tested and listened to user feedback so that we can bring you the best product possible. It's been a journey overcoming huge challenges such as:

  • Making the device small and extraordinarily waterproof

  • Engineering a sound system that plays crisp music in the water

  • Efficiently fitting all our hardware into one compact device

  • Devising multi-tasking algorithms for fitness tracking and live realtime reporting

  • Creating a design that is comfortable on land and in water 

 

Store up to 5000+ songs in your earbuds or stream music directly from your phone/watch over strong wireless connections. Athlos Live music storage let's you keep your music, fitness tracking, and live audio reporting all in one device! No phone or watch is needed unless you choose to listen over a wireless connection. You'll get:

  • Incredible HD sound quality with deep bass and crystal clear trebles produced by advanced acoustic components.

  • The latest, state-of-the-art wireless technology for strong connections

Here's a look at some of the features that Athlos Live earbuds provide to enhance your workouts and empower your fitness life. 

Organized swim sets and intervals really boost your fitness, but the pain comes from remembering all the workout details,  doing interval mental math, and trying to read the pace clock – it's always too far away or inscrutable with foggy goggles. Athlos Live earbuds do it all for you! Just create your workout with the intuitive Athlos App, and they'll remember everything! You'll be prompted what to swim and when to go. You'll also get audio cues when you're halfway through the interval and when there are 10 seconds left before the next. No clock. No remembering. No interval math!

Use the Athlos app to create a HIIT (interval training) workout, and your earbuds will guide you through it. Forget about managing annoying timers, remembering exercises, or fumbling with a screen to see how much time is left! Athlos Live takes care of it all with audio cues.

Athlos Live is the only earpiece that measures your vertical jump. We use innovative, patented algorithms that detect when your body takes off from the ground. Ditch the equipment – just jump and listen for your vertical when you land! 

Dive in and use your Athlos Live earbuds for lap swimming! We'll automatically record your workouts, and you'll hear your lap count, time, and calories burned after each turn. You'll also get timely motivation and encouragement from our AI coach. 

Leave that phone or watch behind, and still get the music, fitness tracking, and live audio insights you want! Although Athlos Live earbuds are device independent, you can also connect to another device with reliable wireless connections.  

Compete against your goal times by setting goal splits with the Athlos app. As you swim, your earbuds will tell you how ahead or behind you are from those splits, helping you stay on pace!


 

 

Athlos Live Earbuds Currently in Production!

Model: AthlosLive-01

FCC ID: 2A2YB-ALA

Fully tested and fully functional units from first production run

 

Fully tested and fully functional printed circle boards (PCBs), the brain of Athlos Live earbuds, are ready for mass production assembly.

 

Right earpiece mold 

 

Left earpiece mold

 

All components (over 20) are ready for mass production.  Here are some examples.

 

Packaging box and earbuds storage case

story:
Introducing Tomo

We are passionate about ending that nasty feeling after drinking to help you experience a healthier, happier, and more productive self. We are excited to launch our new product, Tomo, that encompasses improvements to the efficacy, taste, and branding from your feedback on our prior product (Mentis - thank you to everyone who contributed!). Since launching our first product at Yale University in 2016, we have created a vibrant community of loyal followers, been featured in various articles (including Vice, Forbes, Time, Cosmopolitan, and Men's Health), and received spectacular reviews on the efficacy of our product. With your support, we would like to make our new and improved product available to everyone.

Our Story

Two Yale students came together in 2016 to solve a pressing issue seen all around them: crippling hangovers. Margaret Morse, a Molecular, Cellular & Developmental Biology major, and Liam Mcclintock, a D1 athlete and expert in nutritional supplements, combined their passions and knowledge to bring our first post-alcohol recovery product, Mentis, to life.

Sam, an experienced entrepreneur with a passion for health and fitness, joined the team in 2020 as our CEO. He fell in love with our product when he was pursuing his MBA at Stanford University while taking advantage of the lively social scene. Sam recruited our Chief Scientist, Dr. Joris Verster, to improve our product formula and is working to expand our reach to a broader audience.

Over the years, we have built a loyal community of followers and customers and have been gathering feedback from this community to further improve our popular product. With new ingredients added based on the latest research on hangovers, an improved taste, and a new brand, we are excited to launch Tomo.

Our Team

Margaret Morse, Chairman
Margaret has a passion for health and nutritional science. She invented Tomo while pursuing a B.S. in Molecular, Cellular, and Developmental Biology at Yale University. She enjoys following the latest clinical studies and journals in the space and is responsible for conducting cutting-edge scientific research for Tomo.

Sam Yang, CEO
Sam loves wellness and fitness and has a broad spectrum of experiences in healthcare. Most notably, he led a research team to receive a health innovation grant from the National Science Foundation. Sam holds a B.A. from Brown University and an M.B.A. from Stanford Graduate School of Business. Sam is responsible for Tomo’s operations and research.

Dr. Joris Verster, Chief Scientist
Joris is an associate professor at the Division of Pharmacology at Utrecht University in the Netherlands. He has conducted extensive research into the effects of alcohol and drug use as risk factors in health and disease, including the causes and consequences of discomfort after drinking. Verster is the founder of the Alcohol Hangover Research Group and is the (co)-author of over 200 scientific articles and book chapters.

John Friedman, Advisor
John has extensive experience in healthcare venture capital as CEO of Easton Capital and through serving on the board of several biotech and pharmaceutical companies. He provides business guidance and product advice.

How it Works

We've got the science covered, so you can have a fun night and wake up all right. Tomo aims to address the three root causes of that nasty feeling after drinking:

The combination of nutrients in Tomo is intended to prime your body for alcohol consumption. For a more in-depth explanation of the science behind our formula, click here.

Below is a full list of ingredients in Tomo:

Tomo has no added sugar, is gluten-free, soy-free, and made in the USA.

Customers Love Us

We have received spectacular reviews on the efficacy of our product over the last five years and have been featured by over 100 media outlets.

What You Get

We have a number of perks available for you:

Video Thank You From Founders: video from our founders thanking you for your support

Try It Out: 1 box of Tomo (10 servings) at a 10% discount

Double or Nothing: 2 boxes of Tomo (20 servings) at a 15% discount

Animal House: 5 boxes of Tomo (50 servings) at a 20% discount

Carpe Diem: 10 boxes of Tomo (100 servings) at a 25% discount

Legend: 40 boxes of Tomo (400 servings) at a 30% discount and your name featured on our website

Distribution: 75 boxes of Tomo (750 servings) at a 35% discount

Additional Information

The final Tomo product should be delivered to your doorstep no later than March 2022.

Tomo will retail at $35 per serving.

Please check out our website for more information. If you have any questions regarding our campaign, feel free to email us at hello@tomolabs.co. Thanks!

Legal Disclaimer:

*These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

story:
VibeRise by PAQ

A silent alarm to replace loud, noisy alarms and inefficient sleep aids.

Wake up effortlessly, naturally, and with more energy than ever before - all on silent. The VibeRise band immediately improves mornings by optimizing your transition from sleep to wakefulness, and its companion app has easy-to-use features with actionable insights that make improving your sleep health a breeze.

VibeRise can save your mornings, your mood, and even your relationships. But that’s just the tip of the iceberg.

 

 

 

 

No more groggy mornings or going to bed dreading the morning.

Loud alarms are terrible for your health & sleep environment. They make it nearly impossible to feel well-rested when waking up to a noisy alarm, and sets you up for exhaustion.

VibeRise eliminates all noises and intense settings that ruin your quality of sleep. The VibeRise app adds to the ability to understand your own sleep behaviors, and fast forward to waking up better & improving your sleep health long-term.

 

 

Introducing VibeRise.

VibeRise is both a silent wearable alarm & sleep tracker. We're growing in the right direction to improve the way you wake up, for better mornings and long-term sleep insights.

 

 

 

VibeRise makes sleep smarter and better.

VibeRise is an advanced silent alarm reinvented to make us love waking up again. It’s a soft wrist wearable built with silent sensors that use Vibrotactile Haptic Feedback that gradually nudges your brain out of your current sleep stage, and slowly syncs your sleep cycle to your body’s ideal circadian rhythm. 

 

 

 

The best solution for long-term health and enjoyable mornings.

Sleep is important for your health, your mood, your productivity, and your quality of life. 

This is the best sleepwear for improving your sleep hygiene and protecting your sleep environment. It eliminates the need for disruptive loud alarms and inefficient sleep trackers. 

VibeRise was built to support healthy sleep for all types of sleepers and sleep environments. You can wake  up feeling well-rested no matter how early you have to be up or how little sleep you got*.

*VibeRise is not a substitute for insufficient sleep.

 

 

Built for all types of sleepers and sleep environments.

 

 

 

 

Benefits to waking up better.

Wake up easier.

VibeRise uses gentle-wake features to nudge you out of your sleep cycle without jolting you awake.

It will reduce grogginess when you wake up, so you feel well-rested and are less-likely to snooze or oversleep. It immediately improves your mood which also benefits your productivity and energy throughout the day.

 

 

 

Reduced morning stress.

VibeRise protects you from physically waking up to stressors, which makes it easier to enjoy waking up every morning.

 

 

Improving long-term sleep.

Better sleep is about understanding your own sleep behaviors and patterns over time.

VibeRise tracks the important details from the moment you set your alarm to the moment you wake up. You can gauge how your sleep performance changes over time. Whether you’re an early riser or a heavy sleeper, you can manage your sleep for your personal needs. 

 

 

Better sleep for everyone, anywhere, anytime.

Waking up to someone else’s alarm is frustrating and stressful. With VibeRise, this will never going to be an issue again, even with different morning routines or different sleep habits.

VibeRise is small and portable, so you can use it anywhere you go. Subtle designs wake you up with minimal disruption, preserve your sleep environment, and make maximum improvements to your sleep health. 

 

 

Easy to use and benefits are long-lasting.

With an increasing need for smarter sleep tech, VibeRise is the first to optimize both the way we wake up in the morning as well as improve our overall sleep health by waking you up feeling well-rested.

 

 

 

Product Features

Vibrotactile Haptic Feedback

Similar to bone conduction in some modern headphones, VibeRise places powerful, silent haptic motors directly on your wrist bones. This allows soft feedback from Viberise to create a strong sensation felt throughout the entirety of your forearm. VHF makes VibeRise gentle, yet reliable in waking you up from even the deepest phases of sleep..

 

 

Smart fabric. Comfort is our strong point.

Made from flexible, soft-to-the-touch fabrics, VibeRise is the most comfortable wearable to wear to sleep every night.

 

 

Seamless integration with mobile app.

When you wear your device to bed, it automatically collects insights about your sleep based on when you set your alarm, and how you woke up. It’s easy and efficient; all you have to do is wake up.

 

 

 

App Features

Actionable insights.

VibeRise knows everything from the moment you set your alarm to the minute you wake up. You can assess not just last night's sleep quality, but also look at your sleep habits over a period of time.

 

 

Tracks sleep behavior.

VibeRise makes it easy to understand your personal sleep type and routine. From the moment you wake up, you can assess your sleep quality score and understand how you slept.

 

 

A complete sleep stats assessment.

Easily access a full overview of individual stats from last night, as well as long-term. 

 

 

Understand last night, every night.

Insights and data are easy to break down. VibeRise makes it easy to understand your personal sleep patterns and habits, and facilitate real impact.

 

 

 

 

Long-term foundation for better health & quality of life.

 

 Our insights help you avoid prolonging sleep debt, set up a consistent bedtime schedule, and protect your sleep health with smarter insights. Overall VibeRise sets up a health foundation for a better quality of life.

 

 

Your health.

With our busy lives and work schedules, it’s a priority to focus on our health. Being well-rested is a foundation for better physical, mental, and emotional health. VibeRise makes waking up enjoyable to make better choices for our health even easier.

 

 

 

Better sleep.

How you wake up is as important as how much you sleep. 

Overall waking up well-rested gives you the energy and mood to stay feeling good even well after the morning. You don’t run into the problem of feeling like you’re running on empty during the day. You build healthy, consistent sleep schedules just by waking up well-rested.

 

New 200% goal!

We are ramping up to reach our 200% funding goal. When we do, we're going to give all backers a carrying case, perfect for taking VibeRise on-the-go and for safekeeping.

We are incredibly grateful for your support in this project.

 

 

 

 

About PAQ

We love sustainability.

We are sleep enthusiasts who care about people, and the world. We make sleep tech that's both sustainable for our health and for the environment.

When we travel, we like to be prepared. As avid adventurers, we make sure we're waking up in time to get the most out of our day. 

 

 

* Our timeline has been updated to reflect changes in working conditions so that we can operate safely and give our backers the best quality product. We apologize for last minute delays, and we aim to answer any of your questions for PAQ at our social media and email support@paqwear.com.

 

*We are offering free shipping for the U.S.!

For worldwide: We don't know your address yet, but if you're ordering from outside the U.S, we'll let you know the costs.

If it doesn't work out for you, we'll give you a full refund.

 

 

We make long-term benefits affordable

We've been testing with various sleep types and sleep environments, updating our app to collect more detailed, long-term benefits for your sleep health.

We've been using VibeRise to wake up every morning for a few months now and have noticed huge improvements for our sleep (especially for heavy sleepers!). We're extremely excited to get this to you all as soon as possible.

 

Why now?

We value everyone who has helped us on this journey, and we want to make sure that we are able to support all your questions and concerns. 

As a company we believe that it's important to keep moving forward, even during trying times. We're doing what's best for our teammates as a small business, and we're dedicated to bringing you a product that is guaranteed to improve your quality of life.

 

 

Specifications

 

 

Check out PAQ

Follow our journey for more updates and deals 

We are sleep enthusiasts and adventurers. We get the most out of spending every day doing, and making sure we make the most of our mornings.

As we kickstart our first product, we're also expanding and growing our company. We're growing in an incredible industry between sleep and health and tech; there are so many developments we could be making. Already revolutionizing the alarm clock for the future is a huge step towards innovation. We value your support along this journey as we continue to bring the best, most advanced sleep products that improve our quality of life.

Easy to use and benefits are long-lasting.
With an increasing need for smarter sleep tech, VibeRise is the first to optimize both the way we wake up in the morning as well as improve our overall sleep health by waking you up feeling well-rested.

 
 
 
Product Features
Vibrotactile Haptic Feedback
Similar to bone conduction in some modern headphones, VibeRise places powerful, silent haptic motors directly on your wrist bones. This allows soft feedback from Viberise to create a strong sensation felt throughout the entirety of your forearm. VHF makes VibeRise gentle, yet reliable in waking you up from even the deepest phases of sleep..

 
 
Smart fabric. Comfort is our strong point.
Made from flexible, soft-to-the-touch fabrics, VibeRise is the most comfortable wearable to wear to sleep every night.


 
 
Seamless integration with mobile app.
When you wear your device to bed, it automatically collects insights about your sleep based on when you set your alarm, and how you woke up. It’s easy and efficient; all you have to do is wake up.

 
 
 
App Features
Actionable insights.
VibeRise knows everything from the moment you set your alarm to the minute you wake up. You can assess not just last night's sleep quality, but also look at your sleep habits over a period of time.

 
 
Tracks sleep behavior.
VibeRise makes it easy to understand your personal sleep type and routine. From the moment you wake up, you can assess your sleep quality score and understand how you slept.

 
 
A complete sleep stats assessment.
Easily access a full overview of individual stats from last night, as well as long-term. 

 
 
Understand last night, every night.
Insights and data are easy to break down. VibeRise makes it easy to understand your personal sleep patterns and habits, and facilitate real impact.

 
 
 
 
Long-term foundation for better health & quality of life.

 
 Our insights help you avoid prolonging sleep debt, set up a consistent bedtime schedule, and protect your sleep health with smarter insights. Overall VibeRise sets up a health foundation for a better quality of life.
 
 
Your health.
With our busy lives and work schedules, it’s a priority to focus on our health. Being well-rested is a foundation for better physical, mental, and emotional health. VibeRise makes waking up enjoyable to make better choices for our health even easier.
 

 
 
Better sleep.
How you wake up is as important as how much you sleep. 
Overall waking up well-rested gives you the energy and mood to stay feeling good even well after the morning. You don’t run into the problem of feeling like you’re running on empty during the day. You build healthy, consistent sleep schedules just by waking up well-rested.


 
New 200% goal!
We are ramping up to reach our 200% funding goal. When we do, we're going to give all backers a carrying case, perfect for taking VibeRise on-the-go and for safekeeping.
We are incredibly grateful for your support in this project.
 
 
 
 
About PAQ
We love sustainability.
We are sleep enthusiasts who care about people, and the world. We make sleep tech that's both sustainable for our health and for the environment.


When we travel, we like to be prepared. As avid adventurers, we make sure we're waking up in time to get the most out of our day. 
 
 

* Our timeline has been updated to reflect changes in working conditions so that we can operate safely and give our backers the best quality product. We apologize for last minute delays, and we aim to answer any of your questions for PAQ at our social media and email support@paqwear.com.

 
*We are offering free shipping for the U.S.! 
For worldwide: We don't know your address yet, but if you're ordering from outside the U.S, we'll let you know the costs. 
If it doesn't work out for you, we'll give you a full refund.
 
 

We make long-term benefits affordable
We've been testing with various sleep types and sleep environments, updating our app to collect more detailed, long-term benefits for your sleep health.
We've been using VibeRise to wake up every morning for a few months now and have noticed huge improvements for our sleep (especially for heavy sleepers!). We're extremely excited to get this to you all as soon as possible.
 
Why now?
We value everyone who has helped us on this journey, and we want to make sure that we are able to support all your questions and concerns. 
As a company we believe that it's important to keep moving forward, even during trying times. We're doing what's best for our teammates as a small business, and we're dedicated to bringing you a product that is guaranteed to improve your quality of life.

 
 
Specifications

 
 Check out PAQFollow our journey for more updates and deals We are sleep enthusiasts and adventurers. We get the most out of spending every day doing, and making sure we make the most of our mornings.As we kickstart our first product, we're also expanding and growing our company. We're growing in an incredible industry between sleep and health and tech; there are so many developments we could be making. Already revolutionizing the alarm clock for the future is a huge step towards innovation. We value your support along this journey as we continue to bring the best, most advanced sleep products that improve our quality of life.

story:
Do you know what's lurking around?

 

We all know our surroundings are dirty and pose potential threats to our health, but how about smaller personal items that reign your life daily, things that you put into your mouth, and your ears, how often do we really clean them? 

 

It is common that your AirPods are highly contaminated. So are your toothbrushes and razor blades. Researchers have found the flu virus, colon bacillus, staph bacteria, salmonella, E. coli, strep virus hanging on them.  Therefore, It’s crucial to clean and disinfect our daily used items by sterilizing them regularly.

 

Introducing Ultra Guard CAPSULE

 

Disclaimer: This product does NOT claim to diagnose, cure, treat, or prevent an illness or condition.

 

 

The CAPSULE is the world's first all-in-one UV sterilizer self-sanitizing multi-tool.  Designed to stand between you and everyday germs, CAPSULE is a powerful UV shield offering comprehensive protection and a solution to deep clean your everyday used items. 

 

Exploded View

The CAPSULE is a ONE button functions cleaning device, the inner sanitizing “Light Chamber” has space for your everyday items: AirPods, Toothbrush, Razorblades, Earring, Utensils, Pacifier, Tweezer, Thermometer.  Fast, effective, compact, smart, and portable.  

 

Safety Is One Click Away

 

The CAPSULE purifies 99% of germs in 10 seconds. Insert your AirPods, Toothbrush, Razorblade, Earring, Utensils into the "Light Chamber" for fast sterilization, 10 seconds of direct UV-C light by a single click on the power button will begin breaking down the DNA of harmful germs, the electromagnetic spectrum destroys hazardous microorganism’s ability to multiply and spread danger without harming your personal items.

 

 

Proprietary “Light Chamber”

The UV-C LED in the Light Chamber is precision-tuned to the peak biocidal wavelength of 260-280 nm damaging molecules like nucleic acids and proteins. This makes the germ incapable of performing the processes that it needs to survive.  Once fully charged CAPSULE is capable of 180 uses.

 

 Disclaimer: This product does NOT claim to diagnose, cure, treat, or prevent an illness or condition.

 

Chemical-free Cleaning

Traditional methods of keeping your personal belongings clean can be inconvenient, wasteful, and harmful to the environment. Ultra-Guard™  provides an effective, safe, and chemical-free method of cleaning anywhere, anytime. Ultra-Guard CAPSULE is the UV-C sanitizing device certified by the SGS and CE, one of the most authoritative independent labs in the world.

Ultra-Guard's unique patented UV-C "Light Chamber" is SGS CE certified.

 

For The Smallest Personal Items

Airpods, toothbrushes, and razors are some of the most germ-filled things currently in your pocket. We provide a fast and accessible solution that allows you to perform a deep cleanse on your personal items. Keeping you safe from any potential threats.

 

 

Your Travel Buddy

 

 

UV Wand Mode

Designed to be handy, Ultra-Guard CAPSULE can be used as a UV wand too, once activated it allows you to sterilize larger areas just by waving the UV light over them  (like door handles, keyboards, smartphones, face masks, steering wheel, toilet seat).  Long press the activation button to activate the "UV Wand Mode" - a full 5 minutes time setting, click once more to stop your cleaning session at any time. 

Hold the CAPSULE two centimeters above the surface for 10 seconds to maximize the impact on UV sterilizing, and you can easily clean your belongings.

The average keyboard contains more bacteria than the average toilet seat. ... 

your phone is covered in germs: 25,127 bacteria per square inch, to be precise. This makes cell phones one of the dirtiest objects we come in contact with every day.

public toilet seats are a hotbed for bacteria and you could potentially pick up an infection. ... And in fact, studies have found that this “toilet plume” contains E. coli, SARS, and norovirus.

Researchers found an average of 421,000 units of bacteria on the outside of a shoe and 2,887 on the inside.

 

Pocket-Size

The CAPSULE is lightweight, flexible, and compact enough to fit on your keychain, in your pocket, or in your purse.  It's a perfect companion to be taken anywhere while working, shopping, or commuting. The CAPSULE helps users feel safer no matter where they are or what they are doing.

 

Massive Battery Capacity

The Ultra-Guard is not only powerful but it is also extremely portable, Equipped with a fast-charging built-in battery making it easy to keep charged while on the go so users are always protected.  A full-charged(45minute) CAPSULE is able to disinfect your surroundings and belongings 180+times.

 

Self Sanitizing Features

The CAPSULE is the first-ever self-sanitizing multi-tool, this means that not only does it help purify whatever surface it comes in contact with but it also cleans itself. This cutting-edge technology ensures that every single use is clean and sanitized.

 

No Contact Tool

The CAPSULE is also designed as a Touch-Free hygiene tool with a unique ergonomics design maximizing your comfort while helping you avoid unseen danger you may encounter on a daily basis be it on public surfaces such as ATM,  keypads, elevator buttons, vending machines, You'll never need to worry about bringing any germs home with you because of the self-sterilizing feature. 

CAPSULE is made of High-density, non-toxic ABS materials that can withstand the daily wear and tear necessary to protect you from your environment, also featuring an anti-static non-stick silicon tip that can be used as a stylus. when typing on a touch screen or signing a digital signature at check-out

Color options

 

Reward:

 

Product Timeline:  

 

Design& Prototype

 

Testing 

 

Our Team 

Stay sanitary is a habit, is not mandatory, often we see doctors and nurses pass by in the hospital wearing a pen in their upper pocket, it’s not just for writing if you must ask, they use it to get by from floors to floors, buildings to buildings, simply to avoid touching anything suspicious with their own fingers. Ordinary people like you and me, use keys, phone, elbow, foot, just about anything you could come to think of to help us get from parking lots to our office cubicle, and how often do we deep clean our everyday used items, AirPods, toothbrush, keys or wallet, seriously not often, that’s why at the end of the day the contagious is going right back to our pocket and home, our precautions are simply defenseless. It’s important not to touch the public shared surfaces with your own hands because you probably touch your face 23 times in an hour according to a studied. We’re now facing a reopening world everywhere, and people are eager to get back to their normal lives, airport and train station are becoming combusted and jammed with travelers again, is more important than ever that we keep ourselves and our loved ones protected, by wearing a mask, washing our hands, and even with the vaccine injected might just not be enough when we’re dealing with a tricky virus that keeps on mutating everywhere.

 

There are literally hundreds of portable “UV” sterilizers, and they are probably thousands of personal hygiene tool out there on the market, and they all claim to be the best.  The fact is the portable sterilizer isn’t all that portable, and the brass hygiene tool can still get you infected. Inspired by all our Predecessors and forerunner, we have created the Ultra-Guard “CAPSULE” a powerful mini UV sterilizer, accessorized with a hygiene tool for everyday carry allows you travel the world safely.  

 

The company behind the premium Ultra-Guard "CAPSULE" solution is Maid Wright. CAPSULE was invented by Eddie Lou and Susie Wen. Wen, the creative and innovative mastermind behind popular household appliances such as Jack LaLanne's Power Juicer, Montel Williams Health Master Elite, and Power Cooker, have helped design, develop, and manufacture machines and appliances in tens of millions of units to consumers across the globe. Seeing a market need created by the COVID-19 pandemic.  Maid Wright is constantly exploring opportunities for progress and innovation, and the CAPSULE is just another example of their exceptional work.

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We understand that it is imperative to get the Ultra-Guard "CAPSULE" launched correctly thus needing strict production standards and quality control and for this reason, we are proceeding diligently. This means that our timeline may be a little longer, but when all is said and done, we will deliver a product that people will appreciate. If we run into any logistical issues, we will figure out a way forward, sending out regular updates to all our contributors regarding the progress that we are making.

 

Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

 

Supply Chain Risk: Sometimes a supplier runs out of components. Sometimes a factory shuts down for unknown reasons. Sometimes we get the wrong parts or materials in. These things happen from time to time and can affect how long it takes to build our 

 

products.  Shipping Risk: This year, global shipping and warehousing logistics have become increasingly complicated. But in the last three months, we have moved over to a much more reliable shipping partner who we think are experts in their field. But even our new shipping partner may run into issues — a missing carton of products, a pandemic reprisal, the weather turning ugly, port congestion, and other uncontrollable factors.  At the end of the day, we promise to send a product that you will love. If you back us, we will deliver.

 

Environmental commitments

Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.

We stand behind our product and that's why we offer a 6 month warranty to all of our backers who are putting their trust in us.

 

 

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

story:
Introducing REÅLEA ("rey-á-lee-a").

REÅLEA SKINCARE revives the best kept secrets of traditional herbal medicine to offer you unparalleled skincare products that are truly 100% all natural. Look and feel your best while in harmony with the planet. Alchemizing Nature's Kingdoms: Vegetabilia・Mineralia・Animalia.

Long before REÅLEA SKINCARE was a company, the precursor balm to what would become our signature product, AURORA, came into being after alchemist founder Nick's wife Cody gave birth to their beautiful daughter Pepper, who was born several months early by emergency cesarean weighing only 2.2 lbs. Cody asked for help in healing from the procedure, so Nick formulated a topical balm to be maximally effective while also gentle and nourishing. Now, Cody and Pepper are vibrant, healthy, and thriving, and Cody has virtually no detectable scar from the surgery.

 

Combining revived ancient healing practices with groundbreaking research informed by clinical science, we are launching a collection of five truly natural and highly effective alchemical skincare products: from a healing beauty salve, a protective body butter, a relieving balm, a nourishing oil, to a refreshing face mist. Conscious that as a society, we must seriously reframe how new waste materials are generated, REÅLEA SKINCARE is trailblazing the cosmetics industry by offering a refill program for our 100% reusable premium glass jars and bottles. 

The best skincare for your body and for the planet, our collection promotes beautiful, healthy skin and overall well-being. 

  • Each product is handmade with the highest quality natural ingredients, and without synthetic chemicals or artificial preservatives. 
  • Enjoy luxury quality skincare at down-to-earth price point. 
  • Packaged in specialty reusable containers that protect and preserve our purest of ingredients.
  • Everything you need, nothing you don't.
  • Every single ingredient is fantastic for your skin, so a little bit goes a long way.

 

Ingredients: Sal seed butter, sea buckthorn oil, egg yolk oil, tamanu seed oil, beeswax, beeswax esters, vitamin e oil, rose wax, jojoba seed oil, zinc bhasma, calendula flower extract, bulgarian rose essential oil and CO2 extract, omani frankincense essential oil, ethiopian myrrh essential oil, royal hawaiian sandalwood oil, alchemical oil of gold, yuzu (japanese grapefruit) oil, ambergris.

  • Keeps healthy skin at its best. 
  • Promotes deep tissue healing and rejuvenation.
  • Soothes dry skin, rashes, and burns. 
  • Supports healing of scars, spots, damaged cuticles, and nails. 

Offered in a reusable 30 ml violet glass jar to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 

How to Use:

  • Mornings and evenings, apply a pea-sized amount to your fingertips and spread gently across the whole face and into the hands and cuticles. 
  • Apply liberally to dry skin, rashes, burns, scars, spots, damaged cuticles, and nails.
  • Dab on your solar plexus, throat, and forehead.  

Ingredients: Sal seed butter, egg yolk oil, rose wax, beeswax, beeswax esters, vitamin e oil, ethiopian frankincense essential oil, afghani galbanum essential oil, bulgarian rose essential oil, egyptian neroli oil, chinese wild orange essential oil, alchemical oil of gold.

Nourish your skin daily with a spectrum of oils that are formulated to mimic what your skin produces naturally. 

  • Applies easily and absorbs readily with no residue. 
  • Subtle pleasing fragrance from plant-based oils that benefit the skin as well as uplift the mind and spirit. 
  • Treat your body to this unique blend of luxurious oils.

Offered in a reusable 100 ml violet glass jar to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 

How to Use:  

  • Scoop out a generous portion to apply to your feet, legs, torso, arms, hands, and even face after a shower or bath. 
  • Allow the body butter to absorb before getting dressed. 

 

Ingredients: Jojoba seed oil, sweet almond oil, black cumin seed oil, jamaican black castor seed oil, mimosa floral wax, vitamin e oil, gotu kola essential oil, arnica flower CO2 extract, pseudoginseng extract, lemon balm essential oil and extract, rosemary essential oil, peppermint essential oil, silver bhasma, camphor, mugwort, menthol, black pepper essential oil, high altitude french lavender essential oil, roman chamomile essential oil, angelica root CO2 extract, wild siberian fir essential oil, alchemical oil of silver.

  • Relieves tension and pain in the body. 
  • Promotes deep tissue healing and regeneration. 

Offered in a reusable 50 ml violet glass jar to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 

How to Use:

  • Massage a small amount into your feet at a quiet moment, paying attention to reflexology points, for the ultimate in relaxation. 
  • Apply sparingly to your temples before bed for a restful night's sleep. 
  • Rub onto achy knees, elbows, ankles, necks, backs, and wrists for immediate relief. 
  • Apply to strains, bruises, and pulled muscles to speed up recovery and reduce pain. 

 

Ingredients: Watermelon seed oil, jojoba seed oil infused with indianfrankincense, egg yolk oil, olive derived squalane, kukui nut oil, red raspberry seed oil, prickly pear cactus seed oil, carrot seed oil, rosehip CO2 extract, egyptian jasmine essential oil, turkish rose essential oil, australian sandalwood essential oil, ethiopian myrrh essential oil, french helichrysum essential oil, indian champaca CO2 extract, distillate of fossilized amber, moroccan atlas cedarwood essential oil, alchemical oil of gold.

  • Light and absorbent oil with highly prized ingredients. 
  • Use at night around eyes and face, and in hair before bed.
  • The most hypnotic and long-lasting of all of our fragrances.

Offered in a reusable 30 ml violet glass bottle with dropper to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 

How to Use: 

  • Apply drops to the palms of your hand to work into your hair and around your face, especially under the eyes.
  • Carry in your handbag and enjoy throughout the day or reserve a special place on your nightstand to apply before sleep.
  • A dropperful in the hand makes it easy to share the unique sensual experience with friends and family—a sure way to spread happiness and health!

 

Ingredients: Hydrosols of lemon balm, neroli, frankincense and myrrh, with colloidal silver and alchemical oil of gold. 

  • A blend of fresh botanical hydrosols of lemon balm, neroli, frankincense, and myrrh.
  • Fortified with alchemical preparations of gold and silver to elevate and protect. 
  • Refreshing anytime pick-me-up.

Offered in a reusable 100 ml violet glass spray bottle to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 

How to Use: 

  • Spritz your face throughout the day to refresh your spirit and revitalize your inner state. 
  • Use liberally on your face and allow briefly to dry before applying Aurora or Astrum. 

 

Reducing waste is a critical issue in the fight against climate change and human survival. Recycling is no doubt better than the landfill but it still has a significant carbon footprint. Here at REÅLEA SKINCARE, we're striving to do things different. We invest extra in our product containers in several ways with the objective for all of them to be REUSED either by you as the customer or us as the business. We also use COMPOSTABLE cardboard cartons, soy plant-based ink with no VOC's on upcycled paper made from sugar cane byproduct material called bagasse which contains 0% tree.

  • All our skincare product containers are made from special violet glass which is protective and preservative of living essences
  • Tight sealing, easy to open durable lids
  • Durable ceramic printed labels
  • Precious metal 18k gold ink
  • Talismanic minimalist design

Note, as alchemists, we respect gold - the incorruptible metal. Gold possesses the unique property of being so extraordinarily malleable that the gold leaf used on the label is a mere fraction of a micron thick. We also believe that in order to meet the challenges of climate change, as a society we must attitudinally change as well as materially--and the simple act of a customer practicing their own reuse of appropriate containers leads to the overall shift in holistic consciousness needed.

Violet purple color protects the biophotonic energy of products stored within its glass. Violet glass is the only glass known to offer this important protection, assuring that the smell, color, bioenergy and our products' other vital properties remain preserved longer. Violet glass’ inherent properties filter out the more damaging rays of the visible light spectrum while also uniquely allowing the beneficial portions of the UVA and infrared light waves in, keeping the products inside fresher for a longer period of time. Violet glass also acts as a barrier, preventing the loss of biophotons from the product stored within, making preservatives less necessary. Tests have shown that products stored in violet glass keep their distinctive qualities for extended periods of time, sometimes even for years. The sooner a product is consumed the better, but it will still have benefited from the energy-enhancing properties of the violet glass. 

Our empty jars appear purple against the sun, and with the gold symbols illuminated look very cool! Nothing better for storing living materials such as seeds, flowers, herbs, medicines, foods, topicals, and oils... Get creative & share the love to educate and inspire others on how you REUSE your REÅLEA SKINCARE container! #reuserealea 

 

Finding skincare that keeps your body in vibrant, healthy balance—this has long been a quest of greatest personal necessity shared by both founders of REÅLEA SKINCARE, Nick and Crispin. Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome and Type I Diabetes, respectively, meant both men have journeyed far outside of clinical Western medicine to keep themselves thriving. Tired of the underperformance, misinformation, and wasteful practices of many so-called “natural” products— with hidden fillers and pollutant-causing binders—they decided to formulate their own line of results-driven and truly natural skincare. Skincare that doesn’t harm its users nor the Earth; made purely with ingredients from Nature that are fantastic for human health. 

 

Rare Earth Alchemy, Inc. dba REÅLEA SKINCARE (pronounced "rey-á-lee-a") is a California benefit corporation following responsible business practices in creating world-class alchemical goods. We are dedicated to improving human health and furthering the alchemical arts. With Nick's training in Classics and Medieval Middle Eastern history, and Crispin's wide ranging esoteric experience, we are equipped with the language and knowledge to access formulas, philosophies, and methods that lie outside the domain of what is attainable to most. We believe that holistic wellness is achieved by the combination of great products and great practices. 

 

We have a vision of creating a renaissance of environmentally harmonious alchemical products with verifiable results for the modern age. As a new business, we’re taking steps towards this vision and inviting support to achieve it. We currently have sampled our skincare products with more than 500 people ranging in age from 1 to 80 years old receiving extremely encouraging results. We have conducted feedback surveys and interviewed small focus groups. We have produced and tested many versions, refining our formulas to optimize efficacy, absorption, storage, consistency, color, and fragrance. Reaching our goal of $25,000 enables us to fulfill all the campaign orders and launch our online store.

 

"I use Aurora every night before bed. It makes me feel like royalty." -- Meredith Rom, Host of Rising Women Leaders, Petaluma, CA

"Your cream healed my cracked fingers overnight. And my skin feels so smooth." --Jonathan A, San Francisco, CA

"I love these aromatic and soothing products! After using Tenebris and Aurora after hip surgery, my skin is now surprisingly silky and smooth. Amazingly, with the combination of nature, nurture and their signature alchemy, the scar is barely visible! I also use the oil Astrum as a facial moisturizer for my dry skin. It has a subtle fragrance with a hint of lavender. Delicious! I am 73 years old." -- Laurel, San Geromino, CA

"Aurora - love the scent, and the way the fragrance develops after exposure to skin and body heat; my face feels softer, and the dark circles under my eyes have faded; my skin tone is more even; softens lips and cuticles; and absorbs quickly without feeling oily or greasy. A small amount goes a long way." -- Popsy K, Washington, D.C.

"The first time I tried Aurora, the weird red mark on my face that I thought was some kind of inevitable aging thing and had long given up on, disappeared in three days. I seriously recommend this stuff."-- Sara G, MA

"I have always suffered from dry skin and cracking skin on my finger tips, and it usually involves me wrapping them in band aids for days with moisturizers. When I used Aurora it healed the crack overnight, and in the morning there was no sign of any skin damage or dryness." -- Mike K, Seattle, WA

"The facial mist immediately refreshed my spirit. It was palpable. Meridiem immediately sunk into my skin on my hands. Wow. The scent is very grounding. Visibly already improved my very dry hands. I have very sensitive psoriatic dry skin. " -- Munpriya S, Portland, OR

"Now after using Aurora and Meridiem for several weeks, my skin is totally healed and even hyper-pigmentation from psoriasis is totally gone." -- Munpriya S, Portland, OR

"Aurora is doing really well for my face. It's definitely very hydrating and since using it, I haven't needed to use my other creams which is a really good sign. I usually have to put on creams several times a day due to the very dry cold and windy environment where I live at 9,000 ft in the Rocky Mountains." -- Ruth M., Crestone, CO

"These are THE BEST for healing, scars & burns ~ I am amazed & grateful." -- Braden K, Maui, HI

"We gave your sample to an elderly lady friend of ours who immediately felt her entire spiritual vibration lifted by the product." -- Michael Z, Petaluma, CA

"I wanted to tell you that we adore your Aurora cream...used it only once on my baby's eczema behind his ears and it was gone. I had terrible poison oak starting on my hands and feet last week and after using the Aurora it's totally gone. You're doing God's work!!" -- Elyse, Mendocino, CA

"Subtle, fresh, bright scent. I like the weight of Astrum for both hair and face - it soaks in and feels soft to the touch but not oily. Lighter than some face oils I've tried, not heavy or lingering. Appearance of less dry skin and hair (ends only)." -- Betsy E, Petaluma, CA

"The products are so nice! My skin is super happy, feels very dewy and healthy. I use the Aurora balm every day, morning and night. I use the oil at night on my eyes." -- Sarah C, Berkley, CA

"Aurora is pure MAGIC! It is a sublime blend of potency, nourishment and exquisite beauty. The skin literally wants to feast on the banquet of subtle scents, texture and flavors that humans long to 'taste'. It helps remind skin - our largest organ - what it is truly capable of being, feeling and looking." -- Steve S, Alameda, CA

 

Orders of your Perks in the form of our skincare products will be ready in their completed packaging and delivered to you by November 2021 or before. We will post regular updates.

 

NICK GROSSENBACHER (pictured on right)

Our Head of Product is Nick Grossenbacher. He is an alchemist, product formulator, herbalist, historian and bookbinder. Nick has immersed himself in studies of herbalism and traditional healing with regional experts throughout the world, and is a graduate of the Spagyricus School of Alchemy in Washington under esteemed alchemist and chemist Robert Bartlett. Nick's studies of traditional medicine have taken him to India, the Middle East, the Balkans, Guatemala and Scotland. He holds a B.A. in History from the University of Southern California and an M.A. in Medieval Middle Eastern History from the University of Washington.

As an academic historian, Nick fell in love with the exploration of ancient and early modern medicinal texts. But his curiosity yearned for more than dry academic knowledge—he began to recreate the centuries-old practices at home, breathing new life into them. The early balms worked amazingly well. So he embarked on a years-long journey towards a mastery of the long-forgotten techniques. The exceptional formulations you see today have been guided by these ancient principles and philosophies, combined with the rigor of modern laboratory techniques. 

Nick was turned on to the alchemical tradition as a result of a profound dream rich with alchemical symbolism. He initially approached alchemy through the lens of academic study, given his background as a historian, but over time began to put theory to practice and eventually found the Spagyricus School. Nick's training in Classics and Medieval Middle Eastern history have equipped him with the skills necessary to access formulas, philosophies, and methods that lie outside the domain of what is accessible to most modern students of the art.

CRISPIN CLARKE

As a longtime non-violence educator, clinical mental health leader, and Hatha yoga teacher, Crispin works to heal and nourish communities. Coming most recently from a several-years venture in digital health, Crispin co-founded REÅLEA with Nick in 2020. He leads the business development and strategic vision, helping to guide REÅLEA as an instrument of communal health and environmental action. He directly experienced the efficacy of Nick's products in a striking fashion when he used a precursor to the currently available version of Aurora to heal his skin from the constant minor wounds where he has to wear an insulin pump due to his Type 1 Diabetes. He holds a B.A. in Sociology & Anthropology from Swarthmore College, PA.

 

The funds raised are guaranteed first to be used for manufacturing, packaging and delivering the perks you order. Funds raised above the base goal of $25,000 will be used to create even more awesome products for our backers and soon thereafter for our customers in the open market. REÅLEA founders and a family friend have invested $60,000 of their own capital into product research & development, laboratory equipment, facility space, materials, design, legal, accounting, marketing and operational infrastructure. It will cost approximately $25,000 to manufacture and package the 1,000 units of our first five products for all our supporters and then launch our online store. This is our base goal. We would like to go above and beyond — reaching $50,000 would enable us to launch a refill program for our products' glass containers. If we reach $75,000 to $100,000, we will be able to accelerate the creation of future REÅLEA SKINCARE products including in different categories such as nutritional supplements. We are currently working on a new eye cream using green coffee bean oil as well as an unscented healing balm, a massage oil, and a men's beard butter. Thank you so much for your support!

 

Risks & Challenges

As all startup consumer brands, we face stiff competition to excel in the market and will have to work hard to serve our customers but we are dedicated to do so. In the beauty and wellness market, we believe that we have something truly unique and effective to offer. Based on the powerful positive responses we have received, we are confident in our innovative and potent alchemical approach and in the standout performance of our products. We have an advantage in that our products are entirely made by us in our alchemical laboratory and we are not dependent upon any technical third parties. The logistics of our planned container refill program do present a challenge to do in a cost-effective and easy to do way, but for the sustainability of our life on the Earth: it's worthwhile and we hope the trend is picked up across the cosmetics industry. We will provide custom mailer boxes for sets of purchased products and then sanitize and recirculate the returned jars and bottles at our facility and warehouse.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please follow us across social media @realeaskincare

  • Tell your friends & family about us
  • Comment and tag us @realeaskincare across social media
  • Watch out for our new blog on Medium
  • Send us your sample product reviews to post
  • Take before and after photos when you start using the products and let us know how it's going
  • Connect with us to share any feedback or suggestions

Thank you!!!
story_txt:
Introducing REÅLEA ("rey-á-lee-a").
REÅLEA SKINCARE revives the best kept secrets of traditional herbal medicine to offer you unparalleled skincare products that are truly 100% all natural. Look and feel your best while in harmony with the planet. Alchemizing Nature's Kingdoms: Vegetabilia・Mineralia・Animalia.

Long before REÅLEA SKINCARE was a company, the precursor balm to what would become our signature product, AURORA, came into being after alchemist founder Nick's wife Cody gave birth to their beautiful daughter Pepper, who was born several months early by emergency cesarean weighing only 2.2 lbs. Cody asked for help in healing from the procedure, so Nick formulated a topical balm to be maximally effective while also gentle and nourishing. Now, Cody and Pepper are vibrant, healthy, and thriving, and Cody has virtually no detectable scar from the surgery.

 


Combining revived ancient healing practices with groundbreaking research informed by clinical science, we are launching a collection of five truly natural and highly effective alchemical skincare products: from a healing beauty salve, a protective body butter, a relieving balm, a nourishing oil, to a refreshing face mist. Conscious that as a society, we must seriously reframe how new waste materials are generated, REÅLEA SKINCARE is trailblazing the cosmetics industry by offering a refill program for our 100% reusable premium glass jars and bottles. 

The best skincare for your body and for the planet, our collection promotes beautiful, healthy skin and overall well-being. 

Each product is handmade with the highest quality natural ingredients, and without synthetic chemicals or artificial preservatives. 
Enjoy luxury quality skincare at down-to-earth price point. 
Packaged in specialty reusable containers that protect and preserve our purest of ingredients.
Everything you need, nothing you don't.
Every single ingredient is fantastic for your skin, so a little bit goes a long way.




 


Ingredients: Sal seed butter, sea buckthorn oil, egg yolk oil, tamanu seed oil, beeswax, beeswax esters, vitamin e oil, rose wax, jojoba seed oil, zinc bhasma, calendula flower extract, bulgarian rose essential oil and CO2 extract, omani frankincense essential oil, ethiopian myrrh essential oil, royal hawaiian sandalwood oil, alchemical oil of gold, yuzu (japanese grapefruit) oil, ambergris.

Keeps healthy skin at its best. 
Promotes deep tissue healing and rejuvenation.
Soothes dry skin, rashes, and burns. 
Supports healing of scars, spots, damaged cuticles, and nails. 

Offered in a reusable 30 ml violet glass jar to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 
How to Use:

Mornings and evenings, apply a pea-sized amount to your fingertips and spread gently across the whole face and into the hands and cuticles. 
Apply liberally to dry skin, rashes, burns, scars, spots, damaged cuticles, and nails.
Dab on your solar plexus, throat, and forehead.  



Ingredients: Sal seed butter, egg yolk oil, rose wax, beeswax, beeswax esters, vitamin e oil, ethiopian frankincense essential oil, afghani galbanum essential oil, bulgarian rose essential oil, egyptian neroli oil, chinese wild orange essential oil, alchemical oil of gold.
Nourish your skin daily with a spectrum of oils that are formulated to mimic what your skin produces naturally. 

Applies easily and absorbs readily with no residue. 
Subtle pleasing fragrance from plant-based oils that benefit the skin as well as uplift the mind and spirit. 
Treat your body to this unique blend of luxurious oils.

Offered in a reusable 100 ml violet glass jar to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 
How to Use:  

Scoop out a generous portion to apply to your feet, legs, torso, arms, hands, and even face after a shower or bath. 
Allow the body butter to absorb before getting dressed. 

 


Ingredients: Jojoba seed oil, sweet almond oil, black cumin seed oil, jamaican black castor seed oil, mimosa floral wax, vitamin e oil, gotu kola essential oil, arnica flower CO2 extract, pseudoginseng extract, lemon balm essential oil and extract, rosemary essential oil, peppermint essential oil, silver bhasma, camphor, mugwort, menthol, black pepper essential oil, high altitude french lavender essential oil, roman chamomile essential oil, angelica root CO2 extract, wild siberian fir essential oil, alchemical oil of silver.

Relieves tension and pain in the body. 
Promotes deep tissue healing and regeneration. 

Offered in a reusable 50 ml violet glass jar to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 
How to Use:

Massage a small amount into your feet at a quiet moment, paying attention to reflexology points, for the ultimate in relaxation. 
Apply sparingly to your temples before bed for a restful night's sleep. 
Rub onto achy knees, elbows, ankles, necks, backs, and wrists for immediate relief. 
Apply to strains, bruises, and pulled muscles to speed up recovery and reduce pain. 

 


Ingredients: Watermelon seed oil, jojoba seed oil infused with indianfrankincense, egg yolk oil, olive derived squalane, kukui nut oil, red raspberry seed oil, prickly pear cactus seed oil, carrot seed oil, rosehip CO2 extract, egyptian jasmine essential oil, turkish rose essential oil, australian sandalwood essential oil, ethiopian myrrh essential oil, french helichrysum essential oil, indian champaca CO2 extract, distillate of fossilized amber, moroccan atlas cedarwood essential oil, alchemical oil of gold.

Light and absorbent oil with highly prized ingredients. 
Use at night around eyes and face, and in hair before bed.
The most hypnotic and long-lasting of all of our fragrances.

Offered in a reusable 30 ml violet glass bottle with dropper to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 
How to Use: 

Apply drops to the palms of your hand to work into your hair and around your face, especially under the eyes.
Carry in your handbag and enjoy throughout the day or reserve a special place on your nightstand to apply before sleep.
A dropperful in the hand makes it easy to share the unique sensual experience with friends and family—a sure way to spread happiness and health!

 


Ingredients: Hydrosols of lemon balm, neroli, frankincense and myrrh, with colloidal silver and alchemical oil of gold. 

A blend of fresh botanical hydrosols of lemon balm, neroli, frankincense, and myrrh.
Fortified with alchemical preparations of gold and silver to elevate and protect. 
Refreshing anytime pick-me-up.

Offered in a reusable 100 ml violet glass spray bottle to naturally protect and preserve our purest of ingredients. 
How to Use: 

Spritz your face throughout the day to refresh your spirit and revitalize your inner state. 
Use liberally on your face and allow briefly to dry before applying Aurora or Astrum.

Tight sealing, easy to open durable lids

story:
We are living in unprecedented times. The world health crisis we are going through teaches us a painful lesson on the importance of hygiene and cleanliness. Whether it is the shortage of traditional cleaners caused by panic buying and low supply or traveling in or to a place where cleaners are hard to get, an easy, homemade alternative puts anyone in a much safer position.

We have Fulfilled all pledges from our previous campaign.

CleanseBud is a revolutionary portable cleaning and sanitizing product from the same team that designed and launched the Cleansebot, a groundbreaking sanitizing robot. With just two common household ingredients - water and salt - an effective cleaning agent can be easily created through the process of electrolysis. Because of its easy recipe and portability, you’re able to take care of cleanliness anywhere you go.

 

 

 

Sodium hypochlorite cleans the surface of an object and keeps it clean for a period of time. To demonstrate this, we used cut avocados for testing. On the left is an avocado that has not been sprayed with sodium hypochlorite. It oxidizes naturally over time and rot appears on the surface. The avocado on the right is sprayed with the sodium hypochlorite formed by CleanseBud. During the following 12 hours of the test, we sprayed it every 10 minutes, and you can see that it can effectively inhibit the growth of and preserve the avocado.

*Disclaimer: some white crystals may appear after drying.

*This part is to showcase the effectiveness of Cleansebud.

 

 

 

First just add salt and water to the water tank. Remember to keep it below the marked line so nothing spills over.

 

 

Then allow the electrolysis process to run for just 3 minutes, small bubbles will appear in the water, and wait for the cleaning solution to be produced.

 

 

Spray the solution over the tops and insides of your hands and go about your day. Easy and simple.

 

 

 

Simply wipe your frequently used items with a towel or napkin after spraying the solution to it.

 

 

 

CleanseBud helps you in all household and surface cleaning. Use it on the floor, in the kitchen, on any surface, your dirty shoes, in the bathroom...and more. Spray CleanseBud on anywhere!

 

 

 

 

 

Please Note: 

1. Items like knife, cutting board and dinnerwares will need to fully rinsed before contact with food.

2. Electronic devices are best not to be sprayed on but wiped with towel.

 

 

 

 

Because CleanseBud is reusable and only takes salt and water for its chemical reaction, you save money from buying additional cleaners and sanitizers.

 

 

The world is having too many bottles thrown away as rublish, and we probably know the fact that it is almost impossible for plastic to recycle, recycling plastic bottles is just too expensive and takes too much energy, so most of them are just  dumped in landfills.

 

 

We came up with the idea of a reusable pod to replace plastic bottles, not only to help us to save money on buying bottle sanitizers again and again, but also to contribute in saving our environment.  

 

 

CleanseBud is half the size of an adult's palm, and with a net weight of 67g, it can easily fit in your pocket or your purse for daily use. Use it when you have to touch something in the public.

 

 

 

It works by you adding the correct amount of water and amount of salt according to package directions to fit your requirements. For example, if you need the solution for sanitizing your hands or cleaning fresh food, we recommend 1g to 3g of salt. For household and surface cleaning, our suggestion is to add no more than 2g salt.

Then press the button and allow the electrolysis process to run uninterrupted for three minutes. Wait until the light turns green on the container to show you that electrolysis is complete. It is immediately ready for use!

 

 

 

Sodium hypochlorite (NaCIO) is the chemical compound used in water purification and in bleach, though household cleaning bleach has several other compounds as well. Diluted solutions of sodium hypochlorite (50 ppm to 1.5%) are found globally in cleaning sprays and wipes. It also has stain-removing properties.

Sodium hypochlorite in a solution has broad-spectrum antimicrobial properties and is widely used already in healthcare facilities as a cleaner diluted in water.

Uses of sodium hypochlorite depend on the percentage in the solution. For example, most household beaches for laundry are a 3-8% solution of sodium hypochlorite at the time of manufacturing. The strength of it depends on the brand and does gradually decrease if stored over a long time. A 12% solution is often used in water processing for the chlorination of water, and a 15% solution is commonly used to clean wastewater in treatment plants.

In a pinch, sodium hypochlorite can even be used for cleaning drinking water in emergencies. See this article in the American Water Works Association Journal for more details on household and emergency water treatment.

 

 

 

After the turning water and salt into cleaner, it will last for 24 hours. After 24 hours the effective chlorine concentration will gradually decrease. But you can simply restart the electrolysis process again, to reacquire your cleaner.

At full charge, CleanseBud’s battery can last up to 25 - 30 rounds of electrolysis process at 3 minutes each.

 

 

The CleanseBud component can also fit a larger container which holds 100ml liquid, so don't worry if you're in need of more cleaner. The 100 ml container is available as an add-on to this campaign.

 

 

The standard 30ml CleanseBud can meet your daily cleaning needs, and the large capacity of 100ml can help you do household cleaning. In addition, our measuring spoon is designed according to the standard 1g capacity, which can better help you control the concentration ratio. 

 

 

We have now reached the prototype stage of production. We were thankfully able to already start molding, and we know the next step is to move to mass production. Before the launch of CleanseBud, we have already done part of the trial production. There are already hundreds of sets of CleanseBud finished products in our inventory. But we still need your help and the funds from Kickstarter to cover the cost of mass production.

 

 

 

From our previous project, we learn that having the molds done before the campaign starts is very important, this can benefit both backers and our production. We will be able to start production and backer will receive their pledges sooner.

 

 

 

We provide free shipping to these regions: United States, Canada, Europe (Only for 23 countries, see below), HongKong, Japan, Taiwan, South Korea, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Vietnam, Malaysia.

European countries include: Cyprus, Greece, France, Slovenia, Lithuania, Croatia, Poland, Portugal, Malta, Netherlands, Finland, Belgium, Estonia, Luxembourg, Latvia, Denmark, Ireland, Sweden, Germany, Spain, Italy, Czech Republic, Austria.

Other countries shipping fees will charge after the campaign ends, please refer to our survey.

After the campaign ends, you will receive an email with a survey link, where you can complete your payment, add any accessories as add-ons, fill in your address and contact information.

 

 

Our product price does not include VAT or import tax.  But we will try our best to declare a relatively reasonable value for the product. But please keep in mind, we can’t guarantee you won’t be taxed. Our package is relatively small, from past experience, chance small parcels are less likely to be taxed.

But rules and regulations for different countries and regions can vary, we can't guarantee anything.

 

Our goal is to provide you with quality, safe and reliable products on time. All funds will be used to start mass production and launch CleanseBud. According to the Kickstarter Terms of Use, we will not provide refunds or returns. If you receive a problematic item, please report it immediately after receiving the package and contact us at hello@cleansebud.com. We value Kickstarter supporters very much, and we will put in all our efforts to ensure that you have an awesome CleanseBud.

 

 

 

 

Sodium hypochlorite has been used in households since at least 1785 when Frenchman Berthollet developed liquid bleaching agents based on sodium hypochlorite. The Javel company originally introduced this product as “Liqueur de Javel.”

Here is some more information on sodium hypochlorite from experts:

● You can see here on the CDC website that sodium hypochlorite is a recommended cleaner for various uses in medical settings.

● You can also see here from Pacific Medical Centers that it is used in cleaning directly.

● The World Health Organization published this guideline on hygiene and mentions sodium hypochlorite quite a bit in cleaning and hygiene.

● As for skin safety, Stanford Medicine published this article on how diluted sodium hypochlorite can potentially combat skin damage and aging.

● For why the it will only last for relative short time, see the following study:  Stability of sodium hypochlorite solutions, on how sodium hypochlorite will gradually reduce its concentration. 

 

 

To prove the cleaning abilities of CleanseBud, we requested testing from STC and ICAS. More test reports from other institutes are on the way and feel free to check out the details of the test reports by clicking on the following button. 

 

 

 

1. What is Electrolysis?

There are actually 2 ways sodium hypochlorite can be produced.

We use electrolysis, and the process works by dissolving salt in softened water, which results in a concentrated brine solution. That solution inside the CleanseBud pod is then electrolyzed by internal components for 3 minutes until it forms a sodium hypochlorite solution in water.

Electrolysis is the safer and easier way to produce sodium hypochlorite. The other way is to add chlorine gas (Cl2) to caustic soda (NaOH). When this is done, sodium hypochlorite, water (H2O) and salt (NaCl) are produced according to the following reaction:

Cl2 + 2NaOH + → NaOCl + NaCl + H2O

You can read more about sodium hypochlorite via electrolysis here:

● CDN

● MDPI

● IOP Science

2. What type of salt should I add?

A: Normal salt you would get from the supermarket. To be specific, ‘table Salt’, white, fine grained. Not sea salt or any type.

3. What is the solution? What is the composition?

A: After the electrolysis process, salt and water turn into sodium hypochlorite solution.

Sodium hypochlorite  (NaClO)

Ordinary salt = sodium chloride (NaCl)

water  (H20)

Chemical equation: NaCl + H2O + ELECTROLYSIS  ⇒ NaCIO + H2

4. How much salt should I add?

A: 1g measuring spoon (comes with the package) of table salt for the 30ml water container. Further ratios can be found in the instructions manual.

5. Can I eat, drink and consume food after spray with Cleansebud?

A: Do not directly consume the food sprayed with cleaner water. Wash with clean water before consumption.

6. How much does Cleansebud weigh? And how big it is?

A: Cleansebud weight only 2.4oz/67g dry.

Dimensions of Cleansebud: 91mm x 61mm x 28mm (Length, width and height)

7. Why can’t I spray on electronic devices?

A: Is the same reason you would not wash your phone or your electronic devices (unless your phone is waterproofed). The solution turns into mist when you spray it out, the mist could get into electronic devices and potentially damage it, hence we don’t recommend spray directly on it.

8. Can I spray on cloth, jacket, pants, silk, leather?

A: The solution has a bleaching effect on fabrics, colored or dark clothing used with caution. Do not soak silk or genuine leather. The solution has an oxidizing effect on metals. If metal utensils are directly sterilized, they should be rinsed with water immediately after use and wiped off.

9. How long will the solution last?

A: It will take the Cleanseud 3 mins to fully electrolyze. The solution lasts for 24 hours after the electrolysis process. You can start the electrolyze process and generate a new solution. If you're not planning to use it within the next 7 days, please empty the water container (tank).

10. Can I add more salt to electrolysis?

A: Yes you can add more salt into the water container to increase the concentration of the solution. Detailed information of salt and water ratio can be found in the instruction manual.

11. Will I get shocked or short-circuited?

A: Do not immerse this product or the power cord in any liquid. Do not plug or unplug the charging cable with wet hands.

12. Charging cable included? How long does it take to charge? And how long does it last?

A: A TYPE-C charging cable will be included in the package. Takes the bud 1-1.2 hours to charge. At full charge, it will allow the bud to have 25-30 rounds of electrolysis process at 3 minutes each time.

13. Can we cancel the pledge?

A: You can cancel your pledge before the campaign ends. We do not offer refunds, returns, or exchanges on items received as Kickstarter rewards once the campaign ends. We appreciate your understanding of our policy and your support.

14. Will the liquid in the container leak out?

A: No it won’t. The rubber on the device will seal the container from any leakage.

15. What is the PledgeBox Survey?

A: PledgeBox is a third-party backer management platform that handles the survey for our campaign, after the campaign ends PledgeBox will send out a survey where you will be able to add any add-ons, update your shipping information.

However, we will take responsibility for defective products. Just contact our customer service, at hello@cleansebot.com.

16. How do I contact the Cleansebud Team?

A: You can either:

1: Write us an email to hello@cleansebot.com.

2: Send us a message on KickStarter.

17. What is your refund policy?

A: Orders from 'backers' are not considered as 'purchases', but rather a contribution with a 'reward' in return for believing in and for funding the project. That's why refunds of contributions are not available for our project on this platform.

The support we get from our backers is what enables us to grow and choose crowdfunding as our business model.

18. What are countries and regions with free shipping?

A: United States, Canada, Europe (Only for 23 countries, see below), HongKong, Japan, Taiwan, South Korea, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Vietnam, Malaysia.

European countries include: Cyprus, Greece, France, Slovenia, Lithuania, Croatia, Poland, Portugal, Malta, Netherlands, Finland, Belgium, Estonia, Luxembourg, Latvia, Denmark, Ireland, Sweden, Germany, Spain, Italy, Czech Republic, Austria.
