story:
How Snore Circle works

 

Snoring occurs when air passes through narrowed airways, causing the uvula and surrounding tissue to vibrate as you breathe.

 

The Snore cirecle detects snoring and physically intervenes with micro vibrations that cause the muscles of the throat to contract, allowing you to breathe smoothly.

The first 100 buyers will receive EZ Sleep 

for 

free!

EZ Sleep features:

  • 3D contoured design, with no pressure on the eyes
  • Fitted nose baffle design blocks out all light
  • High-quality nylon/polyurethane foam for ultimate comfort
  • Elastic strap design
  • 8 easily adjustable buckles for a custom fit

 

 

 

 

Snore Earset E4 is a physical anti-snoring device developed based on the principle of snoring. It monitors snoring through an intelligent snore recognition system, and uses a patented anti-snoring algorithm to accurately determine the snoring index of users. Upon detecting snoring, Snore Earset E4 physically intervenes with micro vibrations, which drive the nerve center of the brain to send out commands to tighten the muscles of the throat, thereby opening the airway to make breathing smoother. Snoring is therefore significantly reduced or completely stopped, all while ensuring undisturbed sleep.

 

The free Sleeplus app monitors your sleep and allows you to view relevant sleep data, including snore data, intervention data, and sleep analysis reports.

 

Kick-start your journey towards healthy, peaceful sleep with the Snore Earset E4.

 

 

By combining the latest bone conduction technology and snore recognition technology with an innovative anti-snoring algorithm, the Snore Earset E4 can effectively and accurately determine the snoring index of each individual user.

 

 

 

Upon detecting snoring, the device automatically intervenes with micro vibrations (ranging from weak to strong). These vibrations stimulate the nerve center and drive the muscles of the throat to contract and open the airway, thereby maintaining smooth breathing, effectively stopping snoring, and improving sleep quality.

 

Smart physical intervention Changes to snoring after a period of use

 

 

The intensity of intervention can be adjusted through the Sleeplus app based on individual needs, with users able to choose from 36 levels of intervention.

 

 

After syncing data, you can view snore data, intervention data, and sleep analysis report via the Sleeplus app, and keep track of changes in your sleep patterns.

 

Snore stopper

After syncing your device data with the app, you can view your sleep data, snore data, and intervention data, and you can customize the intensity of vibration and snore sensitivity of the snore stopper.

 

Sleeping

The sleep aid function provides soothing music to help relax your mind and body and promote better sleep.

 

Recorder

With the recording function, you can record your snoring and play it back at any time to compare the effects of using the snore stopper.

 

 

The ergonomic earhook design perfectly fits the shape of the ear, while the food grade silicone material ensures a secure and comfortable fit for long-term use.

 

 

step1: Place the device above the ear.

step2: Slide it down the outer ear to a comfortable position.

 

 

Our tests in respiratory departments across several hospitals in Shenzhen prove that the Snore Earset effectively stimulates the contraction of the muscles of the throat and opens the airway, thereby helping reduce snoring or the frequency of snoring. All test results are supported by relevant data.

 

 

Moreover, our proprietary anti-snoring algorithm has obtained patent certificates in both China and Japan.

About us

 

VVFLY Electronics Co,. LTD  is focused on people's sleep quality. We assembled an experienced software and hardware development dream team with a goal to create an ultra first class hardware and software smart snore stopping device for people to effectively solve the snoring problems. 

 

Our purpose is to dare to innovate, pursue perfection, and strive for excellence. The first 3 generations of Snore Circle devices are widely recognized by the market and now we're on our Snore Earset E4 3th plus generation Snore Circle with more intelligent operations and a better user experience. 

Our team

Snore Circle in the Media

What people say

Shipping & Refund Policy

 

When will the product be shipped？

The shipment will start at the end of August or early September. Your perk will be delivered to you through special line parcel or China Post from China. We will send you the tracking number via email when the units are shipped and you will be able to check the shipping status from thereon on your Indiegogo account. Note that the exact delivery time will vary depending on different country and the couriers. Feel free to email us at service@vvfly.cn if you have any questions!

What’s the refund policy?

According to Indiegogo's policy, you can request a refund in your account at any time before the project ends. Feel free to follow the guide from Indiegogo: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles.... After the project ends, we will lock the orders to prepare for shipment, the refund will be not allowed during the time of shipment. If you have any problems, please contact us through email.

What is the return and warranty policy?

We provide unconditional return within 30 days after receiving the product, and the warranty is 1 year! !
story_txt:
How Snore Circle works Snoring occurs when air passes through narrowed airways, causing the uvula and surrounding tissue to vibrate as you breathe. The Snore cirecle detects snoring and physically intervenes with micro vibrations that cause the muscles of the throat to contract, allowing you to breathe smoothly.The first 100 buyers will receive EZ Sleep for free!EZ Sleep features:
3D contoured design, with no pressure on the eyes
Fitted nose baffle design blocks out all light
High-quality nylon/polyurethane foam for ultimate comfort
Elastic strap design
8 easily adjustable buckles for a custom fit
    Snore Earset E4 is a physical anti-snoring device developed based on the principle of snoring. It monitors snoring through an intelligent snore recognition system, and uses a patented anti-snoring algorithm to accurately determine the snoring index of users. Upon detecting snoring, Snore Earset E4 physically intervenes with micro vibrations, which drive the nerve center of the brain to send out commands to tighten the muscles of the throat, thereby opening the airway to make breathing smoother. Snoring is therefore significantly reduced or completely stopped, all while ensuring undisturbed sleep. The free Sleeplus app monitors your sleep and allows you to view relevant sleep data, including snore data, intervention data, and sleep analysis reports. Kick-start your journey towards healthy, peaceful sleep with the Snore Earset E4.  By combining the latest bone conduction technology and snore recognition technology with an innovative anti-snoring algorithm, the Snore Earset E4 can effectively and accurately determine the snoring index of each individual user.   Upon detecting snoring, the device automatically intervenes with micro vibrations (ranging from weak to strong). These vibrations stimulate the nerve center and drive the muscles of the throat to contract and open the airway, thereby maintaining smooth breathing, effectively stopping snoring, and improving sleep quality. Smart physical intervention Changes to snoring after a period of use  The intensity of intervention can be adjusted through the Sleeplus app based on individual needs, with users able to choose from 36 levels of intervention.  After syncing data, you can view snore data, intervention data, and sleep analysis report via the Sleeplus app, and keep track of changes in your sleep patterns. Snore stopperAfter syncing your device data with the app, you can view your sleep data, snore data, and intervention data, and you can customize the intensity of vibration and snore sensitivity of the snore stopper. SleepingThe sleep aid function provides soothing music to help relax your mind and body and promote better sleep. RecorderWith the recording function, you can record your snoring and play it back at any time to compare the effects of using the snore stopper.  The ergonomic earhook design perfectly fits the shape of the ear, while the food grade silicone material ensures a secure and comfortable fit for long-term use.  step1: Place the device above the ear.step2: Slide it down the outer ear to a comfortable position.  Our tests in respiratory departments across several hospitals in Shenzhen prove that the Snore Earset effectively stimulates the contraction of the muscles of the throat and opens the airway, thereby helping reduce snoring or the frequency of snoring. All test results are supported by relevant data.  Moreover, our proprietary anti-snoring algorithm has obtained patent certificates in both China and Japan.About us VVFLY Electronics Co,. LTD  is focused on people's sleep quality. We assembled an experienced software and hardware development dream team with a goal to create an ultra first class hardware and software smart snore stopping device for people to effectively solve the snoring problems.  Our purpose is to dare to innovate, pursue perfection, and strive for excellence. The first 3 generations of Snore Circle devices are widely recognized by the market and now we're on our Snore Earset E4 3th plus generation Snore Circle with more intelligent operations and a better user experience. Our teamSnore Circle in the MediaWhat people sayShipping & Refund Policy When will the product be shipped？The shipment will start at the end of August or early September. Your perk will be delivered to you through special line parcel or China Post from China. We will send you the tracking number via email when the units are shipped and you will be able to check the shipping status from thereon on your Indiegogo account. Note that the exact delivery time will vary depending on different country and the couriers. Feel free to email us at service@vvfly.cn if you have any questions!What’s the refund policy?According to Indiegogo's policy, you can request a refund in your account at any time before the project ends. Feel free to follow the guide from Indiegogo: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles.... After the project ends, we will lock the orders to prepare for shipment, the refund will be not allowed during the time of shipment. If you have any problems, please contact us through email.What is the return and warranty policy?We provide unconditional return within 30 days after receiving the product, and the warranty is 1 year! !

story:
Disclaimer: Our product might not work if you have attached earlobes.

 

 

 

Every package comes with two pairs of Keepods® with flexible fits for everyone.

Disclaimer: Our product might not work if you have attached earlobes.

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

Risks & Challenges

We have meticulously calculated all the possible scenarios we could think to encounter, but there are still things that one can’t anticipate.

Port Closures and Delays: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, delays and problems might hinder the arrival date of your Keepods. We work with the best fulfillment companies and operate under a strict policy of total transparency to ensure that you are up-to-date on potential shipping complications. Check this Indiegogo page and social media platforms for updates.

Volume: We have created a handful of manufacturing scenarios pending levels of demand, but with an unknown number of backers, there are always risks involved. If we reach our funding goal of $8,000, we will manufacture and deliver all Keepods ordered.

Through designing, developing, prototyping, and testing our product, we’ve put a ton of time into this project. After undergoing such a long road, we’re extremely excited to be in our last step before production. We are certain you’ll enjoy all the value that Keepods can deliver- thanks for backing us!

Stay tuned through social media.

story:
Story

I’m Hoang - a father of two children. When one of them started primary school, I was confused about choosing a suitable backpack. Most of the backpacks that I saw were flashy, bulky, and failed to meet my expectations for a school backpack. I also felt they put my kid at risk of falling by being off-balance. Besides, bringing an extremely heavy backpack to school every day could cause many back issues for kids, such as back pain. Since collecting and working with backpacks has been my passion for such a long time, I had a desire to design a capable backpack for my little son. This was the powerful motivator for me to make my dream come true.

 

 

After extensive research, I noticed that to reduce back pain, the weight of backpacks should account for 5-7% of a kid’s body weight. However, a light backpack is insufficient to keep them protected from the books in their backpack, which easily bumps into their back when moving around and causes pain.

Hence, after two years of development, the first Tinipak version was born. It was called TiniBox, with a mission to help kids “fly to school.” Tinipak is the lightest ergonomic backpack and at the forefront of personalized and flexible design - with easy to attach accessories.

 

 

 

 

The prominent zippers on minimal pattern create a modern and unique look for Tinipak and highlight the Paker - a compelling feature to show kid’s personalities. Tinipak has 3 Simplicity colors available with the personalized packers collection. 

 

We combined student-friendly features with a gender-neutral style to create a Tinipak backpack. 

Tinipak is boxy but rounded. It maintains a rigid silhouette and a balanced shape even when empty, which keeps it from falling over when put down. 
 
Tinipak backpack remains lightweight, at only 660 grams, with many smart features. TiniBox deletes redundant details and refines innovative features to reach an efficient weight.
 
 
 
 

 

Paker is a collection of patches designed by Tinipak. Paker can be changed for different special occasions, making it superior to other backpacks' fixed and boring stickers.

Paker has been made for the global version and updated continually. 

Each of our products (TiniBox, TiniPenbox, and TiniPencilbox) included a Paker. Paker will be distributed at the end of the campaign.

 

 

Tinipak has chosen magnetic locks that are easier for little hands. The convenient magnetic chest strap helps to keep the shoulder straps from slipping off kids' little shoulders, letting them free to run and jump.

 

 

The innovative magnetic buckle is attached directly to one strap without webbing, enabling easy one-handed attachment/detachment.

 

 

 

 

 

Modular with TiniFile: The power of organization with 11 compartments keeps school supplies separated and clean, with quick access and easy storage.

 

 

TiniBox can be used for kids who want to organize books in a large space, or it can be more organized with TiniFile, where books and papers are divided into three vertical compartments for children who need to be careful and tidy.

 

Tinipak found that wearing ID cards around the neck is very inconvenient and annoying for children because they are so active. To facilitate the most comfortable experience for children at school every day, Tinipak designed TiniCard for the global version.

 

 

 

 

TiniBox is designed with a thick back panel and ergonomic prototype frame, keeping kids safe from back pain caused by backpacks. Tinipak leads the market with lightweight, ergonomic backpacks for kids and focuses on maximizing innovative features for kids at school. A sternum strap prevents the straps from sliding off kids’ shoulders while they inevitably run and jump around with their backpacks on.

With TiniFile, books are close to your back, which avoids distributing the force that causes back pain.

 

In poor lighting conditions like early morning, in the rain, or in the dark, the reflective lines in front of the TiniBox and on the two straps are highly visible to any traffic, which helps avoid accidents.

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It is common for kids to take regular public transit (vs. a dedicated school bus) to school, so they need a transit card and some cash on the way. They may also be required to have their name tag/ID showing (e.g., a lanyard around their neck in school). TiniCard is designed to streamline both of these student needs.

 

Other backpacks on the market cannot achieve any functionality to facilitate a quick and easy experience. Tinipak, with a modular design, helps kids feel more comfortable when they bring it to school.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other backpacks have traditional pen cases, which are inconvenient: Everything is floating around in space. It can be disruptive for students when they try to find what they need. Moreover, it is hard to consider which one might be missing, a part of why kids forget their stuff.

TiniPenbox is designed to keep the stuff that goes to school neat, convenient, and organized with your kids.

 

Tinipak keeps students from forgetting or losing their belongings, as all items are organized.

 

 

 

All stuff designed by Tinipak: We focus on the convenience of the product and the detail of items, like the more extensive and bolder digit to help kids easily see numbers.

 

 

 

 

 

We chose materials to meet the following criteria: lightweight, durable, and convenient for children to use.

 

 

 

 

Our product is mainly designed for kids. However, according to the many positive feedbacks we've received, Tinipak has been enjoyed by many adults as well. Our product would be perfect for those who are under 5’11’’. You can read the review from Pangolins- a team of backpack geeks, for further information. So if you are a grown-up and considering owning one, let’s give it a try. We believe that it won’t make you disappointed!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have spent the last two years researching the design and materials to create a backpack. It took us 18 months of failures to design a beautiful product on paper that was too difficult to build in practice. However, from this first lesson, we gained a lot of experience and knowledge to make Tinipak’s first product.

We comprehend our target users and their context of use, and we can determine their demands. We try to meet their needs, providing them a comfortable experience, which lets them focus on learning.

The design process is an iterative process that involves sketches, 3D design, mockups, trying on models, and sewing on the sample fabrics. For each version, we evaluated the users’ context and requirements to check the design's performance and then tried to match the users’ specific context and satisfy all of their relevant needs. For this, I observed my son's usage context and behavior for quite a long time and then tried to identify and address the limitation for each version.

The best product has to be perfect in every detail. An example of this is designing a durable zipper head that is easy for children's small hands to hold and pull. Being a small start-up like Tinipak, we were so glad to convince YKK, the no.1 zipper brand globally, to become our partner.

 

 

For the development of Paker, after researching many partners around the world, we are proud to have chosen in-house production of all Paker, so we, Vietnamese, make them. We printed on different materials to achieve the perfect finish and retain the most vibrant colors for more children's enjoyment.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

From Osprey, The North Face, Jack Wolfskin, Samsonite, and the newer, creative brand names such as Peak Design and Nomatic, we found that the next generation of backpacks is becoming more innovative and convenient, providing a better experience for users.

 

Historically, the backpack was created during wars, when soldiers had to carry large amounts of equipment into battle. Afterwards, it became more widely used in daily life. However, we realized that their features were not optimal, especially for primary/elementary school life. Children with small shoulders wear backpacks every day; however, few brands have yet to design anything for them. We realized that we needed to redefine school backpacks, and with that, Tinipak was born. Our goal is to help students go to school more comfortably and conveniently.

 

Tinipak's first version was launched in Vietnam in August 2020. It gained a considerable number of compliments from Vietnamese residents and foreign followers. We appreciated the suggestions and feedback from the first followers, which allowed us to perfect this version to launch on Kickstarter and bring this dream to the world. 

 

 

 

 

Over the years, with diligence and craftsmanship, Vietnam has produced many products for leading brands globally. However, Vietnam doesn’t yet have a world-recognized brand, and we feel that we have a mission to make one.

To build a well-known brand, besides excellent manufacturing, it is necessary to develop an industrial design. Thousands of Vietnamese students in this field have graduated, but there is no place to build their skills, and they work in different jobs. For this reason, we would love to promote this industry in our country.

 

 

After a minor scale release in Vietnam, we hope that the global community will support our campaign. This can motivate us to build a team, a company, and a pretty new profession in Vietnam. Your support also helps us focus on creating, designing, and manufacturing high-quality backpack brands and solving problems with intelligent, handy solutions.

We have spent over two years - such a long journey to be here. If Tinipak brings real value to you, please support us and share Tinipak with everyone.

We can't do this without you.

 

 

 

 

Suppose our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and the package returns to our warehouse (either because you're not there, the wrong address was provided, or you moved without telling us). In that case, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

Backers from all other countries (apart from the United States) may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. The obligations and tax rates vary from country to country. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with your country's customs and border protection authority.

Return policy. Kickstarter is a platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. Following Kickstarter Terms of Use, we will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defective. However, if you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact me at hoang@tinipak.vn.

 

 

 

We manufactured more than 300 sets for the local launch back in August 2020, and there haven't been any claims regarding of manufacturer's defects. We’re confident in the quality materials and quality workmanship that create Tinipak. We’re offering every backer a 1-year warranty that covers any manufacturing defect that affects the backpack's functionality. You can ship it to one of our 3 Vietnam repair centers. Customers are responsible for any charges related to international shipping, as well as duties/taxes associated with their country. Our repair facility and Tinipak will cover the repair cost. If it can’t be repaired, determined at our discretion, we will replace the backpack. 

If you received a damaged product, have product issues, or have any other concerns, please email contact@tinipak.vn with pictures and we’ll start the replacement process.

story:
How's awful it feels like when you cannot sleep easily and deeply? Spent the night tossing and turning — how you'll feel the next day? Tired, cranky, and out of sorts.

Let Banala® Lite help you out.

Banala® Lite is a smart sleep-cycle-inducing system integrated with isochronic sound technology in the form of a mini-speaker to give you the best sleep ever, every night. 

The system works by inducing your body and mind to sync perfectly with your very own natural sleep cycle.

Several studies have proven the incredible benefits of isochronic tones. Although they are well-known in the medical community, they are not as widespread among the rest of society. We have decided to bring their benefits to your sleep journey. They’re a natural and effective way to improve sleep and well-being.

 

 

Fall Asleep Quickly and Deeply in Just One Button Push:

Just one button push and Banala Lite will take care of the rest of your sleep journey.

Banala Lite is the perfect solution to put you to the best sleep. You will then wake up with a fresh, comfy, and clear mind.

Waking up as a brand-new you!

 

 

When you use Banala Lite regularly, your sleep cycle will be restored to its best. As your sleep cycle improves, your sleep will improve.

 

 

 

 

Banala Lite will take you to a new level of your sleep journey, from the very beginning through to wake-up.

 

The sleep cycle is an oscillation between the slow-wave and REM (paradoxical) phases of sleep. In humans, this cycle takes 1-2 hours. A good night's sleep consists of 5-6 complete sleep cycles.

 

 

During sleep, you usually go through five stages of sleep. Simplified, stages 1-2 are light sleep, 3-4 are deep sleep, and 5 is REM sleep, also referred to as rapid eye movement sleep—the dream state.

  • The first is light sleep. During this stage, you drift in and out of sleep. Your eyes move slowly, your muscle activity is low, and you would be easy to wake up.
  • In the second stage, your body starts preparing for deep sleep. Your eye movements and brain waves slow down, your body temperature drops, and your heart rate slows down.
  • When you enter the third stage, you are in a deep sleep. Extremely slow brain waves called delta waves are intermixed with smaller, faster brain waves.
  • In stage four, you stay in a deep sleep and your brain almost exclusively produces the slow delta waves, guiding you towards the fifth stage.
  • You now enter the last stage, stage five, also called REM sleep. Your eyes are closed but they move rapidly from side to side due to the intense dream and brain activity you experience during this stage.

 

 

Our patent-pending system will stimulate you through each stage of the sleep cycle. It helps restore your natural sleep cycle to its best.

When you cannot fall asleep quickly, it’s usually because the beta wave rhythm in your brain is still high. Banala’s smart sleep-cycle-inducing system will start with the theta isochronic tone to slow down the messy brain activity and prepare you for the sleep state. The system works throughout your sleep by using the theta wave to make you fall asleep quickly and the delta wave to make you experience deep sleep. Also, the secret blend of other beneficial waves will take care of you while you sleep.

When you use Banala Lite regularly, your sleep cycle will be restored to its best. This will lead to many benefits, including the fact that you will no longer wake up in the middle of the night. As your sleep cycle improves, your sleep will improve and you will wake up with a fresh and clear mind.

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

Isochronic Tones

Improving Sleep and Power Napping – When you're struggling to get to sleep, your brain is probably producing too much beta activity. Banala with isochronic tone technology can be used to reduce beta activity and increase the low delta and theta frequency range. This will help you get to sleep faster and deeper.

 

 

Brainwave Frequencies for Better Sleep

Brainwave speed is measured in Hertz (Hz) and relates to the number of cycles per second. A 5Hz brainwave is cycling at a rate of five times per second.

Our brainwave activity reflects how we are feeling and what we are doing. If slower brainwaves are dominant, we might feel sleepy, very relaxed, or dreamy.

 

 

Brainwave entrainment methods like isochronic tones are used to stimulate and produce more brainwave activity of a specific frequency or range, making it more dominant. This helps Banala effectively give you the best sleep. You can reduce high brain wave frequency by listening to slower-speed isochronic tones, which will help calm your mind and bring down your stress levels.

 

 

Delta Waves

0.5Hz-4Hz – Delta waves are very slow and low in frequency. You produce the most delta activity during your deepest sleep. During delta, your body does most of its healing and regenerating of cells.

 

Theta Waves

4Hz to 8Hz – Theta waves are also mainly dominant during sleep, in a state of deep relaxation, or when we are drifting in and out of sleep.

 

Specification:

Output Power: 3W

Discharge Current: 5V/0.5A

Battery: 400mAh 3.7V

Charging Current: 200mA

Size: Ø70 x 40 mm

Weight: 120g

Active Time: Up to 12 hours

Standby Time: Up to 20 hours 

Bluetooth

Hand-free phone operation.

AUX

5V USB-C rapid charging

Banala Life is a company dedicated to helping people all over the world sleep better. Based on extensive and insightful research, we offer solutions that improve the well-being of users. Our mission is to defeat insomnia once and for all.

Our first product, the Banala Alarm Clock, was a hit on Kickstarter in 2018. We served more than 1,000 backers from the Kickstarter campaign and shipped more than 10,000 units of the Banala Alarm Clock to more than 100 countries worldwide.

We have poured our hearts, minds, and weekends into this project because, deep down, we believe that once you use Banala, you will have better sleep, which will bring you a better life.

We hope you join us on this journey and make your sleep the supreme journey.

Our trusted manufacturing partner is ready to run the production. With your help, we can secure enough orders to start production of the first batch and bring Banala Lite to you.

If you would like to reach us, feel free to email us at contact@banala.life. We would love to hear from you!

Thank you!

 

 

 

 

MEDIA KIT

 

We are ready to ship!
story_txt:
How's awful it feels like when you cannot sleep easily and deeply? Spent the night tossing and turning — how you'll feel the next day? Tired, cranky, and out of sorts.Let Banala® Lite help you out.Banala® Lite is a smart sleep-cycle-inducing system integrated with isochronic sound technology in the form of a mini-speaker to give you the best sleep ever, every night. The system works by inducing your body and mind to sync perfectly with your very own natural sleep cycle.Several studies have proven the incredible benefits of isochronic tones. Although they are well-known in the medical community, they are not as widespread among the rest of society. We have decided to bring their benefits to your sleep journey. They’re a natural and effective way to improve sleep and well-being.
 

 
Fall Asleep Quickly and Deeply in Just One Button Push:
Just one button push and Banala Lite will take care of the rest of your sleep journey.Banala Lite is the perfect solution to put you to the best sleep. You will then wake up with a fresh, comfy, and clear mind.Waking up as a brand-new you!  When you use Banala Lite regularly, your sleep cycle will be restored to its best. As your sleep cycle improves, your sleep will improve.    Banala Lite will take you to a new level of your sleep journey, from the very beginning through to wake-up. The sleep cycle is an oscillation between the slow-wave and REM (paradoxical) phases of sleep. In humans, this cycle takes 1-2 hours. A good night's sleep consists of 5-6 complete sleep cycles.  During sleep, you usually go through five stages of sleep. Simplified, stages 1-2 are light sleep, 3-4 are deep sleep, and 5 is REM sleep, also referred to as rapid eye movement sleep—the dream state.
The first is light sleep. During this stage, you drift in and out of sleep. Your eyes move slowly, your muscle activity is low, and you would be easy to wake up.
In the second stage, your body starts preparing for deep sleep. Your eye movements and brain waves slow down, your body temperature drops, and your heart rate slows down.
When you enter the third stage, you are in a deep sleep. Extremely slow brain waves called delta waves are intermixed with smaller, faster brain waves.
In stage four, you stay in a deep sleep and your brain almost exclusively produces the slow delta waves, guiding you towards the fifth stage.
You now enter the last stage, stage five, also called REM sleep. Your eyes are closed but they move rapidly from side to side due to the intense dream and brain activity you experience during this stage.
  Our patent-pending system will stimulate you through each stage of the sleep cycle. It helps restore your natural sleep cycle to its best.When you cannot fall asleep quickly, it’s usually because the beta wave rhythm in your brain is still high. Banala’s smart sleep-cycle-inducing system will start with the theta isochronic tone to slow down the messy brain activity and prepare you for the sleep state. The system works throughout your sleep by using the theta wave to make you fall asleep quickly and the delta wave to make you experience deep sleep. Also, the secret blend of other beneficial waves will take care of you while you sleep.When you use Banala Lite regularly, your sleep cycle will be restored to its best. This will lead to many benefits, including the fact that you will no longer wake up in the middle of the night. As your sleep cycle improves, your sleep will improve and you will wake up with a fresh and clear mind.        Isochronic TonesImproving Sleep and Power Napping – When you're struggling to get to sleep, your brain is probably producing too much beta activity. Banala with isochronic tone technology can be used to reduce beta activity and increase the low delta and theta frequency range. This will help you get to sleep faster and deeper.  Brainwave Frequencies for Better SleepBrainwave speed is measured in Hertz (Hz) and relates to the number of cycles per second. A 5Hz brainwave is cycling at a rate of five times per second.Our brainwave activity reflects how we are feeling and what we are doing. If slower brainwaves are dominant, we might feel sleepy, very relaxed, or dreamy.  Brainwave entrainment methods like isochronic tones are used to stimulate and produce more brainwave activity of a specific frequency or range, making it more dominant. This helps Banala effectively give you the best sleep. You can reduce high brain wave frequency by listening to slower-speed isochronic tones, which will help calm your mind and bring down your stress levels.  Delta Waves0.5Hz-4Hz – Delta waves are very slow and low in frequency. You produce the most delta activity during your deepest sleep. During delta, your body does most of its healing and regenerating of cells. Theta Waves4Hz to 8Hz – Theta waves are also mainly dominant during sleep, in a state of deep relaxation, or when we are drifting in and out of sleep. Specification:Output Power: 3WDischarge Current: 5V/0.5ABattery: 400mAh 3.7VCharging Current: 200mASize: Ø70 x 40 mmWeight: 120gActive Time: Up to 12 hoursStandby Time: Up to 20 hours BluetoothHand-free phone operation.AUX5V USB-C rapid chargingBanala Life is a company dedicated to helping people all over the world sleep better. Based on extensive and insightful research, we offer solutions that improve the well-being of users. Our mission is to defeat insomnia once and for all.Our first product, the Banala Alarm Clock, was a hit on Kickstarter in 2018. We served more than 1,000 backers from the Kickstarter campaign and shipped more than 10,000 units of the Banala Alarm Clock to more than 100 countries worldwide.We have poured our hearts, minds, and weekends into this project because, deep down, we believe that once you use Banala, you will have better sleep, which will bring you a better life.We hope you join us on this journey and make your sleep the supreme journey.Our trusted manufacturing partner is ready to run the production. With your help, we can secure enough orders to start production of the first batch and bring Banala Lite to you.If you would like to reach us, feel free to email us at contact@banala.life. We would love to hear from you!Thank you!    MEDIA KIT We are ready to ship!

story:
Are you looking for an ear cleaner with the newest technology and HD visible camera? Bebird, the Smart Visual Otoscope,  is the safest ear cleaner with soft silica gel ear-spoon designed perfectly for your need. Say good-bye to the traditional way of cotton cleaning!

The previous generation of the Bebird product received a great response after launch. Here are some feedback from our supporters:

 

 

When the earwax starts affecting your hearing, it has reached the level called "impaction." You may be more likely to develop excess wax if you use hearing aids or earplugs regularly. Older adults and people with developmental disabilities are especially at higher risks. And that's why we invented Bebird - to provide the ultimate solution for ear cleaning in the easiest and safest way.

 

  Buy now to get a ear tool gift pack for FREE!

The Bebird X17 includes 11 different accessories that offer 72 various ways of ear cleaning. With 3 different sizes of the soft ear spoons, it cleans your ear at an absolute comfort level. The accessories are durably made for several uses, and are easily replaceable.

                         

 

Maintain your ear health in the safest way

The classic cotton swab is a traditional method that many people have used to clean their ears. Because you can not see clear your ear canal, it may result in pushing the wax buildup deeper into your ear, causing blockage or severe hearing loss.

  • ​

 

Powerful HD Camera

The professional ear otoscope is equipped with 3 million pixels and 3.5mm lens length which allows you to see the real-time images of tiny details inside your ear canal. The endoscope improves clarity while removing the wax residue. It also enhances the accuracy of eliminating every single buildup to make your ears wax-free!​

 

The softest ear spoon for your sensitive ears

The 100% softest ear spoons are made from polycarbonate + high-grade silica gel materials. The elements degraded from nature will provide the safest protection of your ear canal while cleaning.

Never hurt your eardrum again

The protective plug is adjustable to fit all sizes of the ear canal. The 360 degrees angle recognition lets you precisely clean your ear canal in all directions. The 6-Axis Smart Gyroscope consists of a 2mm accurate measurement that will pick the slightest movement of the cleaning rode. It helps to prevent the cleaning rod from being inserted more in-depth into the ear and protects from hurting the eardrum.

 

Comfortable while operating

The Bebird Otoscope ear spoon cleaner provides a similar temperature as the human body. This feature will avoid damage or severe burn to your ear canal. 

 

The long battery life make traveling easier

Charging has never been easier! A full charge of 1.5 hours can be used for two months' duration. To charge, just place the body part of the ear cleaner rod onto the magnetic base.

Enjoy the best ear cleaning experience while being comfortable

  • Comfortable during use, perfect for children 3 years old and up.
  • Children can watch the ear cleaning process while you clean their ears.​

                                                  Easy to use and monitor while you operate

To use, simply open the cover of the cleaning rod, and the product will automatically pair with the Wifi to activate. You can also monitor the battery life of your Bebird via the app. The app supports both Android and IOS operating systems with multiple languages available.

   No more frustration due to slow app performance

Equipped with a super-fast WiFi chip, Bebird has a very smooth transmission. It provides the highest speed for the app to function the camera display, making it easy and smooth to set up and auto-connect the product to your phone. 

Now is the chance to win a FREE storage bag by sharing your referral link with your friends!
*Please check the update#1 for details.


Promote sustainability worldwide

The 100% reusable soft ear spoons are eco-friendly and promote sustainability to protect the environment. Most of the cotton swabs end up in our oceans, and it is harmful to the environment. ​

Bebird is a technology-based company that integrates R&D, production and sales. We are mainly engaged in ear-cleaning health products. The founder of the team has over 10 years of R&D experience; our sales team also has over 20 years of customer service experience. As of now, we have successfully distributed our products to Korea and USA.

We believe in the simplicity of design and use for every product, and that's why we invented Bebird - a sophistication of technology with the simplest user experience.




Contact: info@longhamtec.com
Customer service: cs@blackbees.cn​

story:
Life After Birth

(version française si dessous)

I'm Emilie, after I gave birth to my daughter I suffered from terrible Postpartum Depression that lasted for months, but I also went through PTSD. It took doctors weeks to diagnose this.  There are so many complications and problems that can arise after child birth, and many of these are not spoken about, or known. 
The Life After Birth brand will help raise awareness and ease the stigma revolving around Postpartum difficulties. It can affect Mothers and Fathers alike, and impact family and friends. 

 Our online store

I am looking to raise 10,000$. With this money I will build the Life After Birth online store. All the base merchandise will be created with this fund, as well as organizing charitable events! 

When the store is all set up, for every purchase made 5% of proceeds will be directly donated to Postpartum.net. Postpartum Support International is an organization that is active in 36 countries around the world, the purpose of the organization is to increase awareness among public and professional communities about perinatal mental health.

Management

I am excited to embark on this project, building an online store will be new to me. However, as an experienced retail manager I am convinced that my skills can be applied to make this a successful Brand. I am determined to ease the shame surrounding mental illness in relation to pregnancy and child birth. It can be easy get overwhelmed with the need to be the perfect happy family, and there is nothing to be ashamed of when this doesn't happen immediately.  

Spread the word

Thank you everyone who is willing and able to contribute and fund Life After Birth. If you can't contribute you can still make a difference by spreading the word and using the indiegogo share tools! If everyone gets involved in their own way we can all make a difference!

 

La vie après l'accouchement

Je m'appel Emilie, après avoir donné naissance a ma fille j'ai souffert d'une sévère dépression postpartum qui dura des mois. J'ai aussi vécu un SSPT qui a prise des semaines a diagnostiquer. Tellements de complications et de problèmes peuvent survenir après la naissance d'un enfant. Malheureusement beaucoup de ces problèmes ne sont pas abordés, ni connus. La marque "Life After Birth" aidera à sensibiliser les gens et à enrayer les préjugés sur les difficultés postpartum. Les mères comme les pères peuvent être affectés et l'impact peut être ressenti par tous.

J'espère amasser assez de fons pour bâtir la boutique en ligne "Life After Birth". Quand le magasin sera prêt, 5% des profits ira directement à Postpartum Support International, un organisme actif dans 36 pays autour du monde, qui a pour but de sensibliser les gens et les professionel de la santé sur la santé mental postpartum.

Je suis heureuse d'embarquer dans ce projet, et déterminé à faire disparaître la honte entourant les maladies mentale liées à la grossesse et l'accouchement. Le désire d'être une nouvelle famille parfaite et heureuse peut être angoissant, et il n'y a pas de honte à avoir quand ça n'arrive pas immédiatement.

Passer le mot!
Merci a tous ceux qui veulent et peuvent supporter "Life After Birth". Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer, vous pouvez quand même faire une différence en passant le mot et en utilisant l'outil de partage indiegogo! Si tous le monde s'implique à sa façon, nous pourrons tous ensemble faire une différence!

story:
TA-SK is the technological garment that helps your muscles recover from microtrauma with NO effort through advanced compression technology.

 

Every athlete after an intense workout feels the pain and fatigue in their legs due to microtraumas undergone during the activity. To avoid injuries and improve performance, the athlete should wait for the muscle to regenerate before subjecting it to a new session, but this requires time and effort.

TA-SK allows you to overcome this problem: through an adequate degree of compression it increases the oxygenation of the muscles, allowing to recover passively in a reduced time! You can wear TA-SK under your clothes during the day in a comfortable way and GET READY TO THE NEXT SESSION quicker.

 

 

The perfect combination between effectiveness, comfort & design through our Italian patented technology.  The pre-sales phase is officially on: take the chance to reserve and try the product in world preview.

 

Muscle compression is the main therapy performed at medical level for muscle trauma recovery.
The application of a bandage to compress the muscles facilitates the injury healing and the flow of liquids, which are the cause of swelling and pain.


With TA-SK you can obtain all the benefits derived from muscle compression, with the plus of wearing a comfortable garment that performs an optimized action and that lasts for long time.

 

 

TA-SK is an effective product, and at the same time its design enables you to wear it at any time of the day. That's why comfort and design two of its core features:

  • comfortable to wear like a second skin thanks to its minimal thickness (80 microns) and the new heat-sealing technology that guarantees no visible seams
  • impossible to lose during use thanks to the two silicone bands at the ends
  • easy to wear
  • Contemporary and unisex design thanks to its black color with blue inserts and to the long experience of Punto Azzurro in the production of high quality technical sportswear.

 

 

An innovative and patented fabric that guarantees quality and performance.

Special elastomers and woven fabric allow for the best performance:

  • elasticity and resistance
  • maximum breathability
  • differentiated compression that allows to act on the injured muscle in an optimized way, applying different compressions according to the type of muscle
  • compressive capacity which resists time, washing and use 

 

 

Our team has developed and produced the product with the support of medical staff, professional sport trainers and experts from the textile sector. 100% Italian Design.

 

DISCOVER MORE ON : WWW.TA-SK.IT

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

How to wear it? Ta-sk: Upper Leg 

 

 

 

How to wear it? Ta-sk: LowerLeg

story:
First Retail Location

After building our business for 4 years, we are excited to announce we are opening up our first retail location! 

We have been keeping our eye out for a good fit for a couple of years now and stumbled upon this perfect location in downtown Dexter, Michigan. This location will be our primary retail location, as well as a homebase to store and manage all of our inventory, package all online and wholesale orders, and have an office space. We are located right next to the post office in Dexter (which is very convenient) and just around the corner from the Main Street. It’s going to be an awesome destination soap shop, as well as a convenient location to stop by purchase everyday household items and a space to host events like soap making and other workshops. 

Retail Location: 3170 Baker Road, Dexter, MI 48130

Building Size: 1,000 SF

Plot Size: 0.42 acres - includes back and side yard

Floorplan:

  • Reception and Retail/Open Area = Tiani retail space
  • Office = Tiani stock, shipping and packaging center
  • Upper Level = Tiani office space

Location Perks:

  • Close walking distance to all downtown Dexter shops, restaurants, parks and trails
  • Next door to the Post Office
  • Street parking available and easily accessible
  • 3 miles from I-94 and 15-20 minutes from downtown Ann Arbor

 

About Tiani Body Care

Website: http://www.tianibodycare.com

Etsy: http://www.Etsy.com/shop/TianiBodyCareCo

Here at Tiani Body Care we specialize in a wide variety of everyday household and bath products. All of our products are safe on sensitive skin, kid friendly and are made with high quality ingredients. Every ingredient is carefully selected to be safe for the whole family and the final product is gentle on your skin, the environment and is available at a reasonable price.

 

 

About the Owner, Founder and Formulator

Hi! I am Violet Tiani (middle name) and the Owner of Tiani Body Care.

I launched Tiani Body Care after obtaining a degree in Biochemisty/Molecular Biology and am the formulator of all of Tiani Body Care products. It has been an exciting journey and is the perfect combination of sharing my love for science, supporting our local community and living a healthy life. After building my business for the pas 4 years, we are very excited to announce we are opening our first retail location. Stay turned and we will share more about Tiani Body Care and our new retail location.

 

The Impact

All donors will receive the option to select a thank you gift, which includes a variety of different products or gift cards to be used online or at our new shop. Thank you again, we look forward to sharing our new journey with you. 

Retail Space:

  • New flooring
  • Updating and replacing light fixtures
  • Painting and new trim work
  • Display counters and shelving

Stock Room:

  • New flooring
  • Updating and replacing light fixtures
  • Painting and new trim work
  • Stock shelving and counters
  • Updating shipping equipment

Kitchenette:

  • Replacing sink
  • Updating cabinetry
  • Painting

Bathroom

  • Updating vanity, sink and lighting
  • Painting and trim work
  • Updating flooring

Upper Level

  • Architect to bring spiral stair case to code
  • Painting and trip work
  • Updating light fixtures


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out by posting on your own social media accounts
  • Share the campaign with your friends and family via email
  • Write an article about the project

 

Thank you!

We will keep you updated with renovation progress and will announce our grand opening date.
story_txt:
First Retail Location
After building our business for 4 years, we are excited to announce we are opening up our first retail location! 
We have been keeping our eye out for a good fit for a couple of years now and stumbled upon this perfect location in downtown Dexter, Michigan. This location will be our primary retail location, as well as a homebase to store and manage all of our inventory, package all online and wholesale orders, and have an office space. We are located right next to the post office in Dexter (which is very convenient) and just around the corner from the Main Street. It’s going to be an awesome destination soap shop, as well as a convenient location to stop by purchase everyday household items and a space to host events like soap making and other workshops. 
Retail Location: 3170 Baker Road, Dexter, MI 48130
Building Size: 1,000 SF
Plot Size: 0.42 acres - includes back and side yard

Floorplan:


Reception and Retail/Open Area = Tiani retail space

Office = Tiani stock, shipping and packaging center

Upper Level = Tiani office space

Location Perks:

Close walking distance to all downtown Dexter shops, restaurants, parks and trails
Next door to the Post Office
Street parking available and easily accessible
3 miles from I-94 and 15-20 minutes from downtown Ann Arbor


 
About Tiani Body Care
Website: http://www.tianibodycare.com
Etsy: http://www.Etsy.com/shop/TianiBodyCareCo
Here at Tiani Body Care we specialize in a wide variety of everyday household and bath products. All of our products are safe on sensitive skin, kid friendly and are made with high quality ingredients. Every ingredient is carefully selected to be safe for the whole family and the final product is gentle on your skin, the environment and is available at a reasonable price.
 
 

About the Owner, Founder and Formulator
Hi! I am Violet Tiani (middle name) and the Owner of Tiani Body Care.
I launched Tiani Body Care after obtaining a degree in Biochemisty/Molecular Biology and am the formulator of all of Tiani Body Care products. story:
#C-Rest Pillow lulls you into sleep! See it in Action.

 

C-REST PILLOW is a NECK RELIEF Pillow ✔️ that provides the ergonomic support and helps you fall asleep effortlessly. It improves neck posture for those with aches, pain, discomfort, or anything in between. It helps relax muscles, relieves tension, and improves the mobility of the neck and shoulders. Take a nap, or take a good night of sleep with C-Rest Pillow- the most ergonomic pillow, ever. 

Relax. Fall Asleep in Minutes! Rest on C-Rest Pillow

Living with neck pain is pain. If you have frequent neck pain or know someone who does, you know it’s not an easy problem to get rid of. Chiropractic, Massage, and physiotherapy are costly and time-consuming. Why there isn't a solution for home care?

Stop band-aiding the problem with medications. We must align our cervical spines to reverseall these negative effects of tech devices, gravity, injuries, and whiplashes.  

Straight Out of Medical Book

 

Your neck is out of balance. Let’s fix that!


 

Rest on C-Rest

Resting on C-REST PILLOW ( for as little as 10-15 minutes a day) can help restore your default neck posture (the natural curve of the neck: cervical lordosis). Designed and tested by ergonomists, it aligns your head and neck for proper support, so you can sleep soundly.

Mimics the Feeling of Getting a Neck-Massage

It is made of integral skin foam. When your head rests on C-Rest Pillow, the integral skin foam takes the pressure and expand, providing gentle stretches. Gentle, but perfectly therapeutic. It feels just like a professional's hands. 

 You can take a nap or a night of sleep if you like. It's effortless. It's best to use:

  • in the morning, to warm up the neck spines
  • in the evening, to restore the damage after a long day of work
  • before/after exercises, to relieve stress and tension

 

 

 

The C-Rest Pillow’s form was designed to mimic the effect of having a pair of expert hands give you a neck-massage. Its unique shape cradles the head while relying on the head’s weight to stretch your neck out ever so gently, relieving pain in as quick as 10 minutes. Its name comes from the C-curve that defines its shape as well as from the C1-C6 cervical vertebrae in the neck region that it aims to relax. 

 

The pillow comes molded from a unique integral skin foam that’s both rigid yet comfortable. The foam’s density allows the C-Rest pillow to maintain its shape, unlike most regular, orthopedic, or travel pillows that just deform to take the shape of your head. The pillow’s unique shape-retention property, combined with its low-poly design helps it get to work on key pressure points of the neck, working on bones, nerves, muscles, and blood vessels to help restore your neck’s natural curves (or cervical lordosis, as your chiropractor would say), relieving stress, tension, poor sleep, or anything in between.

1. Effortless & On-the-go. 

We know, “We tried, too.” Most devices like foam rollers & massagers are not designed specifically for your neck; otherwise, they are mostly awkward and require some background knowledge.

That's why we made C-REST PILLOW. A device, specifically designed for your neck that helps us wind down naturally for better, deeper relief in your neck. 

 

2. Align the Natural C-Curve in a matter of minutes.

Restoring the curve in your cervical spine cues your body for rest. Natural alignment induces more blood flow & better circulation, helping you to relax. Such feeling lulls your entire body to relax.

3. Gentle & gradual traction & stretch

Gentle stretch is always better than sudden and aggressive treatment. Slow & Steady!

C-REST PILLOW improves neck posture for those with aches, pain, discomfort or anything in between. While you just lie down and relax, it naturally restores your neck curves (a.k.a cervical lordosis), relieving stress, tension, poor sleep, tension headaches, migraines and more...

 

4. Pressure relief with amazing touch & feel

C-REST PILLOW precisely contours to provide targeted pressure relief. The "Just-Right" Responsiveness of C-REST PILLOW cells to align your neck spines in the most natural possible, with no disruptions or resistances.

To sum up, "The Perfect Balance of Soft and Firm - Comfort & Support." That's me!

5. Improve Posture

Decompression with C-REST PILLOW should happen in as little as 10-15 minutes a day - for less than the cost of a single physical therapy or chiropractic session. Consistency over expensive treatments. (Bonus: You can enjoy it virtually anywhere- on the floor, bed, sofa, yoga mat, and so on.) Good posture boosts your mood, confidence, motivation and overall health.

6. One Size Fits All

Unique Polygon Design is built to Fit Your Neck Perfectly. These curves and edges make a huge difference. Our Advanced Ergonomic Design is adaptable to any neck shape and posture. Our unique polygon structure combines perfect fit, stability, and ergonomic support. With C-REST PILLOW, we want to make sure that not a single person is excluded because of his or her neck proportions, height, and weight. One size fits most, maybe all.

7. It's water-proof

Wipe it down with damp cloth to clean, or just dunk it in water. Will it float?

Also, it's made of INTEGRAL SKINFOAM, it's tough enough to handle everyday tumble. It wicks moisture/water, so it can be cleaned with a simple wipe down. It's light, portable and flexible. Simple to set up: bed, floor, soft, literally anywhere! 

 

1. Side to Side, Up and Down

As you guessed by now, we made C-REST PILLOW as easy & intuitive as possible. No instructions needed. It just works. Align yourself with confidence and rest is assured. Once you get used to it, just move up & down or side to side as seen below:

 

2. So Easy, it’s Almost Fun

During C-REST PILLOW, you should take a deep breathe and move side to side or up and down if you like. Whether you like to read a book or play on a phone, just give yourself 10-15 minutes. 

You can assume any positions... but try not to fall asleep. You may drop a phone in your face.

Why? Neck is very delicate, providing wide range of motion at the joints. Plus, many nerves, veins, and arteries circulate at very high speed. Therefore, you do not want to rock the boat. Just wait for it to relax in the most natural way possible. Enjoy it as if it' is Neck Yoga.

 

All pledges placed in Indiegogo Project will start shipping in July 2020.

Foam : 100% Polyurethane

Cover : 100% Polyester

Size: 13 in (W) x  5 in (L) x 3.3 in (H) 

 

Built by former doctor & a neck pain patient who wanted better for their patients, families—and yours.

Hi, my name is Richard Kim!

Our neck is being punished everyday. Due to poor posture, we are losing the natural C-Curve on the neck. When out of balance, it causes tension headaches, migraines, and chronic neck pain. It may be caused by whiplash injuries from motor vehicle accidents or sports injuries.

Sadly, I was not the exception. I, myself, suffered a lot of pain in the neck due to mental and physical stress. It got worsened to the point that I couldn't even get on flights. I even suffered tinnitus(ringing in the ears) and vertigo for a year. I wanted to fix myself. That' how I started Benepom. Our venture into the US Market was a humble one with C-Rest, back in 2016. 6000+ backers have supported us.

After we learned a hard lession from C-Rest Original, we developed the idea even further, making it into C-Rest Relieve, the version 2. 3000+ backers have supported us. We had a lot of love from the community. Thank you again!

At Benepom, we understand what your wants & needs- painless, effortless and hassle-free treatment that can be done daily. Well. That's exactly what C-Rest and C-Rest family do.

We have no revenue goals or product launch deadlines. No wasted time with budgets and Powerpoint decks to appease outsiders. We take as much time as necessary to design gear that we're confident is literally the best out there.

We love our C-Rest Pillow. I hope you love it as much as we do, too. Here are some of the photos that we love to share. This is how to make it in our factory.

We ensure that the workers in our partners' factories are treated fairly. They're paid higher than average, with safe working conditions and humane hours. In our factory, we have 53 workers from 7 different countries. Gotta love the diversity. We treat our customers as peers. If you ask us a question, we'll tell you the answer, openly and honestly.

Richard Kim, on behalf of the Benepom Team

 

Collaborators & Partners

story:
Squeeze the Hope Teddy Bears™ are a line of interactive teddy bears for kids and adults suffering from cancer, depression, abuse, or poverty. Research indicates that every hour, ten kids die from cancer somewhere in the world. Some of these children toss and turn at night wondering when morning will come. Other kids lay awake at night fighting the effects of depression, abuse, or poverty.

Depression is on the rise. Suicide is the second leading cause of death between the ages of 15 to 29. Many schools have been disrupted by COVID-19 and students are not being referred for counseling.

Simply Squeeze the Hope Teddy Bears™ and you will hear comforting music, visualization techniques, and messages to relieve and support kids on their journey toward wholeness. Funding is needed to manufacture these bears with sound boxes in different languages. The initial request is for $30,000 to make these handmade bears and the long-term goal is $100,000 in order to get these bears mass produced. Funds will be applied toward design, engineering, packaging, attorney fees, administrative costs, website design, and rewards fulfillment.

This project is dear to Joyce, as she too has experienced and overcome depression, abuse, and low self-esteem. She is sharing through these bears what has worked for her and others, enabling them to become overcomers.

Please support this project and bring hope to those suffering from cancer, depression, abuse, or poverty by ordering your bear, making a donation of any amount, or investing in one of the reward levels for campaign products. Thank you in advance for changing a child’s life by contributing and sharing this campaign.

story:
Update

If You're just now seeing this Campaign, I planned to run a 2nd campaign and used the first one for research! DON'T BE AFRAID TO BACK THIS CAMPAIGN! ALL of the manufacturing is currently handled inhouse, so WILL BE ABLE TO DELIVER REGARDLESS OF REACHING MY CAMPAIGN GOAL!

 

Background

Regenerators Water Bottles started as a method to make working out a truly hands free experience. When this idea came into mind over 7 years ago I hadn't thought of the many positive impacts that this water bottle could have. 

 

About Regenerators Water Bottles and the Model We are Shipping to You

The red version of the Regenerators Water Bottle in the video is MK2 V2 (Model Kit 2 Version 2) and  has representations of features on the real thing you will be receiving in MK3 V1 0r MK3 V2. The bottle in the video does contain water, and is safe for drinking; However unlike MK3 V1 or MK3 V2 the speed loader feature, ability to detach into 3 parts, as well as the attachable Blue Tooth/Touch Speaker are not present, but will be present in the model being shipped to backers. Also, the version sent to backers will have a smoother and more polished finish. This page will be updated throughout this campaign with new content, and sneak peaks of MK3 V1 and MK3 V2 that backers will be receiving

 
  • This product will help you stay cool all day long (or at least cool your body for the duration of how long the water inside stays cold) with the cold water from the bottle helping regulate body temperature. 
  • The Bottle detaches in to 3 sections making cleaning easy. 
  • The material has been engineered and coated to help keep bacteria from depositing in the plastic (Between the layers of the plastic that is. Essentially were making it easier to clean. This doesn't mean bacteria wont deposit just means that it will be much easier to clean)
  • Bottle is fully flexible, freezable, refrigerable (disinfect before storing), and will not lose shape (under reasonable wear and tear)
  • MK3 V2 Will include an attachable Blue Tooth/Touch Speaker for Media/Phone use 
  • Future plans for pulse tracking and a mobile app are under way
  • Multiple color options available
  • We offer a couple sizes that fit a wide range of people of all body types (You should measure your own neck and decide which size is the right fit for you. Also, if you would like a tighter fit for the purpose of sports or other activities we suggest selecting a size down)
  1.  Small : Women/Petite Men/Children (Neck size = 16.7 ") 
  2.  Medium: Women/Men/ Teenager (Neck size = 17.93 ")
  3.  Large: Big&Tall/Women/Men (Neck size = 19.17 ")
  • The bottle is manufactured with food and water safe material
  • Regenerators Water Bottles, all its features/attachments, and designs are patent and trademark pending 
 

Why $25K?

We handle our own manufacturing for now, so we are looking to purchase more machines for printing these bottles up, cover cost of attachable Blue Tooth/Touch Speaker, other manufacturing cost, R&D and Miscellaneous. 

 

Credits/Thanks:

Jesse Silva (Head engineer)

Tatyanna Cormier (Project Coordinator/Design Hand)

Lebarron Williams (Videographer)

Demetrius Moore (Actor/Athlete)

Trevaughn Osler (Actor/Athlete)

Jon Todd (Actor/Athlete)

Willie Sublet (Photographer/Actor)

Dwight Coleman (Talent Scout)

And thank you to everyone who took part in making this project possible

 

 

 

 

 

Risk

Delivery times may change according to weather or interruption in manufacturing and supply chain etc.

Environmental commitments

Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.

Long-lasting design

These water bottles are made to keep and re use freeing the environment from some of the plastic from disposable bottles and regenerators water bottles are completely recyclable

Reusability and recyclability

In the future there are plans to start a buy back or bottle trade in program for a discount or credit towards your next pair

Sustainable materials

Its reusable, and a lot of water goes wasted in disposable bottles we can help return water to the environment when emptying before cleaning or putting away instead of trashing while still partially filled like disposables.

Environmentally friendly factories

Were small and beyond the use of electricity were pretty environmentally friendly and plan to keep it that way

Sustainable Distribution

We can not control exactly how its delivered, but we will be vigilant in picking environment friendly shipping services

Something else

We are earth lovers, so our love for our environment is beyond business we consider the environment in everything we do in our personal lives as well

Bottle is fully flexible, freezable, refrigerable (disinfect before storing), and will not lose shape (under reasonable wear and tear)
MK3 V2 Will include an attachable Blue Tooth/Touch Speaker for Media/Phone use 
Future plans for pulse tracking and a mobile app are under way
Multiple color options available

We offer a couple sizes that fit a wide range of people of all body types (You should measure your own neck and decide which size is the right fit for you. Also, if you would like a tighter fit for the purpose of sports or other activities we suggest selecting a size down)


 Small : Women/Petite Men/Children (Neck size = 16.7 ") 
 Medium: Women/Men/ Teenager (Neck size = 17.93 ")
 Large: Big&Tall/Women/Men (Neck size = 19.17 ")


The bottle is manufactured with food and water safe material
Regenerators Water Bottles, all its features/attachments, and designs are patent and trademark pending 
 Why $25K?
We handle our own manufacturing for now, so we are looking to purchase more machines for printing these bottles up, cover cost of attachable Blue Tooth/Touch Speaker, other manufacturing cost, R&D and Miscellaneous.  Credits/Thanks:
Jesse Silva (Head engineer)
Tatyanna Cormier (Project Coordinator/Design Hand)
Lebarron Williams (Videographer)
Demetrius Moore (Actor/Athlete)
Trevaughn Osler (Actor/Athlete)
Jon Todd (Actor/Athlete)
Willie Sublet (Photographer/Actor)
Dwight Coleman (Talent Scout)
And thank you to everyone who took part in making this project possible

 
 
 

 
 
Risk
Delivery times may change according to weather or interruption in manufacturing and supply chain etc.
Environmental commitmentsVisit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.Long-lasting designThese water bottles are made to keep and re use freeing the environment from some of the plastic from disposable bottles and regenerators water bottles are completely recyclableReusability and recyclabilityIn the future there are plans to start a buy back or bottle trade in program for a discount or credit towards your next pairSustainable materialsIts reusable, and a lot of water goes wasted in disposable bottles we can help return water to the environment when emptying before cleaning or putting away instead of trashing while still partially filled like disposables.Environmentally friendly factoriesWere small and beyond the use of electricity were pretty environmentally friendly and plan to keep it that waySustainable DistributionWe can not control exactly how its delivered, but we will be vigilant in picking environment friendly shipping servicesSomething elseWe are earth lovers, so our love for our environment is beyond business we consider the environment in everything we do in our personal lives as well

story:
“Learn to throw aces when life throws curve balls.” - Anita, HappinessFactors

HappinessFactors is building the bridge between mental/emotional health and the Holistic best of East and West. Our wholesome, holistic, one of a kind, complete solutions combine  Yoga, Hypnotherapy, NLP, Meditation, Psychology, Energy Healing and more to help people attain and sustain emotional wellness, happiness and purposeful life!

HappinessFactors emotional wellness ecosystem is a one stop shop for everything mental/emotional wellness, easily available at your fingertips.

The company offers customizable solutions instead of one size fits all. Our app incorporates a unique, interesting, gamified approach to emotional wellness; making it fun, playful and enjoyable to create happy, healthy mindsets together! 

We are a minority, woman owned small business, making a difference in the quality of life! The outstanding team embraces diversity while creating happy mindsets and providing customized and personalized customer care!

Diversity is in our veins!

Our diverse team includes youth, senior citizens and everyone in between!

HappinessFactors media footprint includes ABC, NBC, Fox, Silicon Valley Business Journal, IND TV, WomenNow, TV Asia, SF29, IndiaPost, IndiaWest and others. Our founder Anita has been cited at educational institutions including Stanford. She believes that happiness is everyone’s birthright and we are on the path to make it accessible easily, at your fingertips.

Silicon Valley Business Journal's "Woman Of Influence" Award

                        

     

                                                               

*Logos are trademarks of the respective companies.   

 

Our mission

Our mission is to create happy mindsets and make holistic wellness easily available across the globe!

Our Rationale For Raising Funds. Curious???

We're passionate about making emotional wellness available to those who need it most by increasing our reach.

Branding & Marketing - Update the brand and app, website, SEO, podcast and infrastructure. Digital marketing and paid ads.

 

For perks and more, visit our website.

We can't thank you enough for your support! It means the world to us! You made our hearts melt and we have some outstanding perks!

We would like to reward your generosity with 2 complimentary tickets for our webinar,“Happiness In Uncertain Times”. Claim these before they are gone.

$10 K Or More - Create A Legacy

Have you ever wanted to create a legacy? Everyone who contributes more than $10k, gets featured in the acknowledgement page of our app. What does that mean? That means everyone who uses the app knows what a big difference you made to their emotional wellness.

 

$1000 - Happiness Genius 4.0 2021 Tickets & Bonuses

Want to meet team HappinessFactors in person? We offer you and your loved ones complimentary tickets to Happiness Genius 4.0* 2021 – our flagship event featuring speakers who will inspire you to live a healthier, joyful life each day.

Bonuses:
1. Autographed copy of book by the founder (ships within US only) or e-book
2. Cooking classes
3. Emotional Wellness Assessment

*Note: This event may be online in 2021.

.

 

$500 - Website Shout Out

Do you want to be famous? For all contributions of $500 or more, their names get featured in the amazing gratitude page of our website.

 

$100 - Happiness Recipes

$100 - Ebook- recipe book featuring tested, plant based recipes that are delicious and healthy

 

$50 - Happiness Factors Notebook

$50 – HF notebook autographed by the founder with a handwritten note and pen

Why do HappinessFactors’s solutions matter? 
 

  1. Available solutions are medication centric, fragmented and non-holistic.
  2. They cover a small niche.
  3. They are often expensive
  4. They are complicated and tedious.

Studies show:

  • 2 in 5 Americans struggle with mental issues. 
  • The pandemic has increased mental health issues.
  • 40% of adults in the U.S. have reported symptoms of anxiety or depressive disorder.
  • There has been a rise in domestic abuse, violence during covid times.
  • Inability to have effective personal and professional relationships.
  • Unhealthy eating and lifestyle. Unable to give up on addictions.
  • Feeling lonely and not good enough. 

     

  

Values That Define Us:

  • Innovation In Our Veins
  • Honest Communication
  • We Over Me
  • Collaborative Team Spirit
  • Empathy, Enthusiasm & Positivity
  • Find Clarity In Ambiguity
  • Respect And Appreciation
  • Kindness And Compassion
  • Customer First

 

We appreciate every bit of help we can get. Share this campaign on social media and we will give you a shout out on one of our platforms. If you share on more than one platform, we will reciprocate with multiple mentions, too.

If you inspire your friends to pitch in, we would be super grateful and rest assured, we will have perks for you and your friends!

Sources:

  • https://jamanetwork.com/journals/jama-health-forum/fullarticle/2770050 
  • https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2021/03/210322112907.htm
  • https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/70/wr/mm7013e2.htm
