story:
WE'VE REACHED OUR GOAL, THANK YOU! 

ENJOY EXCLUSIVE INDIEGOGO DISCOUNTS UNTIL 5TH JUNE!

 

SAY GOODBYE TO YOUR BOTTLE.

Mito’s solar-powered smart bottle provides a smarter and greener way to hydrate. Mito reminders supplement our natural thirst function to ensure you are always hydrated.

 

 

60% of adults have inadequate water intake. 

Though thirst may be an indicator of dehydration, it only occurs after your body recognises you are dehydrated. Our capacity to maintain awareness of thirst itself is often dissolved due to our everyday tasks and distractions.

And what are some of the consequences?

A big issue, but why do some of us remain dehydrated? 

SAY HELLO TO MITO.

 Introducing our MiTo smart water bottle, an affordable, smart and sustainable way to hydrate. 

 We at Mito provide a companion that supplements your daily water needs no matter what you do.

 

Smarter than you think. 

Audio-visual reminders to prompt you to drink so that you can achieve your hydration goals.

 

Cables, wires? Thank you next. 

USB Type C, Wireless Charging? 

Our MiTo bottles are solar-powered. MiTo bottles will charge you by reminding you to drink and all you have to is... DRINK! How much simpler can it get? 

 

A bottle for every need.

Our bottles are 500ml, each model perfectly suited to your daily needs .

Why MiTo Cloud

The Mito Cloud App 

Spending a minute off social media every day to check on your hydration is simple and significant. 

You can pair your MiTo Cloud via Wi-fi with the MiTo app to track your daily hydration goals. The NB-IoT card in the bottle will track the amount of water consumed and update the app accordingly, with no hassle! 

 

You can also assess your hydration intake with the calendar. Our smart notifications will also remind you if you're falling short of your goals so that you can stay hydrated with #mymito. 

Peek Inside

Have a look at what our MiTo Smart Bottles are made of, intricately dissected for your viewing. We promise it’s safe to peek! 

Your next smart bottle. In Five Fabulous Colours.

 

Mito’s Smart Bottles introduces 5 different colour palette options: Charcoal Black, Snowflake White, Autumn Gold, Admiral Blue and Crimson Maroon. 

 

 

Partnering with mother nature

Trees help clean the air we breathe, filter the water we drink and provide habitat to over 80% of the world's terrestrial biodiversity. They also provide jobs to over 1.6 billion people, absorb harmful carbon from the atmosphere, and are key ingredients in 25% of all medicines.

In line with our sustainability values, MiTo has also partnered with One Tree Planted, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to global reforestation. Their mission is to reforest the planet, one tree at a time. For every bottle sold, a tree will be planted as part of our commitment to foster a greener and more sustainable future.

Together, we can end the usage of single-use plastics 

Risks and Challenges

While funding a crowdfunding project always comes with some level of risk, we have done everything in our power to reduce it as much as possible.  As with any product, there are inherent issues that can crop up during the manufacturing process. There may also be small bugs with our hardware. Nevertheless, we assure you, honourable Mito-nite, that every care has been taken to ensure that you get a working bottle so that you can focus on #myhydration.

 

The Lion Team

We're a young team based in Singapore with diverse backgrounds and experiences,  just avid hydro-geeks. We've always been passionate about the environment, advancing a more sustainable environment and improving overall wellness. Join us in our movement to change the way you hydrate! 

 

Questions? Email us at supportus@mito.fit

story:
What Is Anywhere Warrior?

It’s a fitness mentality that you could conquer any challenge at anytime, anywhere. The idea came from a love of the great outdoors, obstacle course racing, and the spirit of adventure. AW is personal training designed to get you the results you require. With Anywhere Warrior you get attention to fine detail, a well thought out and specific workout of the day to blast your body into shape and leave feeing accomplished.

WHAT MAKES IT DIFFERENT?

The difference is a holistic approach to your workout. Each day has its own focus and will incorporate some cardiovascular challenges and strength building leaving you feeling like a champion leaving the arena! Years of experience with all types of clients allows me to bring insight and knowledge to your unique situation regardless of fitness level.

Programming is topped off with a fun hiking adventure every other Saturday morning named TrailX! On a TrailX experience we hike to different locations and checkpoints in a loop fashion, in which we complete a circuit workout to add a step up to our walk in the park! These have been incredible experiences where you bond through battle with your friends and leave feeling focused and ready to take on the weekend!

What are you trying to achieve?

Anywhere Warrior was born during the pandemic and now is the time for a full brick and mortar. With a brand new, clean, locally owned facility you can get personalized training that is effective for you. Everyone deserves to live a long life. Cardiovascular disease is the most preventable cause of death. I want to give Livermore a fun-box of equipment to get a uniquely functional and fun workout.

From here we can organize on a larger scale to create fundraising events for local charities and noble causes that benefit the local community. My personal belief and goal is to cause the most benefit to the greatest number of people that I can. It begins with improving your fitness, so you’re prepared for anything life has in store for you.

Why Is this important?

Creating a space that brings the community together as a force for good. I plan to have a series of fitness events that will benefit local charities including, Shepards Gate, Tri-Valley Haven, Brain Cancer research funding. The time for growth is now and this will be a very impactful pillar of the community.

 

What we need is the start up capital for the following.

  1. Initial rent for the location,
  2. Equipment and that includes:

Power Racks, Barbells, Plates, Slamballs, Med Balls, Inertia Waves, Assault Bikes, Cardio Ergometers, yoga mats, padded flooring and rubber flooring, battle ropes, stability balls, yoga mats, benches, weighted sleds, punching bags of all shapes, Jump ropes, dumbbells, kettlebells, climbing ropes, sand bags, peg board or rock wall for bouldering and grip strength, warped wall, Olympic rings.

Good News, number 1, rent for the location is covered!
The building is currently in a bare state, studs and plywood. There is currently a $40 per sq/ft allowance for Tennant Improvements from the landlord / developer. The location is 1750 sq/ft, off the bat, there is $70,000 allowance to cover a buildout of bathrooms, floors, walls, paint, etc  

ALL FUNDRAISING WILL GO TOWARDS equipment and installation, future rent, and program development to expand the TrailX series and more sport specific clubs and activities such as cycling, backpacking, kayaking, paddle boarding, and many more. Enthusiasts and Novices can get together to form lasting friendships and explore hobbies together.

What makes us unique is you will have a passionate lead coach who knows how to put the phone down. Clients can come in, get attention tailored to them in both Structured Classes designed for folks with a schedule or in an open gym form where you can come and go at your own flow.
            TrailX is a big component of Anywhere Warrior. These are group outings in the local area, currently the Greater Bay Area, to test your mettle and gauge your progress by exploring the thousands of beautiful trails we have available to us. Along these group events the coach will lead you through checkpoint challenges to round out the excursions with some fun fitness along the way. Currently already underway there are TrailX excursions that are available to the public currently. Sign up at www.anywherewarrior.com today!

Should we fall short of our goal for fundraising all funds will be dedicated to achieving as much of the build-out goal. If we can just get some walls, paint and bathrooms, we will build the dream gym together over time. For now, lets get a roof over our heads. From the Base Camp we can host fundraising events for local charities, accept donations for the shelters, become a hub of self-empowerment with a bit of power lifting.

WHAT do contributors get? Membership to the club, Merchandise to help get the word out, first access to all the new programs when available, consideration and inclusion of the choice of equipment, first access to all events, parties, shin digs, fight nights, tailgates and fun stuff always and forever for free. See the Perks section for more information!

There will be challenges along the way. Those that I see in the future are going to be permit requirements, Shipping delays, city approval. These are factors of time and cost that could be speed bumps along the way. One way to overcome falling short of the fundraising would be to have your help get the word out to your fitness friends and neighbors. Use social Media to share your excitement for a new fitness community to thrive in your backyard and surrounding parks!

story:
SportsLync - the story

Jay Field was 12 years old and already 6 feet tall when he decided he wanted to be a pro basketball player. By the time he was a freshman, he was already catching the attention of college coaches and recruiters. But his family's financial situation caused him to move from state to state. Growing up in a household living on less than $1,300 a month, there were times where he wasn’t sure he’d ever have the opportunity to play pro, and times where he didn’t even know if his family would have enough to eat. 

But Jay kept pouring his heart and skill onto the court. He played basketball in high school and continued in junior college. Because of his family’s financial situation and with an understanding that many athletes suffer financially soon after retirement, Jay pursued a career in finance. In 2015, he launched his own sports agency. Managing top talent around the world, Jay never forgot his dreams of playing pro basketball. He knew he wasn’t the only athlete out there who had the skill but lacked the opportunity to pursue their dreams. So he put his business talent to work for his sports passion -- and he created a platform to give athletes, coaches and fans the chance to be seen and heard, and more importantly, to tell their stories. Our story begins with a high school freshman athlete who got lost in the shuffle -- and it turns into SportsLync.

The Need 

We are looking to raise $25,000. Funds will be used for SportsLync infrastructure. This includes continuing our mobile app development, legal costs and marketing. Our partners will not receive salaries from any investment. We intend to use investment funds to complete a platform build followed by brand awareness that promotes our platform as the leading digital platform for athletes.

Perks 

Support Levels

  • $0 – $150: Shout-out on social media & thank you
  • $151 – $200: Branded hat + shout-out
  • $201 – $300: Branded water bottle
  • $301 – $400: Branded jersey
  • $401+: Branded basketball signed by WNBA star and SportsLync partner Tyasha Harris

SportsLync Impact - The Recruitment Problem 

In sports — school, location, and stats are the driving force of how players advance to the next level. When it comes to student athletes, the market solely focuses on the top 100 players in the United States. This leaves a gap in the market, forcing athletes to turn to social media platforms to share their successes. While ideal for social networking, these platforms are not dedicated nor designed to build an athlete’s brand and sports career, nor to highlight game stats that are often left unseen.

Professional and collegiate teams often rely on scouts and word of mouth to identify potential athletes, which is inefficient, costly and outdated. The industry relies heavily on where athletes attend school to determine level of talent, rather than basing an athlete’s potential purely on performance and stats.  There are plenty of deserving athletes out there who aren’t being seen or heard. Enter SportsLync: a platform that creates an equal playing field and gives athletes the opportunity to be seen and heard – regardless of what school they attend or where they’re from. SportsLync allows athletes to create their narrative, input their (independently verified) stats, build their brands and share their stories, all while connecting with fans. 

This is a gamechanger in the world of sports recruitment and that's exactly what we wanted to build. SportsLync - Opportunity for every athlete.
story_txt:
SportsLync - the story
Jay Field was 12 years old and already 6 feet tall when he decided he wanted to be a pro basketball player. By the time he was a freshman, he was already catching the attention of college coaches and recruiters. But his family's financial situation caused him to move from state to state. Growing up in a household living on less than $1,300 a month, there were times where he wasn’t sure he’d ever have the opportunity to play pro, and times where he didn’t even know if his family would have enough to eat. 
But Jay kept pouring his heart and skill onto the court. He played basketball in high school and continued in junior college. Because of his family’s financial situation and with an understanding that many athletes suffer financially soon after retirement, Jay pursued a career in finance. In 2015, he launched his own sports agency. Managing top talent around the world, Jay never forgot his dreams of playing pro basketball. He knew he wasn’t the only athlete out there who had the skill but lacked the opportunity to pursue their dreams. So he put his business talent to work for his sports passion -- and he created a platform to give athletes, coaches and fans the chance to be seen and heard, and more importantly, to tell their stories. Our story begins with a high school freshman athlete who got lost in the shuffle -- and it turns into SportsLync.

The Need 
We are looking to raise $25,000. Funds will be used for SportsLync infrastructure. This includes continuing our mobile app development, legal costs and marketing. Our partners will not receive salaries from any investment. We intend to use investment funds to complete a platform build followed by brand awareness that promotes our platform as the leading digital platform for athletes.
Perks 
Support Levels


$0 – $150: Shout-out on social media & thank you

$151 – $200: Branded hat + shout-out

$201 – $300: Branded water bottle

$301 – $400: Branded jersey

$401+: Branded basketball signed by WNBA star and SportsLync partner Tyasha Harris


SportsLync Impact - The Recruitment Problem

Professional and collegiate teams often rely on scouts and word of mouth to identify potential athletes, which is inefficient, costly and outdated. The industry relies heavily on where athletes attend school to determine level of talent, rather than basing an athlete’s potential purely on performance and stats.  There are plenty of deserving athletes out there who aren’t being seen or heard. Enter SportsLync: a platform that creates an equal playing field and gives athletes the opportunity to be seen and heard – regardless of what school they attend or where they’re from. SportsLync allows athletes to create their narrative, input their (independently verified) stats, build their brands and share their stories, all while connecting with fans. 
This is a gamechanger in the world of sports recruitment and that's exactly what we wanted to build. SportsLync - Opportunity for every athlete.

story:
WHY?

 

Footwear is in constant evolution, new designs and new materials in all its elements: 

Soles with better grip (new drawings in each area according to the time of the step, components such as recycled rubber, etc.).

Half-soles (looking for maximum lightness, absorption and reaction).

Adaptive insole according to all types of footprints.

Upper (to fit the foot better, lighter and more breathable).

Don't you think that the lacing system has changed practically nothing since its origins?

                           

 

 

If they are released, the danger of accident is high: hooking on a bicycle or motorbike, stepping on a ladder, getting off a means of transport, getting stuck on an escalator...

For many people, tying them up can be a problem: think of the elderly, reduced mobility persons, people with some kind of disability, children, or any of us wearing gloves in winter.

 

HOW?

 

The reel systems were born to fasten Snow boots with gloved . Given their effectiveness, today many renowned brands design their high-end models to implement them (military world, hunting, fishing, mountain, trail running, skating, golf and cycling mainly).

After studying the different alternatives on the market, we want to launch endlaces® with your help: the universal reel system to attach to your own shoe lace without affecting the original design, maintaining its essence but providing greater functionality.

 

FOR WHOM?

 

It is universal as it is suitable for any age, practically all types of footwear regardless of gender and size.

Amongst young people, be the first to wear it to school, high school or university.

It makes life easier for grandparents.

 

 

In a simple way, personalize your shoes, make them unique, you have the opportunity to gain in performance on a daily basis and wear the most fashionable of the moment.

 

 

And if we think of sports, the use is multiple and the advantages even more obvious, even in conditions of high intensity or competition.

 

 

- Forget about stopping the games to tie your shoelaces.

- Squeeze more if you need to, before you shoot, hit, take the ball out or throw a free kick.

- If the laces get wet and give way, turn a little and adjust.

- If the laces get wet, turn a little and adjust.

- Go resting in the buggy and adjust before the drive.

- Loosen your shoe between games/sets while you hydrate and in a second adjust again.

 

 

- You can squeeze both shoes at the same time.

- You'll be the fastest in the Triathlon transition.

- Do not take risks on a descent.

... It makes a difference.

 

 

If you work at heights, perform maintenance work or work in a workshop or factory, avoid unnecessary risks by using the endlaces® system.


FEATURES

 

Choosing the right size.

Choose the size with the following in mind: 

- How much lace you need to open to be able to comfortably fit your foot.

- Diameter of the lace.

- Shoe size and look.

Clarifications: 

-For a fine lace, with a diameter of 1.5 mm, the Model 25 will roll up to 250 mm of each of the strands.

-For a thick lace, measuring 2.5 mm in diameter, the Model 28 will roll up to 150 mm of each of the strands.

-A flat cord, when folded will fit perfectly into the small MODEL 25 if it does not exceed 2.0 mm in diameter. With a larger diameter, it will fit on the MODEL 28.

-See examples in the project updates.

 

USE

It holds with the desired pressure without discomfort, no matter how thin the tongue is, due to the design and flexibility of the base.

 

 

Pay attention to the ease of adjustment: 

1) Insert the base under the cord.

2) Push the button down.

3) Turn while pressing against the shoe.

Loosening them is even easier: 

Just pull the button upwards, it unlocks and releases the thread.

 

We estimate that the time it takes to button and unbutton two pairs of shoes a day, could save you more than 10 hours a year, as well as avoiding possible untying with its corresponding dangers and more loss of time. 

 

INSTALLATION

 

Two assembly possibilities:

1) Cutting the excess cord. (Quick and simple).

 

 

2) Keeping the original cord.

 

 

COMPARISON TABLE

Comparing all the existing alternatives in the market we can draw following conclusions.

 

REWARDS

SHIPPING COSTS

                                                                Spain: 4€

                                                                European Union (UK included): 8€

                                                                Rest of the World: 10€

It saves costs the bigger the package chosen.

In each pack you decide the combination of size and colour of the pairs between the following references: M25B; M25W; M8B; M28W.

An order must always be linked to a single address.

The fees, taxes and expenses related to imports established by each country will be paid by the recipient.

The parts are protected by patents in the USA and Europe, and the endlaces® brand has already been registered.

The shoes shown in the photos and videos are not marketed by us, they are examples to illustrate the functionality and universality of our accessory.

 

TIMELINE

 

TEAM

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

 

For those of you who got to this point, we want to thank you for your interest!

We would like to thank all the sponsors and people who share this project.

Without each and every one of you, it simply would not be the same.

We hope that this project will run smoothly, as the final samples that we will definitely bring into mass production, have been produced and tested for months in all kinds of circumstances.

We do not foresee any problems in the production at this moment, our manufacturer has years of experience, with an international quality more than contrasted,  and it assures us even in the current moments of world pandemic the fulfillment of the production in date, with the maximum standards of quality, even we have added a good extra time of margin.

At the same time, the logistics study has been meticulous in order to comply with the date and form.

We will keep everyone informed of progress!

story:
Vision Plus and Rio Plus are the world’s first water-propelled eye massagers that refresh and recharge your eyes. With a simple touch of a button, you can select your temperature range and massage mode to reduce eye strain and discomfort and promote better sleep.

After creating and delivering the original designs of Aurai to previous backers, we took their feedback and went back to the drawing board to improve our products. Vision Plus and Rio Plus now feature a type-C charging port that is more reliable and stronger silicone to prevent breakage. We can't wait for you to experience this new level of relaxation. 

 


 

 

 

Our eyes are suffering — artificial lighting, blue light devices, daily stress, lack of sleep, and even allergies can all have a negative impact on our eyes. 

 

 

 

Did you know that water-propelled eye massagers are more moisturizing and soothing than air-powered or infrared eye massagers, and gentler on the skin? 

 

That’s why we created Vision Plus and Rio Plus — the world’s first water-propelled eye massagers that maximize the benefits of water-powered massages to help revitalize your eyes like never before. 

 

 

 

Both Vision Plus and Rio Plus can be used as a warm compress to help soothe sore eyes, help relieve eye fatigue and eye strain, and work as a sleep aid. Vision Plus can also be used as a cool compress to help relieve itchy eyes, puffy eyes, red eyes, and swollen eyes. 

 

 
 

 

"Once you get up, your eyes are feeling so much better than they were when it started."

"I really like it — particularly the hotter temperature setting is really on target to what I wanted in terms of using this as an eye massager, so I was really excited to see all of these significant changes with it."

 

 

Experience a new level of relaxation with Vision Plus. 

  • Vision Plus offers 28 total modes to meet all of your needs, including seven scenario modes and four massage vibration modes  
  • Warm compresses (up to 113℉) help soothe sore eyes, eye fatigue, eye strain and works as a sleep aid
  • Cool compresses (down to 64℉) to help relieve itchy, puffy eyes, red eyes, and swollen eyes
  • Convenient water window lets you know when it’s time to refill

 

 

 

Refresh and recharge on the go with Rio Plus.

  • Travel-friendly design that’s slimmer and lighter than Vision Plus
  • Built-in rechargeable battery allows you to relax anywhere, anytime
  • Three unique massage vibration modes to enjoy
  • Dual-warm temperatures quickly heat up in just 60 seconds

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Perk prices may differ based on the daily exchange rate.

Please note that you may be responsible for duties and taxes applicable to your country. As we are shipping perks all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo. For international backers outside of the US who may be required to pay customs, you will receive an e-mail from the shipping provider or your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Once you make that payment to the customs office your order will be processed for final delivery.

 

 

 

Founded by Eric Chu in 2014, Aurai is a Taiwan-based tech company formed by a team of creative talents. Our team is passionate about searching for the best possible solutions to ease consumers’ daily life issues and create revolutionary products. 

 

We put our eyes through a lot of stress and strain every day — from sitting under artificial lights and using devices that give off blue light, to the overall general stress of our daily lives. We started searching for ways to help soothe and relax our eyes, but we couldn’t find any massagers on the market that worked as we wanted them to. So, we put our heads together to create Vision Plus and Rio Plus, the world’s first water-propelled eye massagers that keep eyes refreshed. 

We have already created and delivered the original designs of Aurai to previous happy backers. We took their feedback and went back to the drawing board and have made an even better product to help you relax and rejuvenate your eyes. This is our team’s third crowdfunding project and we can’t wait for the world to experience the ultimate in relaxation with Vision Plus and Rio Plus.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

 

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Vision Plus and Rio Plus a reality. 

 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a Vision Plus or Rio Plus, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
Gentle Lemur Pet Bed, made of the unique ultra-dense memory foam that is truly washable inside and out and dried almost instantly, the unique nest-like 3D structure is orthopedically engineered to cater to dogs and cats’ natural behaviors and brings unprecedented comfort to them. 

 

Hello, my name is Halo and I have been suffering from various skin diseases since I was a kid. The fleas like me so much, leaving all kinds of little black spots (feces) and little white spots (eggs) on my body, causing me to grow some ringworm spots from time to time, and in severe cases, making me lose my hair.

Thanks my papa for giving me the best bed ever - the Gentle Lemur® Pet Bed! It has improved my skin health so much that I now sleep comfortably every day :)

 

1. The mattress can be washed easily, and quick-dry by a wipe!

 

 

When dirty, the mattress can be cleaned with antibacterial detergent, gently wipes by towel, and then it is immediately ready to use.

Bed cover can be hand-washed or washed in the washing machine. It's very convenient!

 

2. Patented TPU protective membrane - Antibacterial and Waterproof

TPU is a special Thermoplastic Polyurethane with an extremely compact nano-structure. It works as a “protective membrane” to fully block the invasion of germs and parasites, which is the key to eliminating unpleasant smells.

 * TPU is an advanced and environmentally-friendly material that is safe, hygienic, lightweight and durable, and is widely used in many nursing appliances and sports equipment.

 

The tear resistance is about 494kg/㎠ and the ductility is as high as 502%, so it is almost impossible for brute force to tear it.

 

 

It doesn't change shape or color, and it blocks out all stains perfectly.

Even if some yellow stains are left behind, there is no need to worry because not only the bed cover can be washed, but also the mattress!

 

3. Pet body engineering design, suitable for a variety of sleeping positions

 

(1) Caring Zone

Provide special care spaces to relax their joints, tail, neck and head. Reduces the pressure placed on their most vulnerable body parts.

 

(2) Resting area

Holds up their head or legs when they need extra support. For instance, they are lying on their stomach with their head up in a certain direction.

 

(3) Ventilation Channel

Maintain air circulation and keeps the bed dry. Cools our fur babies when sleeping in muggy weather.

 

(4) Collecting Zone

If an accident occurs, the liquid will be collected by the hole in the center and will not flow out of the bed.

 

(5) Hugging Area

This surrounding design gentle hugs their whole body and helps them to feel safe and secure.

 

Kittens, puppies, big cats and dogs all the time lie comfortably on Gentle Lemur Pet Bed no matter how they position, their limbs are well placed in the friendly-supported zone.  

 

4. High-density polyurethane foam mattress

The sunken design resembles a gentle hug also gives us a sense of safety and security.

To maximize the effectiveness of the bed’s structure, Gentle Lemur Pet Bed uses ultra-high density (3.12 lb/ft3) memory foam for the entire bed to deliver strong support. It’s especially effective for aging pets and those suffering from arthritis.

 

 

Therefore, even for the same size pet bed, the maximum weight that can be supported by the Gentle Lemur® pet bed is far more than other brands of pet beds.

The Gentle Lemur Pet Bed is designed with hip dysplasia and arthritis in mind and features firm memory foam and soft foam to create the perfect pressure point relief for your aging pup.

Fortified with the resilient TPU coating, the memory foam can rebound instantly to fit closely to our pet’s body whenever they change positions.

 

 

And the mattress does not have obvious edges and sharp corners, greatly reducing the chances of being chewed.

 

 

5. Scratch and scrape resistant, super durable.

The cover is crafted from an ultra-performance microfiber that is comfortable, strong, durable, and breathable. The design allows air to flow in and out between the cover and the insert and makes the bed feel like a hammock. Sleeping on it seems like floating in mid-air.

With ultra-tough microfiber properties, the space between the cover and the insert helps to disperse and buffer the force from scratches and bites. The large arcs and wide curves shaping the bed, no edges and no sharp angles, provide our pets with little opportunity for chewing. 

 

 

The microfiber structure also enlarges its overall surface area exposed to air, which allows it to dry in a third of the time as ordinary fibers. Therefore, the Gentle Lemur Pet Bed cover can even be air-dried in a short time without a dryer and fight the growth of bacteria in humid environments.

 

 

The back of the bed cover is well organized with non-slip rubber spots, and the hidden zipper can avoid scratches on the floor.

 

6. Specs and Sizes Guide

 

 

7. Reviews

 

8. Global Patents

 

 

9. My Story

My name is Roh Kwang Soo, but you can just call me Robbin. I’m a 60-year-old South Korean veteran. Please forgive me if you find my story about my dream idea to be a bit too wordy.

My company and I have been in the business of manufacturing and selling professional health and fitness equipment since 1994. My dream of making truly washable bedding started back in 2008 when I was visiting a pillow factory. It was an exceptional and amazing experience to see a free-flowing liquid swell up and transform into fluffy memory foam.

 

What really surprised me was the fact that these memory foams could never be washed. After the day they are created, even after being soaked with sweat, covered in yellow stains, and full of germs, mold, and mites, they can never be restored to their cleanly original state.

The idea hit me one day that why couldn’t we coat the memory foam with a comfy membrane to render both the cover and insert truly washable? In all honesty, I didn’t expect that realizing this simple idea would take me more than 10 years. Only after I tried, I started to be aware that it's almost an impossible mission to find a material that could closely fit the memory foam and prevent any exterior messes from entering.

Countless tests of numerous materials and endless visits to research institutes, professors, and related factories made up a huge part of my routine life during the last decade. Eventually, I succeeded in making the patented TPU protective membrane into a memory foam coating and launched my first product, the Gentle Lemur® pillow.

Later, I noticed that some backers mentioned in their comments that their Gentle Lemur® pillows were often occupied by their dogs and cats.

Meanwhile, I had adopted an abandoned cat and an abandoned dog, and they loved to lie on some of the half-finished products I made.

This further strengthened my resolve to make a bed for our fur babies. My company has now been through it all: concept verification, experimenting, 3D modeling, sample making, prototyping, molding, testing, and iterating. We’re confident that we have created the most caring and comfortable pet bed on the market.
story_txt: Gentle Lemur Pet Bed, made of the unique ultra-dense memory foam that is truly washable inside and out and dried almost instantly, the unique nest-like 3D structure is orthopedically engineered to cater to dogs and cats’ natural behaviors and brings unprecedented comfort to them.  Hello, my name is Halo and I have been suffering from various skin diseases since I was a kid. The fleas like me so much, leaving all kinds of little black spots (feces) and little white spots (eggs) on my body, causing me to grow some ringworm spots from time to time, and in severe cases, making me lose my hair.Thanks my papa for giving me the best bed ever - the Gentle Lemur® Pet Bed! It has improved my skin health so much that I now sleep comfortably every day :) 1. The mattress can be washed easily, and quick-dry by a wipe!  When dirty, the mattress can be cleaned with antibacterial detergent, gently wipes by towel, and then it is immediately ready to use.Bed cover can be hand-washed or washed in the washing machine. It's very convenient! 2. Patented TPU protective membrane - Antibacterial and WaterproofTPU is a special Thermoplastic Polyurethane with an extremely compact nano-structure. It works as a “protective membrane” to fully block the invasion of germs and parasites, which is the key to eliminating unpleasant smells. * TPU is an advanced and environmentally-friendly material that is safe, hygienic, lightweight and durable, and is widely used in many nursing appliances and sports equipment. The tear resistance is about 494kg/㎠ and the ductility is as high as 502%, so it is almost impossible for brute force to tear it.  It doesn't change shape or color, and it blocks out all stains perfectly.Even if some yellow stains are left behind, there is no need to worry because not only the bed cover can be washed, but also the mattress! 3. Pet body engineering design, suitable for a variety of sleeping positions (1) Caring ZoneProvide special care spaces to relax their joints, tail, neck and head. Reduces the pressure placed on their most vulnerable body parts. (2) Resting areaHolds up their head or legs when they need extra support. For instance, they are lying on their stomach with their head up in a certain direction. (3) Ventilation ChannelMaintain air circulation and keeps the bed dry. Cools our fur babies when sleeping in muggy weather. (4) Collecting ZoneIf an accident occurs, the liquid will be collected by the hole in the center and will not flow out of the bed. (5) Hugging AreaThis surrounding design gentle hugs their whole body and helps them to feel safe and secure. Kittens, puppies, big cats and dogs all the time lie comfortably on Gentle Lemur Pet Bed no matter how they position, their limbs are well placed in the friendly-supported zone.   4. High-density polyurethane foam mattressThe sunken design resembles a gentle hug also gives us a sense of safety and security.To maximize the effectiveness of the bed’s structure, Gentle Lemur Pet Bed uses ultra-high density (3.12 lb/ft3) memory foam for the entire bed to deliver strong support. It’s especially effective for aging pets and those suffering from arthritis.  Therefore, even for the same size pet bed, the maximum weight that can be supported by the Gentle Lemur® pet bed is far more than other brands of pet beds.The Gentle Lemur Pet Bed is designed with hip dysplasia and arthritis in mind and features firm memory foam and soft foam to create the perfect pressure point relief for your aging pup.Fortified with the resilient TPU coating, the memory foam can rebound instantly to fit closely to our pet’s body whenever they change positions.  And the mattress does not have obvious edges and sharp corners, greatly reducing the chances of being chewed.  5. Scratch and scrape resistant, super durable.The cover is crafted from an ultra-performance microfiber that is comfortable, strong, durable, and breathable. The design allows air to flow in and out between the cover and the insert and makes the bed feel like a hammock. Sleeping on it seems like floating in mid-air.With ultra-tough microfiber properties, the space between the cover and the insert helps to disperse and buffer the force from scratches and bites. The large arcs and wide curves shaping the bed, no edges and no sharp angles, provide our pets with little opportunity for chewing.   The microfiber structure also enlarges its overall surface area exposed to air, which allows it to dry in a third of the time as ordinary fibers. Therefore, the Gentle Lemur Pet Bed cover can even be air-dried in a short time without a dryer and fight the growth of bacteria in humid environments.  The back of the bed cover is well organized with non-slip rubber spots, and the hidden zipper can avoid scratches on the floor. 6. Specs and Sizes Guide  7. Reviews 8. Global Patents  9. My StoryMy name is Roh Kwang Soo, but you can just call me Robbin. I’m a 60-year-old South Korean veteran. Please forgive me if you find my story about my dream idea to be a bit too wordy.My company and I have been in the business of manufacturing and selling professional health and fitness equipment since 1994. My dream of making truly washable bedding started back in 2008 when I was visiting a pillow factory. It was an exceptional and amazing experience to see a free-flowing liquid swell up and transform into fluffy memory foam. What really surprised me was the fact that these memory foams could never be washed. After the day they are created, even after being soaked with sweat, covered in yellow stains, and full of germs, mold, and mites, they can never be restored to their cleanly original state.The idea hit me one day that why couldn’t we coat the memory foam with a comfy membrane to render both the cover and insert truly washable? In all honesty, I didn’t expect that realizing this simple idea would take me more than 10 years. Only after I tried, I started to be aware that it's almost an impossible mission to find a material that could closely fit the memory foam and prevent any exterior messes from entering.Countless tests of numerous materials and endless visits to research institutes, professors, and related factories made up a huge part of my routine life during the last decade. Eventually, I succeeded in making the patented TPU protective membrane into a memory foam coating and launched my first product, the Gentle Lemur® pillow.Later, I noticed that some backers mentioned in their comments that their Gentle Lemur® pillows were often occupied by their dogs and cats.Meanwhile, I had adopted an abandoned cat and an abandoned dog, and they loved to lie on some of the half-finished products I made.This further strengthened my resolve to make a bed for our fur babies. My company has now been through it all: concept verification, experimenting, 3D modeling, sample making, prototyping, molding, testing, and iterating. We’re confident that we have created the most caring and comfortable pet bed on the market.

story:
New Patent Pending Design

The Hand Roller is your massage tool that drives real results.

Here at ODYN we are in the business of driving RESULTS for YOU. 

That's why we spent months along side physical therapists creating and perfecting The Hand Roller. A massage tool made from premium silicone that can be heated or cooled to provide the best therapeutic care for your hands.

Not only is the Hand Roller meant for your hands but it also provides relief to your neck, back, legs, calves, feet, or any place on your body that needs some love using trigger point massage. 

Whether you're at the office, in the comforts of your home, or traveling the world - The Hand Roller was designed to be your perfect companion.

Use The Hand Roller on your desk to roll over sore muscles or vertically for trigger point massage.

Increase Blood Flow to Hands & Arms

Roll Out Pain from Your Hands

Release tension in your neck

Increase circulation in your legs

 

Pop The Hand Roller in the microwave for 50 seconds on high power to achieve the optimum temperature for hot massage therapy.

 Or Pop The Hand Roller in the freezer until desired temperature is reached.

 

 

The Hand Roller can relieve hand pain by increasing blood flow to muscles and through hot & cold therapy. 

 

The Hand Roller has perfectly placed bumps on one end that is incredible for trigger point massage.

 

 

Timeline:

We have partnered with the best of the best to help produce this product and bring it to life. We expect to be able to ship you your Hand Roller by August of 2021.

Risks and challenges

ODYN does not claim that the use of The Hand Roller can diagnose, cure, treat, or prevent an illness or condition. If you use this product and experience pain, discomfort or difficulty, stop use immediately. ODYN is not liable if any injury occurs while using The Hand Roller. There are always uncertainties when manufacturing a product. Unexpected disasters, delays, weather, and other problems might arise, but we promise that we will do our best to deliver. We have great relations with our manufacture. They are efficient and reliable and only do high quality work. The biggest risk at this point is delayed delivery times due to COVID-19. We have planned for unexpected delays in our timeline and promise to deliver the product to you. At ODYN we don't tolerate any shortcomings in our product.

THANK YOU!!

 

 

Long-lasting design

The Hand Roller is made of the highest quality Medical Grade silicone that is guaranteed to last.

Sustainable materials

Our rollers are made of natural materials.

Environmentally friendly factories

Our Roller is non-toxic and perfectly safe to use.

Sustainable Distribution

We will try to make shipping and fulfillment as efficient and sustainable as possible.

story:
We all know that J-beauty products offer amazing skincare solutions: anti-aging face serums, Shiseido Treatment Essence, and Japanese sunscreen to name a few. But to get the products you really want, you either have to ask friends to buy them from Japan or you have to keep scouring websites because they are always sold out (or worse, no longer available).

 

 

 

 

 

You may also wonder if there might be more Japanese beauty products that are revolutionary, high quality, and effective!

That’s why in 2018, our founder, Chloe Takahashi, started to curate the best J-beauty products with her friends and supporters to provide the best and innovative J-beauty products!
Since then, Cosme Hunt has grown rapidly with over 30,000 supporters in our community and we’ve been featured by so many famous beauty media giants such as Glossy, BeautyIndependent, and WWD.

 

 

 

 

 

We have built ourselves up to be a trusted source for J-beauty products and content directed to all beauty lovers. We made sure that all of the information can be accessed in one destination by publishing articles and reflecting our community’s voice. All products are carefully curated by our team of experts, and our curated products provide the best and innovative solution for you. We empower all people to feel beautiful in their own ways.

The minimalist nature of Japanese beauty regiments is especially beneficial to those who don’t want complex multi-step routines, desire a simple routine, and those with not a lot of time to themselves. 

However, we realized that some of our audience are still new to the J-beauty world and struggle to find somewhere to start. With a large number of requests, we decided to launch our discovery box.

As a growing niche in cosmetics, we want to make Japanese beauty more accessible and raise awareness about it through our monthly beauty box.  Our goal is to let the world know that Japanese cosmetics are for everyone, not just for those of Asian descent.

 

 

 

 

Shop and learn with us

Since Cosme Hunt is growing J-beauty's recognition in the beauty world, we want to create a Japanese beauty discovery subscription box to allow for more accessibility and awareness for Japanese beauty brands. Creating custom packaging and marketing requires a lot more work than our usual E-commerce operation, and this is why we came to Indiegogo.

We work directly with brands in Japan to ensure we get genuine products to bring to the U.S., and we want to do the brands justice with the perfect packaging for this discovery box. The simple, yet effective ingredients that Japanese cosmetics use have been utilized for centuries and this innovation can be easily overlooked by overly cute packaging.

 

All boxes carefully curated by our team of experts

Our curated box, that'll contain 5 to 10 staple J-beauty products, will help you set foot into the J-beauty world without choosing unmatched products or getting overwhelmed by too many options.

We also provide a mix of full-sized and mini products in our boxes. We understand that it can be hard to finish a whole product in a month, so to reduce waste, we’re opting to do a mix of full and mini-sized products. In addition, we will cycle themes every month (skincare, makeup, body care, and wellness) so that the products overlap and there is less opportunity for waste.

 

 

 

We’ve also grown our community rapidly since 2018, and now it’s reaching 30,000 J-beauty lovers in the world.

 

 

 

 

We've been nominated as an Asian-Owned Beauty Brands and Retailers To Support by Beauty Independent and featured in top publications such as Glossy, WWD, Forbes, and more.

 

 

 

 

 

To lock in your spot as a future supporter of Cosme Hunt, back our Indiegogo campaign and select the length of time you’re interested in receiving as your perk. You will then complete the payment process via Indiegogo — this will be the only place where payment will be required to reserve your J-beauty secret!

 

 

 

 

Your first-month J-beauty box will be the J-beauty staple items as a starter kit! This includes:

  • Bioré UV Aqua Rich Watery Essence Sunscreen
  • Hadalabo Shirojyun Premium Moisture Lotion
  • HEROINE MAKE Liquid Eyeliner in Black
  • Saborino Morning Care Face Mask (1 Sheet)
  • &honey Deep Moisture Shampoo and Conditioner (sample)
  • a beautiful glossy Cosme Hunt Pouch
  • a Cosme Hunt sticker sheet
  • J-Beauty Ambassador Membership
  • Cosme Hunt Community Membership
  • 1 Day Pop-up invitation

 

 

After the first month box, we’ll continuously provide the most top & popular J-beauty brands. Don’t worry! There will be no overlapping products.

 

 

 

 

 

If you cannot contribute, we’d greatly appreciate it if you can spread the word about our campaign! Please share this on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, Tumblr, and any other social networking site you use!

 

 

As we launch this fundraising campaign we are also maintaining our usual Cosme Hunt operations. Handling both of these responsibilities is a lot for our tiny team!


A risk we face is that the amount of time we put into this fundraiser and the cost of the perks could outweigh the amount of money we can raise. We've taken measures to make sure this doesn't happen so we're not too worried but please keep this in mind when you're looking over the perks!


We've done our best to make sure that we've done a good job of accurately representing our work, values, and plans. If you have any questions about these details please don't hesitate to reach out to us for clarity. Cosme Hunt can be reached at support@cosmehunt.com or feel free to DM us on any of our social feeds.


Thank you!

story:
Link to Study

 

 

 We’re a meticulous, conscientious and detail-oriented group of clean freaks who learned the dangers of plaque and incorrect brushing, and decided we had to do something about it. We’ve been working together for 5 years to translate our love for all things super-clean to teeth and gums. The result is an oral-health solution that’s easy-to-use, comfortable and most importantly, effective. And after lots of tweaking and perfecting, we’re finally ready to share it with you all.

We believe in supporting healthy habits and healthy lifestyles, and our goal is to make these habits easy to integrate into the daily routine. We’re committed to promoting oral health and keeping things clean- that’s why we created CleanFreak.

 Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

Link to Study

story:
The science behind our filters

Our filters are tested by our development partner in a state of the art facility in New Zealand to measure filtering efficiency and ensure a high volume capture rate of undesirable particles.

 

We created a careful balance between filter efficiency (how many particles are captured) and breathability (how hard it is to breathe through the filters).

Our filters focus on comfort of use and offer minimal airflow resistance to allow use for extended periods of time without fatigue or discomfort, so you can walk around all day and even jog with Duo.

We are constantly developing new filters and improving our breathability and filtering efficiency. By supporting us, you are also contributing to our research. We can't wait to see how far we can go together.

 

Back in 2016, after witnessing the rising threat of air-pollution around the world, we started wondering why people weren't protecting themselves more against lasting, severe respiratory conditions caused by urban pollution.

We quickly realized that masks aren't very comfortable to use for extended periods of time. Masks are a necessity for virus protection and mitigation, as they play an equal role in protecting the wearer from spreading the disease as well as contracting it. Most cloth or surgical masks do not effectively filter ingested air, nor have proper sealing around the face, leading to unfiltered air passing through or around the mask.

We were inspired to found our company, Resprana, on the idea that everyone should have access to healthy air without inhibiting their daily lives.

For pollution, allergens, dust and other airborne particles, masks are uncomfortable and often ineffective, leading people to often opt for no protection at all. We decided to design and produce a minimalist solution that can fit with modern styles and allow the user to exercise, drink, talk and socialize with minimal interference.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our models' size:

Here Morgane is wearing a Small.

And Jack is wearing a Medium.

 

Our commitment to safety

Our goal is to offer the most reliable and safest accessory companion. We use only premium materials to craft the Duos.

Our pod metals are all medical grade and chosen for their compatibility with skin contact. Stainless Steel and Titanium are some of the materials of choice for prosthetic implants, while gold is one of the most inert materials in the world, commonly used in jewelry.

We use medical grade silicone for the seals, which satisfies premium bio-compatible industry standards for prolonged skin contact.


 

We have been working on Duo for more than 3 years and are finally ready to bring it to market.

We have partnered with a sourcing supplier to assist us in setting up our manufacturing sources and logistics chain.

 

 

We have thoroughly vetted our contract manufacturers, and have started tooling development for our injection molds that will allow us to produce our filters. Our manufacturing process for the silicone and metal pods has been tested and validated during our pilot production run in Fall 2019.

 

 

Back in November, we carried a pilot release with over 100 beta testers, qualifying the pod production process, adjusting color SKUs and giving valuable feedback on the product to our manufacturing partners.

We've also recently completed qualification of the filter molding tool, the most critical and complicated part of our design. It was our priority to focus adequate resources into resolving the most complex items in our design first.

 

Funds from the campaign will allow us to pay for the remaining tooling investments we must make to mass produce our product. This includes custom tooling for the case, packaging and larger production tooling for the pods.

It will also allow us to pay for our cost of goods and the minimum order of units required to launch a production run.

It was our priority to focus adequate resources into resolving the most complex items in our design first. Funds from the campaign will allow us to pay for the remaining tooling investments we must make to mass produce our product. This includes custom tooling for the case, packaging and larger production tooling for the pods.It will also allow us to pay for our cost of goods and the minimum order of units required to launch a production run.

story:
In the past 2 years, the entire world is suffering from pandemic caused by COVID19, We ALL concerned more about health and air quality.      

PURIMON’s team want to protect people by providing clean air without dust, allergens, smoke, and pollution from everyone’s personal space. We filter harmful particles out of the air around you so as to help you breathe clean and fresh air.

There are thousands of air purifiers in the market. To make a difference, we fully utilize the product size of an air purifier by equipping it with a Dual Coil Wireless Charger because in this digital era, we think most of us should have one or more mobiles and thus, a charging device is crucial for everyone.

PURIMON Air Purifying Wireless charger fulfills people’s needs for having “fresh air” and a “convenient life”.

Protect your daily life.

 

Refresh your working environment.

 

High specification purifying power

 

PURIMON Air Purifying Wireless Charger is equipped with promising purifying power to keep your personal space free from harmful particles, including allergens, germs and PM2.5 industrial pollution.

 

Purifying particle size from 0.3 microns

 

We have 3 filter Layers providing a HEPA H13 level purification results:

  •   Hydroponics Carbon Filter Layer
  •   PET Filter Layer
  •   PP Filter Layer

HEPA H13 + Hydroponics Carbon Filters

 

Extra Protections

 

In order to provide the BEST purifying result, PURIMON Air Purifying Wireless Charger is also equipped with UVC + Plasma Sterilization function.

 

The UVC+ Plasma Sterilization function enable us to eliminate viruses, bacteria, mold, volatile organic compounds (VOCs) and unpleasant odors effectively.

 

How Ultraviolet-C (UVC) Light works?

 

Ultraviolet (UV) light’s disinfection and sanitation applications are approved by agencies such as the US EPA, US EDC, US Government, ASHARE, CIBSE (UK) and ISHRAE (India). UV sanitations are widely used in many areas to disinfect drinking water and sterilize air and surfaces.

UV Light is invisible to human eye and it is divided into UV-A (blacklights), UV-B (sunburns) and UV-C (germicidal).     

 

UV-C radiation is widely used in numerous disinfection applications at schools, offices, public transports, restaurants and even hospitals because it has been shown to disinfect surfaces, air, and objects and kill bacteria/ viruses in seconds.

UV-C light penetrates the cell walls of microorganisms and shatters the DNA to make it impossible for them to grow and reproduce. It is a powerful germ-fighting function equipped in PURIMON Air Purifying Wireless Charger.

 

How Plasma works?

 

Plasma can be found naturally as the detergent of our Earth’s atmosphere by its effective power of breaking down many harmful pollutants.      

 

Plasma is created when specific wavelengths of UV light react with air and it’s proved for destroying bacteria, fungi, viruses, yeast, mold, any allergen and other microorganisms powerfully.

 

Besides this, Plasma air purifying function can eliminate all odors to keep your indoor area conducive for you and other people around.

 

Dual Coils Speedy Wireless Charging Function

 

 

PURIMON Air Purifying Wireless Charger is a dual coil wireless charger providing a fast and wireless charging experience for your mobile and smartwatch. To enjoy an enhanced charging speed, you can add our 20W power adaptor when you check out. You can also use your own 20W power adaptor to get the same charging speed.

We have included essential features to protect your devices from charging damages.

Special Features:

 

Stable Power ・Strong Device Protection ・High Conversion Rate

 

How to use?

 

Super user friendly touch sensitive control buttons

 

 PURIMON Air Purifying Wireless Charger has ONLY 2 buttons.

 

  • Purifying Level Button

Single Touch: Quiet mode, suitable for bedtime

Two Touches: Efficient mode, suitable for most places

Three Touches: Powerful mode, suitable for bad air quality places

Four Touches: Turn off purifying function

 

  • UVC + Plasma Sterilization Button

Single Touch enables ONE hour sterilization

Two Touches enable TWO hours sterilization

Three Touches enable FOUR hours sterilization

Four Touches disable sterilization

 

 

Charge your device by just TWO steps

 

 To charge your device, you only need TWO steps:

 

Step 1: Plug in power adaptor connected USB cable

* 2 meters USD type - C cable is included for any pledge.

** 20W power adapter can be purchased as an add-on. 

 

Step 2: Put your device on the top charging plate of Purimon Air Purifying Wireless Charger.

Small size with effective functions

 

we care every details for our buyers

 

Our vision is to create a fresh and simple life for everyone, please support us!

story:
My Story

I'm Louis, Founder of De Monfort, a Fitness and Sports Technology portfolio company that creates interactive fitness software and equipment to deliver high-intensity workouts in the least amount of time.

Just like you, I struggled to get fit. I have tried everything: equipment, apps, YouTube, and personal trainers. But I can't keep up with it. It takes too long. I get bored. It is too hard. I give up.

One day, I participated in a workout Coach Van held every Saturday at a local gym. And there it was, the heavy rope. A 3" rope no one could last 5 minutes. But, it gave me the idea of the Dragon 4VAX rope machine. The machine we've all been waiting for. Fast workout, high intensity, low impact endless exercises while having fun. 

I need your help in completing the prototype and bring the first ten units to market. 

What we need

I am raising $500,000

  • $350,000 will go into manufacturing the prototype, testing, certifications, and the first ten units.
  • $150,000 will go into operations and marketing to sell those ten units and produce 330 units.

For your support

  1. One percent (1%) ownership (equity) SHARED among all contributors (proportional to your contribution).
  2. You get a chance of winning one of the first ten units we produce.
  3. The Dragon 4VAX will retail for $4,900. It will be available to our top 20 contributors for $2,500.
  4. To the rest of our funders, you will each receive a one-of-a-kind T-shirt at launch and free membership for one year to our online platform.

We will continue to raise funds until we reach our goal. We know how effective this machine is, and we are committed to moving heaven and earth to bring it to market so that everyone can Experience Amazing!

Risks & Challenges

Equipment manufacturing is a high-risk business. So many things can go wrong with a high probability that the product never makes it to market. However, I am confident we will succeed.

  1. We have the best team on the planet. These engineers brought major inventions to market before (Apple iPod, ATARI, etc.).
  2. We have performed extensive testing on individual components already with incredible results.
  3. We are experts at doing more with less. Your funding will go far.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Spread the word. Tell others.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
A Fan reported by BBC NEWS!!

Why?What made it special?

This is NOT an ordinary fan like the one you used to know!

 

We are the 3.0 GEN Super Smart Fan!

What's 3.0 Gen like?Let's begin to meet it!

 

Here are all the unique characteristics that made it a super smart neck fan and being so special.

 

The special temperature sensor system reads the temperature and humidity signals around it with very high accuracy (±2% relative humidity, ±0.2°C). No need to manually adjust the wind speed in different environments or temperatures, it can automatically adjust the airspeed according to the environment you are in.

In smart mode, the YOSH automatically checks the temperature around it and adjusts the airspeed accordingly. No need to manually switch to different fan speeds when you feel hotter or colder, and keep your hands completely free.

You can also control the three-speed setting options of soft wind, medium wind, and strong wind by pressing the power button.

The whale-patterned ventilation grooves on the inner surface help reduce the sticky feeling caused by sweat, and the leafless design prevents any pinching of the skin and catching of hair, improving your comfort and safety.

 

The 360° all-around breeze and dual-channel cooling tech help cool the body down quickly from all directions.

By moving air around the entire neck, the YOSH Smart Fan can effectively keep parts of your body that may get sweaty totally refreshed.

  • Temperature comparison

By utilizing the Archimedean spiral, the air duct system has been upgraded to increase the airspeed, reduce the noise, bringing you a personal and powerful cooling experience.

With its 4000mAh battery capacity, you can keep the fan running all day long. No need to worry about unbearable heat throughout the day.

The soft, skin-friendly TPU material also makes the YOSH smart fan lighter, weighing only 248g, preventing any pressure on the neck. The elastic material allows for easy and unlimited adjustments to fit comfortably on any neck.

 

The YOSH Smart Fan fits around your neck and senses the surrounding temperature to provide you with the appropriate amount of coolness.

 

A smart, wearable neck fan that helps you quickly cool down in the hot summer. It’s lightweight, portable, stylish, and provides instant cooling. It helps make you feel more comfortable and be more efficient. It’s also great as a gift for your friends and family! 

     

    The ergonomic C-shape helps prevent slipping during exercise, so you can wear it anytime and anywhere and enjoy any indoor exercises or outdoor activities with no worries.

    • Running

    ​

    • Stroll 

    ​

    • Walking Dog

    ​

    • Yoga

    ​

    • Working

    ​

     

    YOSH Smart Fan has started mass production recently and will reserve time for sampling inspection of our products. We hope to send the perfect and high-quality products to backers who support and trust us. Please stay tuned!

    YOSH was founded in 2015 to be a solution to the large demand for high-quality products at affordable prices. YOSH products are mainly car accessories, small electric appliances, and smart neck fans.

    Our vision is to bring more convenience and better experiences to people’s lives. As our slogan says: “YOSH will change your life with a better experience”.

    Our company has its own factory, made up of modernized production lines and management. Our aim is to expand our market around the world. As of now, we are expanding to North America, Europe, Japan, and Australia.

    Sticking to our aim, everything we offer is built to last. In fact, we’re so confident in the quality of our products and guarantee superb customer service.

story:
Pushup - One exercise that engages all your major muscles

Pushups are a very popular exercise for a good reason - they work. The world's oldest compound exercise builds your arms, chest, shoulders and core. 

 

Top 10 Benefits of doing Pushups: 

 

 

LEGEND PUSHUP takes your workout to the next level  

Legend Pushup is an advanced pushup bar and instability trainer designed to eliminate wrist pain, generate more muscle growth, deliver faster results and help prevent plateau.

 

1 - NO WRIST PAIN 

We designed the Legend Pushup so it rolls on the floor and lets your wrists stay in the most comfortable angle regardless of your body position.

Stress on Hand and Wrist

 

Eliminate Hand and Wrist Stress
 
 

2 - MORE MUSCLE GROWTH  

The Legend Pushup's curve base design promotes more muscle growth.  Its instability engages more muscle groups making your workout much more effective.  It is like standing on one foot - your whole body works harder to keep you balanced.

The Legend Pushup's Instability Design promotes more Muscle Growth

 

3 - CHEST-SQUEEZE EFFECT 

One of the best ways to make your pushup more productive is to squeeze (contract) your chest together while extending your arms.  The rolling inward motion of the Legend Pushup naturally moves your arms closer together and helps you maximize this squeezing effect.  Your pecs will be on fire!

 

4 - AVOID PLATEAU  

The Legend Pushup helps you avoid plateauing by allowing you to do many pushup variations ergonomically to create "muscle confusion".  You can push beyond your limits and take your growth to a whole new level. 

 

 

 

5 - DEEPER RANGE OF MOTION 

You can go deeper in your movements.  Stretch your muscles - expand your ranges.

The Ground Limits Your Movement

 

Expand Your Ranges to Get More Results

 

6 - STABLE MODE

Just flip the Legend Pushup around when you need a stable base.  It allows you to try different positions and levels that is best for you. 

Stable Mode functions just like a regular pushup bar

 

7 - EXPAND YOUR WORKOUT 

Go beyond pushups.  You can use the Legend Pushup handles for many other exercises.

Seated Dip works on your Triceps, Shoulders and Back

 

Bicep Curl with Resistance Band

 

 

Shoulder Raises

 

8 - WORKOUT ANYTIME 

Another great thing about pushups is their versatility.  You can do them anywhere and anytime.  You can do them at home, on the road or even in the office.  

 

Save time from driving to the gym.  Stay safe by avoiding mass gatherings.  And better yet, you don't have to wear a mask while working out. 

 

9 - SAVE MONEY 

Working out at home is free.  Save yourself from the monthly gym membership fee.  The cost of the Legend Pushup is a fraction of the gym fee - and you pay for it only once!

A portable gym in your hands

 

10 - OUR CUSTOMERS LOVE THE LEGEND PUSHUP

OVER 20,000 UNITS SHIPPED AND THE MAJORITY OF REVIEWS HAVE BEEN 5 STARS.

 

 

11 - TRANSFORM YOUR BODY

GET STRONGER, FITTER AND HEALTHIER WITH THE LEGEND PUSHUP

 

FEATURES:

  • Rocking mode 
  • Stable mode
  • Soft cushion hand grips
  • High-strength steel frame
  • Non-slip tube covers
  • Weight vest ready

 

Unlike other pushup bars on the market which are made of plastic, the LEGEND PUSHUP is made from high-strength steel tubing with large, comfortable hand grip.  It is built to last.

 

SCHEDULE:

  • 2021 April-May – Production
  • 2021 June – Shipping to our warehouse
  • 2021 August - Shipping to backers

 

ABOUT US:

LEGEND BODY™ is a team of fitness enthusiasts.  We are on a mission to make fitness training at home more fun, more effective and more affordable. 

 

DEVELOPMENT

It was a few years ago when I was introduced to a new tennis partner. He was in his 50’s, but he was incredibly fit and he smashed every ball coming his way. Inspired by his fitness, I asked what his secret was. He told me that he does 100 push ups every weekday’s morning. The only negative thing, he told me, was that doing many push ups and playing lots of tennis together hurt his wrists. The idea of a new push-up bar that would not hurt the wrists sprung up in my mind.

It took us a few months and many iterations before we finally came up with the Legend Pushup. It has helped tens of thousands of people stay fit and happy.  

 

Back us today and join us on this journey to improve your health and fitness.

 

IMPORTANT NOTICE:

Please note that YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CUSTOMS FEES, DUTIES, VAT, IMPORT TAXES, SPECIAL DELIVERY FEES ADMINISTERED BY YOUR GOVERNMENT, AND HANDLING FEES. These are not included in the cost of shipping or handling of your rewards, and we are unable to estimate those fees for you.

Long-lasting design

Unlike other pushup bars on the market which are made of plastic, the LEGEND PUSHUP is made from high-strength steel tubing with large, comfortable hand grip. It's built to last.

story:
You take such good care of your skin through your diet, your exercise regime, expensive facial products and weekly spa trips - but is it the best you can do in 2020? 

Backed by science, SkinEnergy gives control back to you, the user, and makes it easy to see the difference that tweaks to your lifestyle and exercise regime can actually make to your skin. Your skin is up to you - you can decide what you want to do more – or less – of as you learn what works for you and your skin and what doesn't.

Powered by the latest in smart tech, Comper SkinEnergy will improve your skin health layer by layer.

From the deeper muscular level right up to the epidermis, SkinEnergy resolves your anti-aging issue - but it comes with the same price tag as one bottle of fancy cream.

 

Of course, going to a beautician or dermatologist can help, but regular visits are expensive and time-consuming. Their skincare routine process may make you feel confident and relaxed, but its impact is only skin deep. In reality, skin aging happens from the inside out: from muscle to fascial level and then from dermis to the epidermis level. SkinEnergy works across all levels and gets to the heart of the matter. 

How it works:

The Comper SkinEnergy is a lightweight, hand-held device that uses MENS, red LED, massage, and heat to improve your skin from the inside out in just 5 minutes a day. You don't have to worry about the unnecessary bells and whistles because we've only used tried-and-tested technologies with scientific evidence to back their impact up.  

​

 

MENS

Microcurrent treatments (MENS) have been used in medicine and physical therapy for over four decades. Gentle, hardly-perceptible, pulses mimic the body's natural bio-electric currents to heal and tone both large and small muscles. When used in cosmetic applications, this treatment is proven to energize the small muscles beneath the skin, lifting wrinkles and rejuvenating damage from sunburn, acne, stretch marks, cellulite, and scarring. It's so effective that it's been called a "non-surgical facelift. "

 

Red LED 

Red and near-infrared wavelengths promote adenosine triphosphate (ATP) nitric oxide release, blood flow, reactive oxygen species increase and stem-cell tissue repair and healing. Dermatologists routinely apply Red LED technology for the treatment of wrinkles, acne scars, hypertrophic scars and UV healing.

 

MASS (Massage)

A 2017 study from L’Oréal Research and Innovation concluded  that using a massaging device on skin leads to higher rates of decorin, fibrillin, tropoelastin, and procollagen-1 expression. It was noted that massage created an anti-aging response across an 8-week trial along which, along with anti-aging cream, showed notable improvements in subjects' facial wrinkles, skin texture, lip area, cheek wrinkles, neck sagging and neck texture. 

 

 Heat 

When targeted energy heats deep down through layers of skin, it stimulates collagen and elastin production, which gradually improves skin tone and texture. The American Board of Cosmetic Surgery describes this type of treatment as a non-surgical skin tightening procedure and states that they can effectively tighten moderately lax or "crepey" skin on the face, neck, and body. 

Your 3-step guide to SkinEnergy  

 

Step 1 - Virtual consultation on the app 

The Comper app creates a personalized, tailored skincare routine that's just right for you. It then syncs your optimal routine with the Comper SkinEnergy to bring both sides of the science together. There's no need for you to fiddle with buttons and settings - our virtual beautician will develop a treatment plan.

Step 2 - Daily routine 

Enjoy your blissful little moment of self-care every day when you use SkinEnergy and follow your own, personalized routine. It's natural, perfectly matched to your skin and totally refreshing.

Step 3 - Collect those compliments 

After just two weeks, your skin will be firmer, look rested and you will look radiant. Improved circulation will give you a healthy glow. Nothing crazy. Nothing plastic.

 

Your personal beautician is just a tap away

You've seen how our tried and tested technologies will help you to get perfect skin, but - just as with any good beauty salon - sophisticated technology is nothing without an experienced and knowledgeable beautician. That's why we created the Comper app that connects to your SkinEnergy device. The app determines what skin type you have and what kind of treatment will work best for you.  

 

Statistics show that, after 2 weeks of constant use, the skin elasticity and compactness of the skin increase noticeably.

Who's behind comper?

Comper is a female-run startup founded by Du Han, a serial entrepreneur, and Kickstarter creator. We're extremely passionate about thoughtful technologies that make our lives happier and healthier. 

 

Founded in 2014, Comper Healthcare is a leading independent designer, manufacturer, and supplier of smart medical devices. Comper’s smart products range from fertility trackers, body scales, and thermometers to facial rejuvenation devices. The thing that connects these high-quality products is not only how easy-to-use they are, but also their sleek design and smart functionalities.

When you can expect your reward

We've already started pre-production on Comper SkinEnergy and we've produced the first 20 samples. We're confident we can deliver your Comper SkinEnergy on time, and it should be shipped out before the end of August. Since we are all still grappling with the realities of COVID-19.

 

Competitors comparison

R&D journey

Here's a peek behind the curtain, showing our R&D process. We've iterated a lot, striking a balance between portability, powerful features, smart design and portability. Our previous product, Smarkin, is used and loved by many, but it's not cordless, which was the number 1 feature we hear from users they'd love to see. SkinEnergy is completely cordless, and it's also splash-resistant and built to last.

Our prototype in action

Kickstarter asks all creators to show the stage of their prototype in a short video, so here's ours! As you can see, all functionalities that we talk about are already working on a production sample. This means no surprises when we go into manufacturing.

story:
The 54" basketball backboard is made of sturdy and weather-resistant polycarbonate material, featuring great rebound performance. The angled poles makes the offset of the backboard, gives it a much more professional feel.

 

 

 

The rim height of basketball hoop can easily be adjusted from 7.5 feet to 10 feet by rotating the rocker lever to make it go up or down.

 

 

 

The outdoor portable goal equipped with a front cover rebounder, the large base ensures the stability of the backboard system include equipped with two transportation wheels, so the basketball hoop is easy to move.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Viller J. Hamilton

Father of 3, husband for 23 years, U.S. Navy Veteran, & successful entrepreneur/business owner of V&S Vending Corp.

 

As an athlete, I peaked as a 1980 Olympic viable Golden Glove boxer. However, my love for sports transcended into learning and improving the games I was passionate for as an adolescent. 

As a lifelong basketball fan and youth basketball coach, Timeboard 321 is a concept I created to improve the training of players at all levels— no matter where they are.

I never understood why, as technology within our game progressed, the shot clock never moved into the player line of vision. Everyone remembers Game 1 of the 2017-18 NBA Finals, Cleveland vs. Golden State. J.R. Smith grabs the rebound with 4.7 sec left on the clock, dribbles it away, never getting off a shot, allowing the game to go into OT, where Golden State won the game, and on to win the series 4-0. JR later contributed the mishap to not being aware of the time on the clock even though he was facing the goal.

There so many instances where shot clock awareness has been a decisive factor in the game of basketball, with this being the latest and most prominent. Shot clock awareness is what inspired me to create Timeboard 321.

Yogi Berra’s famous quote “Baseball is 90% mental, the other half is physical” is one I love to instill in my players.

Timeboard is designed to develop mental repetition whether players are training or just hooping with friends.

Timeboard helps maintain concentration, use positive mental imagery, maintain mental confidence and improve the training of players across all levels.
