story:
Stand Up Straight 

Take All The Pressure Off Your Back

Did you know that 95% of all lower back pain can be prevented with correct alignment and support of the abdominal and back muscles? Get results fast with the ERGOMAX, the world’s first and only wearable elastic resistance total body support. Designed to align your posture, support your body and make you stronger!

 

Achieve Perfect Posture Effortlessly

Just wear it over any clothing, no sweating or difficult exercises required

Elastic Resistance builds strength, stamina and endurance. The applied elastic resistance provides a force against which your muscles must work. This action causes muscles to contract, which stimulates bone as well as muscle growth. This interactive relationship is progressive and with each movement your body gets stronger by the minute. 

 

Progressive Resistance Builds Compounded Strength

Progressive resistance is a strength training method in which the overload is constantly increased to facilitate adaptation. Progressive resistance is essential for building muscle, losing weight, and getting stronger.

 

Who Can Benefit from the ERGOMAX

Made for adults of any age and any size

  • People with weak and poor posture that cannot hold their body erect
  • Back and neck pain sufferers looking for quick relief
  • Those with fitness or weight loss goals who are experiencing slow progress
  • Athletes who want to take performance to the next level

     

    The Perfectore Team 

    On the heals of our amazingly successful $1 million +  ERGO Posture Transformer Crowdfunding campaign in 2017, delivering 10,000 ERGOs worldwide, we are proud and excited to bring you the evolution of the ERGO... The ERGOMAX! More support, more strength and more energy. 

    Start Your ERGO Collection Today

    Perfectore Corp leads the way as the premiere creators in wearable elastic resistance strengthening devices. Devices designed to instantly transform, support and strengthen the body during regular activities of daily living, rehabilitation, exercise or sport. High quality, effective and durable Made in the USA products.

    Get Your ERGO Posture Transformer  here!

    Thank you for your support!

story:
You feel secure wearing a mask in a public space when you hear a cough or a sneeze, but you will never see the virus filled droplet that can fly through the air and land on your face outside the mask. Did you know that the virus can infect you through your eyes and your ears as well?

That's why we created the Multi-Mask: the World's First Mask with a removable Shield (Patent Pending).

MULTI-MASK

  1. Designed for comfort and ease of use - fits everyone.
  2. The Shield can simply be slipped on to the mask when required. No straps required! 
  3. User’s speech is not muffled.
  4. Can be sanitised effectively and minimises Bio-Waste.
  5. It can be customised later with fittings like electronic filter, audio/video recording etc.
  6. Your investment will be Future-Ready, even for tech that’s yet to come.

Multi-Mask for a CAUSE : For every mask you buy, we give one to charity, or you can even donate a mask at half its cost.

Masks are required for:

- EVERYONE today needs Protection against Airborne Viruses,
- Workers in Healthcare and Security, especially the Frontline Warriors.
- Hospitality & Retail staff,
- Workers in Industries with Pollutants,
- Protection against Pollution in Cities.,
For each of these, you need a different/specialized mask, and many times a Shield on top of that!

How many masks & shields will you buy? 

The single solution for most of the above = Multi-Mask

MULTI-MASK can be used by: All of us when we step out in public spaces, for Healthcare, Dentists, Shopkeepers, Store Attendants, Airports and Stations, Public Transport (Subway, Train, Bus), Schools and Educational spaces, Factories and Offices, Social gatherings and functions, Events and Conferences and all kinds of Group Activities.

We Launched with a semi-final prototype and now with your feedback we have reached an amazing final design.

Short summary about us:

The health of the planet was anyway sinking and the world has a lot of pollution to deal with - all of our own making. And then came the virus, brought the world to a standstill and showed how ill-prepared we were. Seeing the situation all around made us realise that we cannot be bystanders anymore. We had to get involved and we were a good mix to make it happen.

Team

Partners

Why is the campaign important to us? Why is your participation even more important?

The whole idea began with joining this war against the virus that has troubled us all. We did a lot of hard work, against many odds. But a good intention and an exciting invention idea can bring a product to a certain stage only. Beyond that, to take it to production and to take it to the world, to reach the people who need it, requires Teamwork, Expertise, Perseverance, Dedication and Funds. We now have everything, except funds! Therefore, if you see potential in the product that it can actually help you, and millions across the world, please do support us.

What We Need & What You Get?

We have already created the proof of concept of the product using 3D printing and other prototyping techniques, and therefore have been able to fine tune all the aspects of functionality, breathability, ergonomics, comfort, modularity, and aesthetics. 

We need funding for the product's final material engineering, tooling and dies and the infrastructure for assembly and shipping. To begin with for keeping capital costs low, we aim to get the manufacturing done through other vendors.

Please do support the Multi-Mask or you can donate an amount of your choice, remember, no contribution is small!

IMPORTANTLY: For every Multi-Mask(s) that you pre-order, we will be sending you those Multi-Mask(s) AND we will also donate the same number of Multi-Mask(s) to an organization/hospital that has been supporting healthcare warriors but cannot afford these. We will send you a photo of them receiving it.

Remember, you can buy the Multi-Mask for yourself, your family, your friends or dozens for your workers or for a non-profit that you think will benefit from it. 

The Impact

The Multi-Mask can be used in any setting that requires a mask (and a shield for additional protection), and not just healthcare. In fact, every household can get it, because importantly, it's modular and therefore multi-purpose. The Multi-Mask can end up saving lives in sudden epidemics or pandemics like this current one. As a mask it can be used in cities with high level of air pollutants, and that’s almost every single city today. The aerodynamics of the shield are an added benefit for cyclists.

From the point of view of impact on environment, there are two positives: One, only the filter material is disposable, and that’s small, thereby reducing the bio-waste burden on the environment. Two, with the Multi-Mask, two products become one, resulting in less resources required to create products of similar specifications. 

Our company Med Interventions and Beyond, Inc. aims to create many inventions and innovations that positively affect millions of people in the world.

We've been in Education and Innovation for a long time, Our YouTube channel "d'Art of Science" is a testimony of our perseverance and quality since 2014. In the first two years itself, we were among the Top 100 YouTube Science Channels in the World, and we were among the handful recipients of the global YouTube Learning Fund in 2019. 

Risks & Challenges

We have partnered with CIBA ( Centre for Incubation & Business Acceleration; affiliated to the National Department of Science and Technology) who helped in securing the Govt permission to work at their Maker Lab during lockdown and we are being incubated with them.

We have also hired the services of Ticket Design, a firm experienced in medical products and that has previously won Red Dot Awards, among others.

The Multi-Mask that you see on this page are prototypes and renders, so expect the final product to be even better built and more amazing looking. 

We are not worried about the new developments in filter materials (reusable, washable, etc) as our design can incorporate any sheet form material easily. It’s modular after all…!

Ways You Can Help

  • You can take one of the PERKS here and PRE-ORDER Multi-Mask(s) for yourself, your family, your friends or dozens for your workers or for a non-profit that you think will benefit from it, or
  • Make a financial contribution to support the Multi-Mask, or
  • Share it with friends & family who might be interested in supporting. Please use the Indiegogo share tools when you do that.

In the first two years itself, we were among the Top 100 YouTube Science Channels in the World, and we were among the handful recipients of the global YouTube Learning Fund in 2019.

We have partnered with CIBA ( Centre for Incubation & Business Acceleration; affiliated to the National Department of Science and Technology) who helped in securing the Govt permission to work at their Maker Lab during lockdown and we are being incubated with them.
We have also hired the services of Ticket Design, a firm experienced in medical products and that has previously won Red Dot Awards, among others.
The Multi-Mask that you see on this page are prototypes and renders, so expect the final product to be even better built and more amazing looking. 
We are not worried about the new developments in filter materials (reusable, washable, etc) as our design can incorporate any sheet form material easily. It’s modular after all…!

Ways You Can Help

You can take one of the PERKS here and PRE-ORDER Multi-Mask(s) for yourself, your family, your friends or dozens for your workers or for a non-profit that you think will benefit from it, or
Make a financial contribution to support the Multi-Mask, or

Share it with friends & family who might be interested in supporting. Please use the Indiegogo share tools when you do that.

story:
I’m a licensed clinical professional counselor who has been practicing for 7 years.  I have a diverse background that includes clinical work within the urban community and a business background that was shaped by an early professional career in corporate.  I decided to tackle this issue because the state of our mental health as a community is deteriorating.  Mental health services in Chicago specifically,  but not limited to, have diminished in the past 8 years due to clinics and hospitals closing or reduced capacity (funding) to provide mental health services.  The consequence of not addressing adolescent mental health extends into adulthood and impairs physical and mental health.  Therefore, this project is important to me because I believe that it is a part of my social responsibility and a commitment to my personal mission.  

Your cooperation and help with this project will increase users’ sense of well-being and higher self-concept, gain access to resources that help them cope with stress, and learn to articulate and manage their emotions.  As a result, users will be able to overcome adversity, handle difficult situations, make responsible decisions, and reduce stressors while positively impacting their mental and physical health.  Your support will bring an awareness to mental health access and fund the beta phase of the app, MChat Connect.  MChat Connect can be found on the Apple Store and Google Play.  However, the app has not been officially released.  After piloting the app with a small group there are needed revisions that will optimize functionality, improve visual layout, and include a HIPPA feature that will provide confidentiality for all online users.  

What We Need & What You Get

MChat Connect is asking for $28,000 to continue building on the beta phase of Google Play and Apple Store versions, add a therapist directory and add the HIPPA feature.  

The Coronavirus pandemic has caused major disruptions to the daily life of all especially adolescents who’ve had their childhood snatched from them.  Missing prom, graduation, first year of college, socializing with peers, etc. are all critical events that shape who you are.  There is something special about being young, something magical. Let’s give that moment back to young people and with the tools that help them overcome adversity.  

If our goal is not reached funds will support programs that provide mentoring to young adults and adolescents and mental health toolkits that have similar content as the app.   

The Impact – Although our pilot group was small, we were able to see improvements in the following areas in more than 63% of participants.

*Increase awareness and education around mental health

*Reduce mental health stigma and misconceptions

*Enhance self-help resources and connections to mental health professionals

Risks & Challenges

As a licensed therapist working in urban communities I’ve had the opportunity to collaborate with various multidisciplinary teams and work with youth and families that have experienced complex traumas and worked in diverse settings.  My plan for solving the challenge will be collaborative and the app will be coupled with trainings for professionals. Our approach will take into consideration multiple stakeholders input and capacity building.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help MChat Connect:

*Make some noise about our campaign.  Please share the project’s cause with others on your social media.  

*PLEASE use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Thank you for your support.

story:
Why we created the FitCapsule

Hey Indiegogo, MotionFit team here! Thanks so much for stopping by our pre-order page, we're excited to be building the future of fitness with you.

The FitCapsule uses high resolution gyroscopic technology to collect 3D range of motion data to help you improve mobility, limb strength, muscle symmetry all while avoiding injuries and overtraining. This is the fitness tracker that helps you hit that new PR, build your biceps / booty & makes the fitness experience much more fun. 

 

MUSCLE IMBALANCES WILL RUIN YOUR GAINS

Nothing will kill your gains faster than an injury and there's no better way to hurt yourself than to let muscle imbalances go unchecked. The FitCapsule measures muscle imbalances in each of your sets to make sure you're not at risk of injury and - subsequently - at risk of losing all your gains. 

 

CHEAT REPS HURT MORE THAN THEY HELP.

Really? OUCH. The FitCapsule doesn't tolerate cheat reps - lift to build your muscles & strength, not your ego. The FitCapsule keeps the ego and cheat reps in check by tracking range of motion, making sure each rep you do is complete, delivering results and keeping you safe. 

 

OVEREXERTION IS THE LEADING CAUSE OF FITNESS FACILITY INJURY. 

No pain, no gain.... right? Wrong. Working out is difficult and it's not meant to be excruciating - too much of a good thing ends in diminished returns, and the FitCapsule helps you to know when you're doing too much of a good thing by measuring the fatigue of your sets. Strike a balance between over and under training to achieve the best results.

 

AFFORDABILITY + PORTABILITY

The only other exercise form trackers out there are the Mirror, Tonal, Tempo and other home workout technology, costing up to $1,500 & a $40 dollar a month charge. The FitCapsule can be taken to the gym or into your home workouts and only costs $100 for a one time payment. 

 

OUR STORY

 

MotionFit started with just Paul & Andrew, a father and son start-up with an idea to track performance in our workouts. Over time, this small project evolved into a novel exercise form tracker & worldwide community built on the future of fitness. 

As we realized the potential of this idea - a wearable for form, muscle imbalances and fatigue - we started to reach out to talented people we knew, which has now grown into the MotionFit Team - a group of 10 people with engineers, kinematic researchers and innovators working across mechanical, electrical, software, and app development. We've spent the past 2 years working together, creating our vision and inspiring people to chase a better version of themselves in our journey to build the FitCapsule. 

 The FitCapsule was designed to deliver a fun, instructive and intuitive experience that helps the millions of people who are haunted by self doubt in their fitness journey. The FitCapsule is for the people who ask themselves:

"Am I doing this right?"

"Will I hurt myself doing this?"

"I don't know what workouts to do or how to do them correctly" 

We're building the FitCapsule for the people who want to achieve a healthier version of themselves and who are looking for guidance in their journey of becoming that person.

Simply put - step tracking won't get you those abs you want, heart rate data won't make you jump higher or move faster and calorie tracking won't build you the body of your dreams. Most importantly, none of these data points provide direction and rep by rep guidance. 

We made the FitCapsule for the following goals: 

A newcomer seeking fitness guidance to make significant improvements in their health, wellness and performance.

Athletes looking to innovate their training and get an edge on their competition.

People who are enthusiastic about the gym and are committed to pursuing health and wellness.

 

We're launching this campaign to build the future of fitness with you. 

Since the day this company started, we've been fueled by the ideas of the people who support our mission. Now that we're 90% finished with the FitCapsule, we're asking for your support through the last push of our development. Your contribution and use of the FitCapsule will help to guide people through their workouts by inventing new metrics, tracking and displaying people's form with fully body tracking, and to build a community of people who encourage each other on their path towards a healthier & happier version of themselves.

 

Every rep you perform with your FitCapsule contributes to the collective knowledge and guidance of the FitCapsule community. Every dollar contributed goes towards helping the next person to restore their energy and enthusiasm for fitness and self improvement. Every kind of contribution you make to our mission supports people's lifespans, helps people to discover their untapped potential, and removes the obstacles that keeps them from becoming the person they want to be. Share with friends, be one of the first 300 FitCapsule users, and grab a MotionFit T-Shirt to show support for MotionFit's mission. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We're raising $7,500 to manufacture the FitCapsule devices, finish the last touches on our game development to add new shaders and game rewards for you, and to build out our machine learning models to be as accurate as possible.

When you purchase a FitCapsule, you'll have 

- An exercise form tracker that's powered by fatigue, muscle imbalance, power, speed and force data

- Band usable for tracking wrist/arm movement and ankle/leg movement

Band is being added to sleeves to enhance the comfort and adaptability of the sleeve design.

- A mobile fitness app with a game like feel to keep you motivated & engaged

- Shaders for your 3D virtual character

The Impact

52% of people report that they skip workouts due to gym anxiety. COVID-19 has made going to gyms that much more nerve racking AND necessary for your health. The FitCapsule was created to help people break through the barriers of gym anxiety and self doubt so they can see how proud their friends and family are when their lifestyle changes become noticeable in their health & attitude. The FitCapsule was invented to give people a sense of belonging in the gym and to guide them through the difficult unknowns that we face when trying to improve ourselves, and to surprise themselves when their hidden potential unveils itself.

80% of people report that accountability is what keeps them from the gym. We think that's true to an extent - people don't need accountability when they love what they're doing. We're here to bring fun to fitness so that building a new routine feels as intuitive and natural as picking up a hobby that just feels right.

The leading cause of fitness facility injury is over-exertion. Measuring fatigue during workouts is crucial to avoid these injuries - it's easy for seemingly small decisions to have large consequences in the gym. Fatigue turns into form breakdown, form breakdown turns into muscle imbalances, and muscle imbalances slowly but surely carve a path towards injury - if you aren't managing fatigue, you are at risk of injury.

Risks & Challenges

Creating the FitCapsule comes with plenty of challenges and risks, some of which include:

- Manufacturing issues

- App bugs

- Running many animations can be expensive on mobile

That's why we have all our hardware designed specifically for the manufacturing process, rigorous testing of our mobile app development and all of our animations put onto one character to save battery life. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you'd like to support our mission in other ways, here's how: 

  • Share the FitCapsule campaign on your social media pages! Make sure to tell your friends and family about our mission and why you support it!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share with friends and family. 

Thank you for supporting our mission.

story:
The Next Level Hula Experience!

Orbit + works thirty core muscles, including abdominal, glutes, thighs, and lower back muscle efficiently at the same time—the one exercise you need to achieve your slim body. 

Motus Orbit+ is reinventing the concept of hula hooping, taking advantage of the traditional hula hoop benefits without the stress of using it. Instead of the loop orbiting your waist, the Orbit+ adopts a whole new concept (smooth track system*) of having the counterweight that will orbit around your body by your body motion; the counter weight will follow your body rhythm to create the orbital speed you need to maintain the body movement.

Thanks to the Orbit + exercising motion, the exercise will strengthen your abdominal muscles and work all the other core muscles of the abdominal, glutes, thighs, and lower back muscles—at the same time! Thus, this provides a much higher exercising efficiency and focuses on the exercise and enjoyment, which will lead to a slimmer waistline and improve waist-to-hip ratio (WHR).

Smooth Track System

Orbit+ is the pioneer product that invented the track system technology (Patent Pending), the key design that make Orbit + an efficient gym equipment compared to traditional ones—providing a more joyful exercise experience

UHMWPE Rope

The Ultra Height Molecular Weight Polyethylene (UHMWPE) rope is not an ordinary rope; it is an ultra-strong rope that is seven to nine times stronger than steel (by weight). It has excellent vibration damping and good resistance to abrasion for maximum safety.

Polycarbonate Plastic

Polycarbonate plastic is being used to form the key component for the Orbit+. It is considered as one of the ballistic-grade plastics for bulletproof glass, and is the ideal material when toughness and durability are needed.

Motus team not only believes in the Next concept but also knows the way to make it happen.

The Motus team knows how to turn concept into reality—not only making good ideas happen but also making them useful. With years of concept design and manufacturing experience, the Motus team not only delivers the new concepts but also follows through to create real products. Our experience ensures that we make our products functional yet offering quality to the market.

We believe quality is one of the keys for a successful product; therefore, we carefully monitor each step of the manufacturing process to ensure quality is delivered to our customer. Thanks to our engineering team with years of manufacturing experience. We select the best materials available and deliver products that will meet our customers’ expectations and final satisfaction.

 

This special Nutrition Guide comes with Weekly Meal Plan, Recipe, and Weekly shopping list. This special program is custom made for Motus by sport nutritionist, Providing a health and balanced diet to make your workout much more efficient.

 

Motus was founded by a group of enthusiasts with years of design and manufacturing experience, believing that hard-working exercise can become a joy and bring traditional gym equipment into the next concept.

We are a group of enthusiasts, inspired by traditional hula-hoop and we believe in making the best hula hoop—one that takes up less space, requires fewer skills, and provides higher workout  efficiency compared to traditional hula hoop exercise. As a result, Motus Orbit+ is born for that purpose.  We have carefully studied and researched the mechanism. A systematic approach has been taken to design the product to be more effective compared to traditional hula-hoop, while providing the best experience which can turn hard-working exercise into a joy.

 

 

More Information:

Distributor:

If you’d like to become a Motus Orbit+ distributor, please email us at info@motusdynamic.com.

Gym Owner:

We desire to help you offer the highest level fitness training and latest innovations, including our patented Track technology. We’ve designed the Small Group and Group Exercise reward packages specifically for gyms. If you’d like to offer Motus Orbit+ classes, bootcamps or virtual training, please email us at info@motusdynamic.com.

Trainer:

We desire to help you offer the highest level fitness training and latest innovations. We’ve designed the Small Group reward package specifically for trainers. If you’d like to incorporate the Motus Orbit+ into your personal training, please email us at info@motusdynamic.com.

Corporate Wellness:

We have received interest in the Motus Orbit+ for corporate wellness programs because it fits any fitness level and you can easily track workouts and progress. If you are interested to learn more, please email us at info@motusdynamic.com.

Physical Therapist:

The Motus Orbit+ is being used in physical therapy too. If you’re interested to learn more, please email us at info@motusdynamic.com.

Blogger / Journalist:

If you’re interested in featuring the Motus Orbit+ on your blog or media outlet, please email us at info@motusdynamic.com so that we can feature you in our updates and send you a press release.

Risks and challenges

No project is without risk, but we have worked extremely hard to mitigate all unforeseen risks in the development, manufacturing and fulfillment of the Motus Orbit+. First, the Motus Orbit+ is the second version in the Motus Orbit+ product line (the first being the original Motus Orbit), so we have already successfully designed, manufactured and fulfilled thousands of units to customers. We are utilizing the same manufacturing and fulfillment partners as the Motus Orbit+. Second, the Motus Orbit+ is an improved version of the Motus Orbit, developed after testing multiple working prototypes. The same Motus Dynamic team of engineers and prototypers have developed the Motus Orbit+, so we know it will hold to our highest standards of portable fitness durability and life cycle. Third, at Motus Dynamic we have an outstanding team of designers, engineers, and fulfillment experts to ensure the entire process from design to manufacturing to fulfillment is executed without a hitch. If a problem arises, we are confident that we will solve them. Even with our successful track record, there are still risks with backing a Indiegogo campaign—please carefully read Indiegogo's guidelines about what exactly it means when you back a project. We're excited to implement our manufacturing and fulfillment plan immediately after the campaign and aim to fulfill on time to each and every backer.

Long-lasting design

We use durable Polycarbonate Plastic which is long lasting and the product lifespan will be much longer

If you’re interested to learn more, please email us at info@motusdynamic.com.Blogger / Journalist:If you’re interested in featuring the Motus Orbit+ on your blog or media outlet, please email us at info@motusdynamic.com so that we can feature you in our updates and send you a press release.Risks and challengesNo project is without risk, but we have worked extremely hard to mitigate all unforeseen risks in the development, manufacturing and fulfillment of the Motus Orbit+. First, the Motus Orbit+ is the second version in the Motus Orbit+ product line (the first being the original Motus Orbit), so we have already successfully designed, manufactured and fulfilled thousands of units to customers. We are utilizing the same manufacturing and fulfillment partners as the Motus Orbit+. Second, the Motus Orbit+ is an improved version of the Motus Orbit, developed after testing multiple working prototypes. The same Motus Dynamic team of engineers and prototypers have developed the Motus Orbit+, so we know it will hold to our highest standards of portable fitness durability and life cycle. Third, at Motus Dynamic we have an outstanding team of designers, engineers, and fulfillment experts to ensure the entire process from design to manufacturing to fulfillment is executed without a hitch. If a problem arises, we are confident that we will solve them. Even with our successful track record, there are still risks with backing a Indiegogo campaign—please carefully read Indiegogo's guidelines about what exactly it means when you back a project. We're excited to implement our manufacturing and fulfillment plan immediately after the campaign and aim to fulfill on time to each and every backer.Long-lasting designWe use durable Polycarbonate Plastic which is long lasting and the product lifespan will be much longer

story:
Enter the giveaway to get a FREE box of DryScoop: 

https://omniform1.com/signup/v1/605eb75b4c7fa45...

Background: As lifetime athletes and hobbyists in activities ranging from powerlifting to rock climbing, founders Dustin and Will are constantly seeking out products to enhance their physical performance and energy levels. For years, they have been searching for a pre-workout style supplement that is portable, functional, and easy to consume. 

The Problem: Current pre-workout powders are an annoyance due to the large tubs they are packaged in, and the need to mix the powder with a copious amount of water in a shaker bottle before it can be consumed. This is a messy process that often results in a negative experience. Coffee and other fitness drinks work to raise energy levels, but don't offer the other performance increasing ingredients provided by standard pre-workout powders. 

 

 

 

Concept of "dry-scooping": A common solution to the shaker bottle issue for pre-workout powder is a consumption mechanism used by powerlifters known as "dry-scooping". This involves scooping pre-workout powder directly into one's mouth with one sip of water to wash it down. This is convenient as there is no need for a shaker bottle, and no potential for a mess.  And yes you can still consume it traditionally in a shaker bottle where you'll notice its smooth and super quick-dissolving formulation and subtle flavor with a traditional amount of water.

 

After searching for such a product unsuccessfully, Will and Dustin had to take matters into their own hands, and launch DryScoop: a pre-workout powder that solves the main issues of pre-workout powders:

 

 

1. No Shaker Bottle Required: DryScoop is the first pre-workout powder that can be consumed without a shaker bottle. Simply open the pouch, consume the powder, and wash it down with a sip of water.

2. Clean and Easy Consumption: No water means no mess! A single use package makes consumption simple and easy and clean. With DryScoop, you don't need to break out the measuring tools in order to consume your pre-workout, we took care of that part before hand for your convenience! 

3. Full Pre-Workout Formula: Unlike other pre-workout options such as coffee and energy drinks, DryScoop contains more than just caffeine and sugar. The DryScoop formula contains the amino acids and supplemental ingredients provided by a standard pre-workout powder in the convenience of a single use pouch. In short, DryScoop is the first portable pre-workout option that doesn't cut any corners when it comes to formula and performance. 

4. Pleasant To Consume Dry: Unlike most pre-work powders that need to be mixed with water, DryScoop is designed to be consumed dry and still taste good. This means a smooth consistency and good tasting flavor when the powder is consumed dry. You are still able to mix DryScoop in a shaker bottle with water if needed, but the flavor is not designed for this.

5. Portability: While standard pre-workout powders come in large, inconvenient bins, DryScoop's pouch design allows you to carry individual one-time servings of pre-workout powder in your pocket or gym bag.

 

By The Numbers

Say Bye to Bad Tasting Pre-Workout

Due to DryScoop's formula and flavor profile being specifically tailored for dry consumption, there is no overpowering taste when consumed nor is there a gritty clumpy texture. 

 

So What's In It?

 

 

 

Caffeine: The all-important ingredient to every energy-boosting product out there. It boosts energy levels and intensity. Every pre-workout powder contains caffeine, and we didn't hold back when adding caffeine to DryScoop.

L-Theanine: Often paired with caffeine, L-theanine is known to assist in the effects of caffeine by limiting jitters and caffeine crashes. By adding L-Theanine, DryScoop is committing to a pre-workout powder that won't cause a crash. 

Nitric Oxide: Nitric Oxide is a booster for increased athletic performance. 

Citrulline: Citrulline is used to promote your vasodilation and pump. This is a critical aspect of any pre-workout supplement. 

Beta-Alaine: Increases Exercise Work Capacity and Muscular Endurance

 

 

Save Room In Your Gym Bag

With DryScoop's easy-open single use pouch, you no longer have to bring the whole tub of pre-workout powder to the gym. Just throw one DryScoop pouch in your pocket or bag, and consume prior to workout.

 

Risks and challenges

As with any startup, DryScoop faces the inherent risks that come with launching a new product. However, DryScoop is not trying to reinvent the wheel, and plans on using standard unit economics to become profitable. We are not a tech company, and have no intention of trying risky and untested profitability methods. With us, what you see and expect is what you will get.

story:
Sure Sinus helps remove your body's tendency to enact excessive defense mechanism by balancing your sinus biome.

 

 

 

 
 

 

If you’re suffering from sinusitis or inflammation issues, it may be because you have an unbalanced sinus biome. You’re missing key probiotics, or the good bacteria needed to fight off the bad bacteria.

Without key probiotics, your body is unable to fight off bad bacteria effectively. Instead, it has to fight hard to keep itself in balance.

 

 

They help your body find the balance between necessary and excessive defense mechanisms (aka all that pain you feel).

Sure Sinus reintroduces the good bacteria, helping to balance your sinus biome and assisting in regulating your body's immune response.

 

 

 

"I have only used Sure Sinus for a short period of time, but have already seen improvement in my sinus drainage and inflammation. This product has helped me overcome a severe cycle of infection. I am excited to see how my results improve with continued use."

  • Daniel M.

 

"I have already noticed a bit of improvement. So I think this program may work if I stick with it over the long term as this has been a problem of long standing. In any case it shows more promise than anything I have tried so far. I think that over time it may perhaps break up whatever is causing the problem up in the sinuses. I am hopeful and have ordered 16 vials of 30 doses each."

  • George P.

 

"If you have sinus problems, you simply have to try Sure Sinus. I wouldn't have believed it if I didn’t. With near-instant relief and a drastic reduction in inflammation, I could feel it essentially repairing my nose over the course of the treatment. After a lifetime of abuse from prior measures, this was unbelievable. Being 2019, I would have expected every solution for such a seemingly simple problem to have been already identified and exhausted. Honestly, I wouldn’t have believed it if I hadn’t used Sure Sinus first hand. I wouldn’t have believed my sinuses could feel the way they do now."

  • Samuel G.

 

These bacteria produce vitamins and nutrients, boost immune response and protect against carcinogens and unhealthy bacteria.

 

A diverse mixture is very important to a healthy biome.

 

 

 

 

Repeat this process every day for the full 30-day process. Depending on the severity of suffering and sinus symptoms, some users see results within 1-2 days.

 

 

 

The proprietary blend of bacteria is both more potent and healthier when kept cold. True cold-chain storage and fulfillment ensures the best results. Shipping price displayed is for the 1-pack option.

 

One 30-day program is enough for the average individual. Users who suffer from more severe symptoms should expect to need more than 30 doses for relief.

It is recommended to pre-order multiple 30-day programs and store for future use, should your biome becomes unbalanced again.

Depending on your history and disease process, some suffers find further benefit from multiple doses per day during the rebalancing of the biome.
 

Sure Sinus is more than just a probiotic, the company has created a platform that will allow users to have access to a private forum with doctors and sinus experts. The forum will allow those suffering from Rhinitis symptoms to ask any questions or concerns to medical professionals and fellow sufferers regarding their respective symptoms. The platform will offer a community for chronic suffers to interact with each other and professionals on an ongoing basis.  The forum will be live this year for the end of this campaign.

 

 

 

Sure Sinus was created after our founder found that his own symptoms of chronic sinusitis had become so serious that he considered walking away from his passion for business. Instead of giving up, he put his head down to personally research and navigate his way through the maze of sinusitis cures. It was during this period that he discovered research that pointed him towards probiotics as a potential way to help relieve the chronic symptoms of  sinusitis.

After several years of research, he was able to settle on his own proprietary mixture of probiotic strains of Lactobacillus that, per his own biohacking and experimentation, helped alleviate the myriad symptoms of his chronic sinusitis. Marc had put together a combination that changed his life—an actual, tangible and consistent solution for just about anyone suffering from both acute and chronic versions of sinusitis.

Since then, he has had his eyes up and his clear-as-day nose to the ground building out Sure Sinus as a product that is able to help millions. He set out to build a team, who have since commenced with research and product development. That team has built the product you see today that is available now on a global basis. Your product will arrive immediately following the end of this campaign. 

 

 

We ship worldwide. See reward details for shipping costs. Prices exclude any local duties or sales tax.

We plan to ship the product mid/end of October 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary.

By backing now we will give regular production updates and keep you in the know with everything.

 

 

 

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Not intended to replace current medical treatment. Please consult your doctor before use. The doctors referenced in support of the product are those mentioned in the campaign page.

 

 

Sure Sinus manipulates the sinus microbiome to restore immune homeostasis. Sure Sinus works to prevent dysbiosis, or microbial imbalance, within your sinus microbiome. It works with your body to solidify the mucosal immunology of the respiratory membranes in your sinus cavity.

The nature and composition of bacteria present in the sinus biome are important contributors to the development of host defenses against infection and allergic reaction. Data shows that probiotic supplementation modulates immune responses and can help lessen symptoms. Probiotics help your body find the balance between necessary and excessive defense mechanisms.

 

Using scientifically-backed ingredients, Sure Sinus is primarily composed of 4 different strains of Lactobacilli. Beneficial varieties of this bacteria produce vitamins and nutrients, boost immune response and protect against carcinogens and unhealthy bacteria.

The mixture of species developed for Sure Sinus are all naturally part of the human sinus biome, as either a keystone (has a disproportionately large effect on the community), a pioneer (are the first to colonize the niche after a disruption), or a dominant (a relatively high abundance in most people) species. The right mixture is very important to a healthy biome.

 

The chosen strains have been found to be safe, and conducive to restoring your body’s sinus biome to its native state. Having a sinus biome that is out of balance leads to many common symptoms of both acute and chronic sinusitis. Scientific studies have shown that sinus inflammation is associated with decreased sinus bacterial diversity and the then collateral enrichment of specific sinus pathogens. The included species have been shown to competitively exclude the habitation of certain harmful bacteria.

The probiotics within Sure Sinus primarily act through the production of antimicrobial compounds. For example, one included strain produces the protein reuterin, which acts as an antimicrobial compound by inducing oxidative stress in competing bacteria. The effects of this protein are aimed at eliminating competing microbes, giving the good bacteria an advantage in righting the biome.

 

Intranasal administration is key in regulating respiratory immune responses. Probiotic administration directly into the sinus biome can influence the host composition and function via antimicrobial production, changing PH levels, or through competitive colonization.

 

 

 

 

Sure Sinus is based on revolutionary research into the composition, modulation, and health of the human sinus biome.

Abreu, Nicole A, et al. “Sinus Microbiome Diversity Depletion and Corynebacterium Tuberculostearicum Enrichment Mediates Rhinosinusitis.” Science Translational Medicine, U.S. National Library of Medicine, 12 Sept. 2012, www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4786373/

Cope, Emily K, et al. “Compositionally and Functionally Distinct Sinus Microbiota in Chronic Rhinosinusitis Patients Have Immunological and Clinically Divergent Consequences.” Microbiome, BioMed Central, 12 May 2017, www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/28494786

Mahdavinia, M, et al. “A Comprehensive Review of the Nasal Microbiome in Chronic Rhinosinusitis (CRS).” Clinical and Experimental Allergy: Journal of the British Society for Allergy and Clinical Immunology, U.S. National Library of Medicine, Jan. 2016, www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26510171

Ramakrishnan, Vijay R, et al. “Sinus Microbiota Varies among Chronic Rhinosinusitis Phenotypes and Predicts Surgical Outcome.” The Journal of Allergy and Clinical Immunology, U.S. National Library of Medicine, Aug. 2015, www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25819063

Vickery, Thad W, and Vijay R Ramakrishnan. “Bacterial Pathogens and the Microbiome.” Otolaryngologic Clinics of North America, U.S. National Library of Medicine, Feb. 2017, www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/27888914

 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for entrepreneurs & enterprises.

story:
If you’re not satisfied with your Kailo for any reason, you’re free to send it back for a full refund within the first 90 days. Because of our high success rate, our only request is that you call us first and let us help you with the proper placement. In almost every case where Kailo seemed to not be working, it was only a lack of finding the right spot for the affected area. After helping customers find proper placement we have received less than 1% returns, we are confident this can work for you! Our goal isn’t to just sell a product but to help people find real, lasting relief. We’d love the opportunity to help you too!

 

Testimonial Videos

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

Customer Testimonials

"I gave the first one to my mother who is in pain often, years and diabetes.  She slept really well for the first time in years."  - Brian N.

 

"I was part of the early funding for Kailo on Indiegogo, Since receiving the item last month I have absolutely loved it and shown it to all my friends and family! My mother has told me that it has helped with pain in her knee that hasn’t been able to dissipate for years. So I have decided to leave her with my prized possession! I will buy another Kailo... I definitely can see the value in the little miracle." -Nick A.

 

"I am a skeptic! I am no stranger to pain. I was accident prone as a child. Breaking, twisting and rupturing. At 17 I was hit head-on by a drunk driver, changing my life. Lots of broken bones, severe injuries, metal in my body and years of pain. Even now. I have had lots of things removed, numerous surgeries, ovarian cysts, varicose veins, miscarriages, and so much more.

And now Fibromyalgia! All causing LOTS OF PAIN!

So, when my SIL told me about this Kailo pain patch I was skeptical. Excited, but skeptical. A pain patch with NO MEDICINE, working off my bodies own electrical system with nanotechnology. 

But then, I got to go try Kailo before buying it. Yipee! I walked in there hopeful to relieve some pain, but still in the back of my head thinking that I was going to have to be the one to tell these people it didn't work. And on camera! But honesty is always the best policy.

* Guess what?!?! *

IT WORKED!!!! It took a little while to figure out where to best place it. But then.... RELIEF! I have found relief from my shoulder, neck, hand, arm, hip and back pain so far. Not a cure, but relief.

I can now wake up in the morning not feeling sore, stiff and in pain. It has helped my quality of life. Finally some RELIEF. It WORKS. It's weird, I know." - Liza Burdette

 

"I used my Kailo for hip pain. I wore it all day and took it off to sleep at night. My pain did not resurface until the following evening. So the relief lasted for almost 24 hours. I have also used it for sciatic pain and it allows me to sleep at night in comfort. I think it is a wonderful product and I am so grateful for it!" - Karen V.

 

"I used the Kailo all night for a wrist strain that I've been suffering those last few days, and the pain is so little to none that I managed to sleep through it (without any medication) and it gives me a pain-free good start for the day.

My mother suffers from back aches every morning due to arthritis and sometimes, it takes a few hours to dissipate; placing the Kailo on her back when she gets up at the best place made the ache disappear in a very short time.

The Kailo also eases my lower back pain from sitting for too long; it doesn't make it unnecessary to do breaks to get up, do exercises and to have a good back position, but it makes the last few hours so much more bearable. I always have it in my purse, ready to use whenever I need it." - Delphine D.

 

“I have a tear in my rotator cuff which has derailed upper body workouts for me for over a year now. I was unable to lift my arm for days after any heavy use because of the pain. Once I found the correct placement of the Kailo, my pain dropped from a constant 7.5 (worst = 10), down to a 2. and my range of motion has improved drastically. Best placement has been across my trapezius, between the base of my neck and the top of my shoulder bone. so far, it’s been fantastic. Recommend!” - Nic

 

"I'm just writing to let you know that I received your product yesterday and immediately started using it. It took me about 3 minutes before I found a good spot on my upper back. The pain went away within seconds. I have been suffering from 

daily muscle spasms and tightening that was so painful..(it felt/feel like my spine was being crushed in a vise). This would happen daily when I walked for more than a couple of minutes, when I mowed the lawn, vacuumed and when I would lie down to sleep. This has gone on for over 4 years . MRI's , Xrays, chiropractor, massage therapy, orthopedist.. Anyway, you get the point... I have tried everything and still ..pain. I know that your product isn't fixing the issue, but it has (so far) given me amazing relief from the daily pain that I had been feeling.

I have told several people about this product and I have no doubt that they will be ordering from you. Thank you so much for developing this amazing technology and delivering it at a reasonable price!!  I hope you continue to develop and improve on it." -Michael

 

 


 

Electricity is everywhere, even in the human body. Our cells are specialized to conduct electrical currents. Electricity is required for the nervous system to send signals throughout the body and back to the brain — making it possible for us to move, think, and feel.

 

The Kailo™ nanocapacitors work in harmony with your body’s electrical system like a bio antenna. You may even feel your Kailo begin to get warm as your nervous system responds. Now, once the pain and discomfort is managed, your body can get back to living the life you should be living.

 

 


 

Let’s take a look inside Kailo’s innovative, licensed technology. It was invented as a leading-edge antenna technology and in a EUREKA! moment was discovered to also help relieve pain. So what's inside a Kailo? What makes it work?
 

 

 

As long as your Kailo is properly placed, it will continue to provide relief. Additionally, there is a lasting effect even after the Kailo is removed. We have use cases of people wearing it for a week and the positive effects lingering for days after removal. We also have many examples of the relief continuing for up to an hour after just wearing it for a few minutes. It likely depends on the kind of pain, the health of the person wearing it, and the placement technique. Please contact us if you need help finding a proper placement at support@gokailo.com.

 

 


 

 

 



 

And hundreds of other applications!

These are some of the most common applications, but we have thousands of use cases. People use Kailo for just about every kind of pain. Kailo has helped provide natural relief in joints, muscles, and nerves. If you are wondering if Kailo can help you, we have a 100% money-back guarantee so it won’t hurt to give it a shot!

 

 

Each Kailo comes with a small pack of adhesives that can be easily applied to the back of your Kailo for seamless application. When the adhesive loses its stick, simply peel it off and apply a new one for next time. If you don’t want to use the provided adhesives, feel free to use your favorite athletic or medical tape to hold your Kailo in place.

 

 

 

Because the pain relief is dependent on your body’s nervous system pathways, there can often be a little trial and error when it comes to correct placement. We’ve found that when a friend or loved one helps you, it can shorten the amount of time needed to find the right spot.

Kailo is known to start working within seconds, so it’s fairly easy to know if you’ve found the right spot. Simply move Kailo around in varying configurations until you find relief, then remove the adhesive backing and apply it to that location. We’ll send a handy placement guide with your Kailo kit to help you find just the right spot.

 

 

Kailo is watertight and sealed against the elements. Feel comfortable and free to wear Kailo during adverse weather conditions, while taking a shower, or even during an afternoon dip in the pool. Kailo should only be cleaned with mild soap and water.

 

 

 

Because of the strength of the body’s electrical field, Kailo can be worn directly on the skin as well as over fitted clothing. We’ve even seen it work over sweatshirts. This means you have some flexibility of where you place it and how it works best with your activities.

 

 


Humanity has changed. Our bodies weren’t designed to be so sedentary but we now spend more time sitting than at any time in history (you’re probably sitting right now). Because of that, nearly every single one of us suffers from pain. And as we get older, it gets more common.
 

 

Standing desks, expensive chairs, gel pads — we’ve all tried them. Unfortunately, too often, the answer to pain is to open a bottle of pills. None of us want to be dependent on medication for the rest of our lives. Kailo can help.

 

Please consult with your physician or other qualified health care professional before using any product discussed within this website. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or condition.

 

INTERIM STUDY RESULTS COMMUNICATION PREVENT STUDY

October 2020

Interim Results from the IRB-approved PREVENT Study, aimed at evaluating Pain Severity and Pain Interference in patients with mild, moderate, or chronic pain conditions over a period of 30 days using the Kailo Pain-Relieving Patch, showed positive and statistically significant results in patient outcomes, patient satisfaction, and patient preference over oral medications.
    
Detailed interim results have been submitted for presentation at the 2021 International Conference on Pain Management Drugs and Chronic Pain (ICPMDCP 2021) to be held in Barcelona, Spain and the 2021 American Academy of Pain Medicine (AAPM 2021) Annual Scientific Congress, to be held in Phoenix, Arizona.

A review article on the interim data by the Principal Investigator, Jeffrey Gudin, MD has been submitted for publication in Practical Pain Management in an upcoming edition.

A peer-reviewed manuscript is being developed for submission to the Journal of Pain Research and other leading 
Pain Journals

Interim results showed:
o    A statistically significant decrease in pain severity and pain interference 
o    An increase in quality of life and patient function
o    Patient satisfaction for convenience and ease of use
o    Patient preference over oral medications

“With the recent apparent resurgence in opioid and other drug abuse, clinicians are demanding effective, safe and non-addictive options for the treatment of acute and chronic pain. Modern science has allowed the incorporation of nanotechnology into topical patch systems, minimizing, and in the case of Kailo, eliminating the need for drugs/pharmacological agents. The interim results of the PREVENT Study look very promising and we look forward to continuing to collect data from those patients with mild, moderate, or chronic pain.”                                                       

Jeffrey Gudin MD, Principal Investigator

“The interim results from the PREVENT IRB-approved study demonstrated that patients who used the Kailo Pain-Relieving Patch over a period of 30 days showed a vast reduction of their pain severity levels. They experienced a better quality of life, improved function, were very satisfied with the Kailo Pain Relieving Patch, and preferred the patch over oral pain medications. With the increased focus on identifying alternative multi-modal therapies for patients in pain that clinicians and consumers can turn to, the use and ongoing research of novel approaches, including the non-drug, and nanotechnology-based Kailo patch, seems to have a very positive effect on patients who are experiencing mild, moderate, and chronic pain. We look forward to reporting on these important data in the coming months.”                

Peter Hurwitz, President, Clarity Science LLC, Clinical Research Organization and Study Administrator

 

 



When our campaign ends, we will send you a survey to collect your shipping information.

You’ll be among the very first to receive new Kailo technology! You’ll lock in Indiegogo-only discounted pricing for your early support. We love you! (and you’ll love yourself with the extra relief Kailo will bring)

 

 


If there is a friend or loved one who could benefit from Kailo, please share this campaign with them! Join us in assisting others to a happier life on our mission to bring easy, affordable, life-long relief from pain to everyone. Use the links below or simply copy/paste the URL above and share it any way you’d like :)
 


For press inquiries about Kailo or this Indiegogo campaign, please email support@gokailo.com or download our media kit including photos, GIFs, videos, branding, and more below.

 

 

 




Kailo is ready to be shipped and enjoyed by you. Order any time and start your journey towards pain relief.


If you are outside the United States, customs fees and duties may be required in order to obtain your order. Customs and duties are the responsibility of the buyer. We have no control over how long it takes for international orders to arrive. Please note that many international orders will be routed through a country other than that of its final destination. This is normal and is done to ensure a more secure delivery internationally.
 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

Over the past year, our team has been working closely with our manufacturers and logistics partners, to ensure that we ship your Kailo as soon as possible, with no delays. With that being said, we cannot control everything, in any case of delays we promise to communicate with transparency and work around the clock to ensure your expectations are met!

If you’re not satisfied with your Kailo for any reason, you’re free to send it back for a full refund within the first 90 days. Because of our high success rate, our only request is that you call us first and let us help you with the proper placement. In almost every case where Kailo seemed to not be working, it was only a lack of finding the right spot for the affected area. After helping customers find proper placement we have received less than 1% returns, we are confident this can work for you! Our goal isn’t to just sell a product but to help people find real, lasting relief. We’d love the opportunity to help you too!
 
Testimonial Videos
 

 

 
 


 


 


 




 
Customer Testimonials
"I gave the first one to my mother who is in pain often, years and diabetes.  She slept really well for the first time in years."  - Brian N.
 
"I was part of the early funding for Kailo on Indiegogo, Since receiving the item last month I have absolutely loved it and shown it to all my friends and family! My mother has told me that it has helped with pain in her knee that hasn’t been able to dissipate for years. So I have decided to leave her with my prized possession! I will buy another Kailo... I definitely can see the value in the little miracle." -Nick A.
 
"I am a skeptic! I am no stranger to pain. I was accident prone as a child. Breaking, twisting and rupturing. At 17 I was hit head-on by a drunk driver, changing my life. Lots of broken bones, severe injuries, metal in my body and years of pain. Even now. I have had lots of things removed, numerous surgeries, ovarian cysts, varicose veins, miscarriages, and so much more.
And now Fibromyalgia! All causing LOTS OF PAIN!
So, when my SIL told me about this Kailo pain patch I was skeptical. Excited, but skeptical. A pain patch with NO MEDICINE, working off my bodies own electrical system with nanotechnology. 
But then, I got to go try Kailo before buying it. Yipee! I walked in there hopeful to relieve some pain, but still in the back of my head thinking that I was going to have to be the one to tell these people it didn't work. And on camera! But honesty is always the best policy.
* Guess what?!?! *
IT WORKED!!!! It took a little while to figure out where to best place it. But then.... RELIEF! I have found relief from my shoulder, neck, hand, arm, hip and back pain so far. Not a cure, but relief.
I can now wake up in the morning not feeling sore, stiff and in pain. It has helped my quality of life. Finally some RELIEF. It WORKS. It's weird, I know." - Liza Burdette
 
"I used my Kailo for hip pain. I wore it all day and took it off to sleep at night. My pain did not resurface until the following evening. So the relief lasted for almost 24 hours. I have also used it for sciatic pain and it allows me to sleep at night in comfort. I think it is a wonderful product and I am so grateful for it!" - Karen V.
