story:
The Underestimated Danger

Smartphones, laptops, and tablets are electric devices most people use every day. Some even use smartwatches, baby monitors, or game consoles. But all of us are surrounded by Wi-Fi routers, 3G - 4G, and soon the new 5G towers.

They all relate to one thing which is ELECTROSMOG also known as EMF radiation (Electro-Magnetic Field). Everything that works with electricity or radio-frequency emits harmful electromagnetic waves.

Every mobile phone's manual tells you to keep your device 2 - 3 cm away from your body. Have you ever read those instructions?

The thermal effects above are easy to experience, but there are long term, invisible effects.
People often neglect them while using their devices but we should keep them in mind and focus on prevention.
 

Einstein Brain Card

Einstein Brain Card is a pocket-sized innovation that effectively absorbs 5G & EMF radiation by its patented SHS-technology.​

Our Einstein Brain card offers an all-in-one solution to your electric devices!
The active layer inside is based on nanotechnology. This technology can absorb a given spectrum of low-frequency, magnetic, and high-frequency electromagnetic radiation to a healthy level based on research results and our measurements.
The components of the card are made under laboratory conditions to ensure premium quality and consistency.

The greatest advantage which makes our technology unique is that it does not limit the operation of your devices. 

Just keep it close to your gadgets and your Einstein Brain card will do the rest! 

 

Proof of Effectiveness

We measured the EMF radiation created during an average phone call and used our card to prove its effectiveness in reducing that radiation.

Important: Our card is not a shielding product!
Shielding creates increased EMF radiation and could cause more harm than help.
That's because shielding mostly just reflects radiation back from its surface. In other cases "shield" promising products should be grounded to lead away built-up charge.

However, Einstein Brain Card works differently.
It uses a patented technology that combines composite alloy with microorganisms that absorb excess radiation. The card can absorb a given spectrum of low-frequency magnetic and high-frequency electromagnetic radiation emitted by electronic devices.

Unit of measurement in the above scenario: mW/m2

 

Our Technology is tested and approved

Our technology is tested and approved by the independent Verkotan laboratory in Finland.

Measurements were made in “cheek” and “tilt” positions on both the left and right sides of the phantom head. The phone's radiation levels were tested with our Einstein Brain Card and without it. 
The card has successfully reduced harmful radiation below the healthy SAR level, and by up to 64.8%.

See the full report on the bottom of this page. [1]

Early Adopters

As an early adopter, we give you the extra advantage to protect yourself and your loved ones.
That's why we would like to reward the fastest action takers.
As part of our Global Launching Campaign, we created a special offer for Indiegogo.
The retail value of the Einstein Brain Card is €150 per card.

However, for a short period of time, we will allow you to get 2 cards with bonuses at a highly discounted price.

The price is created for our global launching campaign, so take advantage of it NOW.

This card makes it a perfect gift for those who constantly use electronic devices and if you order now, you will receive it within 7 - 10 working days.

 

The 21st Century's intangible pollution

If we could see EMF radiation, it would look like this:

Most surfaces absorb or reflect electromagnetic waves.  Some waves are stronger and can easily pass through objects.  It depends on the wave's type, power and direction. The highest impact is always on the closest surface.

Think about a phone call you make or an email which you write on your computer.
Who or what gets the most exposure?

Yes, it is YOU. The user and its body.

Einstein Brain card protects YOU from the excess radiation by absorbing and converting the invisible waves to light heat. It reduces the potentially harmful effects on your body.

 

Health effects of EMF radiation

Our environment is changing due to constant innovation. And innovation is great!
Although in the past 15 years average radiation increased 350 times... and new inventions like 5G networks, smart homes and self-driving cars are still just at the beginning of their development.

EMF radiation has physical effects on our bodies. Those effects are the easiest to measure because they can be felt quickly like heat and reflex-based responses.
They were the main points for testing when health authorities created the Specific Absorption Rates or SAR levels. 
Unfortunately, the results are either outdated or limited because they don't involve the newest technologies and their long term effects.
Do you remember what phone model or computer you had 10 years ago? What about 20 years ago?
Manufacturing standards have barely changed since then, even though technology advanced by light-years.

Mobile phones and Wi-Fi devices emit pulsed microwave radiation. Our bodies are mostly based on water and minerals. We function because it can successfully communicate via tiny electric signals. This is the language of our nervous system. On the other side minerals like iron can be magnetised.

When physicians were asked about Electro-Magnetic Radiation, about 96% of them believed that EMF radiation can cause illnesses. (EMF Hypersensitivity research, WHO 2006)

More and more people experience mild symptoms like headaches, muscle pains, ear ringings or sleep disturbances.

In 2011, almost a decade ago, the World Health Organisation has classified electromagnetic fields as "possibly" carcinogenic to humans (Group 2B).

See the full report at the bottom of this page. [2]

It can be linked to health problems like diabetes, inflammation, hearing inefficiencies, decreased fertility or even complete infertility in men and women.
Miscarriage, hormonal problems, panic syndrome, various tumours, childhood leukaemia, electromagnetic hypersensitivity and in extreme cases even heart problems or DNA mutation. 

Don't procrastinate too much...

A few decades ago asbestos and smoking were safe. Officially.
The fact is, they were never safe but it took too much time to get results on how harmful they are to our health.

And as a result, authorities had to take reactive measures and find quick solutions to protect people's health and increase their awareness by controlling companies and their marketing campaigns.
But it took decades to get to this stage.

What if we consider prevention?
It will make us proactive and not reactive.

"Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.” Albert Einstein

We see that soon the risks of Electromagnetic Radiation could turn into a scandal.
Because the masses of people are not aware of the hidden risks.

It is a critical moment in time where we can think ahead and focus on preventative measures!
Like switching off our devices or keeping a big distance from them.

But what if there are easier solutions available?

That's why we created the Einstein Brain card, an affordable and effective solution for local EMF protection.

And now it can take less than €100 per card to reduce excess radiation emitted by your phone or other devices. It is a relatively small price to pay when comparing with the high-end smartphones which are actually causing the issue.

Protect the people you love, that's the most satisfying gift!

This offer allows you to freely Mix & Match our cards while receiving Exclusive Bonuses.
The bonuses allow you to get a voucher which you can use on our website in the future. There are 2 categories:

  1.  The €25 and €65 Vouchers allows you to redeem them on our Home / Office measurement service or a future Einstein Brain Card purchase.
  2. The €100 Voucher allows you to spend the entire amount on a Home / Office measurement service which we are launching in 2021.

 

Our next stage launched in May 2021: Home and Office protection

Very important: Even though EMF and geopathic radiations are invisible, it is important to find out how much they are present in our living and working spaces.
Our measurement protocol has been already applied to thousands of homes and offices but a global rollout takes time.

European houses have energy ratings. Also, public buildings in Europe are obliged to have a radiation rating.
What would be the EMF rating of your home or your office?
You spend plenty of time there, but how many times have you measured your living space with quality measuring equipment?

Get clarity on what is invisible.
Our Home and Office Measurement service will be available in multiple countries from 2021 and you can fully redeem your vouchers from their price on our website.

If you don’t believe in radiation, measure it with us!

 

Whether it is the Einstein Brain Card or building protection, our patented SHS-technology is the guarantee behind it. We measure all of our products before release to ensure premium quality.

100% assurance for manufacturing and shipments. Our project is running through InDemand which can give you extra confidence.

Our card production is scalable therefore allows us to ship worldwide from Europe.
Your package is dispatched and delivered by insured shipping companies. After we dispatch your cards you will receive a tracking number via email.

 

The Risks

We have done our best to remove any potential risks from your side.
What does it mean?
Many projects have to collect 5-6 figures in funding to create technological products.
The best thing is: we already developed and ship a working product so we are not dependent on funding.
We believe Indiegogo is a great community with innovative people who care about technology and their health.

You will receive a working product, no matter what!
But it wasn't easy to establish.
We had to organise manufacturing, packaging, shipments, contracts and agreements upfront.

Your delivery will take 7-10 working days to ship and it is exempt from any Custom fees or surcharges.
Delivery times will happen before Christmas but we are aware of the peak package season.
That's why you will receive a tracking code with your order so you will always know where your Einstein Brain Cards are before they arrive to you.

Einstein Brain Cards in Production

You can see our cards in the production phase below.

Team One

We are all One.
A small team with different skills and backgrounds. That's what makes us so powerful.

Our MISSION is to reduce harmful EMF radiation and its effects in our world.

We are ready to expand our global network for partners and distributors. If you are interested in joining our team, feel free to send your interest to contact@einsteinbrain.com

 

EMF Awareness

The place where we can talk freely:
What if there would be a place or an event, like TED talks where experts can present their findings?
At one point, the truth was that "the world is flat". - Dr Debra Davis – PhD toxicologist and epidemiology expert 

Truth can be fragile, naked, but most often hidden. Indeed most of us have a desire to know it. As our world is changing, truth should be constantly updated alongside it.

As a community, we look for relevant and up to date information and researches.
In the same time, we wish to make it accessible for people who wish to educate themselves in the field of Electrosmog and its possible effects.

Our upcoming event will invite leading scientists, professors and experts who share what they have discovered so far. 

"Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth." Albert Einstein

Your Einstein Brain Card purchase will allow you to have a product which reduces unnecessary EMF radiation and also support creating events and further research in the field.

 

 

Resources:

[1] Einstein Brain Card - SAR Measurement Certificate
[2] WHO Report on the Classification of Electrosmog (2011)

Danger From Induction Cooking Appliances

The Wireless Effect in School Rooms

Health and EMF Fields by EU Commission Research
story_txt:
The Underestimated DangerSmartphones, laptops, and tablets are electric devices most people use every day. Some even use smartwatches, baby monitors, or game consoles. But all of us are surrounded by Wi-Fi routers, 3G - 4G, and soon the new 5G towers.They all relate to one thing which is ELECTROSMOG also known as EMF radiation (Electro-Magnetic Field). Everything that works with electricity or radio-frequency emits harmful electromagnetic waves.Every mobile phone's manual tells you to keep your device 2 - 3 cm away from your body. Have you ever read those instructions?The thermal effects above are easy to experience, but there are long term, invisible effects.People often neglect them while using their devices but we should keep them in mind and focus on prevention. Einstein Brain CardEinstein Brain Card is a pocket-sized innovation that effectively absorbs 5G & EMF radiation by its patented SHS-technology.​Our Einstein Brain card offers an all-in-one solution to your electric devices!The active layer inside is based on nanotechnology. This technology can absorb a given spectrum of low-frequency, magnetic, and high-frequency electromagnetic radiation to a healthy level based on research results and our measurements.The components of the card are made under laboratory conditions to ensure premium quality and consistency.The greatest advantage which makes our technology unique is that it does not limit the operation of your devices. Just keep it close to your gadgets and your Einstein Brain card will do the rest!  Proof of EffectivenessWe measured the EMF radiation created during an average phone call and used our card to prove its effectiveness in reducing that radiation.Important: Our card is not a shielding product!Shielding creates increased EMF radiation and could cause more harm than help.That's because shielding mostly just reflects radiation back from its surface. In other cases "shield" promising products should be grounded to lead away built-up charge.However, Einstein Brain Card works differently.It uses a patented technology that combines composite alloy with microorganisms that absorb excess radiation. The card can absorb a given spectrum of low-frequency magnetic and high-frequency electromagnetic radiation emitted by electronic devices.Unit of measurement in the above scenario: mW/m2 
Our Technology is tested and approved
Our technology is tested and approved by the independent Verkotan laboratory in Finland.Measurements were made in “cheek” and “tilt” positions on both the left and right sides of the phantom head. The phone's radiation levels were tested with our Einstein Brain Card and without it. The card has successfully reduced harmful radiation below the healthy SAR level, and by up to 64.8%.See the full report on the bottom of this page. [1]Early AdoptersAs an early adopter, we give you the extra advantage to protect yourself and your loved ones.That's why we would like to reward the fastest action takers.As part of our Global Launching Campaign, we created a special offer for Indiegogo.The retail value of the Einstein Brain Card is €150 per card.However, for a short period of time, we will allow you to get 2 cards with bonuses at a highly discounted price.The price is created for our global launching campaign, so take advantage of it NOW.This card makes it a perfect gift for those who constantly use electronic devices and if you order now, you will receive it within 7 - 10 working days. The 21st Century's intangible pollutionIf we could see EMF radiation, it would look like this:Most surfaces absorb or reflect electromagnetic waves.  Some waves are stronger and can easily pass through objects.  It depends on the wave's type, power and direction. The highest impact is always on the closest surface.Think about a phone call you make or an email which you write on your computer.Who or what gets the most exposure?Yes, it is YOU. The user and its body.Einstein Brain card protects YOU from the excess radiation by absorbing and converting the invisible waves to light heat. It reduces the potentially harmful effects on your body. Health effects of EMF radiationOur environment is changing due to constant innovation. And innovation is great!Although in the past 15 years average radiation increased 350 times... and new inventions like 5G networks, smart homes and self-driving cars are still just at the beginning of their development.EMF radiation has physical effects on our bodies. Those effects are the easiest to measure because they can be felt quickly like heat and reflex-based responses.They were the main points for testing when health authorities created the Specific Absorption Rates or SAR levels. Unfortunately, the results are either outdated or limited because they don't involve the newest technologies and their long term effects.Do you remember what phone model or computer you had 10 years ago? What about 20 years ago?Manufacturing standards have barely changed since then, even though technology advanced by light-years.Mobile phones and Wi-Fi devices emit pulsed microwave radiation. Our bodies are mostly based on water and minerals. We function because it can successfully communicate via tiny electric signals. This is the language of our nervous system. On the other side minerals like iron can be magnetised.When physicians were asked about Electro-Magnetic Radiation, about 96% of them believed that EMF radiation can cause illnesses. (EMF Hypersensitivity research, WHO 2006)More and more people experience mild symptoms like headaches, muscle pains, ear ringings or sleep disturbances.In 2011, almost a decade ago, the World Health Organisation has classified electromagnetic fields as "possibly" carcinogenic to humans (Group 2B).See the full report at the bottom of this page. [2]It can be linked to health problems like diabetes, inflammation, hearing inefficiencies, decreased fertility or even complete infertility in men and women.Miscarriage, hormonal problems, panic syndrome, various tumours, childhood leukaemia, electromagnetic hypersensitivity and in extreme cases even heart problems or DNA mutation. Don't procrastinate too much...A few decades ago asbestos and smoking were safe. Officially.The fact is, they were never safe but it took too much time to get results on how harmful they are to our health.And as a result, authorities had to take reactive measures and find quick solutions to protect people's health and increase their awareness by controlling companies and their marketing campaigns.But it took decades to get to this stage.What if we consider prevention?It will make us proactive and not reactive."Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.” Albert EinsteinWe see that soon the risks of Electromagnetic Radiation could turn into a scandal.Because the masses of people are not aware of the hidden risks.It is a critical moment in time where we can think ahead and focus on preventative measures!Like switching off our devices or keeping a big distance from them.But what if there are easier solutions available?That's why we created the Einstein Brain card, an affordable and effective solution for local EMF protection.And now it can take less than €100 per card to reduce excess radiation emitted by your phone or other devices. It is a relatively small price to pay when comparing with the high-end smartphones which are actually causing the issue.Protect the people you love, that's the most satisfying gift!This offer allows you to freely Mix & Match our cards while receiving Exclusive Bonuses.The bonuses allow you to get a voucher which you can use on our website in the future. There are 2 categories:
 The €25 and €65 Vouchers allows you to redeem them on our Home / Office measurement service or a future Einstein Brain Card purchase.

The €100 Voucher allows you to spend the entire amount on a Home / Office measurement service which we are launching in 2021.
 Our next stage launched in May 2021: Home and Office protectionVery important: Even though EMF and geopathic radiations are invisible, it is important to find out how much they are present in our living and working spaces.Our measurement protocol has been already applied to thousands of homes and offices but a global rollout takes time.European houses have energy ratings. Also, public buildings in Europe are obliged to have a radiation rating.What would be the EMF rating of your home or your office?You spend plenty of time there, but how many times have you measured your living space with quality measuring equipment?Get clarity on what is invisible.Our Home and Office Measurement service will be available in multiple countries from 2021 and you can fully redeem your vouchers from their price on our website.If you don’t believe in radiation, measure it with us! Whether it is the Einstein Brain Card or building protection, our patented SHS-technology is the guarantee behind it. We measure all of our products before release to ensure premium quality.100% assurance for manufacturing and shipments. Our project is running through InDemand which can give you extra confidence.Our card production is scalable therefore allows us to ship worldwide from Europe.Your package is dispatched and delivered by insured shipping companies. After we dispatch your cards you will receive a tracking number via email. The RisksWe have done our best to remove any potential risks from your side.What does it mean?Many projects have to collect 5-6 figures in funding to create technological products.The best thing is: we already developed and ship a working product so we are not dependent on funding.We believe Indiegogo is a great community with innovative people who care about technology and their health.You will receive a working product, no matter what!But it wasn't easy to establish.We had to organise manufacturing, packaging, shipments, contracts and agreements upfront.Your delivery will take 7-10 working days to ship and it is exempt from any Custom fees or surcharges.Delivery times will happen before Christmas but we are aware of the peak package season.That's why you will receive a tracking code with your order so you will always know where your Einstein Brain Cards are before they arrive to you.Einstein Brain Cards in ProductionYou can see our cards in the production phase below.Team OneWe are all One.A small team with different skills and backgrounds. That's what makes us so powerful.Our MISSION is to reduce harmful EMF radiation and its effects in our world.We are ready to expand our global network for partners and distributors. If you are interested in joining our team, feel free to send your interest to contact@einsteinbrain.com EMF Awareness The place where we can talk freely:What if there would be a place or an event, like TED talks where experts can present their findings?At one point, the truth was that "the world is flat". - Dr Debra Davis – PhD toxicologist and epidemiology expert Truth can be fragile, naked, but most often hidden. Indeed most of us have a desire to know it. As our world is changing, truth should be constantly updated alongside it.As a community, we look for relevant and up to date information and researches.In the same time, we wish to make it accessible for people who wish to educate themselves in the field of Electrosmog and its possible effects.Our upcoming event will invite leading scientists, professors and experts who share what they have discovered so far. "Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth." story:
Short Summary

Hi friend!

My name is Bergen and I've been the owner of Vibe Tribe Fitness for the past four years and have been a personal trainer and strength coach for six years. Coming from Bozeman, MT to the big city of Seattle, WA, I set out on a mission to make a positive impact on as many people's health and wellness as I possibly could.

I started Vibe Tribe Fitness back in 2017. Since then, I have built my business as an independent contractor, training countless hours out of other locally owned gyms, and that growth has lead me to this point. 

In that time, I have gotten to know the fitness industry and learned how to run a profitable business. I also learned that there is a large gap in the fitness community that is in desperate need of strong female leadership.

After carefully researching my local area, as well as online fitness communities, I found there is a serious lack of female-owned strength services, and female-owned gyms are virtually non-existent in the state of Washington.

I'm dedicated to being a front runner in a new era. An era in which women are encouraged to build physical strength, and through that, feel empowered in their lives.

Our gym will specialize in one-on-one personal training, with a focus on the following:

1.) Muscular Imbalances

2.) Injury Rehabilitation

3.) Proper Movement Mechanics

4.) Strength Development

5.) Cardiovascular Conditioning

Our main goal is to help people build optimal strength through pain free movement. This will ensure that each of our members will feel safe, supported, and strong! 

Personally, building strength has not only changed my body for the better, but has helped me increase my confidence in myself, and my ability to help others.

With your help, we will be able to properly outfit our gym with the latest equipment in order to give our clients the best results and experience possible.

Empowerment is what we need right now.

Let's build a gym together that is the definition of that.

What We Need & What You Get

Our fundraising goal is $30,000, all of which will go 100% to funding the equipment and renovations necessary to create a fully functional and exceptional gym experience.

In efforts to meet my vision for impacting the health of people's lives, I'm so excited to offer you several virtual fitness and nutritional coaching packages. Your donations will qualify you for these programs. I believe this will not only give you direct insight to our superior coaching strategies, but also personal results to your own health. This allows me to show you the benefits of what we do, as well as create further connections with each and every one of you.

Additionally, if you are a current client, or not in need of virtual coaching, you can also donate freely just because you love our vision and what we stand for.

The Impact

I believe this is what not only our local community needs, but also women everywhere. The fitness industry needs more strong women to stand in these spaces and help impact the health of as many people as we can reach.

There is no doubt in my mind that our gym will stand out as true professionals in our industry, and help create a movement more towards empowerment and encouragement.

Together, we will grow build a tribe this world has yet to see!

Risks & Challenges

With any business, there is always a few risks and challenges that we face. Luckily, much of this is reduced based off my current clientele. 

As stated above, I have had my business for four years and have developed a loyal and substantial clientele, so I don't have the typical "Start-Up" risks. The biggest challenge has been finding more space for them. Hence, our own gym is needed. 

The biggest challenge we face is raising the funds needed to outfit the gym with the proper equipment, which again, is the reason we are raising funds through this platform.

With your help, and the help of our current customers, we will raise the money necessary to make this gym a reality.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't in a position to currently help financially, THAT'S TOTALLY OK!

You can still help us out by sending this link to three friends you think would be interested in contributing.

Thank you so much friend! I appreciate you!

story:
Gajo Makes Staying Hydrated & Following a Healthy Lifestyle Easy

In these challenging times of COVID 19, we need to stay on top of our health, and one easy way to do that is by tracking our water intake with Gajo. The Gajo pad and app can help you monitor your water intake to ensure you drink enough water each day.  

Along with reminding you to drink water, the Gajo pad will track your coffee & caffeine intake for the day. We all love coffee, it helps us get through the day or give us a kick in the afternoon, but according to the CDC caffeine consumption (up to 400mg per day)  is about 3-5 cups of plain coffee. Do you drink more than that? 

How Gajo Works

Building a daily water habit is tough. That’s where Gajo comes in. It has a sleek design and fits naturally into your daily routine. Gajo is lightweight, roughly the size of a coaster, and designed to complement your home décor.

It is easy to set up, download the app, and you can set up your device in a few minutes. Place the Gajo device on a flat surface like your desk or nightstand, then place your glass, cup, mug, or water bottle on it. As you consume your drink, the device graphically tracks how much has been consumed. It seems like magic, but it’s just a great design that helps you stay hydrated.

 

Gajo reminds us to drink water throughout the day by visually tracking water intake. Gajo keeps us informed about our water intake so we never have to worry about becoming dehydrated. As well as keeping track of your coffee and caffeine intake. 

Why did we create Gajo?

As we have gotten old we realized how important it is to take care of ourselves. That all starts with good habits, being active, eating right, taking care of mental health, and finally how much water we drink and caffeine we drink. 

Our mission is to create products that help people live a healthy lifestyle, we empathize with your wellness journey and want to build items to make that path simple as well as effortless.

It started with the 3 of us and as we extended team of 22 professionals is spread across 2 continents, 5 countries, and 18 Cities.

We are not amateurs, we have a combined 80 years of embedded system experience, 60 years of product design & UX, 50 years of the supply chain, 45 yrs. Of marketing & 60 yrs. Of health & wellness experience.

Gajo product features 

At

At launch the Gajo app will:

  • Automatically track your water with the pad
  • Manually add water 
  • Earn points for hitting goals 
  • Create groups to motivate each other 

What will you get?

  • Gajo Pad 
  • USB-C Cable
  • Instruction Manual

 

Gajo Rewards:

Super Early Bird

Early Bird

Base Indiegogo

 Add-ons Products

Press Kit

 Download Here 

Risks and challenges

The team understands the risks and challenges of the production process, which is why we perform rigorous testing of all embedded systems, firmware, and apps before launching them to market. It's Gajo's first Kickstarter campaign, but the team combined has over 80 years of embedded system development & testing experience, 60 years of product design & UX, and 50 years of supply chain experience. Unexpected issues may arise, and if they do, we are confident to deal with them with clear communication and transparency at the top of our priorities list. Supply Chain & Logistics: We are confident of not only delivering a quality product in your hand but creating a unique fulfillment experience for you. We have experience in all facets of the supply chain and logistics. The team has an in-house mass production mold designer, and we have partnered with a local supply chain expert, global custom agent, and 3td party logistic firm(s).

story:
As Eddy Murphy's song "Red Light" suggests, a crisis that stops us in our tracks is also an opportunity to pause, reflect and perhaps proceed more wisely than we had been travelling on life's journey.

I allude to Janice Gurney's story (she's mentioned anonymously) in an article I published months before I campaign was conceived. Read it here:  http://news.wikinut.com/Eddie-Murphy-s-Red-Light-,-Charlie-Hebdo-s-legalistic-liberal-red-line/ixpzcuyc/.


Janice was the proverbial "life of the party" before she was "parked" by Parkinson's disease.

A polymath, Jan's amazing appetite for life and learning is powered by an Edwina Currie-like drive and curiosity.

Beginning in 2007 Jan was slowed down by Parkinson's disease. And when she broke her ankle in 2012, she was 'parked' literally.

(You can read Jan's reflections on the torture of "akathasia", an inability to "move" and "do", here:  http://jleargurney.blogspot.co.uk/).

But a born fighter Jan is used to thriving through adversity. Turning obstacles into stepping stones, she's allowing the loss of her speech and mobility to teach her the power of silence, the virtue of patience and other fundamentals of spirituality. 

Among other things Jan's visual art instincts have flourished - as the digitally created paintings depicted below demonstrate:




(See more of Jan's work at this link: http://www.artyjazminco.com/)

 And she is sounding the depths of what faith in God and one's self could mean.

Jan is an inspiration to women, men, girls, boys: everybody!

Parkinson's disease isn't stopping her party. Its restrictions of her speech and movement have partly effaced but not erased her charming, witty personality.

Moreover, a formidable business woman, Jan is capitalizing on Parkinson's adversity.

She's facing Parkinson's challenge head-on, documenting her experience and leading her own campaign to improve the medical community's knowledge of and response to this and other "red light", life limiting diseases.

With the help of Intelek International founder Junior Campbell and others in her small Parkinson's Party Team, Jan is pioneering a holistic, 'faith and reason reconciling' approach to treating and/or healing people suffering from Parkinson's and other forms of disease.

Our goal is to improve understanding of the causes of Parkinson's and ensure that sufferers of all faiths and none have the fullest possible access to the fullest range of remedies.


PLEASE SUPPORT US

So, please Jam with Jan. Give generously to this cause.

This is a "red light" crisis-opportunity to do good.

To show our appreciation for your support, were offering prints of Jan's digital artwork in return for your donations (see perks).

Join Jan's amazing journey. Help one-time windsurfer Jan blaze a trail celebrating life and the power of faith as "tiny as a mustard seed".

We're trying to raise £1,500,000 in the first instance, a third of which (1/3 x £1000000 =  £500,000) will go toward covering Jan's health care costs for five years (estimated at £240 per day x 365 x 5 = £438,000).

The remaining £1,000,000 and all monies raised subsequently will go toward the holistic health research dimension of the project (I can only apologize for incorrectly indicating that the initial goal is £1,000,000. Unfortunately Indiegogo does not allow us to edit that part of the dashboard.). We're currently exploring the possibility of pursuing this in collaboration with a number of universities.

More details will be made available once definitive agreements on these and related matters are reached.

While being mindful of the need to protect our work from intellectual property violations, our intention is to make this project an exemplar of principles of accountability and transparency.

Read it here:  http://news.wikinut.com/Eddie-Murphy-s-Red-Light-,-Charlie-Hebdo-s-legalistic-liberal-red-line/ixpzcuyc/.Janice was the proverbial "life of the party" before she was "parked" by Parkinson's disease.A polymath, Jan's amazing appetite for life and learning is powered by an Edwina Currie-like drive and curiosity.Beginning in 2007 Jan was slowed down by Parkinson's disease. And when she broke her ankle in 2012, she was 'parked' literally.(You can read Jan's reflections on the torture of "akathasia", an inability to "move" and "do", here:  http://jleargurney.blogspot.co.uk/).But a born fighter Jan is used to thriving through adversity. Turning obstacles into stepping stones, she's allowing the loss of her speech and mobility to teach her the power of silence, the virtue of patience and other fundamentals of spirituality. Among other things Jan's visual art instincts have flourished - as the digitally created paintings depicted below demonstrate:(See more of Jan's work at this link: http://www.artyjazminco.com/) And she is sounding the depths of what faith in God and one's self could mean.Jan is an inspiration to women, men, girls, boys: everybody!Parkinson's disease isn't stopping her party. Its restrictions of her speech and movement have partly effaced but not erased her charming, witty personality.Moreover, a formidable business woman, Jan is capitalizing on Parkinson's adversity.She's facing Parkinson's challenge head-on, documenting her experience and leading her own campaign to improve the medical community's knowledge of and response to this and other "red light", life limiting diseases.With the help of Intelek International founder Junior Campbell and others in her small Parkinson's Party Team, Jan is pioneering a holistic, 'faith and reason reconciling' approach to treating and/or healing people suffering from Parkinson's and other forms of disease.Our goal is to improve understanding of the causes of Parkinson's and ensure that sufferers of all faiths and none have the fullest possible access to the fullest range of remedies.PLEASE SUPPORT USSo, please Jam with Jan. Give generously to this cause.This is a "red light" crisis-opportunity to do good.To show our appreciation for your support, were offering prints of Jan's digital artwork in return for your donations (see perks).Join Jan's amazing journey. Help one-time windsurfer Jan blaze a trail celebrating life and the power of faith as "tiny as a mustard seed".We're trying to raise £1,500,000 in the first instance, a third of which (1/3 x £1000000 =  £500,000) will go toward covering Jan's health care costs for five years (estimated at £240 per day x 365 x 5 = £438,000).The remaining £1,000,000 and all monies raised subsequently will go toward the holistic health research dimension of the project (I can only apologize for incorrectly indicating that the initial goal is £1,000,000. Unfortunately Indiegogo does not allow us to edit that part of the dashboard.). We're currently exploring the possibility of pursuing this in collaboration with a number of universities.More details will be made available once definitive agreements on these and related matters are reached.While being mindful of the need to protect our work from intellectual property violations, our intention is to make this project an exemplar of principles of accountability and transparency.

story:
The donations will be used to takeover and build out a group fitness facility in San Diego. We have a group of positive trainers and health coaches ready to make fitness fun for all levels. Boot-camps, yoga, personal training and more will be available to the surrounding community. We have an exciting 1500 sq ft. location perfect for a training facility, right next door to our existing nutrition club business. This is the perfect opportunity to help people through fun, affordable fitness and nutrition coaching. The one stop shop for all of your health and fitness needs!

I have been training clients for almost 10 years and have clients all over the world.  Joining forces with some of SD's top group instructors we have the passion, experience and drive to provide more for the community.   Not everyone can afford personal training, but with our group fitness model we can help more people and make group training much more accessible to a bigger market.  You get a fun, highly effective circuit training workout, with a personal training feel, at a very reasonable monthly fee.   Your donations will help us get the doors open and build out our facility so we can start our big advertising campaigns and build the membership base!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Steve Stedman, a software developer, database administrator with over 25 year of experience with SQL Server databases. I am also a volunteer firefighter and EMT.  I have spent the last 4 years building Database Health v1.0, then Database Health Monitor (for SQL Server) v2 with 10 major beta releases so far.  I need your help to fund the next beta version.

The problem that database administrators and developers face is that over time their databases outgrow the hardware, and you are left with the choice of throwing money at purchasing more hardware, an alternate to that is performance tuning your database to run faster and do more with the hardware you have. Database Health Monitor helps with that performance tuning.

Database Health Monitor for SQL Server is a tool that database administrators use to get more out of their SQL Server reducing or delaying the need to purchase more hardware, while improving the overall performance of their database.

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking to raise $1500 (us dollars) to help offset my costs in developing and marketing the next beta release of the product. In the next beta I plan to do the following:

  • Development work adding 2 additional reports.
  • Bug fixing, both bugs reported by customers, and crash reports automatically submitted to the system.
  • Additional writing and development of help files and web content, at least 15 new documentation pages.
  • Performance improvements to make the program run faster.
  • Marketing to increase brand awareness.

Those who contribute will receive the following perks depending on the level of contribution.

  • Weekly email update for all contributors.
  • Early beta release access to all contributors at the $15 level or above.
  • Software license code to use the product to all contributors at the $25 level or above, plus benefits of the $15 level.
  • 30 minutes of online training with Database Health Monitor to all contributors at the $150 level or above. Includes benefits of the $15 level

I have kept my goal here small, with just what I need to get the next beta done.  If somehow this campaign doesn't reach the entire goal, the funds will be split over the above bullet items with a larger percentage going to the marketing to increase brand awareness.

The Impact

Over the last 4 years I have treated this as a hobby. The beta releases of Database Health Monitor have been run at over 1700 locations worldwide, with 300 of those using the product over the last 90 days. Database Health is at the point that I can no longer treat it as a hobby.

This product was built out of necessity for me. I have needed this product to regularly tune database performance, often times not being able to justify the cost of purchasing new database hardware. Often times in a large organization the cost of the SQL Server database may be in the $10,000 to $100,000 range and beyond. Database Health monitor helps the programmers and database administrators get more out of that database hardware investment.

Here are some comments from users of Database Health Monitor:

  • Just downloaded your tool. It rocks! -From San Diego, CA
  • #DatabaseHealth showed 5 LongRunningQueries, …  a bit of Index Consolidation and execution time went down from 2 mins to 2 secs! Thank you for the tools! 
  • Hi, I think your project is AMAZING.
  • Just downloaded Database Health … So far excellent work and thanks for sharing with the community.
  • I really dig being able to view the code by double-clicking it in the “Debt By Object”
  • That’s pretty dang cool!  (Referring to the SQL Technical Debt analysis).
  • Excuse my language but that's ***** amazing - it's instant! Wow, good work :)
  • The entire application is so much more responsive, can't believe it. The new colour is fantastic too, really changes the whole 'quality' feel of the application.
  • First of all I would like to thank you for a great tool. I’m using it to monitor >70 instances and over 7000 databases.
  • Just downloaded it myself and gave it a try. Awesome program!
  • The software is really good, I am using very regularly to audit and performance tune the SQL instances that I administer. Managed to knock a third of a large SSIS pipeline's runtime just from using the historic waits section today.
  • You and your team have done some really nice work.

With Beta 11, I will be focusing on how to bring this great product to more users. The marketing budget will be used to promote brand awareness, and for advertising through search engine and social media marketing.

Risks & Challenges

With this being the 11th beta release of Database Health Monitor, there are very few risks and challenges in the release of that beta, as I am not new to releasing updates to the product.

Where the risks and challenges exist is in the marketing effort, using appropriate search engine and social media marketing to drive the brand awareness. I plan to address these risks by walking slowly, doing small experimental marketing campaigns, measuring their success with the goal of coming out of Beta 11 with a solid reproducible plan to show if we spend X dollars on Y marketing, we will produce Z customers.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t contribute money at this time, here are some additional ways that you can help with this campaign and the success of Database Health Monitor.

  • Follow @DatabaseHealth on Twitter, spread the word on the product
  • Connect with me on LinkedIn to help spread the word: http://www.linkedin.com/in/stevestedman
  • For database administrators and programmers, download the product and try it out. Please send me your feedback. http://DatabaseHealth.com
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word of this campaign

And that's all there is to it.

I would like to thank everyone for contributing to the success of Database Health Monitor.

-Steve Stedman

story:
UPDATE: I REGRET TO INFORM YOU THAT MY MOM PASSED AWAY ON THE 4TH FEBRUARY AT 10PM. 

Thank you to all who have advised that their contribution can be put towards medical costs already incurred and funeral costs.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Dear everyone, 

My name is Julita. This is a picture of my mom - Madeliene (68yo)  when I visited her in April last year in St Lucia. She has always been a very family oriented person, and has always been a great support to all.  Life will never be the same without her.  I have never even thought of doing this before for a matter so personal to me. I plucked up the  courage as it can probably make a difference in helping my Mom with the much needed medical assistance to recover from a stroke which has caused her to have a brain hemorrhage and induced  a coma. 

She is based in St Lucia and the doctors have given her a 50-50 chance! As you can probably imagine not having the NHS like the UK means all medical has to be privately funded.  I was informed that the ICU unit costs about £2000 per day!  By the end of tonight this would be Day 1.   We are unable to find any space in the ICU unit in the General Hospital as of now, which will cost a lot less.  We are praying that this situation changes soon.

She has a brain hemorrhage and we have been told to wait to see what happens! How long is that possible at £2k per day! To make matters worse in St Lucia we do not have a neurologist on the Island.  A neurologist flies over once every month, the next is due to visit at the end of February!

I need any help from a  neurologist/specialist who can suggest or provide some means through which she can be helped or if anyone can contribute to make it possible to get Medical treatment that she needs. We lost our Dad in 2012 and she is all we have left. 

For anyone who can assist in any small way so we can have our beloved mother restored to health, I would be eternally grateful. Many thanks

Update as of 4Feb:

We have now been given an initial estimate of €30,000 Euros for an Air Ambulance to the closest island Martinique and for an initial deposit for the hospital.  My original funding request has now been exceeded by these initial costs.

story:
60-90% of inmates commit crimes within three years of release.  Imagine a different world - where upon release, ex-cons become contributing members of society. The Prison Freedom Project (PFP) is creating this change through yoga.  And YOU can help!

Short summary, BIG Reality

Globally, incarceration rates are at an all time high. The costs of incarceration weigh heavily on government budgets and more importantly, the statistics tell us that prisons don’t work. Going to prison increases, not decreases, the chances of committing a crime. Overwhelmingly, prisons are not rehabilitation centers but places of violence, shame and punishment. In the words of an inmate currently enrolled in the Prison Freedom Project:

YOU can help us to break this cycle and build healthier individuals and safer communities right now. Support a very simple approach to rehabilitation.
Support the Prison Freedom Project.

Why The Prison Freedom Project?

TRUE freedom is an inside job. We provide inmates with the tools of yoga and mindfulness practices - through classes, correspondence courses and mentorship.  With regular practice, they develop self-awareness, forgiveness and personal responsibility. This experience is so profoundly transformative, that they are inspired to share these practices with their fellow prisoners.

The strength of this project is that it’s self-seeding.
We teach one yoga class.
An inmate is inspired.
He receives the free manual, starts to teach himself and then to teach others.
One inmate can inspire hundreds! It’s simple.

After participating in the PFP, the likelihood of re-offending upon release is dramatically reduced. Quantifying this reduction is part of our long-term plan, however there is no shortage of evidence of the deep qualitative impact we have already had on a myriad of individuals.

Your support will help us to:

  • Expand –We currently hold five weekly classes in three facilities. We want to teach 12 weekly classes in five facilities by 2016.
  • Produce materials  - EVERY person we reach receives a free Teach Yourself Yoga booklet. One booklet costs $1. We hand out approximately 100 per week to new students. Internet access is not a privilege for prisoners.
  • Course Development - $35 takes one inmate through our six month Correspondence Course. Printed materials reach facilities we are unable to access, spreading the programme further.
    It will cost an estimated $55 for an inmate to complete our teachers training course.
  • Train & support volunteers - We love our volunteers, their selfless giving is priceless, help support their placement and travel costs.
  • Evaluate – We need to demonstrate the effectiveness of our program through monitoring and evaluation as to sustain the programme, we require proven results
The impact: True stories

We’re so inspired by the transformation taking place. These are just a few of the experiences shared by PFP participants in their correspondence with us.

 

Who we are

Brian and Leela are the founder and co-founders, and along with a family of magnificent volunteers, we make up SevaUnite’s Prison Freedom Project. SevaUnite is a registered not-for-profit with PBO status. The Prison Freedom Project is in it's fifth year of operation.

Get involved: There are so many ways to support this campaign

  • Make a donation - Just $10 can assist 10 inmates with our free Teach Yourself Yoga Booklet.
  • Spread the word - Share the campaign with your social media network. People often want to help, they just don’t how, or where to go. Talk about this project with your friends and family.
  • Based in South Africa? Interested in volunteering in a correctional facility? Reach out to us, we can make it happen

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The LIPAVI sous vide racks

The LIPAVI racks are now on sale on Amazon.com and Amazon.co.uk

For more information go to LIPAVI.com

The LIPAVI racks keeps the pouches separated from each other by a 15 mm space, enough to ensure a water stream to pass so that the warming is even for all pouches. It's also adjustable for different thickness of the pouches. The capacity of the water vessel is utilized to maximum. It's collapsible too - it saves space when not in use. It's the only rack in the market that has all these properties.

These racks are made for the modern, demanding sous vide cook.

Please observe: Transport to your home address is included within USA and EU.

Different models for different requirements

Improve your sous vide cooking

  • ensure even warming and high quality by holding the pouches separated
  • enables full use of the capacity of your water bath
  • enable easy and safe handling of the pouches in and out of the water bath
  • adjust the distance for different thickness of the pouches
  • simple and easy to use
  • collapsible - takes little space in the kitchen when not in use
  • made of stainless steel 201
  • works with all kinds of equipment like immersion circulators, ordinary water baths, kettles, slow-cookers, rice-cookers end even smoke- and steam-chambers

Our website: www.lipavi.com

Facebook: www.facebook.com/pages/LIPAVI/1579234852316968


Enhance your sous vide cooking!



Easy to adjust and use


Just put each of the dividers into the slots and the rack is ready to use. Its handled safely by the lifting handles that are folded down when not in use. 

We need the support of food enthusiasts! 

We will send a rack to all the food enthusiasts that support us. Find the model you need! 

Transport to your home address (within EU and USA)  is included. The distribution is performed by Amazon Multi-Channel Fulfillment services.

Your support is very valuable to us

We need food enthusiasts who start using our products and tell their friend about us! 

We have made a first production 1.000 racks and they are currently on their way to Europe and the US. Early backers will get their rack from these shipments, and more racks are in progress. Deliveries are planned to start already this month (March).

Who are we?

We are a group of food and sous vide enthusiasts from Norway, Sweden and China and we simply found that there were no good racks in the market for sous vide. 

We experimented and made different racks and at last we arrived at a construction that met all our requirements.

So now we have a new product that we believe that many sous vide enthusiasts have been looking for. 

We need pioneers who like to try new products and tell their friends about them!

Samples of the racks have been tested by several food enthusiasts and their feed-back is unanimously positive.

We are determined to produce and distribute quality products. We do 100% quality control and have been particular in setting up a robust logistic chain and distribution channel. 

One of the founders. Libo Pang, lives in China. He he supervises both quality control and logistics at the manufacturing plant. This gives us a high level of control.

Our biggest challenge is the marketing of our racks. We need you to help us!

You may ask why we established the company i the UK while we live in other places? The reason is simple: UK is a business friendly country and close to our markets. Almost everything, except for quality and manufacturing control in China, are done with computers anyway. We have our legal address and book keeping in the UK. Mansell & Co, Bishop's Stortford, is our accountant. It's close to the airport with Ryan Air also. Our bank is Handelsbanken, Bishop's Stortford. It has proven to be a very practical arrangement.


You Can Help Us by telling your friends

Please tell your friends about our campaign! Your support is very important to us!

Remember that you can tip off your friends by simply using the Indiegogo Share Tools!
story_txt:
The LIPAVI sous vide racks
The LIPAVI racks are now on sale on Amazon.com and Amazon.co.uk
For more information go to LIPAVI.com
The LIPAVI racks keeps the pouches separated from each other
by a 15 mm space, enough to ensure a water stream to pass so that the warming
is even for all pouches. It's also adjustable for different thickness of the
pouches. The capacity of the water vessel is utilized to maximum. It's
collapsible too - it saves space when not in use. It's the only rack in the
market that has all these properties.
These racks are made for the modern, demanding sous vide cook.
Please observe: Transport to your home address is included within USA and EU.
Different models for different requirements

Improve your sous vide cooking






ensure even warming and high quality by holding the pouches separated
enables full use of the capacity of your water bath
enable easy and safe handling of the pouches in and out of the water bath
adjust the distance for different thickness of the pouches
simple and easy to use
collapsible - takes little space in the kitchen when not in use
made of stainless steel 201
works with all kinds of equipment like immersion circulators, ordinary water baths, kettles, slow-cookers, rice-cookers end even smoke- and steam-chambers


Our website: www.lipavi.com

Facebook: www.facebook.com/pages/LIPAVI/1579234852316968




Enhance your sous vide cooking!









Easy to adjust and use





Just put each of the dividers into the slots and the rack is ready to use. Its handled safely by the lifting handles that are folded down when not in use. 
We need the support of food enthusiasts! 



We will send a rack to all the food enthusiasts that support us. Find the model you need!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Dr Yvonne Murphy and i got an Entrepreneur Business Visa from fabulous NZ immigration to grow and teach a new healing/wellness/animal communication modality called Divine Clearing 3 years ago. Now NZ has informed me that i have not earned enough money and i must leave NZ or show them i can generate another $30,000 and pay taxes to get residency by March 24th 2015.  
This is my life work as a "Healer Idealist" to teach and spread new ways of health care. NZ is perfect ground to write and work from, as well as teach internationally by Skype and email. (I am registered as a Doctor of Chiropractic for the past 24 years in the USA.)
Divine Clearing is growing steadily as we reach more animals and children and their adults! I need your contribution today please?

What We Need & What You Get

I need to show $30,000 income and pay the relevant tax and insurance to stay in the country and continue my work, i have no-where else to go! (I am happily volunteering my Doctor of Chiropractic services in India at the moment to village children!)
 I am registered a a Doctor of Chiropractic in the USA for 24 years. 

I have been using my 6th sense all my life, i was healed from a life threatening condition 30 years ago by asking the Great Mystery for help. This developed into Medical Intuition during my 20 years busy chiropractic years in USA and Ireland , when I specialised in pediatrics, cranial, birth trauma release and animal adjusting.

My work has evolved over the past 15 years into a unique way of healing called Divine Clearing, because i found other approaches too narrow.

When i ask the Greater Power or Mystery for help, not only is the problem solved, but everything related is cleared back to the beginning of time. My dream is that this Divine Clearing method will be for the new race of man, who does not want a limited therapist trying to save them!

If i do not reach my goal the funds will support me to relocate and grow Divine Clearing elsewhere! ( Money needed for new website and airline ticket back to NZ to resume teaching and treating horses and their families and homes, and for food and transport and insurance and business expenses.)Thankyou.

The Impact

Money will help fund my work in India with village children in Tamil Nadu, where i am currently working; and will buy my ticket back to NZ to share the gifts of Indian spiritual healing there. I will be able to pay my taxes and insurance in NZ and continue sharing info with doulas, midwives, nurses and Drs as well as people in the animal industry who need gentler ways to be with their racing animals. Lots of info and testimonials on new web site www.divineclearing.com. Funds will help completion of website with Indian developer. (Blog www.divineclearing.co.nz)

Risks & Challenges

I am also requesting my international client base to prepay some Skype sessions so i will have money in my Paypal account to pay bills for the NZ immigration process. My income has been low because i have been paying all the necessary medicals and accountant reports needed in the residency immigration process to a new country! And growing a new business takes money every day! There is so much need in India that i cannot not contribute there! It has been an exciting journey and proves to me the power of Faith in the Great Mystery that always helps when sought!. And using the Power of Command to get what we need immediately always works too!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please let others know who may work with children,families or animals as they may need help growing the New Race of Mankind! Or those who need a miracle cure for their pain and suffering, there are many testimonials to the power of Divine Clearing on new website www.divineclearing.com.

campaign_city: Auckland, Wellington and Wanaka, New Zealand

story:
On the 25th of April 2015, our planet gave us a little surprise. It left 3000+ people dead, 8000+ injured, 40,000 homeless and many missing in Nepal. The 7.9 magnitude earthquake that hit Nepal has left a lasting impact on the small landlocked country and has been a traumatic experience both phisically and psychologically for the people living in Nepal and outside. 

Natural disasters are inevitable, but how we deal with the consequences are completely in our hands. Nothing has been more painful than watching our own home reduce to nothing but ruble within a matter of hours. 

We hope we will be able to help this beautiful nation in whatever way possible.

The 7.9 magnitude earthquake that hit Nepal has left a lasting impact on the small landlocked country and has been a traumatic experience both phisically and psychologically for the people living in Nepal and outside. Natural disasters are inevitable, but how we deal with the consequences are completely in our hands. Nothing has been more painful than watching our own home reduce to nothing but ruble within a matter of hours. We hope we will be able to help this beautiful nation in whatever way possible.

story:
HELMINTHS:  YOUR MISSING OLD FRIENDS


Who are we?

We,  Detlev Goj and Judy Chinitz,  are founders and CEOs of the two premier providers of non-pathogen helminths in the world today. Both our organisms have empirically shown that they are capable of training weak immune systems, helping to restore normal function.  We are joining forces in order to get government regulatory approval for these two kinds of non-pathogen helminths. 

WE BELIEVE THAT THESE HELMINTHS (HDC AND TSO) ARE PROBIOTICS!  IN ORDER TO PROTECT YOUR RIGHT TO OBTAIN THESE NATURAL PRODUCTS, AND TO GET THEM EASILY AND AFFORDABLY ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD, WE NEED GOVERNMENT APPROVAL TO MAKE THE PROBIOTIC DESIGNATION OFFICIAL!

Both of us came to the world of helminths through our role as parents.  Judy's son, Alex, is profoundly autistic and has suffered from a variety of immunological issues since infancy including inflammatory bowel disease and immune deficiency.  In his 21 years of life, very few things have helped...but helminths (Detlev's product, TSO) made a huge difference. Judy had first read about helminths and their proposed use in immune disease in an article in the NY Times, back in 1999, but for many years was unable to buy a commercial product.  When she was finally able to get Detlev's helminth, in just a few months Alex went from always sitting by himself in the basement, rocking back and forth on a swing, to being a happy and social boy who ran to the kitchen table to blow out the candles on his birthday for the first time in his life.

Judy then devoted herself to looking for a way to make helminths affordable and easy to get for everyone. Thus, in 2013 she joined forces with two others, an MD and a PhD, with the same vision, and co-founded the company Biome Restoration Ltd (www.biomerestoration.com), which provides HDC (Hymenolepis diminuta cysticercoid) at a very reasonable cost.

Detlev's story is similar. Years ago,  an inoperable brain tumor was found in his son that was located right next to the hypothalamus wrapped around the optic chiasm. Despite  radiation therapy, the tumor kept growing. Detlev started looking into possible new options, one of which was the idea of an immunological approach. He was already working with live biological organisms and was the first to develop (along with his team at Biomonde, in Germany) a good manufacturing process (GMP) for live blowfly maggots, for the treatment of chronic wounds. Detlev searched the international medical database and found an article written by Dr. Joel Weinstock and his colleagues (1998) about their idea of using  the helminth, Trichuris suis, to stimulate the human immune system and teach it to attack the right targets - not its own tissue.  Weinstock et. al were working on inflammatory bowel diseases, but the principle idea seemed very logical and could possibly also apply to other autoimmune diseases. In 2003, Detlev sold his maggot business and joined forces with doctors at the University of Iowa, establishing the company, Ovamed. Tragically, his son died before anything new was developed to help him. However, Detlev then devoted himself to get helminth therapy approved as a medicine, established partnerships with various companies and initiating numerous international clinical studies with TSO. While the first clinical studies at Iowa University (IBD), Wisconsin University (MS) and Mount Sinai (autism) showed remarkably good results, following studies done in partnership with the pharmaceutical industry failed to demonstrate clinical efficacy.  This was  due to a change in the original formula, inactivating the TSO.  Going forward, Detlev's company, Tanawisa (www.tanawisa.com), is producing TSO in its original and highly effective formula.

2015:  new regulations should now allow TSO and HDC to be approved as novel food supplements. 

Taking helminths to the next step - getting official governmental regulation of TSO and HDC as probiotics - is a cause we are both more than passionate about.

WHAT ARE HELMINTHS AND WHY DOES EVERYONE NEED THEM?

Your body is a complex ecosystem: for every human cell, there are at least ten other organisms that live in and on you. We have a microbiome, consisting of bacteria and other microbes - and we should also have a macrobiome, comprised of more complex life forms, which include a family of organisms called helminths. A helminth is the native animal life of all mammals. Our modern lifestyles (i.e. our use of toilets, our highly purified water and food, etc.) have led to a near-complete lack of exposure to helminths, which, in turn, is responsible for a pro-inflammatory shift in the human immune system. Some scientists now believe that the loss of our macrobiome is the most important factor behind the modern epidemic of autoimmune and allergic disorders.

Many chronic diseases were not present in our ancestral environment, and are still absent in the least modernized inhabitants of the developing world. Most of these diseases are attributed to a dysfunctional immune system. Immunological diseases such as multiple sclerosis, ulcerative colitis, Crohn’s disease, type 1 diabetes, autism, lupus, and even allergy and asthma, as well as many others, were conspicuously absent in our ancestors. In a very real sense, these are man-made diseases. So what lies behind this modern health crisis?

It is thought that, in the industrialized world, we live a life that is too sanitized for our own good. It is now becoming clear that lack of exposure to our old friends, higher organisms like helminths, is the driving force behind the developing epidemic of autoimmunity and immune dysfunction.

HDC (Hymenolepis diminuta cysticercoid) is grown in the common mealy worm beetle. There's nothing to see when you take them - 1 ml of what looks like water and tastes like very salty water.  These organisms are considered MUTUALISTS - that means that you benefit and, in their native hosts (rodents), they also benefit. (In humans they die rapidly.) Up until about 75 years ago or so, prior to modern food handling practices, HDC was likely fairly common in our food supply, as grain beetles were regularly found in unprocessed grains.  HDC is still common in less developed countries even today, where grains and other foods are not highly processed and frequently eaten raw. 

TSO (Trichuris suis ova) is the microscopic small egg of a pig whipworm.  Mankind has been in direct contact with Trichuris suis, ever since people domesticated pigs. Pig farmers today are often continually exposed to them.There have never been any reports of medical problems coming from Trichuris suis in humans. Like HDC, there's nothing to see - you just drink a little bit of a water-like liquid. 

In all places where people have eradicated these old friends, allergies and  autoimmune disorders are on the rise.

Taking HDC and/or TSO every few weeks replaces recreates a normal macrobiome.  In fact, there may be great synergy between our two products.  HDC live in the small intestine and TSO live in the large, so taken together, you have a complete macrobiotic solution.  Both organisms, as they're not native to humans, die in about 2 weeks and get fully digested like any other food - so, you just replace them once or twice a month. 

WHAT WE NEED:

We need about 200,000 Euros (about $230,000) to get EU regulation of our two helminths, TSO and HDC, officially proclaiming them to be probiotics.

If we don't reach our funding goal, the money we raise will remain in a joint fund.  We will continue to work together to achieve this goal.

    THE IMPACT

    How will getting official probiotic status for TSO and HDC change the helminth world for the better?

    Lots of ways!

    Firstly, we can guarantee that we will forever be able to send you helminths, without fear of governmental interference at some point.  Secondly, Detlev will be able to radically lower the costs of TSO under the novel food category as a probiotic, making a complete biome solution super affordable for everyone.  And talk about getting helminths easily - health food stores, supplement stores, etc. can start to carry these healthy products around the world!

    RISKS AND CHALLENGES

    In order to minimize risk, we obtained an 18-page professional statement from a law firm in Germany that specializes in food and drug law and regulations.  This firm has confirmed that, due to better elaboration/clarification of the European Commission of the novel food category definition, it is now possible to get non-pathogen helminth organisms approved as probiotics. However, it requires hiring a professional company - a clinical research organization (CRO) or similar - to prepare and present the application to the Commission for approval. We then provided this legal statement to a well-known and reputable CRO in Germany, asking for their opinion. They entirely agreed with this legal statement and offered to develop and present this application for us. Last but not least, we have sent this question about  possible approval under the novel food category to the national German agency in charge of novel food applications and received an answer indicating that if the organism meets the requirements as explained in our legal opinion paper, such application can be successful.

    The only remaining, and rather unlikely, risk is that the Commission may deny this approval.  In this case, it will be up to us to provide scientific evidence supporting the fact that both helminths meet the regulatory requirements, which we strongly believe that we can.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    How can you help? Donate!  And get the word out!  Those of you who have had major health benefits from helminth use - please, help Detlev and Judy ensure that forever, everyone everywhere can have access to these remarkable organisms.

    Email us your stories!  We'd love to post them here!  (Anonymously of course.)  And send this link to everyone you've ever met...and beg them to help.

    With deepest gratitude,
    Detlev and Judy

story:
Who is Green Thumb Juice and our story.

We are Rich & Lacey Adrian from Hamilton, Ontario. In January 2014 we embarked on a journey to better health. Each of us had an arms length long of medical ailments and we just wanted to be healthy for ourselves and our children. We watched a film by Joe Cross called Fat, Sick and Nearly Dead, which changed our lives forever. Since January 2014, Rich has lost over 120 pounds and stopped taking all medications. Lacey has lost over 110 pounds and has not had any vasculitis flareups since juicing and stopped taking medications as well. Overall, since juicing and our lifestyle changes, we have lost over 250 pounds combined and continue to juice and eat healthy.

Last May 2014, after returning from Camp Reboot at the Omega Institute in upstate New York, which was hosted by Joe Cross and his team at Reboot with Joe, we decided to purchase a used FedEx truck and convert it to a juice truck. Our vision is to help others get on a healthy path and offer healthier food choices. With a food truck we can reach that audience and travel as well. We were set to start in late July 2014 as we awaited the completion of our food truck. After receiving our truck back we had many mechanical problems and the fabrication of our truck was not done correctly. We decided to return the truck back for a refund and obtain another truck. Some illegal activity followed on behalf of the dealers we purchased the vehicle from and we did not receive our money back and the truck was unusable on the road. 
Our persistence and dedication to the juicing community and to helping others has enforced us to reaching our goals. With your help we can help change the world and bring healthy juices, smoothies and vegetarian/vegan food curbside. The plus side to having a food truck is mobility, and being able to reach different markets in different locations. 
Where are your donations going and what are you getting in return?
Our goal is $25,000
  • $6000 to purchase a new truck
  • $4000 to customize truck
  • $4000 for new equipment, including blenders, refrigerator, freezer, oven and cooktop.
  • $3000 for generator needed to run day to day operations
  • $3000 for permits and licensing
  • $5000 for paint, vinyl wrap, natural gas installation and hood vent, and any repairs the truck may need to be road safe
We are proud of the accomplishments that we have achieved and we want to help others do the same. With a nutritious diet, fitness and a positive mindset, people can live a healthier and more productive lifestyle. We have teamed up with Goodlife Fitness to help make that happen. With your help we will help you with free juice, smoothies, vegetarian and vegan food, gym memberships and some really awesome swag. 
The Green Thumb Juice Vision
Our vision is to spread the juicy cheer. We simply love juice and juicing is a passion that we firmly believe in to help with chronic illness, getting in your daily fruit and vegetable intake, and living a more healthier lifestyle. We love to educate people on the power of fruits and vegetables and have done many different events to show our passion and vision. Some events include: The Hamilton Spectator Nutrition and Wellness Expo 2015, The Santa Cause 2014, Food 4 Kids Gala 2014, Roxborough Park School Nutrition Program. just to name a few. We have also introduced juicing to about 1000 of our friends, family and strangers and look to increase that number with our business. We have offered juice cleanses as well with significant results and people have walked away with knowledge and a better understanding of their food choices and also felt great after their cleanse. 
Other ways you can help us reach our goal
Word of mouth and social media is the best form of advertising. We ask that you share our campaign through facebook, twitter, instagram, etc. You can also find us on those platforms as well, find us, like us, support our cause. 
On Facebook: www.facebook.com/GreenThumbJuice
On Twitter: www.twitter.com/GreenThumbJuice    @GreenThumbJuice
On Instagram: www.instagram.com/GreenThumbJuice   @GreenThumbJuice
Visit our website for more information:
www.greenthumbjuice.com
Once again, thank you very much for your support and we look forward to seeing you out on the road in the coming months. Green Thumb Juice crew!
#GreenThumbsUp - Official hashtag of our campaign. Use this to spread the word!

If you are looking for motivation, inspiration and help with juicing or are interested in more information and would like to join a supportive, non-judgmental group, join our facebook group, Juicing101.ca at www.facebook.com/groups/WeLoveJuicing/ or our other fitness/wellness group, The Juice Warriors at www.facebook.com/groups/TheJuiceWarriors/
