A single donor contributing 100 USD would get a "thank you" card  containing the"family with the stove" photo via email.

After three months from the date of installation of the stove, each donor would get an email report on "how the stove has impacted the life of the beneficiary?".




The Impact


A donor funding a Servals Stove Package(SSP)  to a household in Tamil Nadu will help the women  in kitchen breathe in a cleaner environment

 The donor will help save more than 35  trees per stove package during the stove's lifetime.(considering TLUD alone)


 It will also save 10 hours every week for the women to spend usefully 
which otherwise would have been spent collecting firewood.
A 
single TLUD stove reduces emission by 2.5 tonnes per year(considering 
charcoal) and a single Surabi will reduce emission by 1 tonne per year.

We intend to pilot 100 stoves to  jump-start the campaign of  converting "one-kitchen-at-a-time" into "clean kitchens"
100 Servals Stove Packages in a cluster will help in warding off more than 250 to 300 tonnes of carbon di-oxide 
from entering the atmosphere.
A 100 stove cluster can generate 1 tonne of 
charcoal every month which will give fillip for a new livelihood/economic activity
 for the household women.
The success in Sunderbans is a testimony to the fact that we have been able to change the lives of people through stoves .http://www.biochar-international.org/sites/default/files/Servals-Sapient_TLUD_Pilot_Study-Sunderbans_project.pdf
http://www.slideshare.net/ashiq25/earn-while-you-cook-sunderbans-project-achievements

 Risks & Challenges
The main challenge is to make the user get adapted to the new clean stove as "the familiarity" with traditional stove will make the household women to stick on to the old stove even though the latter smokes. 
As the user gets acclimatized to the cookstove usage patterns and observes the convenience factor in real time, the user will slowly revert from the old traditional stove.This challenge will be broken by incentivizing the user via sale of the high-grade charcoal generated in TLUD stove. The user will be 
able to collect 10-15 kgs of charcoal towards end of every month.

  Help Spread the word of Servals through social media campaigns in case 
you cannot help gifting the stove to a household woman in Dhanushkodi.

Some of our product videos created by our associates/partners :

story:
Moving organ donation matching into the 21st century

 

Hi , I'm Dr. Robert Moore. For over 25 years, working as a primary care physician, I have witnessed the anguish that family members and friends have endured when they are waiting in need of an organ donation. Although there have been tremendous strides made in improving the system of donor/recipient matching, it is clear WE MUST DO BETTER.

Our goal is to use social media networks and computer facial recognition software to optimize organ/bone marrow donor matching

 

GeneSetMatch is out to change the way donor matches are made.

For a person to be an eligible tissue match, he or she needs to have compatible immune system genes. These Human Leukocyte Antigen (HLA) genes come in different types, similar to blood types, but more complicated. Just as it is important to only receive blood of a compatible type, transplant patients can only receive tissues from a person with a matching HLA type. Previous studies have shown that these HLA genes and their chromosome 6 neighbors may influence facial characteristics and other visually perceived traits.

 

GeneSetMatch is developing innovative software that will link facial features with HLA types.

Using state of the art machine learning algorithms and high performance computing techniques, we will develop software tools that use facial features to predict HLA types. This will allow a person in need of a bone marrow or organ transplant to search an online source of potential matches that is thousands of times larger than traditional donor lists. By HLA typing more individuals, we can expanding our training and testing sets. This will allow us to create more accurate and precise computational models.

 

What We Need From the Community

We are setting a initial funding target of $54,000. The majority of funds will be spent on HLA typing participants. Supervised machine learning methods require large training and testing sets, so we will need to HLA type hundreds of individuals. As funding grows over our initial target, it will allow us to continue to refine our methods by HLA typing more people. At this stage, coding and computing time is already funded.

 

Benefits for the Community

Although we are not offering any specific incentives for this campaign, we feel the entire project is beneficial to the community since the GeneSetMatch system and accompanying app will be free for users. This will allow those who do not have social media accounts to search for possible donor matches using our powerful software in real time.

 

Our Impact

We will be able to significantly improve the process of organ donor matching by utilizing social media networks and facial recognition software. Regardless of our funding, all of us connected with GeneSetMatch will continue to be working in the area of improving healthcare delivery assisted by bioinformatics and computer science.

 

Many thanks to Brian Switzer for making the project video.


 

Other Ways You Can Help

Although you might not be able to financially contribute at this time, you can help by sharing this project with your family and friends.

story:
The Cancer Driveline is a newly-formed not-for-profit organization in Victoria, BC , Canada aimed at offering free transport for cancer patients undergoing any form of diagnosis, surgery or treatment, both during and post their procedures. The service is targeted at people who do not readily have access to family, friends or neighbours who can drive or accompany them to cancer treatment centers. In particular, the service is used by the elderly, those who live alone, the very sick and those of limited financial means. The ride itself is obviously of great importance to our clients, but we find that the company of the driver to and from their treatments is of equal value. We service the Greater Victoria area from Sidney to Sooke, Monday to Friday, 6 am - 6 pm.

Our drivers, for the most part, have been volunteers for some time and are professional and caring individuals. Many are retired and have time on their hands and enjoy contributing to this service. All drivers are required to have a full license, a clean abstract and $3 million third party insurance coverage.

The estimated cost for running this valuable business is $35,000 for the first year. This will cover the rent and overhead costs, mileage, office equipment and insurance. Everyone involved here are unpaid volunteers. Rest assured that all the money raised will be used conscientiously for the clients' benefit. 

We understand that not everyone can contribute financially, but you can also help in other ways, such as passing this information along to your friends on social media or volunteering with us! We always need good drivers and dispatchers.

story:
Who we are?


Intimate Melody is a design-centric brand founded on the belief that life is better with a sexy twist. We have 4 key designers who have years experience in world-famous sex product enterprises, then left and established our brand, Intimate Melody. We have more than 6 years mature experience of design and sales on vibrators. We design products not only to provide an enhanced pleasure, stronger physical connections for women and men, but also provide a good price to stand on the behalf of consumers, in order to offer more opportunities to let more women and men to enjoy various and healthy sexual life.


What is LAVA? Why LAVA? 

Our team spent more than 1 year to devote to designing and developing LAVA, the innovative vibrator with HEAT FUNCTION and THREE individual massage sticks, which can perfectly get to different G points and enhance sexual pleasure. This is pretty rare on the market because we provide customers way more sexual orgasms via one product. 


Development of a good vibrator is not easy. LAVA focuses on how to improve customer experience, which requires deliberations on design, touch, and deep understanding of customer needs. We had more than 10 experimenters to try or initial modes and collected their feedback to get the final product, LAVA. And this is why Intimate Melody team spent more than 1 year conducting research and tests. We want the best design which perfectly fits human physical structure.We pursue creative design,  good quality and also customer's satisfaction.


LAVA is not only composed of THREE independent massage sticks catering for different sexual needs, it  is also equipped with IMITATED HUMAN BODY HEATING FUNCTION technology offering truer sexual experience. And with simple concise interface and middle-size design, LAVA can be easily changed into different stimulation varieties.



  




Product Installation & Specifications



What We Need & What You Get

Unlike other INDIEGOGO's campaigns, what you are seeing is the final product of LAVA, we have around 500 pieces in hand but we need more fund to  go further to complete the order  and we need to know the voice of the market, so this is why we hold the campaign, because we want to stand on the top of the world to let customers see us and get responded. We will deliver the first five hundreds LAVA around this October, while the rest may take longer time, around November. But please have faith in us, we are already a small company and we are not only idealists, we are also practitioners! 

$10,000 will cover the tools and materials that we still need to purchase and the necessary funds for fulfillment and the infrastructure to build this business into a larger size. The funds raised through this campaign will help to secure the purchase of the rest molds, rest material costs,  and get the LAVA Vibrator to a larger production in time for Christmas 2015.

Other questions:

Q: Can I back this project anonymously?

A: Absolutely, Indiegogo allows you to donate money to a project anonymously. Just check the “Don’t display my name on the campaign page.” box when you go to donate!

Q: Is LAVA body safe? 

A:Our product is made of medical grade silicone, considered to be the highest standard of sex toy materials. It’s non-porous, easily washable, and hypoallergenic

Q: Is LAVA waterproof? 

A:Yes.

Q:Do you ship discreetly?

A:Yes,we do.All packages will arrive in a plain yellow box.

Q:Can I be support anonymously?

A:Yes,you can ! You can click and choose "hide my name on the campaign page." 

Q:How else can I assist you?

A:Comment on the campaign,or use social sharing buttons at the top.It would mean the world to us you did it,even you didn't support us financially.Every share will help us a lot!

story:
Summary

   Hi, my name is Pony R. Horton. Years ago I began developing the idea that would become the Scrubbee Shimmee™ you see here today. After numerous injuries to my back, I had a lot of pain and range-of-motion troubles, not to mention simply wanting a more natural way to scrub my back.



   The Scrubbee Shimmee was inspired by, of all things, the now long-gone "Mine Train Thru Nature's Wonderland" at Disneyland; specifically the scene in Bear Country of the bear scratching his back on a tree!!!






   The product adheres to the shower wall using any of a number of types of double-face adhesive tape; we will be recommending 3M Command Strips™ as the tape of choice, and we are in discussion with 3M to partner with them to add the Command Strips to each package.
   Now THAT'S the RIGHT IDEA!

Why not use suction cups instead? My research has shown that most suction cups are simply not strong enough to hold up against the weight of an adult leaning on and rubbing against the device, and will quickly pull away from the wall. As well, many showers today have a pebbled or textured surface in their tiles, and many don't use tiles at all but rather use stone, redwood, gloss-painted drywall, etc. Suction cups won't work with such surfaces, but 3M Command Strips DO, and disengage cleanly when it's time to remove the Shimmee.

After ten years of research and testing, finding out what did and did NOT work, I am now ready to bring the Scrubbee Shimmee to market!!!
I have filed for Trademark and Copyright on the Scrubbee Shimmee™, and it is Patent Pending.


This campaign is to finish the prototyping and final testing, and filming ad spots, for the Scrubbee Shimmee. If we reach our stretch goals, we'll be able to go into mass-production. We already have the factories chosen for the production runs, as well as packaging, shipping and order delivery at the ready for individual and commercial sales through our partner, DirecSource, Inc.

This is my first invention as a consumer retail product. It's important to me for the personal reasons mentioned above, and I can't help but feel it will make life just a little bit easier for those who use it, especially the elderly and those with injuries, pain issues, and even missing limbs.
   I really love the idea of making life easier for people.

The initial 3D test print.



What We Need & What You Get


We are needing to raise $25,000. in order to...

$1,200 - Create the initial 3D-printed prototypes. These will be used to create molds for the initial filming units, in other words, the physical Shimmee units to be used for the slick TV and web spots.

$10,000 - For the actual production of initial TV and Web Spots and Infomercials.

$1,000 - Small perks/giveaways, such as Fridge Magnets and Custom "Scrubbee Shimmee Shower Girls" Playing Cards.

$5,000 - Perk Fulfilment including shipping.

$5,000 - Office/Shipping space

$2,800 - Taxes, salaries, misc. expenses.


Our perks are primarily to be the Product itself, IF we reach our Stretch Goals.

Perks for this early campaign include Custom Playing Cards and Wall Posters (downloadable) with our lovely Shimmee Girls (or Boys, your choice) in sexy, attractive poses using the Shimmee in the shower; Fun Images of YOU in our upcoming 1950's Surf Themed ad images looking just like our Models will in the actual ads (Think the old Frankie and Annette surf movies, with girls and guys "surfing" while Shimmee-ing to great old surf riffs!)

And just to be weird, for the lowest donor levels of a mere $5 I am offering to send you one of my TWO great food recipes... my World Famous Spaghetti (Apollo 12 Lunar Module Pilot Al Bean LOVES this recipe!),

OR my Amazing, Mouth-Watering Deviled Egg Salad Sandwiches recipe, GREAT for lunches!!!!




If we do NOT reach our final goal, and funds raised will go to...

Creation of the 3D Prototypes...

Lower-Budget Video Spot production, fewer models.

And

Fulfilling the Poster, Recipe, and Custom Surf Pictures perks.

If we reach our STRETCH Goals, the Scrubbee Shimmee will go right into it's initial mass-production run.


    The Impact


    This invention is of great value in that it will make showering and bathing easier for those with movement troubles, or anyone who wants a more FUN and NATURAL method to get clean.
    It is my firm belief that this product will be seen in showers around the world in a few years. It'll be as normal as the soap caddy hanging from the shower head.



    Risks & Challenges

    The risks in this endeavor are small but present; mostly making sure the sponge attachments have the strength we envision. Currently the design features a rubber-backed sponge attachment that can be replaced, cleaned, switched out for a different sponge or material, etc. This attachment will be affixed to the Shimmee body by simple tabs and will hold based on the rubber acting as a grip on the tabs. If it proves less than perfect, we will add hook-and-loop tabs to the body and the sponges.

    Another challenge will be to see how well the Scrubbee Shimmee sells. If it does well, the 3M partnership will move forward, as 3M has certain minimum unit numbers per order. If not, the consumer will be required to purchase Command Strips or other double-sided tapes or caulking adhesives of their choice.

    It is likely that either scenario would have only a small effect, if any, on the retail price of the Scrubbee Shimmee.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
    • PLEASE use the Indiegogo share tools!

    THANKS!!!!!!

story:
Take Time to Exercise your Soul

Do you wish you could just disconnect from the world for 10 minutes? Tried meditation, but could never get it to work, since you couldn't turn off your mind? Zen masters and Hindu Yogis definitely have it all over you, since they seem to have all this time on their hands to be professionals at zoning out...

Now there is a connected device that can whisk you away from the distractions around you – co-workers, social media, your phone, even your loved ones (who love to monopolize every microsecond of your time).

Introducing Xoggl (shaw*gul), the augmenter of senses, the modern answer to metaphysical meditation. By isolating and brilliantly stimulating your primary senses, it uniquely and visibly enables deep, healing expansion of consciousness, even if you only have 10 minutes. Xoggl features a pair of goggles (why do they call it a pair, if it's only one thing?) that fills your entire field of vision with bright, saturated, animated LED colors. Not only do they transform your sight, wearing them tells the outside world “Do not disturb, I'm getting my Zen on”. Sight is not the only sense ignited – the Xoggl system coordinates with meditation specific music, pumped into your ears with premium earbuds. Finally, touch rounds out the sense augmentation through a bass transducer belt that literally excites you by vibrating the healing frequencies of your meditation music throughout your body. 

Xoggl 1.0 system components - Bass Belt, Earbuds and the LED Goggles

What about smell and taste? We're sure you can handle that yourself (we suggest some lovely aromatherapy oils and some Skittles, but that's again up to you).

Xoggl 1.0 system features

The Xoggl system will have two distinct meditative modes – a connected mode that features music and light programs professionally (or user) designed to enable any existing or yet to be created meditation method, from beginner to advanced (from basic relaxation to raising your Kundalini). These programs will be available for download (free and fee based) from the Xoggl web portal / mobile device app. The second mode will allow you to upload your favorite meditative music to the Xoggl and experience it through the unique tone and vibration visualizer. New age synths aren't your thing? Well, upload some metalcore and exercise those demons! For the high energy types, upload some dubstep or electrohouse and you'll never be the same.


Our Early Adoptors can choose their own adventure:

EA Perk 1 supporters will receive the Xoggl 1.0 system, ready for use with pre-loaded basic meditation programs and ability to load and visualize / feel your own music.

EA Perk 2 supporters will become developers. This perk will be a full development kit for those that wish to create their own meditation light and sound programs. You can then submit these to be featured on the Xoggl web portal and mobile device app. (Requires signed development agreement).


So yes, you will be augmenting yourself by putting on goggles, wearing earbuds and strapping what looks like a weightlifter belt around your waist. But the sense transformation is amazing, enabling you to enable your mind and body to center, heal and relax in the few minutes in your day you're able to dedicate to meditative practice.  

Risks & Challenges

This project wasn't dreamed up overnight. Xoggl is the result of over a year of conceptualization, prototyping, software and hardware development and research into many meditative modes. Although I am confident in this product's realization, there are some risks:

  • Production level hardware / software need to be sourced / completed.


  • My team needs to be assembled (marketing, finance, app development - if you're looking to collaborate, email me!).
Once these easy hurdles are cleared, we will be set for a fantastic launch in 2nd Quarter 2016. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't commit to the perks, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Support by donating $10 for a cool Xoggl shirt. Tell your friends how to pronounce it!

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word to your friends and followers!

Features sounds by J.S. Epperson, an amazing artist of meditative music and guided meditation.
story_txt:
Take Time to Exercise your Soul 
Do you wish you could just disconnect
from the world for 10 minutes? Tried meditation, but could never get
it to work, since you couldn't turn off your mind? Zen masters and
Hindu Yogis definitely have it all over you, since they seem to have
all this time on their hands to be professionals at zoning out...

Now there is a connected device that
can whisk you away from the distractions around you – co-workers,
social media, your phone, even your loved ones (who love to
monopolize every microsecond of your time). 
Introducing Xoggl (shaw*gul), the
augmenter of senses, the modern answer to metaphysical meditation. By
isolating and brilliantly stimulating your primary senses, it
uniquely and visibly enables deep, healing expansion of
consciousness, even if you only have 10 minutes. Xoggl features a
pair of goggles (why do they call it a pair, if it's only one thing?)
that fills your entire field of vision with bright, saturated,
animated LED colors. Not only do they transform your sight, wearing
them tells the outside world “Do not disturb, I'm getting my Zen
on”. Sight is not the only sense ignited – the Xoggl system
coordinates with meditation specific music, pumped into your ears
with premium earbuds. Finally, touch rounds out the sense
augmentation through a bass transducer belt that literally excites
you by vibrating the healing frequencies of your meditation music
throughout your body. Xoggl 1.0 system components - Bass Belt, Earbuds and the LED GogglesWhat about smell and taste? We're sure you can

story: We need water polo gear! We're the New York Water Polo Meetup/Brooklyn Wets. Our caps, balls, and goals are falling apart. We need new equipment, especially as we hope to move into new practice facilities in Brooklyn!

story:
What happened ...

To cut a long story short, I recently found myself out of work (and therefore without health insurance). Whilst looking for a job I decided to help a friend's aging parents do some work around their home. In the course of cutting fire wood (more specifically, tree branches) with a machete I accidentally hacked into my left hand. Fortunately nothing was severed, but the cut went to the bone and was only stopped by bone.

At the time, because I knew I didn't have insurance I wanted to try and take care of it myself, but my friend's family insisted on taking me to accident and emergency. I received 6 stitches and antibiotics to prevent a potential blood infection. Two weeks later I've received a bill for €565.90 (to which there will be attached "penalties for each day of delay" in paying). I'm requesting the money in USD because for some reason I'm unable to link my PayPal account to this campaign, which is required for EUR.

While I know this is not an outrageous medical bill, but it is something I just cannot afford as I have no savings. Even if I found a job tomorrow, the bill would continue to rise while I'm waiting for my first paycheck to come through. If you can help me pay this bill so that it doesn't become some larger debt that I'll be paying off for months to come would be greatly appreciated.

I'm only trying to raise enough to cover the medical bill. I've been told that I'll need some sessions of physiotherapy to regain full use of my left hand, but for now this is something I'll have to do without, or try my best to do by myself. If the goal isn't met, anything raised will still go towards paying the medical bill. If by some good fortune more than the goal could be raised, I'd put that towards the cost of physiotherapy sessions.

All I can offer you unfortunately is the satisfaction of helping someone out of a situation that could soon become unmanageable, if it's not dealt with soon. I'd like to be able to offer anyone who would be willing to help me something, but right now it's a struggle to keep a roof over my head while searching for work.

Thank you for reading and thanks in advance for anyone who can help me get out of this jam!

story:
Welcome to my event fundraising page! I am fundraising for First Descents, a nonprofit that provides life-changing outdoor adventure programs for young adults impacted by cancer. 

I was diagnosed with a brain tumor on August 12th, 2013.  I had surgery on September 6th.  I was unable to speak, relearning to speak.  At first I couldn't do more than do a thumbs up/thumbs down!  But gradually, with the help of my sister Laurie, a speech therapist, I regained my ability (or lack thereof) of normal talking. 

One thing that helped me was taking part in this First Descents.  It was the first time to get out of my parents' hair (just kidding!).  It was an eye-opening experience!  I was blown away by Jackson Hole, and the diversity of cancer patients and cancer survivors! FD taught me through kayaking that I could still feel a thrill of life go through me. I made some friends (some that are currently helping me with this!) and I miss them and wish them all the luck in the world.  I want someone else to experience what I experienced, so please donate!  Cancer survivors getting a chance to have fun for a week, kayaking, rock climbing, and surfing!

Thank you so much for donating some of your time and money! 

Kip "Manhands" Lamers

story:
The team at tottalrenew are a group of friends who have been in business separately for over 20 years.  A year ago a common goal that bought them together is  hair loss, each of them experiencing thinning hair themselves or having family members and friends who have thinning hair.

This exciting product has been developed by the team at tottalrenew to bring you a safe instant cosmetic solution for mild to moderate hair loss.  

It is 100% effective and works in around 60 seconds.

The micro fibres are made from pure plant keratin and are so easy to apply.  Just shake onto the area of thinning hair, gently pat and with a quick spray of ANY firm hold hair spray – it will give you a full head of perfect hair all day. 

Quite simply, your help will mean that we can make this product available for everyday people at everyday prices.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We have raised money to research thinning hair and the effects this can have on everyday life.
  • We have researched similar products that are on the market and different costs.
  • With your help we can begin our production at a price that is affordable for everyone; giving more people the opportunity to regain their confidence and have a full head of perfect hair... all day.This is John, before and after tottalrenew.  
tottalrenew  hair fibres give you a fuller thicker head of hair in seconds, blending  seamlessly  with your own natural hair.
You can support the campaign through a number of different perks ranging from receiving our newsletter, to enjoying the difference our product can make to your life or the life of a loved one to enjoying a fantastic UK Spa Break with a tottalrenew travel pack included.
One of the additional challenges at tottalrenew is to create a larger range.  Our micro fibres are currently available in a range of different colours and in the future we would also like to develop the 'highlighter mix kit' which will be smaller bottles of two to three colours for highlighted hair  and the 'discreet bag kit' which will see tottalrenew hair fibres in a beautifully discreet black or brown case.

Another challenge is to make more people aware of our product and to get them to discuss thinning hair and hair loss without embarrassment.
We would like to encourage people to offer solutions to each other, like tottalrenew and to get people to support our product, not just through Perks but also through a social media rumble so that we, at tottalrenew, can offer this product to more people at a more competitive price each and every time.
FAQ's

Who are we?

We thank you for your support.

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Ich bin seit über 30 Jahren in Forschung & Entwicklung von Medizinprodukten tätig.
Für das Produkt zur Stärkung des Herzmuskels habe ich auf alte Wissenschaften aus der Forschung  zugreifen können und deren wissenschaftlichen Vorsprung nutzen können.

Jetzt ist die Wirksamkeit durch Ärzte & Studien über Jahre bestätigt worden.
Das diätetische Lebensmittel ist jetzt mit allen Inhalststoffen zur Produktion fertig und kann mit einem Aufwand in Höhe von 40.000 Euro produziert, abgefüllt und in den Markt eingeführt werden.

Mit Ihrer Unterstützung kann ich das Produkt herstellen lassen. Mit Ihrer Unterstützung tragen Sie zum Wohl aller bei.

Wer von diesem Hilfsprodukt begeistert ist kann diese Projekt gerne weiterempfehlen. Nutze dazu u.a. SocialMedia und das Tool von Indiegogo.

I have been working for over 30 years in research and development of medical devices.
For the product to strengthen the heart muscle, I have access to old science from the research of the German Democratic Republic and use their scientific projection.

Now the efficacy by physicians and studies has been confirmed over the years.
The dietetic food is now ready with all Inhalststoffen to production and can be produced at a cost of 40,000 euros, bottled and launched on the market.

With your support, I can be manufactured the product. With your support, you contribute to the good of all.

Who is excited about this auxiliary product this project can be happy to recommend. Use to i.a. Social Media and the tool of Indiegogo.

story:
Cheap clean water for millions

As seen on (and many, many more!):

 Bug-killing book pages clean murky drinking water

Filtering a new idea: A book that's educational and "drinkable"


Background

The most recent United Nations figures are that 663 million people do not have access to clean drinking water.  The silver nanoparticle filter paper technology in the Drinkable Book was invented by Dr. Theresa Dankovich for her Ph.D. research at McGill University to try to help with this problem. 

Teri started working on this in 2008 and its been incredibly exciting to see it move out of the lab. Teri's Ph.D. showed that the technology kills 99.9999% of bacteria under the ideal circumstances of the laboratory.   


Out of the lab and into the field

Next, Teri went to the University of Virginia for a postdoc at the Center for Global Health to test her papers in Africa.  Field studies in South Africa showed that the papers work with the more complex chemistry of real world water. The papers were even able to reduce bacterial levels in the dilute raw sewage serving one community down to the levels found in U.S. tap water.  

Around that time the nonprofit WATERisLIFE approached Teri to make the Drinkable Book video. Most scientists never get to tell the world about their great ideas so the video was an incredible opportunity.  We've been amazed at how many  people have responded and been interested in  solving the global water crisis!


Partnerships and pAge Drinking Papers

Donations to WATERisLIFE and to our related crowd-sourced funding campaign allowed us to test the papers in Ghana, Haiti, India, and Kenya with WATERisLIFE.  These preliminary field studies showed that the papers kill bacteria in a variety of waters from throughout the world.   



The work with WATERisLIFE was featured at an exhibit at the United Nations headquarters earlier this year!  The Drinkable Poster!


The video also led to our being contacted by the nonprofit iDE, International Development Enterprises. iDE has thousands of people working in dozens of countries and specializes in human centered design and providing products to the poorest people in the world.  This summer Teri and her students traveled to Bangladesh to work with a team from iDE-Bangladesh to learn what Bangladeshis from a dozen communities with a variety of backgrounds thought about the technology. 

We were really amazed at how positive everyone was about the technology. Its very important to us that we not impose what we as outsiders believe is an answer, but rather that we engage local communities and provide ethical and community accepted solutions.  


Finally, we were contacted by Luke Hydrick, an incredibly talented design student from the University of Cincinnati School of Design. For his senior thesis project, Luke created a variety of filter holder designs and made prototypes for testing in Bangladesh.  Luke joined our team for the trip to Bangladesh and is refining his designs based on the feedback from the communities.  For the project to be successful the filter holder design must not only effectively hold the papers but also much be easy for users to understand and use correctly.


To handle all of this activity we've created a nonprofit called pAge Drinking Paper.  We've registered in the state of Pennsylvania and filed 501(c)3 paperwork with the U.S. IRS.    

The work has garnered a lot of positive exposure in places all over the world: Canada, the US, Mexico (below), the Netherlands, Germany.  We even had someone raise money for our work with a dogsled race!  


The Next Step: Scaling Up

While we ultimately want to be able to provide water to 10s to 100s of millions of people, we must first do development work to create a practical product and to demonstrate that it works in the hands of users in faraway countries.  Right now all the filter papers are made by hand by Teri or a student in a local church kitchen.   The next step in the project is scaling up production and field testing to distribute filter papers to 100s to 1000s of people.  

The biggest limitation to the project at this time is funding.  Paper manufacturing costs money.  Travel to far away countries costs money.  In-country personnel require salaries.  Most of all, since Teri completed her work at UVa, the project has entirely been funded by crowdsourcing, and all our work on the project has been done on a volunteer unpaid basis. 

Ideally we would like to perform a field trial of the papers for 1-2 months in about a dozen villages.  We will work with other nonprofits with local expertise and in-country staff to evaluate the papers' performance.   We will evaluate source water quality, the quality of the filtered water, and the effects on human health.

Project Funding Goals

$30k, two villages, one month: for $30k we can get the equipment, paper production, travel funding, and personnel time to test the papers in two villages for about a month. 

Additional money would allow us to test papers in more villages and for longer amounts of time. 

$150k, about a dozen villages, 1-2 months each village: our ultimate goal is to test the papers in a variety of locations to demonstrate that they work with a variety of waters and in a variety of communities. 

Donation Levels

$10 is about how much it costs to manufacture one book by hand.  We're aiming for a price of <10 cents per filter paper after scale up, so ~100 papers.  We expect pilot scale production costs will be higher.  
$20=2 books, ~200 papers
$50=5 books, ~500 papers
$100=lab supplies
$1000=a bacteria incubator and related supplies, a substantial portion of the salary for in-country personnel, travel to the project country
The largest costs for this project are the time and equipment for planning and executing the pilot scale paper production, the human health assessment, the water quality assessment, and travel to- and operations in- a country on the other side of the world.  That is, the majority of costs at this time are not the physical paper itself or the paper treatment, but rather the necessary work that must be done to assess that the papers are effective.  We do not sell the papers at this time because without such a proper assessment we would not find this ethical.  

The Impact

Someday we would like to have these papers in the hands of the poorest people throughout the world.  But before we can get to 1 million we have to go through 1,000.  We will be applying for governmental research grants but the turnaround time will leave us unable to move the project forward for half a year to a year.  If we can raise money through crowdsourcing the project will be able to continue moving forward: the first pilot scale production run will be made and field trials to evaluate the effect of the papers will be performed.  


Risks & Challenges

Scaling up from bench scale production and small field trials to a pilot plant and a dozen villages will require overcoming a variety of unforeseen challenges.  Working in countries on the other side of the world creates a variety of challenges.  Over the past several years we have developed partnerships with a diverse array of very talented people and organizations. Each is highly qualified in its own area, whether paper manufacturing or community health field projects.   We also maintain the flexibility to engage additional experts with abilities outside our own area.


Other Ways You Can Help

Unlike software projects, we cannot deliver health benefits without providing physical papers to kill waterborn pathogens and paper costs money.  But some of the most important advances to the project have come from social media sharing.  We have been introduced to all of our remarkable partners through word of mouth and online social sharing.   And just as importantly, we believe that clean water should be provided to everyone in the world, and we hope that sharing our idea will lead to more projects like ours. We are in competition only with sickness and encourage support for any and all public health and WASH - water, sanitation, and health - campaigns and technologies.  


FAQ

1. Sorry we are not offering perks for this campaign, we're simply too busy doing science, engineering, and health work, all strictly in our spare time.  
2. We cannot send copies of The Drinkable Book or any filter papers to funders.  We'd love to be able to offer it as a perk but its not possible for a variety of logistical and legal reasons.  Most of all because we're saving all the filter papers for poor people who need them. 
3. We are not selling papers or Drinkable Books at this time.
4. We have no staff and read all emails personally.  If we are slow to respond please bear with us.  If you send something mean or otherwise harassing we will not respond, but you will, on a personal level, make one of us a bit sadder about the world.
5. Teri absolutely loves it when younger people send nice emails. Her favorites have been the really positive nice messages from school kids, teenagers, and Girl Scout Troop 510. 
6. We're partnering with the good folks at Willy Wonka to develop a blue-raspberry flavor just as soon as we can get Johnny Depp or Gene Wilder to agree to serve as a spokesperson.

Donations to WATERisLIFE and to our related crowd-sourced funding campaign allowed us to test the papers in Ghana, Haiti, India, and Kenya with WATERisLIFE.  These preliminary field studies showed that the papers kill bacteria in a variety of waters from throughout the world.   





The work with WATERisLIFE was featured at an exhibit at the United Nations headquarters earlier this year!  The Drinkable Poster!


The video also led to our being contacted by the nonprofit iDE, International Development Enterprises. iDE has thousands of people working in dozens of countries and specializes in human centered design and providing products to the poorest people in the world.  This summer Teri and her students traveled to Bangladesh to work with a team from iDE-Bangladesh to learn what Bangladeshis from a dozen communities with a variety of backgrounds thought about the technology. We were really amazed at how positive everyone was about the technology. Its very important to us that we not impose what we as outsiders believe is an answer, but rather that we engage local communities and provide ethical and community accepted solutions.  



Finally, we were contacted by Luke Hydrick, an incredibly talented design student from the University of Cincinnati School of Design. For his senior thesis project, Luke created a variety of filter holder designs and made prototypes for testing in Bangladesh.  Luke joined our team for the trip to Bangladesh and is refining his designs based on the feedback from the communities.  For the project to be successful the filter holder design must not only effectively hold the papers but also much be easy for users to understand and use correctly. 
To handle all of this activity we've created a nonprofit called pAge Drinking Paper.  We've registered in the state of Pennsylvania and filed 501(c)3 paperwork with the U.S. IRS.    

The work has garnered a lot of positive exposure in places all over the world: Canada, the US, Mexico (below), the Netherlands, Germany.  We even had someone raise money for our work with a dogsled race!  



 
The Next Step: Scaling Up
While we ultimately want to be able to provide water to 10s to 100s of millions of people, we must first do development work to create a practical product and to demonstrate that it works in the hands of users in faraway countries.  Right now all the filter papers are made by hand by Teri or a student in a local church kitchen.   The next step in the project is scaling up production and field testing 
to distribute filter papers to 100s to 1000s of people.   The biggest limitation to the project at this time is funding.  Paper manufacturing costs money.  Travel to far away countries costs money.  In-country personnel require salaries.  Most of all, since Teri completed her work at UVa, the project has entirely been funded by crowdsourcing, and all our work on the project has been done on a volunteer unpaid basis.  Ideally we would like to perform a field trial of the papers for 1-2 months in about a dozen villages.  We will work with other nonprofits with local expertise and in-country staff to evaluate the papers' performance.   We will evaluate source water quality, the quality of the filtered water, and the effects on human health. Project Funding Goals$30k, two villages, one month: for $30k we can get the equipment, paper production, travel funding, and personnel time to test the papers in two villages for about a month.  Additional money would allow us to test papers in more villages and for longer amounts of time.  $150k, about a dozen villages, 1-2 months each village: our ultimate goal is to test the papers in a variety of locations to demonstrate that they work with a variety of waters and in a variety of communities. Donation Levels$10 is about how much it costs to manufacture one book by hand.  We're aiming for a price of <10 cents per filter paper after scale up, so ~100 papers.  We expect pilot scale production costs will be higher.  $20=2 books, ~200 papers$50=5 books, ~500 papers$100=lab supplies$1000=a bacteria incubator and related supplies, a substantial portion of the salary for in-country personnel, travel to the project country
The largest costs for this project are the time and equipment for planning and executing the pilot scale paper production, the human health assessment, the water quality assessment, and travel to- and operations in- a country on the other side of the world.  That is, the majority of costs at this time are not the physical paper itself or the paper treatment, but rather the necessary work that must be done to assess that the papers are effective.  We do not sell the papers at this time because without such a proper assessment we would not find this ethical.    The Impact Someday we would like to have these papers in the hands of the poorest people throughout the world.  But before we can get to 1 million we have to go through 1,000.  We will be applying for governmental research grants but the turnaround time will leave us unable to move the project forward for half a year to a year.  If we can raise money through crowdsourcing the project will be able to continue moving forward: the first pilot scale production run will be made and field trials to evaluate the effect of the papers will be performed.   
  
Risks & Challenges Scaling up from bench scale production and small field trials to a pilot plant and a dozen villages will require overcoming a variety of unforeseen challenges.  Working in countries on the other side of the world creates a variety of challenges.  Over the past several years we have developed partnerships with a diverse array of very talented people and organizations. Each is highly qualified in its own area, whether paper manufacturing or community health field projects.   We also maintain the flexibility to engage additional experts with abilities outside our own area.


    Other Ways You Can Help Unlike software projects, we cannot deliver health benefits without providing physical papers to kill waterborn pathogens and paper costs money.  But some of the most important advances to the project have come from social media sharing.  We have been introduced to all of our remarkable partners through word of mouth and online social sharing.   And just as importantly, we believe that clean water should be provided to everyone in the world, and we hope that sharing our idea will lead to more projects like ours. We are in competition only with sickness and encourage support for any and all public health and WASH - water, sanitation, and health - campaigns and technologies.   



FAQ1. Sorry we are not offering perks for this campaign, we're simply too busy doing science, engineering, and health work, all strictly in our spare time.   2. We cannot send copies of The Drinkable Book or any filter papers to funders.  We'd love to be able to offer it as a perk but its not possible for a variety of logistical and legal reasons.  Most of all because we're saving all the filter papers for poor people who need them.  3. We are not selling papers or Drinkable Books at this time. 4. We have no staff and read all emails personally.  If we are slow to respond please bear with us.  If you send something mean or otherwise harassing we will not respond, but you will, on a personal level, make one of us a bit sadder about the world. 5. Teri absolutely loves it when younger people send nice emails. Her favorites have been the really positive nice messages from school kids, teenagers, and Girl Scout Troop 510.  6. We're partnering with the good folks at Willy Wonka to develop a blue-raspberry flavor just as soon as we can get Johnny Depp or Gene Wilder to agree to serve as a spokesperson.

story:
About this project

Leegle is the world’s first app that can detect brainwashing, manipulation and thought control in any text - either written or spoken. It uses the benefits of our three special technologies called BULL¹, TaSA² and EMO³.

To put it simple: Leegle embraces the knowledge base of linguistics, psychology, semiotics, anthropology, memetics, math and history to filter out word patterns that can subliminally affect a human.

Most of the information that comes out of our environment and media is designed to influence our behavior. You can observe that at work, school and home: literally all people communicate by certain codes of mutual manipulation, including parents and children. That is happening because we are taught to do so by a sequential heritage vectoring from our ancestors to descendants.

But whatever is accepted between people who know each other will unlikely work well for you and a stranger. Especially on the street, during negotiations and, of course, on TV and Internet.

Indiegogo, as many other info hubs like Airbnb, TEDx or IFL Science, is a place where quite particular people congregate. Advanced open minded learners and idea pushers, like you and me, know very well that human society is massively driven by greed, fear and lust, making the money a universal unit of human interactions. No evil or good has ever been publicly released without the goal of earning cash, so any news, ads, talk and TV shows, as well as political debates and charity are designed specially to generate income. Guess who is the source of that business :) Yes, it’s you and me, the ones who watch, read and listen to the messages, which include special word combinations that influence the way we think. We might suddenly want to believe, purchase or support. Leegle is being created to detect such scams and raise a red flag for you.

“A hypnosis-type mental pressure has been noted by the Supreme Court of the United States to be so unduly influential that it deprives someone of their fundamental rights.”

In order not to get caught into these sticky nets one must either simply not participate by turning everything off, or learn through dozens of books on linguistics, psychology, history, neurophysiology, genetics and math. That looks kinda hard, and indeed is, you can trust people who’ve done it during the last 12 years. That’s why we’ve delegated this task of learning to our software so you don’t have to.

Use it on your smartphone, computer, tablet and wearables like smart watch or glasses to monitor the incoming information flow and guard you from subliminal influence.

We are well aware that most of the people do not consider this to be a significant threat, because it’s their daily routine like breathing air that no one notices. This is exactly why we pledge our idea here at Indiegogo, the community of thinkers and opinion leaders. Think of any significant breakthrough like radio or morphine. The first one was considered to be economically unbeneficial, because there was no wire to control payments. The second one had been believed to be a panacea and a nice toy. Both mistakes seem vivid now but doesn’t the history repeat?

It’s a big piece of text you’ve gone through so far and we deeply appreciate that! Since you are really interested, please do read our stories about how we came to this point and why we are doing this project. See what we believe and share, and maybe you will find that appealing enough to join our striving for evolution, freedom and progress.

Leegle in action

Leegle app is designed to detect special neural linguistic structures in texts. These structures can bypass a person’s conscious filters and program people to think and act in a desired way. Leegle analyzes spoken speech and written text, defining the degree and direction of the influence on subconscious process that serve manipulative suggestion. Depending on the software version the result is: 

  • A 5 level scale indicator (safe, fair, suspicious, harmful and dangerous);

  • Highlighted passages and explanation of the manipulation techniques used;

  • An indication of the real purpose and meaning of the text between the lines (ex: make you feel guilty and pay; make you feel scared and vote; make you feel hopeful and invest, etc.)

Leegle can analyse texts from any other apps installed on your device. Simply select any passage and transfer it to the app by share button or via clipboard. Leegle will send the data to the processing server and show the results in its app as graphic charts and explanations. In the mode of permanent environment scanning the app analyzes all the incoming speech and alerts users when the chosen presets get activated.

The following types of psychological manipulation techniques can be detected by Leegle: Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP), hypnosis, covert influence, subliminal advertising, trance induction, brainwashing, reeducation, indoctrination, coercive persuasion, conversational hypnosis, zombification, thought control, thought reform, neuromarketing, verbal magic, “bewitching”, psycho-religion, mental viruses, cyber bullying, transformational linguistics.

How to use

 

 

 

  1. Select a text for analysis and transfer your selection to our app by clicking Share button or via clipboard

  2. See your results in an automatically opened Leegle app:

 

  • An overall mark of brainwashing level;
     
  • Highlighting suspicious elements (heat map); 
  • Explanations and tips (the depth of details depends on your subscription plan).

 

Back Leegle App!

 

By backing Leegle you support the technology of fighting the unique evil, which has been spread so widely and for so long time that people don’t even notice it, like the air we breathe. This evil is meanly using our natural biologically conditioned reactions for reaching its illegal goals. Our future will look much brighter if people stop using hidden subliminal influence against each other. A detector that defines such manipulations can guarantee a kind and honorable intentions between people in a dialogue.

 

What do I pay for?

The backing fund resources will be allocated to:
  • Fully develop the software for all popular OS platforms;
  • Rent cloud storage and pay for the speech recognition/translation APIs to Google;
  • Add more popular languages to make Leegle available in many countries;
  • Set up the user support service.

Giving out our basic app for absolutely free we will have to cover the aforementioned expenses by offering prepaid packages with larger unit sets and deeper analytical features.

The simplest package will allow analyzing text passages of up to 1 000 words (about 2,5 pages of A4 format). The advanced users will have access to much more serious program features.

Project timeline

Features in BASIC and ADVANCED versions

 

  • Brainwashing threat detection in written texts;

  • Short explanation of the threat's essence.

 

  • Highlighting suspicious passages;

  • Explanations and tips;

  • Widgets for smart devices;

  • Speech recognition and environment scanning;

  • Priority access to new versions and functions;

  • Instant user support.

Rewards

 

 

 

Dear crowdfunders! Considering the virtual specifics of our project we are glad to offer you physical rewards, made in style of classic Ukrainian ornamented clothes called "Vyshyvanka" (embroidery) inspired by Leegle. 

Just like the subject of our research - human verbal communications - each type of vyshyvanka carries a code. An experienced craftsman knows how to read that code, expressed in colours, type of embroidery and patterns.

To Ukrainians vyshyvanka is not only a cultural heritage, but also a symbol of independence, democracy and freedom. Especially nowadays. Your contribution into popularisation of Ukrainian culture will surely be rewarded by our open and hospitable people. We highly value and appreciate our friends and partners who respect our right for independence and freedom.  

 

 

Depending on the supported kit, the following items are available:

 

 

  • A stylish ethnic tracery sticker (STARTER, OPTIMAL, PRO, ALL INCLUSIVE)

  •  A vyshyvanka ornament fridge magnet 3″ (OPTIMAL, PRO, ALL INCLUSIVE)

  •  A handmade vyshyvanka smartphone protecting case 6.25″x3.1″x0.3″  (PRO, ALL INCLUSIVE)

  • A traditional Ukrainian embroidered vyshyvanka shirt handcrafted specially for the Leegle backers! (ALL INCLUSIVE KIT ONLY)

* backer of ALL INCLUSIVE KIT will select the size, colour and model of vyshyvanka.

Research materials list

  • Badouk-Epstein, O., Schwartz, J., Schwartz, R. Ritual Abuse and Mind Control: The Manipulation of Attachment Needs. 2011

  • Bandler, R., Grinder, J. Frogs Into Princes. 1979

  • Barker, E. The Making of a Moonie. 1984

  • Birch , A. 30 Covert Emotional Manipulation Tactics: How Manipulators Take Control In Personal Relationships. 2014

  • Blackmore, S. The Meme Machine. 2000

  • Braiker, H. Who's Pulling Your Strings?: How to Break the Cycle of Manipulation and Regain Control of Your Life. 2004

  • Charvet, S. Words that Change Minds. 1997

  • Chomsky, N. Language and Mind. 1972

  • Chomsky, N. Syntactic Structures. 1978

  • Cialdini, R. Influence: Science and Practice. 2003

  • Cialdini, R. Influence: The Psychology of Persuasion. 1993

  • Dawkins, R. River Out of Eden. 1995

  • Dawkins, R. The Blind Watchmaker. 1986

  • Dawkins, R. The Selfish Gene. 1976

  • Dawson, J. MIND CONTROL: Manipulation, Deception and Persuasion Exposed: Human Psychology (Mind Control, Brainwashing, Subconscious Mind, Psychopath, NLP, Hypnosis, Manifestation). 2014

  • Dilts, R. Sleight of Mouth. 1999

  • Dvorkin, A. Totalitarian sects. How to protect yourself and your loved ones. 2001

  • Erickson, M., Rossi, E. Hypnotherapy: An Exploratory Casebook. 1979

  • Erickson, M., Rossi, E. The February Man: Evolving Consciousness And Identity In Hypnotherapy. 1989

  • Galanter, M. Cults: faith, healing, and coercion. 1999

  • Grinder, J., Bandler, R. Trance-Formations: Neuro-Linguistic Programming and the Structure of Hypnosis. 1981

  • Haley, J. Uncommon Therapy: The Psychiatric Techniques of Milton H. Erickson. M.D. 1993

  • Hall, E. The Silent Language. 1973

  • Hassan, S. Combatting Cult Mind Control: The #1 Best-selling Guide to Protection, Rescue, and Recovery from Destructive Cults. 1990

  • Hayakawa, S., Hayakawa, A., MacNeil, R. Language in Thought and Action. 1939

  • Hogan, K. Covert Hypnosis: An Operator's Manual. 2006

  • Hunter, E. Brain-washing in Red China: the calculated destruction of men’s minds. 1951

  • Huxley, A. Brave New World. 1932

  • Hyde, M. Brainwashing & Other Forms Of Mind Control. 1977

  • Jacobson, S. Mind Control in the U. S. 1985

  • Jessop, C. Triumph: Life After the Cult - A Survivor's Lessons. 2011

  • Jones, D. Mind Control 101 - How To Influence The Thoughts And Actions Of Others Without Them Knowing Or Caring. 2007

  • Jones, D. Mind Control Hypnosis: What All the Other Hypnotists Don't Want You to Know about Hypnosis. 2009

  • Jones, M., Flaxman, L. Mind Wars: A History of Mind Control, Surveillance, and Social Engineering by the Government, Media, and Secret Societies. 2015

  • Keith, J. Mass Control: Engineering Human Consciousness. 2003

  • Lee, B. Out of the Cocoon: A Young Woman's Courageous Flight from the Grip of a Religious Cult. 2010

  • Lifton, R. Thought Reform and the Psychology of Totalism: A Study of 'brainwashing' in China. 1961

  • Lindstrom, M. Brandwashed. 2011

  • Lindstrom, M. Buyology: Truth and Lies About Why We Buy and the New Science of Desire. 2010

  • Love, S. Mind Control: Getting Deeper into Human Psychology and Intuition to Recognize the Manifestation of Manipulation, Deception, Mind Control Humiliation, Hypnosis, and Brain Washing. 2014

  • Lung, H., Prowant, C. Mind Manipulation: Ancient and Modern Ninja Techniques. 2002

  • Marks, J. The Search for the "Manchurian Candidate": The CIA and Mind Control: The Secret History of the Behavioral Sciences. 1991

  • Maslow, A. A Theory of Human Motivation. 1943

  • McCoy, D. The Manipulative Man: Identify His Behavior, Counter the Abuse, Regain Control. 2006

  • Meerloo, J. The Rape of the Mind: The Psychology of Thought Control, Menticide, and Brainwashing. 2009

  • Mlodinow, L. Subliminal: How Your Unconscious Mind Rules Your Behavior. 2013

  • Nash, M., Barnier, A. The Oxford Handbook of Hypnosis: Theory, Research, and Practice. 2012

  • Nielsen, S. Manipulation: How to Recognize and Outwit Emotional Manipulation and Mind Control in Your Relationships. 2015

  • O'Connor, J., Seymour, J. Introducing Neuro-Linguistic Programming: Psychological Skills for Understanding and Influencing People. 1990

  • Opton, M., Scheflin, A. The Mind Manipulators: A Non-fiction Account. 1978

  • Orwell, G. 1984. 1949

  • Packard, V. The Hidden Persuaders. 2007

  • Poole, S. Unspeak: How Words Become Weapons, How Weapons Become a Message, and How That Message Becomes Reality. 2007

  • Pratkanis, A., Aronson, E. Age of Propaganda: The Everyday Use and Abuse of Persuasion. 2001

  • Price, J., Stevens, A. Prophets, Cults and Madness. 2001

  • Rosen, S. My Voice Will Go with You: The Teaching Tales of Milton H. Erickson. 1991

  • Sanders, N. Your Thoughts Are Not Your Own: Mind control, mass manipulation and perception management. 2014

  • Sargant, W. Battle for the Mind: A Physiology of Conversion and Brainwashing - How Evangelists, Psychiatrists, Politicians, and Medicine Men Can Change Your Beliefs and Behavior. 1957

  • Schein, H. Coercive Persuasion. 1980

  • Singer, M., Lalich, J. Cults in Our Midst: The Hidden Menace in Our Everyday Lives. 1996

  • Smale, J. The Secret Language of Hypnotherapy. 2006

  • Stern, R. The Gaslight Effect: How to Spot and Survive the Hidden Manipulation Others Use to Control Your Life. 2008

  • Streatfeild, D. Brainwash: The Secret History of Mind Control. 2008

  • Sutphen, D. The Battle For Your Mind: Persuasion & Brainwashing Techniques Being Used On The Public Today. 1984

  • Tamm, J. Cartwheels in a Sari: A Memoir of Growing Up Cult. 2009

  • Taylor, K. Brainwashing: The Science of Thought Control. 2006

  • Vitale, J. Hypnotic Writing: How to Seduce and Persuade Customers with Only Your Words. 2006

  • Winn, D. The Manipulated Mind: Brainwashing, Conditioning, and Indoctrination. 2000

 

 

News from the video presentation

  • “Brainwashing” charged in damage suit, The Spokesman-Review, Aug. 28, 1980

  • Alternative health centre accused of "brainwashing", The Telegraph, Sep. 06, 2008

  • Boston Police Warning of Possible ‘Hypnosis Robberies’ Near Chinatown, Boston Herald, May. 07, 2012

  • 'I was brainwashed by a cult': How one woman escaped and rebuilt her life, Daily Mail, Dec. 14, 2014

Disclaimer

Our technologies:  

 

  1. BULL - Block Unwanted Lingual Loads algorithm - is set on the basic speech elements, like syllables and phonemes;
  2. TaSA - Transaction and Scenario Analysis - is a psychological practice that examines behavior and interactions (or 'transactions') between people;
  3. EMO - Emotional Mind Operations - is a complex database of emotional clusters linked to words and their combinations that actually manage our thinking and decision making.

 

* All materials used in the presentation are either purchased from the stocks, CC licensed or approved by the rights owners.

** Some of the advanced presented functions will be available by the time of corresponding technologies launched on the mass market.

 

 

Risks an Challenges

  1. Despite Leegle's growing ability to process all key languages of the world, its adaptation to each of them will directly depend on existence of the corresponding Google translate/speech recognition API;
  2. The officials in power might simply shut us down or even not let us out in the very beginning. Due to the expected growth of Leegle’s popularity amongst wide audience of users including professionals, the information might travel all the way up to the media stakeholders.They are definitely interested in keeping and growing their target audience as well as the ratings. And we might become a stone in their shoe;
  3. Our technology is a bit ahead of time for wearables in terms of sound processing in public and private. The ethics of reality recording is still debated though we believe it is inevitable in a year or two. At the same time the technology of sound recognition is also growing and becoming more and more precise. Nevertheless you can use Leegle on pre-recorded materials without violating someone’s legal rights.

 News from the video presentation


“Brainwashing” charged in damage suit, The Spokesman-Review, Aug. 28, 1980
Alternative health centre accused of "brainwashing", The Telegraph, Sep. 06, 2008
Boston Police Warning of Possible ‘Hypnosis Robberies’ Near Chinatown, Boston Herald, May. 07, 2012
'I was brainwashed by a cult': How one woman escaped and rebuilt her life, Daily Mail, Dec. 14, 2014


Disclaimer



Our technologies:  
 


BULL - Block Unwanted Lingual Loads algorithm - is set on the basic speech elements, like syllables and phonemes;


TaSA - Transaction and Scenario Analysis - is a psychological practice that examines behavior and interactions (or 'transactions') between people;


EMO - Emotional Mind Operations - is a complex database of emotional clusters linked to words and their combinations that actually manage our thinking and decision making.


 
* All materials used in the presentation are either purchased from the stocks, CC licensed or approved by the rights owners.
** Some of the advanced presented functions will be available by the time of corresponding technologies launched on the mass market.
 
 
Risks an Challenges

Despite Leegle's growing ability to process all key languages of the world, its adaptation to each of them will directly depend on existence of the corresponding Google translate/speech recognition API;
The officials in power might simply shut us down or even not let us out in the very beginning. Due to the expected growth of Leegle’s popularity amongst wide audience of users including professionals, the information might travel all the way up to the media stakeholders.They are definitely interested in keeping and growing their target audience as well as the ratings. And we might become a stone in their shoe;
Our technology is a bit ahead of time for wearables in terms of sound processing in public and private. The ethics of reality recording is still debated though we believe it is inevitable in a year or two. At the same time the technology of sound recognition is also growing and becoming more and more precise. Nevertheless you can use Leegle on pre-recorded materials without violating someone’s legal rights.

story:
Prossa can be purchased on eBay now


A Prostate orgasm is more than 30% stronger than a penile orgasm, in terms of size and intensity. 

Massaging the prostate can improve your erection, keeping you harder for longer. 

Regular prostate massaging can help keep your prostate healthy. 

                        

Still have no clue about the prostate orgasm?  This Video Explains All



The Safe and Simple Way to Play Away...

Each Prossa App Pack  comes with an easy to clean, cordless, rechargeable Playmate unit complete with a USB charger. It is compatible with both iphone and android mobile technology. Simply download the App to your mobile handset, charge up your Playmate, and start to play. 

                                      


Stay Connected, Stay Hitched, Stay Intimate...

Don't let physical estrangement come between you and your lover. The new Prossa App Pack is the fun way to keep intimate from a distance. As long as you can access the internet on your mobile phone, you can now personally pleasure your playmate either at home or anywhere in the world.  


From the Bottom of Our Hearts to the Heart of Your Bottom...

We are a small start-up, not a huge multinational company, so we care about what we do. We take your fun seriously. The Prossa Playmate has been ergonomically designed in order to fit any snug bottom comfortably. It has been fashioned from medical grade silicone which is completely safe, easy to clean and 100% waterproof. The unique twin motor system not only enables a range of variable vibrating and massage options, but also a stroking function that is guaranteed to bring a smile to your face. The Prossa Application Pack gives you and your partner the freedom to stimulate your secluded P-Spot from anywhere in the world.

 
You are in control...
In addition to the 6 pre-programmed patterns, which can be operated without the App, your Prossa Playmate can be controlled remotely by any smartphone giving complete control of the intensity of your 'P-Spot' orgasm to whoever you choose.

This is Cyber Sex Without the Scary Science Fiction...

The Prossa Playmate has been designed to be as discreet as possible. It vibrates in a super smooth fashion which ensures that the earth will move for you and not your next door neighbour. Furthermore, a gyroscope sensor has been embedded and sealed inside the pack which is able to track and record the pulse of your orgasm. You have the option to save this data and personalize your own favourite stimulating routines.

We are keen to engage in a dialogue with all our customers and backers in order to create a sex toy that continues to improve and give satisfaction.







We are…

Eric  Young      

Eric is interested in sports, classical music and musicals. Eric leads the product development and marketing team.  He believes that all men deserve a sex life that is more fun and he is passionate about redefining the image of sex toys.

Mr E

Mr E writes sexy, cultural commentary for intelligent adults with a sense of humour; sometimes it's published, sometimes it isn't. He also writes songs about the trials and tribulations of living an authentic queer life in world full of strangers. Check him out www.magicalmretour.com

Oraix Lang 

Oraix used to work for DELL as principle architect  for many years. He leads the R&D, focusing on development of the app and the technical side of things. 


Mr/Ms Get involved

We value all ideas and we are open to any constructive suggestions. A forum on our official website is already set up to receive the benefit of your experience and sex knowledge, tell us what you need, we'll try to oblige.

Sign up now to be eligible for a 15% discount on your Prossa Application Pack. Furthermore, people who post on our forum will receive a 15% discount. Check out the Prossaer Forum to get honest about sex toys.


Our project started a year ago, we have invested our savings to create a prototype, and the product is now finalized, fully tested and ready to go. The app is almost done, but we do need more users to perform a mass testing to improve the user experience. We welcome more bloggers, journalists and people in PR to interact with us, and offer any helpful feedback. Now we are actually moving towards mass production,  we have decided to use crowdfunding to measure and predict the demand for production. 

We take your fun seriously, you are not only backing an idea, but you are a part of our team.



What is The Prossa Playmate?

The Playmate is made from medical grade silicone which is already widely used for adult toys, so it is 100% body safe.

What is the size of Prossa?

Overall size is 5.59, by 3.5, by 1.7inches, the part you insert is 3.7 inches. Reliable industry data confirms that this size fits most men comfortably. If you have questions or concerns about the size, please drop us an email, we will be happy to respond.

Can you pledge anonymously?

Absolutely! Remember to click the “Hide my name on the campaign page”, when you make the payment.


How long can the Prossa Playmate be used after a full charging?

There is 400mAh battery inside each playmate. It takes about 3 hours to make a full charge, and it lasts for 1 hour.

How does Prossa Playmate connect?

The connection between the Prossa and smartphone App is enabled by Bluetooth, which means you don't need to have the Internet to play Prossa alone. The remote control over the Internet is enabled by our smart App which is downloaded by you and your partner, either you or your partner send the remote control request.  

Is it waterproof?

Yes, the Playmate is 100% waterproof; which means you can use it with lubricants, lotions and you can even use it in the shower. It is totally hygienic and can be cleaned with a just little water.

How many vibrating modes are there?

Without the App: The Prossa Playmate has a 6 preconfigured vibrating options and 5 levels of vibrating intensity. 

With the  App: you can customize the vibrating patterns, go wild! The world is your oyster.

I am a straight man, can I use it? Or Can I buy one for my husband? 

Yes, of course; massaging the prostate is widely used for pleasuring all men, regardless of their sexual orientation.

Research suggests prostate massaging may reduce the risk of developing prostate problems in later life. It also helps those who wish to explore better orgasms; the P-spot is the new G-spot.

What are the risks and challenges for this campaign?

Well, actually the prototype has already been made. We need to have extra funding in order to support us with the cost of production. Nevertheless, the main investment has already been done. We are looking for help in order to ascend this product to the international market. We also need users to give us feedback in order to help us on the software user experience. We genuinely want to improve the product to give our customers the best experience.

Warranty ?

Sure, we offer a 1 year warranty for Prossa from the day we ship out your order. Should you encounter an issue with your Prossa App Pack, please contact us, we will replace it for you. But do remember to keep your warranty card.

I am interested to help you on the campaign, how can I be a help?

  • If you are a reporter, please email us with any questions.
  • If you are reviewer, please don’t hesitate to contact us for demo.
  • If you are just interested, but don’t know how to help, email us too, let’s figure it out.                                                                                                                                                Contact me: eric#prossa.me mre@prossa.me
