story:
Here's To The Hostesses with the Mostesses

Many thanks to Karen & Sarah for providing venues for the 2016 Labor Day Family RE-Onion!


All contributions will be used to defray expenses. Your help is appreciated for catering, decorations, etc. This helps avoid a per person charge!

The Shibutis are first come, first serve. The $15 is neither an upper nor lower limit for contributing, so feel free to pony up as much as you like. It will take $15 to secure a Shibuti. There are approximately 50-60 of them.

Hope to see many old friends this September!
story_txt:
Here's To The Hostesses with the Mostesses
Many thanks to Karen & Sarah for providing venues for the 2016 Labor Day Family RE-Onion!



All contributions will be used to defray expenses. Your help is appreciated for catering, decorations, etc. This helps avoid a per person charge!
The Shibutis are first come, first serve. The $15 is neither an upper nor lower limit for contributing, so feel free to pony up as much as you like. It will take $15 to secure a Shibuti. There are approximately 50-60 of them.
Hope to see many old friends this September!

story:
(Klick hier für die deutsche Version unserer Crowdfunding-Kampagne – inkl. deutschsprachigem Video!)


I'm a passionate diver since 2009! Since then, I've intensively taken care of all different aspects of this fascinating sport! That is how my project 'Dive in the Blue' came to life. Because only a diver knows what divers want and need!

  • Best quality with highest safety standards;
  • distinctive designs: an own sign of recognition;
  • good prices

It is a fact that in most teamsports suppliers send their products directly to the customers in order to guarantee fair prices. Especially divers, who need a lot of equipment anyway, earn such an opportunity, too. That is what we want to create: a new brand label of fashion and equipment that is delivered directly to the divers' home. That's how we can offer best quality for extraordinary prices!

Speaking of distinctive designs: The 'Dive in the Blue' brand logo already convinced manufacturers as well as potential clients. Does it just show a normal fish shape? It doesn't! Take a second look and find the outline of another fish crossing by from the right.

This element is the main design of the first collection of our functional and trendy dive fashion. No matter what: Our t-shirts, polos, hoodies and caps offer an own sign of recognition for every diver. Extraordinary easy and simply clever!

Mass production? Not with 'Dive in the Blue'! The client himself can choose out of different features like shirt and design colors. In addition to that, he can customize it with his name or other individual text elements. Our high-quality fashion products are refined by hand in our own fablab (fabrics laboratory)!

Our online shop is still under construction, but it will be launched in spring 2016! Here's a first insight! You want to support us more? Then we have unique perks for you!

We were able to implement our first fashion line by our own credit. We've initiated good contacts with experienced manufacturers! That is why we are motivated to let the next step follow at once. We'd like to produce and sell our own equipment for diving and water sports!

But therefore, I need your support: In order to realize our philosophy of highest quality with best-price-policy, I have to order a special amount of items per stock. That is why I need a calculable funding!

With the revenue of this campaign, I would like to add the following diving goods to our assortment:

  • wetsuit (3mm)
  • diving mask
  • snorkel
  • diving flashlight

For this, I need approximately USD 8.000 (EUR 7.500,--)! The rest is going to be invested into exclusive perks as well as into fees and taxes.

The money funded by the crowd will be used for water sports equipment anyway – no matter what amount it finally will be. If there is less money available, I'll reduce the assortment! Do we achieve even more, I'll add some more products:

  • diving mask for kids
  • shorty (adults and children)
  • more items

I'm staunchly confident of our project! Even more than that, I look forward expectantly: How will the divers assimilate our products?

We're pitching high, but our equipment for water sports will convince you! Why am I so sure about that? I've tried every single item of our assortment myself and have supervised all improvements during the manufacturing process. I've controlled the usability, the quality and the safety of every product. This was the procedure and it will go on in the future – as long as I am 'addicted to water'! That's my promise!

You can be the first to get a unique 'Dive in the Blue' fashion product! This privilege is worth to get involved!

Your support opens a new opportunity for every participant in diving or any other water sports in order to buy their equipment or fashion products!

A big 'thank you' to all who are supporting us! Here are our valuable peaks:

  • Get our distinctive designs for diving and water sports on hoodies, polos, T-shirts or caps! This is an 'early bird' offer – our online shop has not yet opened!
  • Lifelong or on a time range: Get attractive 10% discounts for every order in our shop!
  • Get one of our exclusive fan articles: high-quality softshell jackets, trendy gymsacs or keybands – these products will definitely not be sold anywhere!
  • Be the first to get an unforgettable holiday experience at Turtles Beach Resort between Hurghada and El Gouna in Egypt (up from 2018).

  • All supporters will be named at our 'Wall of Fame' on the 'Dive in the Blue' website (as wished only).

At first, many thanks that you've read about us and our campaign up to this point! We're happy about your interest – no matter if you're planning to support our fundraising or not.

There are some more possibilities to help us getting well known:

  • Talk about 'Dive in the Blue' and our projects – surely there are divers or other participants in water sports in your family or among friends who will be happy to get informed about us!
  • Show them our crowdfunding campaign on indiegogo.com!
  • Visit our website and find our free Red Sea Reef Guide!

  • By the way: If you find interesting advertising on our website with articles you want to buy, please click on the ad! It will just cost you one moment of time, but we will get a small bonus, if you use these links.
  • Visit us on Facebook and 'like us' for staying updated.
  • Follow us on Twitter and/or subscribe to our newsletter!

You see, a word-of-mouth recommendation helps us to climb up. And who knows: Perhaps one day, you or one of your friends can call yourself 'supporter of the first generation'!

(Thank you for reading! Now we start with the German version of our campaign!)


2009 hat mich das Tauchfieber gepackt! Seitdem habe ich mich intensiv mit den verschiedenen Facetten dieser faszinierenden Sportart beschäftigt. Hieraus ist das Projekt 'Dive in the Blue' entstanden. Denn: Nur ein Taucher weiß, was Taucher wollen und brauchen!

  • Beste Qualität mit höchsten Sicherheitsstandards;
  • unverwechselbare Designs: endlich ein eigenes Wiedererkennungsmerkmal;
  • günstige Preise

Was es im Teamsport schon lange gibt, möchte ich nun auch für Taucher und andere Wassersportler verwirklichen: ein neues Label, das seine Waren direkt an den Endkunden verschickt! So lassen sich die oben genannten Punkte zum Wohle des Kunden vereinen!

Stichwort: unverwechselbare Designs! Das Logo von 'Dive in the Blue' hat bei seiner Vorstellung bei Lieferanten und potenziellen Kunden bereits gleichermaßen für Begeisterung gesorgt: Auf den ersten Blick zeigt es nur einen einfachen Fisch! Doch ein genaueres Hinsehen lohnt: Von rechts lässt sich schemenhaft ein weiterer Fisch erkennen, der vor den anderen schwimmt.

Dieses Element habe ich zum Start des neuen Labels in funktionaler und trendiger Tauchmode verewigt. Egal ob mit T-Shirts, Poloshirts, Hoodies oder Mützen – so bekommt jeder Taucher sein ganz eigenes Wiedererkennungsmerkmal auch über Wasser. Herrlich spannend und doch einfach schlicht!

Produktion in Massen? Nicht bei 'Dive in the Blue'! Der Kunde bestimmt die Farben des Designs aus einer vorgegebenen Auswahl selbst und kann sein Shirt außerdem mit seinem Namen oder anderen Textelementen weiter personalisieren. Die Veredelung unserer hochwertigen Fashionprodukte erfolgt dabei in Handarbeit in der eigenen Werkstatt!

Unser Onlineshop befindet sich gerade im Aufbau und wird im Frühjahr 2016 an den Start gehen! Hier gibt's einen ersten Einblick! Und wer das Projekt weiter fördert, der kann sich einzigartige Perks als 'Dankeschön' sichern!

Unsere Tauchmode konnten wir eigenständig realisieren! Der dabei geknüpfte Kontakt zu einigen der besten Fabriken der Tauchbranche hat uns motiviert, sofort den nächsten Schritt in Angriff zu nehmen. Wir wollen unser erstes eigenes Equipment produzieren!

Doch hierfür brauche ich eure Unterstützung: Um die in der Philosophie verankerte Zielsetzung der günstigen Preise bei höchster Qualität und Sicherheit realisieren zu können, muss ich eine recht hohe Erstauflage der gewünschten Produkte in Kauf nehmen. Diese gilt es, seriös zu finanzieren!

Mit dem in dieser Kampagne erzielten Erlös möchte ich die folgenden Ausrüstungsgegenstände in unser Sortiment aufnehmen:

  • Wetsuit (3mm)
  • Tauchmaske
  • Schnorchel
  • Tauchlampe

Hierfür benötige ich rund EUR 7.500,--! Das restliche Geld fließt in die Bereitstellung unserer exklusiven Bonusgeschenke sowie in Gebühren und Steuern.

Die von der Crowd finanzierte Summe wird in jedem Fall für Wassersport-Equipment eingesetzt. Kommt der erhoffte Betrag als Ganzes nicht zusammen, reduziere ich die Produktion zunächst auf einige ausgewählte Artikel! Übertreffen wir die Summe hingegen, so investiere ich wie folgt weiter:

  • Tauchmaske für Kinder
  • Shorty (Erwachsene und Kinder)
  • weitere Wassersport-Produkte

Ich bin von unserem Vorhaben absolut überzeugt! Noch mehr als das aber bin ich gespannt: Wie nehmen die Taucher und Wassersportler die neuen Produkte auf und an?

Die qualitative Messlatte liegt hoch, aber das Wassersport-Equipment von 'Dive in the Blue' wird euch überzeugen! Warum ich da so sicher bin?

Ich habe jedes Teil unseres Sortiments selbst unter und auf dem Wasser getestet und an seiner Optimierung mitgewirkt. Dies gilt sowohl in Bezug auf die Benutzerfreundlichkeit, die Verarbeitungsqualität und die Sicherheit eines jeden Produkts. Das war bisher so, und das wird auch in Zukunft so bleiben – solange ich begeisterter Wassersportler bin! So lautet mein Versprechen!

Ihr könnt die Ersten sein, die ein Produkt von 'Dive in the Blue' in den Händen halten! Allein dieses Privileg ist es wert, dass ihr euch engagiert!

Eure Unterstützung eröffnet Tauchern und anderen Wassersportlern eine ganz neue Alternative beim Kauf von Equipment und Fashionprodukten!

Als Dank für euren Support habe ich einige tolle Präsente zusammengestellt:

  • Unsere unverwechselbaren Tauch- und Wassersport-Designs auf Hoodie, Poloshirt, T-Shirt oder Mütze – noch vor dem Start unseres Onlineshops!
  • Lebenslange oder zeitlich begrenzte Rabatte in unserem Onlineshop: Spare 10% bei jedem Einkauf!
  • Exklusive Zusatzartikel wie unsere hochwertige Softshelljacke, der stylische Turnbeutel oder ein Schlüsselband – diese Produkte gibt es garantiert nirgendwo zu kaufen!
  • Sichert euch als Erste einen unvergesslichen Urlaubsaufenthalt im Turtles Beach Resort zwischen Hurghada und El Gouna in Ägypten (ab 2018).

  • Alle Unterstützer werden auf Wunsch Teil unserer 'Wall of Fame' auf der Internetseite von 'Dive in the Blue' (namentliche Erwähnung).

Zunächst einmal vielen Dank, dass du dir unsere Kampagne bis hierhin überhaupt durchgelesen hast! Wir freuen uns über dein Interesse – auch wenn du uns gerade nicht finanziell unterstützen kannst oder magst.

Es gibt viele weitere Möglichkeiten, uns zu helfen:

  • Sprich über 'Dive in the Blue' und unser Vorhaben – sicher gibt es in deiner Familie und/oder deinem Bekanntenkreis den einen oder anderen Wassersportler, der sich über deine Info freut!
  • Verweise auf unsere Crowdfunding-Kampagne auf indiegogo.com!
  • Besuche unsere Internetseite und erfreue dich an unserem kostenfreien Rifflexikon mit einem Tierverzeichnis des Roten Meeres!

  • Übrigens: Findest du in den Werbefenstern auf dieser Seite etwas, das dich interessiert, so kaufe doch nach einem Klick auf die entsprechende Anzeige! Es kostet dich keinen Cent mehr, bringt uns aber eine kleine Provision.
  • Besuche unsere Facebook-Seite und bleib mit einem 'Gefällt mir' auf dem Laufenden.
  • Folge uns auf Twitter und/oder abonniere unseren Newsletter!

Du siehst, schon ein kurzer Gedanke zählt, um uns beim Bekanntwerden zu unterstützen. Und wer weiß: Vielleicht kannst du oder einer deiner Freunde sich eines Tages als 'Fan der ersten Stunde' bezeichnen!
story_txt:
(Klick hier für die deutsche Version unserer Crowdfunding-Kampagne – inkl. deutschsprachigem Video!)


I'm a passionate diver since 2009! Since then, I've intensively taken care of all different aspects of this fascinating sport! That is how my project 'Dive in the Blue' came to life. Because only a diver knows what divers want and need!

Best quality with highest safety standards;
distinctive designs: an own sign of recognition;
good prices

It is a fact that in most teamsports suppliers send their products directly to the customers in order to guarantee fair prices. Especially divers, who need a lot of equipment anyway, earn such an opportunity, too. That is what we want to create: a new brand label of fashion and equipment that is delivered directly to the divers' home. That's how we can offer best quality for extraordinary prices!

Speaking of distinctive designs: The 'Dive in the Blue' brand logo already convinced manufacturers as well as potential clients. Does it just show a normal fish shape? It doesn't! Take a second look and find the outline of another fish crossing by from the right.

This element is the main design of the first collection of our functional and trendy dive fashion. No matter what: Our t-shirts, polos, hoodies and caps offer an own sign of recognition for every diver. Extraordinary easy and simply clever!

Mass production? Not with 'Dive in the Blue'! The client himself can choose out of different features like shirt and design colors. In addition to that, he can customize it with his name or other individual text elements. Our high-quality fashion products are refined by hand in our own fablab (fabrics laboratory)!

Our online shop is still under construction, but it will be launched in spring 2016! Here's a first insight! You want to support us more? Then we have unique perks for you!

We were able to implement our first fashion line by our own credit. We've initiated good contacts with experienced manufacturers! That is why we are motivated to let the next step follow at once. We'd like to produce and sell our own equipment for diving and water sports!
But therefore, I need your support: In order to realize our philosophy of highest quality with best-price-policy, I have to order a special amount of items per stock. That is why I need a calculable funding!
With the revenue of this campaign, I would like to add the following diving goods to our assortment:

wetsuit (3mm)
diving mask
snorkel
diving flashlight

For this, I need approximately USD 8.000 (EUR 7.500,--)! The rest is going to be invested into exclusive perks as well as into fees and taxes.
The money funded by the crowd will be used for water sports equipment anyway – no matter what amount it finally will be. If there is less money available, I'll reduce the assortment! Do we achieve even more, I'll add some more products:

diving mask for kids
shorty (adults and children)
more items


I'm staunchly confident of our project! Even more than that, I look forward expectantly: How will the divers assimilate our products?
We're pitching high, but our equipment for water sports will convince you! Why am I so sure about that? I've tried every single item of our assortment myself and have supervised all improvements during the manufacturing process. I've controlled the usability, the quality and the safety of every product. This was the procedure and it will go on in the future – as long as I am 'addicted to water'! That's my promise!

You can be the first to get a unique 'Dive in the Blue' fashion product! This privilege is worth to get involved!
Your support opens a new opportunity for every participant in diving or any other water sports in order to buy their equipment or fashion products!
A big 'thank you' to all who are supporting us! Here are our valuable peaks:

Get our distinctive designs for diving and water sports on hoodies, polos, T-shirts or caps! This is an 'early bird' offer – our online shop has not yet opened!
Lifelong or on a time range: Get attractive 10% discounts for every order in our shop!
Get one of our exclusive fan articles: high-quality softshell jackets, trendy gymsacs or keybands – these products will definitely not be sold anywhere!
Be the first to get an unforgettable holiday experience at Turtles Beach Resort between Hurghada and El Gouna in Egypt (up from 2018).


All supporters will be named at our 'Wall of Fame' on the 'Dive in the Blue' website (as wished only).

At first, many thanks that you've read about us and our campaign up to this point! We're happy about your interest – no matter if you're planning to support our fundraising or not.
There are some more possibilities to help us getting well known:

Talk about 'Dive in the Blue' and our projects – surely there are divers or other participants in water sports in your family or among friends who will be happy to get informed about us!
Show them our crowdfunding campaign on indiegogo.com!
Visit our website and find our free Red Sea Reef Guide!



By the way: If you find interesting advertising on our website with articles you want to buy, please click on the ad! It will just cost you one moment of time, but we will get a small bonus, if you use these links.
Visit us on Facebook and 'like us' for staying updated.

Follow us on Twitter and/or subscribe to our newsletter!

You see, a word-of-mouth recommendation helps us to climb up. And who knows: Perhaps one day, you or one of your friends can call yourself 'supporter of the first generation'!
(Thank you for reading! Now we start with the German version of our campaign!)

story:
The Skrill Garden allows you to relax and calmly rake your Skrill into any shape or pattern, giving you the impression that you're in full control of your finances. 

Inspired by traditional zen gardens, we want to offer a product that takes your sense of peace and stability beyond simple sand and rocks, to the more relatable feel of cold hard cash.

You'll never feel more confident, in control and at peace than when you rake in your skrill with the innovative Skrill Garden. 

What We Need & What You Get

The Skrill Garden is a revolutionary new product. To get it off the ground, we need your help. Thanks to your support, we will have the seed funding necessary to build our first batch of Skrill Gardens to offer you and the world. 

We want to offer you the perfect perk for getting involved in our campaign. We offer perks that range from receiving a limited-edition original-line version of an actual Desktop Skrill Garden to the chance to meet and have lunch with the innovative creative team behind the product in Los Angeles, California. 

Even if our entire goal isn't met, we will still be able to provide a first-run limited edition product line of our innovative Skrill Garden for you to enjoy. 

The Impact

What more could a person want than a feeling of peace, balance, and control of their personal finances? 

Life is stressful. Jobs, deadlines, family, personal finances, animals - they're all burdens we bare. Few experience are more soothing than raking your own skrill. Whether it's easing the stress from that nagging boss or a way to wind down after a long day, the Skrill Garden has you covered. 

Our larger dream is to bring an increased sense of peace and stability to the world. 

Risks & Challenges

The risk of our campaign failing is that we will fail to bring our core mission of peace and stability to the world. We understand that it is always a challenge to garner support behind a new product, as innovative as it may be. 
We want to ensure the quality of every Skrill Garden we produce reaches our high standards of function and design.  There are always variables regarding quality involved in large scale production of a product that is new to the market. But with your support, we believe we can build and offer the best Skrill Gardens possible. 

Other Ways You Can Help

It's OK if you can't support the Skrill Garden financially at this time! There are many ways you can help. Please share this campaign with all family, friends and colleagues you have on all forms of social media. Together, we can work to bring the Skrill Garden to the world. 


IndieGoGo campaign created by Department 4

Disclaimer:

While the Skrill Garden IndieGoGo campaign is very real, the “skrill” included with the Skrill Garden is not real currency of any kind. Additionally, we make no claims to any actual health or financial benefits with the Skrill Garden product. None of the “gold” mentioned in any of the Skrill Garden products, such as the gold-plated rake in the Deluxe Set, is actual gold. But we do however hope that it brings you much joy and relaxation.

story:
About Me

In November 2014, I founded People Against Violence Org., where we offer 24-hour phone and private counseling (by qualified counselors), free self-defence classes, and access to alternative accommodations.

I designed this very important app called, uAlert in the summer of 2014 to actually send emergency assistance to victims of domestic or street violence. But my app got a little more sophisticated with several added features and internal reporting and statistics.

About This Project

I wanted to create an app that brought a real sense of security to both the user and the concerned family member or friend. There are various personal safety apps out in the market, but none like this one. When I first started designing uAlert back in the summer of 2014, I didn't even know that any had existed. Still, after having reviewed a few competing apps recently, I came to the conclusion that my original app still beats what is available today in the market. And here's why...

uAlert is a true emergency response system that uses your phone's gps to locate you and, when you raise an alert, sends help your way. It is a "system" because there are teams of people actually involved; it isn't a mere self-functioning app. It has been designed to offer the fastest and most efficient response in the event of an attack.

When the "Hi' alert button is pressed, not only is the police number in your designated country set up to dial out, but a video recording begins automatically and a short video is submitted to our centre. You have the option to send more video if you are able to. We have a team of personnel standing by for assistance and can communicate directly with the user/victim. What's more, we have the largest security company in the world able to offer scheduled security services exclusively through our app. (The only feature where there's an additional cost.)

Additional and crucial features include User Check-In, Missing Child Poster, My Diary, smart watch compatibility (where you can alert us even more quickly) and much more.

We are currently tweaking the app which, is set to be released end of October 2015. Did we mention that this app can be used worldwide?

What We Need & What You Get

The funding required is mostly paying for the high development costs of this very sophisticated app. We also require paid staff to monitor the alerts and communicate directly with the victims. We are, however, keeping all costs to a minimum, as we foresee that some expenses will also go into marketing our product.

We are still tweaking the app and would love to add a phase 2 with additional features but it will all depend on the success of this campaign.

As for perks, we can offer free self-defence classes and phone counselling with qualified counsellors, complements of People Against Violence Org. We can also add your business pin in our app! Please refer to the perks section.

Even if we do not reach our fundraising goal, we are already well into this and will roll with what we got. It is, after all, for a good cause and could save lives.

The Impact

The impact this app will have in the world in general is limitless. We believe that we could help save thousands of women, men, children and even animals from domestic abuse or street violence. But we're aiming to save much more. 

Our app tracks each case, giving us, as well as all countries, important and detailed information and statistics.

Risks & Challenges

I had tried putting together teams of volunteer emergency staff, aka, "The Help Squad", which was a challenge because these qualified crisis intervention officers needed to get paid.  Since I will be able to do this with additional funding, I keep this as an added bonus. The app still communicates with live people and will send for help when the alert is pressed because emergency contacts, my centre (staff) and the local police will still be notified. And this is all at no additional cost. However, if the user is willing to pay a little extra, we do offer extra security services.

Other Ways You Can Help

If monetary contribution is not an option, we would be grateful if you could just spread the word about this app and my campaign. Please also check out Indiegogo's share tools.

If you have read up to here then I'd like to thank you for your time. Now, let's make a difference!

We are still tweaking the app and would love to add a phase 2 with additional features but it will all depend on the success of this campaign.
As for perks, we can offer free self-defence classes and phone counselling with qualified counsellors, complements of People Against Violence Org. We can also add your business pin in our app! Please refer to the perks section.
Even if we do not reach our fundraising goal, we are already well into this and will roll with what we got. It is, after all, for a good cause and could save lives.   The Impact The impact this app will have in the world in general is limitless. We believe that we could help save thousands of women, men, children and even animals from domestic abuse or street violence. But we're aiming to save much more. 
Our app tracks each case, giving us, as well as all countries, important and detailed information and statistics.
    Risks & Challenges  I had tried putting together teams of volunteer emergency staff, aka, "The Help Squad", which was a challenge because these qualified crisis intervention officers needed to get paid.  Since I will be able to do this with additional funding, I keep this as an added bonus. The app still communicates with live people and will send for help when the alert is pressed because emergency contacts, my centre (staff) and the local police will still be notified. And this is all at no additional cost. However, if the user is willing to pay a little extra, we do offer extra security services.  Other Ways You Can Help If monetary contribution is not an option, we would be grateful if you could just spread the word about this app and my campaign. Please also check out Indiegogo's share tools.  If you have read up to here then I'd like to thank you for your time. Now, let's make a difference!

story:
WHAT IS EBLD?

UNECE (European) Regulations for vehicle manufacturers were updated in recent years, one of the amendments to the directives referred to an 'Emergency Brake Light Display' (or EBLD) that consisted of the following optional features:

  • Above 30mph the brake lights flash rapidly under heavy / emergency braking (flashing must be deactivated automatically when braking force logic is no longer applied)
  • Below 30mph the hazard warning light maybe activated (optional)

GSTOP® is a retrofit 'Emergency Brake Light Display' EBLD system with incorporated Telemetry Logger and Crash Data Recorder.

  • Industry Standard EBLD Retrofit System
  • Activates under harsh braking in milliseconds
  • Undetectable, when stationary (MOT Pass)
  • UNECE Compliant - UK and EU Road Legal
  • Telemetry Data Logger (records all braking characteristics)
  • APP Configurable (optional)

  • When emergency braking is detected, the device immediately modulates the 3rd brake light to alert following drivers
  • GSTOP® reacts within milliseconds, thousands of times faster than is humanly possible for a driver to hit the hazard warning switch 
  • Does not affect the normal operation of the brake lights
  • GSTOP® Companion APP, allowing the device to be configurable.

Comparison Chart (below)

When we looked at other market offerings for 'EBLD' Systems, we could not find any that complied with UK law or UNECE regulations.  Our chart below shows four of the most popular brake light modulators by sales popularity and their features in comparison to GSTOP®'s features at the time of publishing this list.

  • Looks Super Cool & Adds Safety

Features include:

  • Micro Processor based - the ultimate safety device for your ride!
  • Dual Stage G-Force Triggers
  • Pulse Speed Adjustment
  • Duty Cycle Adjustment
  • Intelligent Duration Timer Over-Run
  • GPS assisted Crash Data Logger - with Companion App
  • Telemetry Logger - Graph and Chart Analytics
  • Small and Compact - discreet package size and easy to install
  • Bulb or LED Operation - Suitable for Bulb Monitor systems

  • Fire resistant ABS Plastic
  • Moisture-resistant treated
  • Fail-Safe (Brake Lights continue to work normally if GSTOP® Fails)
  • Durable to allow longevity and operation during any impact

PERKS

  • Campaign pricing is significantly discounted from retail price!
  • Edition Black will only be available during this campaign
  • Act now and get the best pricing we have ever offered!

Available purchase options are:

  • GSTOP® Branded Mug - £5
  • Edition Black GSTOP® (Single unit) - £20
  • Edition Black GSTOP® (Twin Pack) - £40
  • Shipping Costs apply

We are ready for mass production and to start shipping GSTOP® modules to you! By securing pre-orders, we will be ready to start dispatch by the end of February for early March 2016.

Our updated Goal

We would like to secure £6,000 in initial orders, this helps us with production costs.  However, if we do not reach this goal, production will still go ahead, but the increased cost maybe reflected in retail pricing.

GSTOP® is not an idea, and no longer requires development. GSTOP® already exists, and has shipped to more than 50 people worldwide for beta testing.  Beta test versions have been available to buy from our website for some time, and the feedback we are getting has been really promising.

FAQ's

  • Q: Does the GSTOP® Companion App work with all devices?
  • A: The GSTOP® App works with both Apple and Android. It will be available from the App Store and Google Play.
  • Q: Does the GSTOP® come with a guarantee?
  • A: The GSTOP® has a 1-year manufacturer's warranty.

THE GSTOP® STORY

Picture this scenario.. Your travelling at 60mph on the motorway, leisurely taking your time, your in no rush, and your certainly no racer type.. Then Suddenly, The realisation all the traffic in front of you has come to a stop! (We have all been there!) Adrenaline sharpens your senses, the bodies natural defence and method of heightened alert jumps into play.. you react, in less than a second, your foot is moving for the brakes, and your razor sharp reactions just stopped you crashing into the car in front.

Sitting there, a little shaken from the event that may still be unfolding, you reach for the hazard warning lights, not only a courteous response to warn vehicles behind of the danger, but also a natural reaction to reduce the risk of then being hit from behind.. 

..What if, you could give that crucial heavy braking warning seconds earlier, at the split second your toes touched the brake pedal? Those extra few seconds could make the difference between a near miss, a little bump, or something tragic.

Today, only some top specification cars and motorbikes have EBLD technology built-in by the manufacturers!

so we made 'GSTOP®' ..but it had to be better in order to compete, so our team went to town, and made GSTOP® truly innovative.

THE GSTOP® TEAM

  • Mark Deeley - 34yrs of age
  • Electrical Technician of 15 years
  • Embedded technology and software
  • Qualified Nominated MOT Tester (Class 4 & 7)
  • Studied at Emtec in Leicester, UK
  • Studied at City of Wolverhampton College, UK

  • Yang Minghua - 30yrs of age
  • Embedded firmware/hardware engineer of 8 years
  • Wireless sensor network
  • RF technology specialist
  • Studied at GLIET university, China

  • Lin Jie - 31yrs of age
  • Software Engineer of 7 years Coding and software developer
  • Electrical Engineering and Automation
  • Guilin University of Electronic Technology, China

  • Huang Zhijun - 27yrs of age
  • PE & RD engineer for 5 years
  • SCH / PCB layout, produce and process
  • Bachelor of engineering from Guangxi Normal University, China

  • Shu Peng - 28yrs of age
  • iOS Developer for 5 years
  • Bachelor of Micro-Electronic
  • GuiLin University of electronic technology, China

  • Richard Carpenter, 30yrs of age
  • Creative director at Design380 Ltd
  • Specialises in Front-End development
  • Digital Graphics for the past 10 years

 ---

Thank you for reading our campaign and we really appreciate your support!

story:
What are we fundraising for? / Warum Fundraising für eine Arzneimittelentwicklung? - English text below

Als kleine Ausgründung aus der Freien Universität Berlin haben wir gemeinsam mit Prof. Christoph Stein von der Charité Berlin und Prof. Haag von der FU Berlin eine bahnbrechende Entdecklung gemacht: Nanoverkapselte Opiate, ohne zentrale Nebenwirkungen. Damit ist es möglich, dass sich Schmerzpatienten ohne Gefahr von Sucht, von Sedierung und ohne Nebenwirkungen von den Vorteilen von Opiaten profitieren könnten.

Wir verwenden hierbei ein Opiat, welches von Big Pharma aus der Forschung aussortiert wurde. Dieses Arzneimittel wollen wir möglichst schnell für Menschen und Tiere verfügbar machen. Insbesondere Katzen vertragen viele Schmerzmittel nur schlecht oder gar nicht.

Dafür benötigen wir Unterstützung: jeder Unterstützer der auch nur 1 Euro/1 US $ spendet zeigt, dass Ihr oder Ihm dieses Thema wichtig ist.

Je mehr Unterstützer sich finden, desto gewichtiger wird unser Anliegen auch in Hinblick auf die Bewilligung von EU-Fördermitteln. Weiterhin werden wir alle Unterstützer informieren, wenn es soweit ist, dass wir Probanden suchen.


Folgende Erfolge haben wir bereits erreicht:

1. Kooperation mit dem Dresdener Künstler Chris Löhmann, der nun nicht nur das 25US$ Desin sondern auch eine Original Radierung für alle Spender, die mindestens 100 US$ spenden, bereitstellen wird. http://chris-loehmann.de/

2. Zusage von direktem Beteiligungskapital in Höhe von 60.000 € durch zwei Privatpersonen.

Damit haben wir bereits ca. 40% der benötigten Summe eingeworben. Bitte teilen Sie diese Kampagne auf Facebook, via Mail.

Auch jede kleine Unterstützung ist wichtig, um zu zeigen, dass auch Sie Menschen kennen, von einer effizienteren Schmerztherapie profitieren könnten.


Our fundraising goal -  a better quality of life with chronic pain:

Millions of people suffer from chronic pain. Back pain. Cancer pain. Chronic visceral pain. And as you may know the most efficient pain killers are opioids, like morphine or oxycodone for excample.

The  use  of opioids for acute pain or terminal pain is well accepted. Their role in the long-term treatment of chronic noncancer pain is, however, highly controversial for many reasons. One of the primary reasons is the well-known phenomenon of psychological addiction that can occur with the use of these medications.

For those who can and will obtain them, opioids come with risks and severe side effects like respiratory depression and severe constipation, nausea and drowsiness.

Just imagine: an opioid, which does neither cause addiction, nor sedation or drowsiness and no constipation.




A drug that combats your pain, but does not compromize your mind and thinking. A drug that enables you to stay active, keep your job and your quality of life.

A drug that shall be available at low cost for everybody.

Prof. Christoph Stein, MD, from the Charité University Hospital in Berlin, previously  Johns Hopkins University (JHU) Baltimore, USA has discovered a mechanism of action that will make all this true.

First experiments have shown that the feat can be accomplished.

Prof. Stein was one of the first scientists to realize that pain does not need to be controlled in the brain - it can be controlled at the site of damage instead.


How does it work:

Very simply: 

Step 1: Most pain like tumor pain, post-operative pain, visceral pain is associated with inflammation. This causes changes in the metabolism of this tissue.

Step2: Pain receptors (opioid receptors) are multiplied in this case at the inflammed site - outside the brain. The diseased tissue also becomes more acidic than healthy tissue.

Step 3: We combine an excisting opiod with a nanocarrier.

Step 4: The resulting drug molecule is now so large that it cannot pass through the blood brain barrier. It can only penetrate damaged and inflammed tissue.

Step 5: The drug is released only at the painfull, inflammed region of the body.


Who are we?

The campaign is led by the DendroPharm team. Together with Prof. Dr. Haag of the Free University of Berlin we have developed a cutting edge nanocarrier technology and developed the a novel method for nanocarrier synthesis.



We are a small team of 5 expierienced Ph.D.-level scientists plus one technician. We are partnering with a university hospital and a well established polymer science research group. Each of us has more than 8 years expierience in his or her field of expertise.
Neither of us has the money to fund the next step - we put all our money into developing the nanocarrier technology. In 2014 we were nomimated for the technology transfer award Berlin-Brandenburg (Gründerpreis). With a shoe-string budget we have set up a laboratory and conduced the first safety tests. We are highly lucky in the aspect that we can use the university laboratory for the next 2 years to come.

Big Pharma has spent billions of US$$$ on the resesarch on drugs. Due to side effects and strategic reasons more than 95 % of these compounds never reach a patient. We have identified serveral of  highly potent opiod derivates that were never used. We will screen them in our lab and pick the best match to our technology.

Imagine: Just with the first drug compound we selected we already had a pain killing potential similar to morphine. And we can do better!

... and afterward we will bring the drug to the patient.


read more about Prof. Christoph Stein:
http://anaesthesie.charite.de/fileadmin/user_upload/microsites/m_cc07/anaesthesie/pdfs/CVs/CV_Stein_2012.pdf

and his wife and collaborator Prof. Halina Stein:
http://anaesthesie.charite.de/fileadmin/user_upload/microsites/m_cc07/anaesthesie/pdfs/CVs/CV-H.Machelska.pdf

read more about our research group partner Prof. Rainer Haag:
http://userpage.chemie.fu-berlin.de/~akhaag/nanocarriers.html
http://www.polytree.de/
http://userpage.chemie.fu-berlin.de/~akhaag/vita01.html

What we need:

We want to raise enough money to enable Prof. Stein and our team to conduct clinical trials on this groundbreaking technology.

1 million US$ will enable us to do it - 2 million US$ will enable us to do it really well.

How can we do this with just 150.000 US$ to 300.000 US$?

Our funds will be matched by a public reasearch grant - but we need to finance 15 % of that sum. Otherwise we won`t be eligeble for this grant.

With this money we can:

- synthezise nanocarriers for drug trials including paying for the laboratory upgrade from current ISO 9001 standards to the required GMP standards. We will rent specific laboratory space at a research park in Luckenwalde about 50 km south of Berlin for this.

- pay for safety tests required for the clinical trial.

- do the first clinical trials in a limited number of patients at the Berlin Charité University hospital.

How likely is it that we get the grant?

Very likely. We have had a very promising presentation of our technology in November. In case that we only have the money from this campaign we will take a step-wise approach and start with developing this technology for veterinary applications. Cats are very sensitive to many pain-killing drugs and we identified a high medical need in this field as well. In this case we will collaborate with the veterinary university hospital and develop a veterinary drug. With the income of this project we can pay for the clinical trials. So in any case - we can make it happen - with your help. 

We will also stay independent enough from Big Pharma to make sure that the price for this medication will stay affordable for all.

  1. Please donate.
  2. Please help us share our campaign on Facebook and Twitter
  3. Please tell all your friends.

What you’ll get:

We have lined up some amazing perks from having an artist creating a unique etching for this campaign to having your name published in the research papers. They also include an invitation to the lab in Berlin to meet the scientists, and exclusive tours and lectures.

We will be adding more perks as our campaign progresses.

You will become part of medical history.

Thank you.

A thankyou to everybody for looking at this campaign.

story:
Why Isn't There Filipino Food in Boston?

Boston is a world-class city and it's surprising that a cuisine as complex and ripe for interesting exploration as Filipino food is not on the restaurant roster. There are many eaters like me that enjoy engaging with other cultures through food, so it's really not a question of how many Filipinos there are to eat the food... so, what gives?

I'm Ellie and I'm one half of the dynamic Filipino-American sibling duo that's dreamed up and executed pop-ups of all forms, shapes and sizes in Boston this past year. The answer is complex, but I think one of the puzzle pieces into which Kulinarya and the Pamangan pop up fit is answering the call to create. If the pop-ups we've run are any indication of the hunger Boston has for Filipino food and our take on our Kapampangan heritage, we're also getting at another piece: 

The desire to have the Filipino-inspired food that Pamangan is serving is clear. Dare we say... ardent.

Filipino food in Boston. Why not, indeed!

But This Isn't Just About Filipino Food

While we are filling this void of Filipino food in Boston, what’s even more important to us is that we do this work in a way that takes care of everyone involved — that’s diners and all the people that work hard to put that food in front of you. From the beginning, we want our voice to carry a message that says food is more than a transaction. 

Our restaurant will be an echo chamber for all the important work people are already doing to change the way that people think about food consumption. People are behind every part of that process and our mission is to be intentional about recognizing that in a practical way. 

For us, that means sourcing from farms and other producers who have a sense of purpose beyond profit and who treat their folks well. That means starting with a living wage for the people that work with us and working to provide them benefits and ways of plugging into the business. That means thinking about you, and how our food nourishes your health, but also your soul (that beind said, there's always time and place for lechon).

So Where Does My Money Go?

Funding a restaurant is an expensive and risky endeavor. That's not lost on us and it's why we believe your contribution is an essential part of giving the restaurant the best shot it has. We have a concept (tapas bar!) and a realistic idea of how much money we'll need (a lot!) -- so your piece comes into making sure the space we decide to make our home is in the right place and is on favorable terms. 

Many bootstrapped restaurant businesses not only cut corners but rush into decisions without enough consideration, and we want to avoid that. $20,000 of your contribution will go towards legal, financial and marketing counsel as we make our first move: securing a space.

The rest will go towards supplementing the funds we pay into the pop-up to develop the menu, find a place in town that'll let us be a regular fixture and explore questions like "What does it take for us to pay all our staff a living wage and still survive the restaurant grind?" "How can we involve the people who grow and raise our food in our business?" and "What can we do to continue to rethink the hierarchy of the kitchen and the floor?"

So, are you wondering why there isn't Filipino food in Boston? Are you wondering why Filipino food hasn't had the same presence that other food cultures have? Do you live in Boston and want to be part of bringing a culture that needs representation to the place you call home? Do you live elsewhere and care about the representation of the Filipino diaspora? DONATE!

We've got 30 days to make it happen! If we meet our goal, let's party! Pamangan will throw a holiday party for all our contributors in Boston!

About the Project Thus Far

While we both had a lot of personal and professional experience, we started this project flying by the seats of our pants. We really had no expectation for this beyond being able to do something together that we’ve always done, put ourselves wholly into the task of creating and cooking and serving food, something that has always been an expression of love in our family. The intensity of support and excitement for more of what we were doing was inspiring and without hesitation, both me and my brother felt we had to do it again.

Since August of 2014, we’ve hosted this dinner in many places, turning everything from gallery spaces to cafes into restaurants for a night. My brother often takes a red-eye flight on a Friday night to be here for a weekend of insanity and we’ve made lots of connections to folks and facilitated connections between folks who are completely supportive of bringing Filipino food to Boston. Since that first pop up, our idea of what we want has become more and more concrete and it’s clear to both of us that we want to give Filipino food a permanent home in Boston. What that means is a restaurant and that’s why we’re asking for your help.

Personally, I’ve explored many different paths… it’s almost cliche that I return to the place I began, making Filipino food. One of my first memories is of being at the stove with my dad, on a step stool, stirring a sauce while he showed me what to watch for as it thickened. With my dad being a chef, and with our house being the house that all family and friend gatherings happened, and with so many positive memories around the preparation of food, making food is a way for me to bring the social and sharing culture of it that I’ve known all my life.

Does My Contribution Absolutely, Positively Guarantee This Restaurant Is Happening?

The short and disappointing answer is "no." What's important to say is that there are lots of pieces that are crucial to opening any restaurant's doors and unforeseeable things can happen that stall or halt the process. That being said, we're repositioning our lives to give this project everything it needs to become a brick and mortar. 

RJ is going to be one of the major investors in the business and I will be 100% focused on the task of bringing the restaurant to life, and running it once we've welcomed you in.

Your contribution is an essential piece to giving this restaurant the best chance possible here in Boston and acts two-fold: it shows investors that there is undeniable support and demand for a Filipino restaurant in Boston and it provides us with the capital necessary to secure a space and to develop best practices that will inform the restaurant.

Money Is Hard to Come By, But I Still Want to Support!

Tell your friends and urge them to donate. That is one of the most helpful things you can do! If there's one specific thing we'd like to ask all of you to do is record a 15-second video to put on Instagram or Facebook about why you think Pamangan should be a restaurant! Tag it with #PamanganPopUp and #RestaurantorBust2016 and we'll feature it and shower you with many, many thanks!

I also know you have mad skills. The business of making a restaurant go is much, much more than chopping onions with lightning speed and zero tearing (but if that's one of your many talents, then I wanna hear about it!). Email me at ellie@kulinarya.us and let's sit down for coffee.

I Got Other Questions

Q: It's that gift-giving time of year. What if I want to send a perk to someone else?

A: Easy-peasy! Just use their name and address in the shipping information. If you find there's any problem at all with this, email Ellie at ellie@kulinarya.us!

Q: What if I want to just pick up my perk from you?

A: This is possible, but only for a limited time and you need to tell me by December 16th! You can pick the perk up at a pop-up or locally in the Boston area dates all throughout the second half of December. As far as I can tell, Indie Go Go won't offer optional shipping, so if you come our way, I can offer you a refund of your shipping cost. I'll ship in January if I have somehow missed you!
story_txt:
Why Isn't There Filipino Food in Boston? Boston is a world-class city and it's surprising that a cuisine as complex and ripe for interesting exploration as Filipino food is not on the restaurant roster. There are many eaters like me that enjoy engaging with other cultures through food, so it's really not a question of how many Filipinos there are to eat the food... so, what gives?
I'm Ellie and I'm one half of the dynamic Filipino-American sibling duo that's dreamed up and executed pop-ups of all forms, shapes and sizes in Boston this past year. The answer is complex, but I think one of the puzzle pieces into which Kulinarya and the Pamangan pop up fit is answering the call to create. If the pop-ups we've run are any indication of the hunger Boston has for Filipino food and our take on our Kapampangan heritage, we're also getting at another piece: 
The desire to have the Filipino-inspired food that Pamangan is serving is clear. Dare we say... ardent.
Filipino food in Boston. Why not, indeed!




But This Isn't Just About Filipino Food
While we are filling this void of Filipino food in Boston, what’s even more important to us is that we do this work in a way that takes care of everyone involved — that’s diners and all the people that work hard to put that food in front of you. From the beginning, we want our voice to carry a message that says food is more than a transaction. 
Our restaurant will be an echo chamber for all the important work people are already doing to change the way that people think about food consumption. People are behind every part of that process and our mission is to be intentional about recognizing that in a practical way.

story:
Kettle Falls Five

The Kettle Falls Five are 5 qualified medical marijuana patients in Washington State that have been prosecuted & persecuted by the United States Federal Government since 2012 and were just sentenced to years in Federal Prison for following their doctors medical marijuana prescriptions and theirs Washington State law. A little background on the events leading up to now:

  • August 9th, 2012 (first SWAT team raid) - Stevens County Sheriff's office, WA State Patrol, US Border Patrol & DEA officers and agents conduct a SWAT team raid after the United States Civil Air Patrol flew over Rhonda & Larry Harvey's 33 acre property and spotted what they thought was a small outdoor medical marijuana grow. The first raid was executed with a Stevens County Sheriff's office warrant. Rhonda was the only one home. Immediately Rhonda shared the 5 valid medical marijuana prescriptions with the Sheriff. The Sheriff called the local county prosecutor who told the Sheriff to not arrest anyone but to leave the 45 plants in the ground because they were following & in compliance with the state law RCW 69.51a. Even though these state legal medical marijuana patients were in compliance with state law, the Sheriff's office still confiscated and seized all of Larry's hunting rifles and the Honda four-wheeler the older couple used to drive around their property. This may have been because DEA agent Sam Keiser was present. Although this first SWAT team raid was under the jurisdiction of Sgt. Loren A. Erdman who was sworn to uphold State law.
  • August 16th, 2012 (second SWAT team raid) - Stevens County Sheriff's office, WA State Patrol, US Border Patrol & DEA officers and agents conduct a second SWAT team raid 7 days after the State raid, this time with a Federal Search Warrant led by DEA agent Sam Keiser. They proceeded to destroy the 45 harmless outdoor medical marijuana plants, to confiscate & seize Rhonda's 2006 Saturn SUV, two Suzuki motorcycles, the home computer & $700 in cash. No arrests were made that day. The US government DEA thugs simply came with automatic weapons & moving trucks then destroyed, stole property that wasn't theirs and left. 
  • February 2013  - United States Government charges and arrests 5 sate legal medical marijuana patients via Attorney for the Eastern District of Washington Michael Ormsby who charged Rhonda Firestack-Harvey, Larry Harvey, Rolland Gregg, Michelle Gregg & Heather Zucker with the following 7 major federal drug charges including:
  1. 21 U.S.C. S 846 Conspiracy to Manufacture and Distribute 100 or More Marijuana Plants (Count 1)
  2. 21 U.S.C. S 841 (a)(1) and 18 U.S.C. S 2 Manufacture of 100 or More Marijuana Plants, (Count 2)
  3. 21 U.S.C. S 841 (a)(1) and 18 U.S.C. S 2 Possession with Intent to Distribute Marijuana (Count 3)
  4. 21 U.S.C S 841 (a)(1) and 18 U.S.C. S 2 Distribution of Marijuana
  5. 18 U.S.C. S 924 (c) Possession of a Firearm In Furtherance of a Drug Trafficking Crime (Count 5)
  6. 21 U.S.C. S 856 (a)(1) Maintaining a Drug Involved Premise
  7. 21 U.S.C. S 853 Notice of Criminal Forfeiture
  • February 2013 (third SWAT team raid) - Stevens County Sheriff's office, WA State Patrol, US Border Patrol, Kirkland Police, Seattle Police & DEA officers/agents conduct a SWAT team raid on 3 separate houses at 6 AM. Rhonda & Larry Harvey near Kettle Falls, WA; their son & daughter and law's house in Kirkland, WA; Jason & Heather Zucker in Seattle, WA.
  • Everyone was arrested & taken to Federal Prison and released after weeks in prison. Everyone was released on what's called "appearance bonds." Meaning all 5 medical marijuana patients now had to follow 16 different 'conditions of release'. Meaning that if we didn't follow the US governments orders, we would be taken back to Prison immediately (can't leave the State of WA, can't follow our doctors orders and use our medical marijuana for the ailments that the doctors prescribed us the mmj, can't have contact with ANY of the other co-defendants, can't be out of the house past 9 PM, must drive to Federal Probation office in Seattle & Spokane to pee in a cup and take urine analysis every week and many more conditions). 
  • 2013, 2014 we fight to push the court case out with continuances in hopes that Congress will change the laws as we lobby hard in Washington D.C. Larry Harvey and Kari Boiter from Americans For Safe Access make many trips to Washington D.C. to testify before Congress about how the Federal drug laws are harming innocent patients and usurping State Medical Marijuana Laws being passed by The People in 40 states now.
  • December 17th, 2014 - President Obama signs into law the first time ever that Medical Marijuana was mentioned and protected from Federal interference with Section 538 of the 2015 Continuing Appropriations Act, the "cromnibus". We thought this would stop the prosecution because Section 538 states, "None of the funds made available in this Act to the Department of Justice may be used, with respect to the States of Alabama, Alaska, Arizona, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, District of Columbia, Florida, Hawaii, Illinois, Iowa, Kentucky, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Mississippi, Missouri, Montana, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New Mexico, Oregon, Rhode Island, South Carolina, Tennessee, Utah, Vermont, Washington, and Wisconsin, to prevent such States from implementing their own State laws that authorize the use, distribution, possession, or cultivation of medical marijuana."
  • March 3rd, 2015 - The trial starts at the Thomas Foley US Federal Courthouse in Spokane, WA. Six days later after a full day of jury deliberation, the jury comes back with not-guilty on 4 of 5 charges. The last charge was actually a "lesser included crime" of manufacturing over 50 and under 100 plants. So we were literally convicted of exactly what is legal under Washington State Medical Marijuana laws RCW 69.51a.
  • October 2nd, 2015 - Sentencing for the manufacturing over 50 and under 100 plants at the Thomas Foley US Federal Courthouse in Spokane, WA. Rhonda Firestack-Harvey receives 1 year and 1 day in Federal Prison and 3 years of Federal Probation, Michelle Gregg received 1 year and 1 day in Federal Prison and Rolland Gregg received 33 months in prison and 3 years probation.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help with spreading the world and funding our appeals process as we make our way to the 9th Circuit and eventually to the Supreme Court.

  • Effective attorneys aren't usually free. So far Phil Telfeyan with EqualJusticeUnderLaw.org has been defending our family Pro Bono. He needs help and a budget to work with.
  • When we win at the Supreme Court we hope to make Cannabis federally legal nationwide & worldwide after that.
  • The funds will go towards our legal fight, there are so many expenses that have come out of our pocket to fight this battle the last 3 years. For example the US Federal Government has spent over $2.5 million dollars prosecuting us and we've spent thousands in comparison with help from friends and family.

The Impact

The impact will be rolling back the Federal governments powers which are currently impeding on our individual liberties and our god given rights to decide what foods we eat and what medicines we take care of ourselves and our loved ones with.

  • When the Supreme Court overturns our manufacturing conviction, this will open up a new world of liberties and freedoms we do not have now.
  • So far we have defended ourselves from the tyrranical oppression of the DEA and the full force of the US Department of Injustice and we will not stop until the record is set straight.
  • We will be doing video updates of our progress and other ways you can help!

Risks & Challenges

The risks are that if we don't overturn this conviction not only will we go to prison for years but it will set a precedent that could turn back all of the progress that the states and the people have made over the last 30 years in rolling back the draconian US cannabis laws. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate, please share the link and the campaign and tell everyone you know about this.

story:
We could all use some support from time to time

Message from the creator:

The Bladeflex support system will be one of the most effective and useful support systems on the market, and we are excited to say that with your support, you can reap its benefits too.  Through my own personal struggles with back pain and injuries, which led to bad habits and poor posture, the value that this has added to my life is apparent, and I know that you will feel the same way once you can incorporate it into your life as well.

 

Benefits of Bladeflex

  1. Retractable - Very easy to put on and take off, and it doesn't restrict your natural movements eg. Reaching for your phone or a dinner plate.
  2. Adjustable - The size of the straps and the level of resistance can be adjusted in order to adapt to your progressing needs.
  3. Strong - Bladeflex was engineered to be strong and to withstand the pressure it is put under as it is regularly used.
  4. The System - The Pro Posture Pack System, including simple exercises with the thera-band  and a massage ball roller to help relieve tight muscles, will ensure that long-term benefits are truly accomplished with real results that matter most to you.

The funds we are raising in this Indiegogo campaign are to help us take this product to our last and final stage which is mold production.  We know that we will be getting this product to market in a very reasonable time frame and that all the manufacturers involved with the final product will have high standards.  We have only accepted the best with our team and that has ensured us over the years, through dozens of different prototypes and numerous methods for assembly, we will meet our goal of creating a strong, lasting, supportive device.

 

New refined look

We will also be refining the prototype with molding engineers to make sure that the overall look and feel is the best that we can get during the molding process. These steps involve softening the edges and adding more defined radiuses to the entire device. Not only will this allow an easier molding process, but a more refined overall look.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IU8l-wJ_kFc

 

Why we are pre-selling and what benefits you get

We are pre-selling our Bladeflex packages to get the final processes completed (incl. mold making) and start shipping our product in 2017.  These offers are exclusive to Indiegogo and we are excited to be able to bring this product to market and see the real benefits it can add to peoples lives.

This early bird package has a special price and has great value which includes:

  1. Bladeflex - A retractable upper body brace designed to easily help correct posture
  2. Latex-free Thera-band - An exercise band to retrain back muscles (with a few simple exercises with videos coming to our website soon)
  3. Massage ball roller - An effective hand held massage ball roller for targeting tight muscles
  4. Dry-fit t-shirt - High quality shirt designed to keep you dry and can be worn under Bladeflex
  5. Drawstring bag - Can be used to store your Bladeflex or used as a gym bag

The Impact

We will be manufacturing and assembling this product close to home, supporting the local communities and surrounding areas in the process.  Making this product to a high standard means not cutting any corners, resulting in a top quality product.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have limited our risks by creating a team of manufacturers that conduct their businesses at the highest levels with the best quality materials ensuring you will have a product that will last as long as you need it to.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We have a special offer on our website to be entered in to win a Bladeflex Pro Posture Pack (value $250) if you sign up for our newsletter.  We have some useful health and fitness tips along with product updates so we encourage you if you cant contribute now to please sign up!
story_txt:
We could all use some support from time to time
Message from the creator:
The Bladeflex support system will be one of the most effective and useful support systems on the market, and we are excited to say that with your support, you can reap its benefits too.  Through my own personal struggles with back pain and injuries, which led to bad habits and poor posture, the value that this has added to my life is apparent, and I know that you will feel the same way once you can incorporate it into your life as well.
 
Benefits of Bladeflex 

Retractable - Very easy to put on and take off, and it doesn't restrict your natural movements eg. Reaching for your phone or a dinner plate.
Adjustable - The size of the straps and the level of resistance can be adjusted in order to adapt to your progressing needs.
Strong - Bladeflex was engineered to be strong and to withstand the pressure it is put under as it is regularly used.
The System - The Pro Posture Pack System, including simple exercises with the thera-band  and a massage ball roller to help relieve tight muscles, will ensure that long-term benefits are truly accomplished with real results that matter most to you.

The funds we are raising in this Indiegogo campaign are to help us take this product to our last and final stage which is mold production.  We know that we will be getting this product to market in a very reasonable time frame and that all the manufacturers involved with the final product will have high standards.  We have only accepted the best with our team and that has ensured us over the years, through dozens of different prototypes and numerous methods for assembly, we will meet our goal of creating a strong, lasting, supportive device.
 
New refined look
We will also be refining the prototype with molding engineers to make sure that the overall look and feel is the best that we can get during the molding process. These steps involve softening the edges and adding more defined radiuses to the entire device. Not only will this allow an easier molding process, but a more refined overall look.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IU8l-wJ_kFc


 
Why we are pre-selling and what benefits you get
We are pre-selling our Bladeflex packages to get the final processes completed (incl. mold making) and start shipping our product in 2017.  These offers are exclusive to Indiegogo and we are excited to be able to bring this product to market and see the real benefits it can add to peoples lives.

This early bird package has a special price and has great value which includes:

Bladeflex - A retractable upper body brace designed to easily help correct posture
Latex-free Thera-band - An exercise band to retrain back muscles (with a few simple exercises with videos coming to our website soon)
Massage ball roller - An effective hand held massage ball roller for targeting tight muscles
Dry-fit t-shirt - High quality shirt designed to keep you dry and can be worn under Bladeflex
Drawstring bag - Can be used to store your Bladeflex or used as a gym bag


The Impact
We will be manufacturing and assembling this product close to home, supporting the local communities and surrounding areas in the process.  Making this product to a high standard means not cutting any corners, resulting in a top quality product.
 

Risks & Challenges
We have limited our risks by creating a team of manufacturers that conduct their businesses at the highest levels with the best quality materials ensuring you will have a product that will last as long as you need it to.
 

Other Ways You Can HelpWe have a special offer on our website to be entered in to win a Bladeflex Pro Posture Pack (value $250) if you sign up for our newsletter.  We have some useful health and fitness tips along with product updates so we encourage you if you cant contribute now to please sign up!

story:
Choosing a care provider for a family member or a loved one is extremely stressful, due to several reasons:

  • how to recognize good quality home care service;
  • the fear of bringing in a stranger into their home; and
  • the lack of transparency in the market in terms of the quality of services on offer.
Through our research we discovered that in the eyes of home care users the quality of care is, contrary to general belief, not primarily reflected in the expertise (formal or otherwise) of the care provider, but in the pleasantness of the relationship between them.

A systematic and scientific way of ensuring this pleasantness of relationship, which would be both time and cost effective, is to attest several psychological and social compatibility features for both potential care providers and care users:

  • very particular expertize a care user may need and the expertize the potential care provider can offer;
  • different social and demographic preferences a care user may have; and
  • the psychological and emotional traits of the care user and the potential care provider.

Over the last 8 months we have piloted our tool in a smaller institution providing home care and have seen excellent results:

  • reduction of initial caregiver rejection by 80%;
  • increase in client satisfaction;
  • less caregiver burnout; and
  • less stress for all parties involved.

At this point, we are faced with two challenges:

  • promoting our service so it can help more people by being adopted by more institutions providing home care; and
  • strengthening our matching algorithm.

In order to do that, we need funds to pilot the prototype test in a larger and a more international setting and to present our service wider to the home care community.

story:
WHAT IS GetStartedLosingWeight.com

We are the Baxter’s of ReformedFatAss.com.  We need your financial support in order to transform the lives of people who are overweight, out of shape and frustrated into a healthier, happier life.  Our comprehensive 56 day program is tailored for beginners, so they can start their long term weight loss journey the right way.

From our own personal lifestyle transformation, we teach people how to gradually and incrementally change their everyday habits into health ones by addressing the 3 “E’s” of permanent weight loss:

  •  EATING
  • EXERCISE
  • EMOTIONAL CHALLENGES

This program is not a diet nor is a fitness routine, but a total lifestyle transformation program with a special emphasis on developing the mindset that is needed to achieve success. 

WHY ARE WE DOING THIS

Alex and Avril Baxter know first hand what it is like to be overweight and out of shape.  We have lost a combined 150 lbs. and kept it off for over 6 years.  We want to teach others how to do it because we know how getting fit and healthy completely changes your life for the better.  About 2 years ago we started a free educational website, ReformedFatAss.com, to help people make better decisions about eating and exercising.

We have found that the main reason people fail to keep excess weight off is that they do not change their unhealthy lifestyle.  Some people try fad, quick diets or starve themselves on short term meal plans.  Because they do not adjust their true habits, the weight loss is only temporary.  Still others don’t even try because they know its not a long term solution.

From our own weight loss journey we know how to transform habits.  We know the challenges and obstacles and have specially designed GetStartedLosingWeight.com to reorient how people view food and exercise.  The program also features a fun, educational way to maintain daily focus which is vital to weight loss.  We harness the mind to drive short term and long term results.  The result is a total improvement in the quality of life.

PROGRAM OVERVIEW

The GetStartedLosingWeight.com program is 8 weeks of transformation by incrementally breaking old habits and establishing healthy ones.  Every week starts with a motivational video that outlines the objectives of the week and addresses the emotional challenges subscribers will encounter in the week ahead.  Each day subscribers receive a beginner level exercise video with instruction from the Baxter’s.  They also receive two videos a week on practical ways to eat healthy while balancing a real life of kids and work.  Finally, subscribers watch a personal message from us that recaps the week’s accomplishments and celebrates the completion of another transformative week.

IMPACT

The financial cost of being overweight and out of shape are enormous in terms of increases in sickness and disease, but the real cost is the reduced quality of life.  Being overweight means there are simply things you can’t do or worse yet things you avoid doing because of your weight.

It’s the inability to coach your kid’s sports team or maybe it’s the poor example you set for your kids by being overweight and out of shape.  It could be depressing intimacy with your mate or suppressing your ability to attract a mate.  Or it may simply be a lack of self confidence that holds you back from living a full and satisfied life.

GetStartedLosingWeight.com will change people’s lives in ways they can’t even image.  We have lived on both sides of the scale and this is why we are so passionate about helping others get healthy.  Everything changes when you dramatically upgrade your physical appearance.  Life feels better when you are healthy and fit.

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

GetStartedLosingWeight.com is currently just a domain name.  We need your support to make the website into a program.  Your contribution will also help us produce the 88 videos that are needed to transform subscribers’ lives one day at a time.  Your support is also needed for us to market this real life program for people ready to make a change.

SPECIAL CONTRIBUTION PERKS

$500 - we are offering to make your company the official sponsor of 4 videos.  That’s very cost effective marketing!

$2000 - you receive 4 weeks of one on one personal coaching from the Baxter’s.  Use it yourself or give it as a thoughtful gift.  This customized instruction will include a 30-minute live video call each week with instruction on eating, exercise and emotional discovery.

We appreciate your support on launching GetStartedLosingWeight.com.
