story:
Meet nestCARE – a Program Designed to Manage Health and Wellness Through Technology and Connection

nestCARE is:

  • A suite of secure, Bluetooth-enabled devices that measure key vital signs – a blood pressure cuff, a smart scale, a pulse oximeter and a wearable activity tracker/medications reminder.
  • A dynamic app for smartphones and tablets that acts as a personal wellness coach and a communication hub.

  • An opportunity for individuals and support networks to manage health and wellness together, no matter the distance.

By participating in our crowdfunding campaign, you'll receive the nestCARE products and program at a (very) discounted price prior to our public launch.

Purchase nestCARE before the public at a very reduced cost. Here's what you'll receive:

  • Our proprietary device bundle, including a wearable and three devices. Our discreet, low-profile wearable tracks activity and sleep patterns; it also serves as a medications reminder. Our devices include a smart scale, a pulse oximeter (measures BPM and pulse ox), and a blood pressure cuff. All devices including the wearable are Bluetooth-enabled, so they'll transmit the data directly to the nestCARE app automatically with a simple confirmation.
  • A subscription to our app (available on smartphones and tablets). Our app acts as a personal wellness coach, guiding users to develop and continue with health-at-home habits such as proper hydration, medication adherence, and regular movement. nestCARE tracks pain, mood and sleep patterns as well. Additionally, our app also acts as a communication hub for a user's designated support network and provides an all-in-one home base for a user's electronic medical records.
  • Thoughtful "how-to" videos and a step-by-step guide for program setup
  • nestCARE support

Gift nestCARE to a loved one who could benefit from our program (Mom/Dad, loved one) or purchase the program for yourself!

Imagine your medical history and baseline over time, all in one place. Imagine having a truly comprehensive picture of your health – see how your meds affect your mood or how sleep patterns affect your pain levels, for example.

There are 8760 hours in one year and we spend maybe two-three of them at a doctor's office. What can we truly glean about our health from those quick visits?

Hospital care is sick care. nestCARE is health at home on your watch, with a bigger picture focus.

The unique insights provided by our program will help you (or your loved ones) better understand your unique wellness snapshot. You can modify behaviors or medications over time, allowing for a better quality of life. (Less time spent sick means more time spent doing what you love!) 

If you're not ready to buy nestCARE just yet, no problem! You can also support our cause of bringing health into the home by supporting us at the $15 or $40 level. The $40 gets you a super-soft nestCARE tee, too!

FYI – the user must have access to a smartphone or tablet in order to participate in the program.

The Greater Good 

The impact a program like nestCARE could have on society could be monumental.

There are 70+ million "boomers and beyond" and veterans in the US alone. The reality is that both groups are incredibly underserved when it comes to supporting their health and wellness management while away from professional healthcare facilities... not only in the US, but globally as well.

Hospital care is sick care. Health and wellness management shouldn't be a passive enterprise. With 10k+ baby boomers turning 65 *every day* in America alone, the sustainability of our health care system directly depends on our personal involvement and interest in the care of ourselves and those we love.

We know that it's not just boomers + vets that can benefit from the nestCARE program, but we believe that focusing on these groups will allow us to have the greatest impact in changing the landscape of public health through holistic, community-based care.

We're Crowdfunding Because...

We want to bring nestCARE to the rest of the world.

Well-being begins at home, outside of the clinic or hospital setting. Knowledge is power and we want to help you better care for yourself or those you love by connecting the dots between vitals, meds, and general wellness.

Our goal is to provide you with genuinely useful wellness information that translates into powerful knowledge.

Any funds we raise from this campaign will go into our operating capital and will primarily be used for the following:

  1. Purchase of devices (we need a sizable inventory up front)
  2. Development / expansion of our analytics capabilities, providing unique insights for nestCARE users and their support network

All donations (save for where noted) will receive the actual nestCARE program – the device bundle + a designated subscription – at a discounted "pre-public launch" price. We've got some great perks on the way and a few different donation levels outlined here, too.

People who opt-in to purchase the program early will also be asked to join our nestCARE guide program. This community of thoughtful users and buyers will be asked for their feedback on the product in order to help guide our development and direction.

Our nestCARE guides will act a sort of consumer steering committee, helping us to get it right. We can't make this program a reality without your thoughtful and diverse feedback! 

Let's change the face health care together one "nest" at a time.

What sets nestCARE apart: real, human connection and encouragement. Change isn't easy and staying healthy requires effort. By connecting loved ones, friends, and medical professionals to a user at the point of healthcare management, we create accountability and community around an otherwise singular experience. It's why group fitness classes work and why you'll find online communities dedicated to paleo dieting. Encouragement breeds success!

By supporting our nestCARE efforts now, you will have a direct hand in not only making a difference in your life and that of your loved ones, but also in making it possible to deliver this program to countless individuals who'd benefit greatly from its existence.

The nestCARE device-based app allows those wanting or needing to get a better handle on their health at home efforts to actually SEE a comprehensive picture of their health and truly understand it, over time. I

+Imagine vital concerns no longer going unnoticed for weeks.

+Imagine medication adherence made simple.

+Imagine how developing healthy habits becomes less of a chore and more of a group exercise.

+Imagine true connection and support for those who need it most – our elders and our veterans.

We believe nestCARE can play a serious supporting role in making these things happen.

Risks/Challenges

Our small but seasoned team is hungry to make a positive change. That said, we know that getting folks to adopt new technologies isn't easy. We also know that society isn't quite there yet in making the connection between preventive wellness management and quality of life. We hope to help the millions of folks 55+ (as well as veterans and those with chronic conditions) to manage their wellness outside a clinical setting. 

Our single biggest challenge will be to help ensure adoption with our target demographic. Countless other companies have tried and failed to introduce technology to these groups –we cannot shy away from this reality. Instead, we choose to embrace it knowing that nestCARE has the potential to change the landscape of public health.

We overcome these challenges by:

  • Engaging with advocates/the support network from day one to ensure users aren't alone on their journey
  • Accepting that no user will immediately leverage every aspect of the nestCARE solution from day one
  • Recognizing that adoption and compliance will mimic a "slow boil" – every new nest is a small victory!
  • Expecting hiccups along the way and in turn, addressing and solving the problems through user education, outreach, and community management

Additional Ways to Support nestCARE

For those who are not yet ready or able to donate, there are still plenty of ways to support the nestCARE mission!

  • Become an active participant in our burgeoning nestCARE community on social media; find us on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn + via our message boards on our website. 
  • If you're passionate about what we're trying to accomplish (just as we are!) share our Indiegogo campaign link via your own social media channels... help us spread the word.
  • Send us your feedback and suggestions – We welcome them, truly! @nestCARE on Twitter or via email: info@mynest.care
  • Share your story with us – our founders have their stories... what's yours? We all face challenges in maintaining the health and wellness of ourselves and our friends/families. nestCARE connects families and support networks no matter the distance AND it provides a forum for holistic, community-based care.

story:
Right now we are in https://igg.me/at/dumyrobot

 

 

 

 


You must ensure that you are logged in to your Indiegogo account and sharing your own unique link in order for the Indiegogo system to credit you with your referral. You can find detailed instructions on how to participate by following this link: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-to-Participate-in-a-Referral-Contest

 

 

FAQ

 

 

How I can contact you?

You can contact us by email hello@projectdumy.com and we will respond within 24 hours.

Where is the data stored?

Dumy stores all data (photos, videos, data conversations, ...) in its internal memory (32 / 64GB depending on model). Dumy not use any cloud service.

Dumy need to be connected to the Internet?

No, it is not necessary. It is advisable to connect for updates, to use your remote APP, receive and send emails, or any other Internet service.

So Dumy has APP own?

Yes, he has an APP to control manually at home or over the Internet. The APP is free and available in the App Store, Google Play and Microsoft Store.

How I upgrade to Dumy?

Whenever there is an update, Dumy will warn you and ask if you want to update. (Dumy need to be connected to the Internet)

Which types of Internet connections has Dumy?

Dumy can connect through WiFi and 4G connection.

Dumy warranty?

Dumy has 1 year warranty. Dumy batteries are 1 year warranty.

I do if a battery is damaged?

If it is under warranty, we'll send you another free. If you are not under warranty, you can buy it in our future online store.

What do I do if Dumy not work?

Do not worry! We send a messenger to your home to pick up Dumy and give you another Dumy free. (Subject to warranty.)

Dumy speaks many languages?

Currently, Dummy speaks and understands English, German, Russian, French, Spanish, Chinese (traditional) and Japanese. In future updates we will be adding more languages.

When I get to Dumy, do I have to do?

Simple! Just turn on and say the language that you want to interact Dumy.

How cardiac monitoring work?

Dumy connects via Bluetooth to your cardiac monitoring bracelet and always alert. Should Dumy detects an abnormality in the heart rate, he will call the person or emergency service that you have scheduled. Dumy schedules are made by voice.

It supports any bracelet or watch cardiac monitoring?

Not all are compatible, so we recommend buying the next specific to Dumy and avoid compatibility problems.

Dumy is available in more colors?

In principle, Dumy is only available in black and white pearl color. We do not rule out the possibility of integrating more colors in the future.

What is special about Dumy?

Dumy is different. We have focused on that Dumy can hold long conversations and remember details of these discussions. You can connect to your TV, air conditioning, bulbs and smart plugs you have in your home. Dumy is good teaching and learning, giving you the ability to be gaining personality, making it a member of your family. Dumy has a fun and playful side. Dumy make you feel in the future without leaving the present.

.....??

I know what you're thinking. Dumy still does not breakfast and mows the lawn, but ... it's very affectionate and you fall in love! ;)

story:
Short Summary

I am Rebecca Underdown, licensed Acupuncturist and facial rejuvenation expert.   I founded Veridatta, which means truth, to supply the people I love with the most powerful anti-aging skincare that was organic and safe for the body.  It is 8 years later and we are launching our first proprietary, organic sunscreen, VITAL SUN, which protects and enhances the glow of the skin.

Sunscreen is an important part of our life because the sun is the number one cause of aging AND we are seeing higher rates of skin cancer than we have EVER seen before.  Wondering why?  With all of the sunscreen we use and buy?

Chemical sunscreens such as oxybenzone, avobenzone and octisalate, mimic the hormone estrogen causing disruptions in mood, weight, sex drive, and sleep.  The long term effects of these hormones are not predictable but the short term effects obviously are. 

Why don't we all use organic sunscreens in order to prevent these hormonal imbalances that affect our endocrine system?  

Until now, all other organic sunscreens have sucked. 

VITAL SUN is the planet's first organic sunscreen that does not suck. Since we are not all the same color but all skin does act the same, we created a sunscreen that matches your color tone AND, keeps you safe from the aging effects of the sun, AND is safe for your body.  

Sounds perfect?  It is.  But, we need your help to bring this sunscreen to the rest of the world.  Simply put, most people don't know the disastrous effects of chemical sunscreens.  It takes numbers to make a difference and we need all the eyes and ears we can get.  If we reach our goal, Veridatta will be able to properly distribute VITAL SUN around the world and educate people on the why  they should choose an organic sunscreen over a chemical sunscreen.  


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $50,000 to help open distribution channels in the US and Australia where skin cancer rates are the highest in the world.  Veridatta is a direct to consumer skincare company and we want to create the most convenient way for people to access VITAL SUN, the safest sunscreen in the world. 

Our perks allow your skin the opportunity to try our original Veridatta products!  The Perfect Prep gets your skin ready to apply our anti-aging sunscreen and our Clean and Go removes VITAL SUN completely assuring clear, vibrant skin after your day in the sun.  We not only want to keep your skin safe, but your eyes safe!  Our perks also include SPY sunglasses so you can have more fun in the sun. 

If we don't reach our goal, all of our funding will be focused just on the distribution in the US.  We are focused to partner with the right doors in order to share our skincare technology with as many people in our country as possible. 

The Impact

One in five Americans will be diagnosed with skincare in a lifetime.  That's a lot of skin cancer.  
20 million people in the US suffer from some sort of thyroid disease and 60% of those people are unaware of the why of their condition. 
These facts alone prove that we need sunscreen, but we need a safe one!  VITAL SUN is the solution to having more fun in the sun and looking good doing it.  
We are a team, dedicated to providing the world with the safest, most effective skincare we possibly can.  Experts in each of our fields, we are a gifted company in supplying products to people that are looking for an answer to their needs.  

Risks & Challenges

Our challenges include all other big companies that have market share and are invested in their chemical sunscreens that keep the skin from burning, but do not keep the body safe from hormonal disruptions.  

These companies have bigger buying power and a louder voice, but Veridatta has the passion to share a message that is in the BEST interest of all skin types and colors.  YOU ARE ENOUGH.  Each person, in each shade, deserves the safest sunscreen available and deserve looking good wearing it.  

We are dedicated to growing a group of passionate users and believers and we need your help to do so.  We are going to change the marketplace of sunscreen and it's going to start with VITAL SUN because it is the first organic sunscreen that does not suck .  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that's ok!  This campaign stands for truth and the love of skin, any and all color.  Help us bring it to life by sharing it with your friends.  Share this campaign on your Facebook page and we will give back to you with a personal thank you on your page.

story:
Why refugees, why kids, and why yoga?

In the spring of 2007, I took my first steps on foreign soil with a study abroad trip to Eastern Europe -- Moldova, Romania, and Hungary -- and I was thrilled, and terrified, to immerse myself in the politics and culture of the land. It was while there that I became aware of the terrible human rights violations that plague every country on this planet, some worse than others. In the gracious faces of the many orphans living just outside of Moldova's capital city of Chisinău, where we volunteered in partnership with the Clipa Siderală children’s foundation, I saw the damage that globalization, corruption, and apathy have caused in these forgotten areas of the world. I saw first-hand what happens to families ripped apart by human trafficking and broken political and economic systems, and it was thus in Eastern Europe that I first realized that I wanted to be a part of the fight against social injustice, both in my home country and on an international level.

Today, centuries after the globalization of forced labor practices, and well over a century after the abolition of slavery and involuntary servitude in the United States, an estimated 20- to 30-million people worldwide are victims of forced labor and slavery-like practices; and, every day, in numerous countries around the world, innocent people are persecuted, tortured, and even killed, by state and non-state actors, because of their sex, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, religious beliefs, and so forth. Many of these individuals, whether forced into modern-day slavery or whether persecuted simply for being themselves, lack the means, logistically and financially, to escape their situations, and, if and when they do escape, they often have nowhere safe to go and no one to whom they can turn for help. Then, even if and when they do receive help, they are still left to deal with the lasting emotional, mental, and physical trauma of the situations from which they came.

Thus, while education, community awareness, and advocacy are key for making strides to combat human rights violations on all levels, there is also a need for attention to healing, community, and lifelong wellness. This is where yoga comes in, for it is "[t]he necessity of pursuing happiness [that is] the foundation of liberty. As therefore the highest perfection of intellectual nature lies in a careful and constant pursuit of true and solid happiness; so the care of ourselves, that we mistake not imaginary for real happiness, is the necessary foundation of our liberty. The stronger ties we have to an unalterable pursuit of happiness in general, which is our greatest good, and which, as such, our desires always follow, the more are we free from any necessary determination of our will to any particular action" (John Locke, An Essay Concerning Human Understanding, 1894).

Health and wellness are fundamental to human happiness, and I believe that these elements are foundational for basic human rights. Yoga serves as a powerful tool for restoring peace and joy in a life imprisoned by trauma, depression, anger, and shame; and, for me, practicing yoga has been a source of strength and healing, through life's expected and unexpected trials and tribulations, showing me over the last 4 years that I am stronger, body and mind, than I ever thought I could be. It is this strength and the peace and stability that flow with it that bring me back to the mat day in and day out, and it is this strength, peace, and stability that I wish to share with others in becoming a yoga instructor. Therefore, in addition to pursuing human rights work from a policy/advocacy/legal background, I also hope, in my career, to focus on human rights work from a trauma-sensitive wellness perspective -- by sharing the healing and strengthening powers of yoga, mindful eating and living, creative arts, and outdoor adventure with those who may benefit from it most. 

I come to the table having studied, trained, and worked in the areas of trauma-informed care, expressive arts, immigrant detention facilities and populations, human rights and humanitarianism, outdoor education, and youth wellness and development; and it is my goal that by pursuing my yoga teacher certification, that I may teach my love of yoga and develop the same with young women from around this world. As such, I hope to serve as a source for research and healing for unaccompanied minors and youth ages 11-24 who have suffered human rights violations, helping these youth to overcome the horrors of their past, to choose and be empowered to move forward in life as their fullest potential selves, and to lead full, joyous lives untarnished by past harms. 

Our youth are our future, and in helping them, we help ourselves. 

The Timeline

I have the opportunity to complete my 200-hour yoga teacher certification at a discounted rate here in my home city of San Diego through my work trade program with Spirit Yoga. I will complete my yoga teacher training over a series of Wednesday nights and Saturday mornings beginning in mid-September and ending with my graduation ceremony on December 10, 2016. I have been volunteering/work-trading at yoga workshops and trauma-informed care/integrative healing seminars over the course of the last year and implementing these resources into my own research and planning; and I have already begun creating a business plan and establishing contacts, with the goal of having the project fully off the ground, with 501(c)(3) status and grant applications in the works, by the first of the year, 2017. As soon as I have confirmation that my chosen business name is reserved for me, from the State of California, I will share that information with my contributors and link my website and social media pages as well.

What will your donation do?

Funds raised will support:

  • Spirit Yoga teacher training program cost
  • Training/start-up materials and supplies
  • CPR+First Aid re-certification
  • Yoga Journal TeachersPlus Insurance
  • Nonprofit incorporation and tax-exempt status filing fees
  • Indiegogo fee (c'est la vie)

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute financially? That's okay... Or want to donate and do more? Even better! Here's what you can do to help:

  • Share my campaign with friends, family, and coworkers so that others may donate if they feel called to do so.
  • Hold on to your arts and crafts supplies, yoga and outdoor gear, and kids games and toys for me, and I will be able use them in my practice once I get it up and running.
  • Follow and share my Facebook and Instagram pages (links to be given here, soon).
  • Reach out - words of encouragement and love are also very powerful and much appreciated! 

Thank you, everyone!

With gratitude,

Love and light,

Jenny
